sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Robust network security with perimeter protection and zero trust (NET326)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过边界保护和零信任实现强大的网络安全 (NET326)
sessions.abstract: Learn about comprehensive network security on AWS, focusing on integrating Amazon CloudFront, AWS WAF, Network Firewall, and Verified Access (AVA) for zero-trust architecture. Discover how AVA implements access controls for both HTTPS and non-HTTPS applications, providing secure workforce access. Through real-world examples and design patterns, learn AWS-recommended practices for application security and service integration. Gain practical insights for implementing zero-trust frameworks and enhancing organizational network security on AWS.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 AWS 上的综合网络安全，重点介绍如何集成 Amazon CloudFront、AWS WAF、Network Firewall 和 Verified Access (AVA) 以构建零信任架构。了解 AVA 如何为 HTTPS 和非 HTTPS 应用程序实施访问控制，提供安全的员工访问。通过真实案例和设计模式，学习 AWS 推荐的应用程序安全和服务集成实践。获得实施零信任框架和增强组织在 AWS 上网络安全的实用见解。

presenter.name: Megha Kande
presenter.title: Senior Manager Product Management Tech - ES

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-Digital transformation excellence using agentic AI: From vision to victory-MAM204
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-使用智能体AI实现数字化转型卓越：从愿景到胜利-MAM204
sessions.abstract: Discover how customers are leveraging AWS AI-driven solutions to accelerate their cloud transformation journey, moving beyond traditional migration and modernization to achieve digital transformation excellence. This session showcases real-world experiences where organizations have integrated AI-powered accelerators with AWS cloud services to achieve 3x faster migration timelines and drive unprecedented business value. Learn actionable strategies and see demonstrations of how a large transformation project can become a digital enterprise enabler for your organization,
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解客户如何利用AWS AI驱动的解决方案加速其云转型之旅，超越传统的迁移和现代化，实现卓越的数字化转型。本次会议展示了真实案例，组织如何将AI驱动的加速器与AWS云服务集成，实现3倍更快的迁移时间线并推动前所未有的业务价值。学习可操作的策略，并观看大型转型项目如何成为组织数字化企业推动者的演示。

presenter.name: Brad Sevenko
presenter.title: Head of Agentic AI Transformation, ES

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A leader's guide to agentic AI (SNR201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 智能体AI领导者指南 (SNR201)
sessions.abstract: In a landscape of rapid AI evolution and daily headlines, senior leaders need clarity on what Agentic AI means for their business. This session cuts through the noise to provide a practical understanding of autonomous AI agents and their strategic implications for your organization. We will demystify Agentic AI and focus on what matters most to leaders. We will share how both management and architecture models will need to evolve to get value out of the autonomous AI systems.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在快速发展的AI环境和每日头条新闻中，高级领导者需要明确了解智能体AI对其业务的意义。本次会议将透过噪音，为您的组织提供对自主AI智能体及其战略影响的实用理解。我们将揭开智能体AI的神秘面纱，专注于对领导者最重要的内容。我们将分享管理和架构模型如何需要演进，以从自主AI系统中获得价值。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernizing Legacy Systems: Boeing's PLM Cloud Transformation (IND321)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 现代化遗留系统：波音公司的PLM云转型 (IND321)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Boeing transformed a complex, bureaucratic product lifecycle management (PLM) system into an agile, cost-effective powerhouse. In this talk, we'll explore how leveraging cloud technologies and embracing DevOps practices led to breakthrough improvements, including 95% faster deployments, 40% cost reduction, and enhanced global collaboration. We'll dive into the challenges of migrating critical systems, the innovative solutions implemented, and the outcomes realized. This journey demonstrates how large, established companies are revolutionizing their operations, boosting efficiency, and driving innovation by embracing AWS and modern development practices.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解波音如何将复杂、官僚化的产品生命周期管理(PLM)系统转变为敏捷、高效的强大平台。在本次演讲中,我们将探讨如何利用云技术和采用DevOps实践实现突破性改进,包括部署速度提升95%、成本降低40%以及增强全球协作。我们将深入探讨迁移关键系统的挑战、实施的创新解决方案以及实现的成果。这一历程展示了大型成熟企业如何通过采用AWS和现代开发实践来革新运营、提升效率并推动创新。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Breaking the legacy barrier: How AI is revolutionizing modernization (MAM402)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 打破传统壁垒：AI如何革命性地推动现代化改造 (MAM402)
sessions.abstract: Enterprises are trapped by legacy monoliths that drain billions in maintenance while stifling innovation. Traditional event storming relies on fragmented human memory and disappearing institutional knowledge. Learn how AWS GenAI & Agentic AI services  can now reverse-engineer entire codebases, automatically generating comprehensive event storming a& DDD based analysis  that captures bounded context and  hidden business rules and forgotten workflows in legacy applications. This AI-driven approach transforms months of code archaeology into days of systematic analysis. Organizations can modernize confidently, with early adopters reporting faster modernization with less timeline and fewer post-migration defects. Experience how AI precision is revolutionizing enterprise modernization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业被传统单体架构困扰，耗费数十亿资金进行维护，同时抑制创新。传统事件风暴依赖于碎片化的人类记忆和消失的机构知识。了解AWS GenAI和智能体AI服务如何逆向工程整个代码库，自动生成全面的事件风暴和DDD分析，捕获边界上下文以及遗留应用程序中隐藏的业务规则和被遗忘的工作流程。这种AI驱动的方法将数月的代码考古工作转化为数天的系统性分析。组织可以自信地进行现代化改造，早期采用者报告称现代化速度更快，时间线更短，迁移后缺陷更少。体验AI精准度如何革命性地改变企业现代化进程。

presenter.name: Anand Bilgaiyan
presenter.title: Senior Specialist Partner solution Architect Enterprise Transformation

presenter.name: Sreekumar Nair
presenter.title: Sr Spec SA Migration+Modernize
presenter.company: Amazon Web Services Singapore Private Limited

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS RTB Fabric: Real-time bidding workloads with your AdTech partners (IND379)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS RTB Fabric: 与您的广告技术合作伙伴进行实时竞价工作负载 (IND379)
sessions.abstract: Advertising technology (AdTech) companies buy, serve, and measure hundreds of billions of ads per day at single-digit millisecond latency. Explore how AWS RTB Fabric transforms real-time bidding workloads with an optimized, private network in the cloud. Industry leaders from Yahoo and Yieldmo share how they reduce costs, optimize development velocity, and improve performance for scaled real-time bidding workloads using AWS RTB Fabric. Hear AdTech experts share cloud-native best practices, architectures, and pitfalls to avoid when scaling ad platforms. Learn how AWS RTB Fabric can help you save up to 80% compared to standard cloud networking costs—without the need for upfront commitments.
sessions.abstract_cn: 广告技术（AdTech）公司每天以个位数毫秒级延迟购买、投放和衡量数千亿次广告。探索 AWS RTB Fabric 如何通过云中优化的私有网络转变实时竞价工作负载。来自 Yahoo 和 Yieldmo 的行业领导者分享他们如何使用 AWS RTB Fabric 降低成本、优化开发速度并提高大规模实时竞价工作负载的性能。聆听 AdTech 专家分享云原生最佳实践、架构以及在扩展广告平台时应避免的陷阱。了解 AWS RTB Fabric 如何帮助您与标准云网络成本相比节省高达 80% 的费用——无需预付承诺。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Allianz designed AIOps at enterprise scale (IND3321)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 安联如何设计企业级AIOps (IND3321)
sessions.abstract: Deploying applications that utilize large language models (LLMs) at enterprise scale presents unique challenges beyond traditional MLOps. In this session, aimed at developers and data scientists, learn how Allianz built a comprehensive AIOps framework for bringing AI-powered solutions to production. Discover how they leveraged Amazon Bedrock, Amazon SageMaker, and open-source solutions to create an ecosystem serving a wide range of user groups. Explore architectural patterns for ensuring consistency, security, and governance across AI implementations while enabling rapid deployment of new use cases. Gain insights into managing end-to-end LLM applications within complex organizational structures, balancing innovation with compliance in highly regulated environments.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在企业规模部署利用大型语言模型(LLM)的应用程序面临着超越传统MLOps的独特挑战。在本次面向开发人员和数据科学家的会议中,了解安联如何构建全面的AIOps框架,将AI驱动的解决方案投入生产。探索他们如何利用Amazon Bedrock、Amazon SageMaker和开源解决方案创建一个服务于广泛用户群体的生态系统。探讨确保AI实施中一致性、安全性和治理的架构模式,同时实现新用例的快速部署。深入了解在复杂组织结构中管理端到端LLM应用程序,在高度监管的环境中平衡创新与合规性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Implement Agentic AI at the edge for industrial automation (HMC317)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在边缘实施代理AI用于工业自动化 (HMC317)
sessions.abstract: Manufacturing and industrial operations demand real-time, intelligent decision-making in low-connectivity environments. This code talk demonstrates how to deploy SmolVLMs (small vision language models) and AI agents to automate site operations using AWS Outposts and Strands Agents. The solution enables on-premises, multilingual interaction with safety protocols, documentation, and equipment data to enhance the productivity and safety of frontline workers. You’ll learn how to combine edge infrastructure, publicly available models, and agent frameworks to deliver context-aware, resilient AI for industrial automation.
sessions.abstract_cn: 制造业和工业运营需要在低连接环境中进行实时、智能决策。本代码演讲展示了如何部署SmolVLMs（小型视觉语言模型）和AI代理，使用AWS Outposts和Strands Agents自动化现场运营。该解决方案支持本地部署、多语言交互，涵盖安全协议、文档和设备数据，以提升一线工作人员的生产力和安全性。您将学习如何结合边缘基础设施、公开可用模型和代理框架，为工业自动化提供上下文感知、弹性的AI解决方案。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - What's new with Amazon S3 (STG206)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon S3 的新功能 (STG206)
sessions.abstract: Amazon S3 consistently delivers new innovations to help you store, manage, analyze, and protect any amount of data for virtually any use case. Discover S3's latest breakthroughs including S3 Tables enhancements delivering fully managed Apache Iceberg support, S3 Vectors with native vector support at scale for AI applications, S3 Metadata for instant data discovery, and S3 Express One Zone's ultra-low latency performance. Learn how these innovations optimize for different data types and workloads, increase performance, simplify operations, and lower costs for analytics, AI/ML, and high-performance computing applications. This session provides implementation strategies, live demonstrations, and practical insights to immediately optimize your data architecture.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon S3 持续提供新的创新功能，帮助您存储、管理、分析和保护任何数量的数据，适用于几乎任何使用场景。了解 S3 的最新突破，包括提供完全托管 Apache Iceberg 支持的 S3 Tables 增强功能、为 AI 应用程序提供大规模原生向量支持的 S3 Vectors、用于即时数据发现的 S3 Metadata，以及 S3 Express One Zone 的超低延迟性能。了解这些创新如何针对不同的数据类型和工作负载进行优化，提高性能，简化操作，并降低分析、AI/ML 和高性能计算应用程序的成本。本会议提供实施策略、现场演示和实用见解，以立即优化您的数据架构。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Secure AI Agents Delivering Efficiency in Regulated Industries (WPS317)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在受监管行业中提供高效率的安全AI代理 (WPS317)
sessions.abstract: Regulated industries demand more than AI deployment—they require secure, efficient, and measurable outcomes. Holland Casino modernized cloud operations with a multi-agent system using AWS Strands Agents SDK, orchestrating agents for security, cost optimization, and operations support with fine-grained permissions. Sicoob, Brazil’s largest credit union, transformed operations with AI agents and digital employees: achieving 80%+ case resolution, cutting document processing time by 25%, deploying 80 digital employees to save 440,000 hours and R$23M, and automating 85% of credit operations. In this session, you’ll learn how organizations securely scale AI to cut costs, streamline compliance, and modernize operations.
sessions.abstract_cn: 受监管行业需要的不仅仅是AI部署——他们需要安全、高效且可衡量的结果。荷兰赌场使用AWS Strands Agents SDK的多智能体系统实现了云运营现代化，通过细粒度权限编排安全、成本优化和运营支持智能体。巴西最大的信用合作社Sicoob通过AI智能体和数字员工转型运营：实现80%+案例解决率，文档处理时间缩短25%，部署80个数字员工节省44万小时和2300万雷亚尔，自动化85%的信贷运营。在本次会议中，您将了解组织如何安全扩展AI以降低成本、简化合规并实现运营现代化。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Improve self-managed database performance and agility with Amazon FSx (STG337)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon FSx 提升自管理数据库的性能和敏捷性 (STG337)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Amazon FSx can modernize Microsoft SQL Server, PostgreSQL, Oracle DB, SAP HANA and others by supercharging performance and improving data protection and resilience. Learn how to choose the right FSx service (FSx for NetApp ONTAP, FSx for OpenZFS, and FSx for Windows File Server) to optimize the TCO of your database environments. We will review practical migration strategies and best practices for resilience including how to protect with replication with the ability to recover in minutes. This session is ideal for anyone who is migrating from on premises and wants to learn the latest in database performance tuning and high availability.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Amazon FSx 如何通过提升性能、改善数据保护和弹性来实现 Microsoft SQL Server、PostgreSQL、Oracle DB、SAP HANA 等数据库的现代化。学习如何选择合适的 FSx 服务（FSx for NetApp ONTAP、FSx for OpenZFS 和 FSx for Windows File Server）以优化数据库环境的总体拥有成本。我们将回顾实用的迁移策略和弹性最佳实践，包括如何通过复制进行保护并在几分钟内实现恢复。本课程非常适合正在从本地环境迁移并希望了解最新数据库性能调优和高可用性技术的人员。

presenter.name: Aaron Dailey
presenter.title: World Wide Specialist Solutions Architect, File

services: Amazon FSx for Windows File Server

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-Finding the Noisy Neighbor: Patterns for Per‑Customer Performance at Scale-MAM354
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-寻找噪声邻居：大规模按客户性能模式-MAM354
sessions.abstract: Zendesk chose Datadog for observability (APM, Log Management) to boost performance, resolve issues faster, and optimize infrastructure. Datadog's tools provided essential per-tenant visibility for their high-cardinality, multi-tenant platform, guiding code and infrastructure decisions. Datadog also helps Zendesk optimize AWS usage in real-time. This led to faster detection and resolution, fewer cross-tenant incidents, right-sized compute/storage, and better customer experience. Attendees will learn how to de-risk migrations and accelerate modernization with Datadog and AWS. This presentation is brought to you by Datadog, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: Zendesk选择Datadog进行可观测性（APM、日志管理）以提升性能、更快解决问题并优化基础设施。Datadog的工具为其高基数、多租户平台提供了必要的按租户可见性，指导代码和基础设施决策。Datadog还帮助Zendesk实时优化AWS使用。这带来了更快的检测和解决、更少的跨租户事件、合理调整的计算/存储以及更好的客户体验。与会者将学习如何使用Datadog和AWS降低迁移风险并加速现代化。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Datadog提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building High-Performance, Secure networks for Hybrid and Multicloud (HMC209)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建高性能、安全的混合云和多云网络 (HMC209)
sessions.abstract: Enterprise data and AI workloads are more distributed, and more valuable —and more mobile—than ever. Training AI models, running inference at scale, migrating workloads, or sharing datasets across hybrid and multicloud environments, requires a network built for security, performance, flexibility, and cost control. In this session, we’ll share best practices for building hybrid and multicloud architectures that ensure your data is in the right place, at the right time—without unnecessary risk. You’ll walk away with best practices for selecting the right networking constructs for mission critical, hybrid multicloud connectivity. This presentation is brought to you by Equinix, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业数据和AI工作负载比以往任何时候都更加分布式、更有价值，也更具流动性。训练AI模型、大规模运行推理、迁移工作负载或在混合云和多云环境中共享数据集，都需要一个为安全性、性能、灵活性和成本控制而构建的网络。在本次会议中，我们将分享构建混合云和多云架构的最佳实践，确保您的数据在正确的时间出现在正确的位置——而不会带来不必要的风险。您将了解到为关键任务混合多云连接选择正确网络构造的最佳实践。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Equinix为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Learn How Sky Powers the Future of Streaming with Redis Cloud (API209)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 了解Sky如何利用Redis Cloud推动流媒体的未来发展 (API209)
sessions.abstract: When Sky streamed to 23 million viewers during the Peacock-exclusive NFL Wild Card game, bookmarking ensured a seamless experience, handling up to 140,000+ writes per second during live events and 116,000 during record-breaking moments. To meet these demands, Redis Cloud delivered: cross-region active-active replication for global sync, sub-millisecond latency for spikes, and intelligent auto-scaling. Its write-behind capabilities cut costs and enabled a long-awaited AWS Keyspaces migration. Now, Sky’s GenAI platform, Genapi, leverages Redis Cloud's vector search and semantic caching to transform content discovery. Redis Cloud isn’t just solving scale, it’s powering Sky’s AI-driven future. This presentation is brought to you by Redis, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 当Sky在Peacock独家NFL外卡赛期间向2300万观众进行流媒体直播时，书签功能确保了无缝体验，在直播活动期间处理高达140,000+次/秒的写入操作，在创纪录时刻处理116,000次写入。为满足这些需求，Redis Cloud提供了：跨区域主-主复制实现全球同步、亚毫秒级延迟应对峰值、以及智能自动扩展。其写后模式降低了成本并实现了期待已久的AWS Keyspaces迁移。现在，Sky的GenAI平台Genapi利用Redis Cloud的向量搜索和语义缓存来变革内容发现。Redis Cloud不仅解决了规模问题，更为Sky的AI驱动未来提供动力。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Redis赞助提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-Unlock the power of Kiro steering: Your blueprint for scalable development-DVT340
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-释放 Kiro 引导的力量：可扩展开发的蓝图-DVT340
sessions.abstract: Transform your team's development experience with Kiro's powerful steering capabilities. Learn how to create and maintain steering files that act as your project's source of truth, ensuring every team member follows the same conventions for components, API endpoints, and tests. We'll demonstrate how this living documentation evolves alongside your codebase, capturing crucial decisions and patterns while reducing cognitive overhead. Say goodbye to repetitive explanations of coding standards and hello to consistent, automated code generation that perfectly aligns with your team's established workflows and best practices.
sessions.abstract_cn: 通过 Kiro 强大的引导功能改变您团队的开发体验。了解如何创建和维护引导文件，使其成为项目的真实来源，确保每个团队成员遵循相同的组件、API 端点和测试约定。我们将演示这种动态文档如何随代码库演进，捕获关键决策和模式，同时减少认知负担。告别重复解释编码标准，迎接与团队既定工作流程和最佳实践完美契合的一致性自动化代码生成。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build generative and agentic AI applications on-premises & at the edge (HMC308)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在本地和边缘构建生成式和代理式AI应用程序 (HMC308)
sessions.abstract: As customers scale generative AI and agentic AI implementations from pilots to production, they need to balance speed of innovation with data sovereignty requirements, low-latency edge processing needs, and space, power, and cost efficiency. This session explores how to build generative and agentic AI solutions using AWS Local Zones, AWS Outposts, and AWS Dedicated Local Zones. Discover architectural patterns and best practices for deploying foundation models across distributed locations. Learn how to implement Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) with locally stored data. Gain insights into strategies for model selection and optimization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着客户将生成式AI和智能体AI实施从试点扩展到生产环境,他们需要在创新速度与数据主权要求、低延迟边缘处理需求以及空间、功耗和成本效率之间取得平衡。本次会议探讨如何使用AWS Local Zones、AWS Outposts和AWS Dedicated Local Zones构建生成式和智能体AI解决方案。了解跨分布式位置部署基础模型的架构模式和最佳实践。学习如何使用本地存储的数据实现检索增强生成(RAG)。深入了解模型选择和优化策略。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Capital One: Building resilient systems by engineering for five nines (IND3308)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Capital One：通过工程化实现五个九可用性来构建弹性系统 (IND3308)
sessions.abstract: 99.999% availability—less than five minutes of downtime per year—is the gold standard for mission-critical applications. This session dives deep into architectural strategies to achieve such availability using AWS. We'll explore fault-tolerant patterns such as multi-Region deployments, active-active failover, circuit breakers, bulkheads, chaos testing, and event-driven designs. Learn how services like Amazon S3, Amazon DynamoDB Global Tables, and AWS Lambda can eliminate single points of failure. We’ll cover SLAs, SLOs, and engineering observability and automation to detect and respond to failures within milliseconds. Case studies and practical design guidance make this session ideal for architects and engineers building for extreme reliability.
sessions.abstract_cn: 99.999%可用性——每年停机时间少于五分钟——是关键任务应用程序的黄金标准。本次会议深入探讨使用AWS实现此类可用性的架构策略。我们将探索容错模式，如多区域部署、主-主故障转移、断路器、舱壁、混沌测试和事件驱动设计。了解Amazon S3、Amazon DynamoDB全球表和AWS Lambda等服务如何消除单点故障。我们将涵盖SLA、SLO以及工程可观测性和自动化，以在毫秒内检测和响应故障。案例研究和实用设计指导使本次会议成为构建极端可靠性的架构师和工程师的理想选择。

presenter.name: Enrique Bastante
presenter.title: Sr. Customer Solutions Manager, AWS Strategic Accounts

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Developing AI Solutions: What Every Developer Should Know (TNC207)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 开发AI解决方案：每个开发者都应该知道的事项 (TNC207)
sessions.abstract: What skills will set you apart as a generative AI developer? Drawing from the AWS Certification team's 2025 market research and insights from AWS service teams, discover the competencies employers are actively seeking. Learn how AWS Certifications can accelerate your journey in building AI-powered solutions, while helping organizations identify and validate the talent they need for successful generative AI adoption.
sessions.abstract_cn: 作为生成式AI开发者，哪些技能能让你脱颖而出？基于AWS认证团队2025年市场研究以及AWS服务团队的洞察，了解雇主正在积极寻求的能力。学习AWS认证如何加速你在构建AI驱动解决方案方面的发展历程，同时帮助组织识别和验证成功采用生成式AI所需的人才。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Data protection strategies for AI data foundation (AIM339)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI数据基础的数据保护策略 (AIM339)
sessions.abstract: Build robust security frameworks for AI implementations through hands-on coding. We'll implement data protection patterns, secure prompt handling, and PII detection. Code along as we create privacy-preserving pipelines in SageMaker, configure IAM policies for model access control, and automate compliance checks with AWS Config. Develop defenses against prompt injection attacks, implement differential privacy techniques, and build CloudTrail audit trails. Leave with production-ready code templates for governance guardrails and technical safeguards that protect sensitive data throughout the AI lifecycle while enabling innovation and maintaining trust in your AI applications.
sessions.abstract_cn: 通过实践编码为AI实施构建强大的安全框架。我们将实现数据保护模式、安全提示处理和PII检测。跟随编码，在SageMaker中创建隐私保护管道，配置模型访问控制的IAM策略，并使用AWS Config自动化合规性检查。开发针对提示注入攻击的防御措施，实现差分隐私技术，并构建CloudTrail审计跟踪。您将获得用于治理护栏和技术保障措施的生产就绪代码模板，这些模板在整个AI生命周期中保护敏感数据，同时促进创新并维护对AI应用程序的信任。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Staying Ahead: Smart Strategies for Effective Vulnerability Management (SEC316)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 保持领先：有效漏洞管理的智能策略 (SEC316)
sessions.abstract: This session explores modern  vulnerability management strategies for cloud and development environments.  We'll demonstrate how to integrate automated scanning and continuous  monitoring for both AWS compute resources and Git code repositories. Learn  how to identify misconfigurations, unpatched software, and insecure code  dependencies before they become threats. Attendees will gain practical  insights into prioritizing and remediating vulnerabilities across  infrastructure and code, unifying security efforts from development to  deployment. Join us to discover actionable techniques for reducing risk and  strengthening your organization's security posture in today's dynamic,  cloud-native landscape.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨云环境和开发环境的现代漏洞管理策略。我们将演示如何为AWS计算资源和Git代码仓库集成自动化扫描和持续监控。学习如何在错误配置、未修补软件和不安全代码依赖项成为威胁之前识别它们。与会者将获得跨基础设施和代码优先处理和修复漏洞的实用见解，统一从开发到部署的安全工作。加入我们，发现在当今动态的云原生环境中降低风险和加强组织安全态势的可行技术。

presenter.name: Anthony Verleysen
presenter.title: Sr. Product Manager Technical - External Services

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Balancing Agility and Compliance feat. The Digital Agency of Japan (COP349)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 平衡敏捷性与合规性，日本数字厅案例分享 (COP349)
sessions.abstract: Regulated industries face the challenge of innovating with agility while addressing stringent security and compliance requirements in the cloud. In this session, learn how the Japanese government successfully implemented a centralized governance model for cloud adoption across 30 ministries and 1,700 local government, enabling over 5,000 accounts to be managed seamlessly. With AWS Cloud Governance services like AWS Control Tower, AWS Config, and AWS Security Hub, regulated and public sector industries can streamline operations, enhance governance, and meet evolving compliance requirements to strike a balance between central control and local autonomy.
sessions.abstract_cn: 受监管行业面临着在云端以敏捷性进行创新的同时满足严格安全和合规要求的挑战。在本次会议中，了解日本政府如何成功实施集中治理模型，在30个部委和1,700个地方政府中推进云采用，实现对超过5,000个账户的无缝管理。通过AWS云治理服务如AWS Control Tower、AWS Config和AWS Security Hub，受监管和公共部门行业可以简化运营、增强治理并满足不断发展的合规要求，在中央控制和地方自治之间取得平衡。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernize SQL Server & .NET Together with AWS Transform's New AI Agent (MAM340)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用AWS Transform的新AI代理共同现代化SQL Server和.NET (MAM340)
sessions.abstract: Want to cut your Microsoft licensing costs by up to 70% while modernizing SQL Server workloads? Join us to explore AWS Transform's groundbreaking new capability that automates end-to-end migration from SQL Server to Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL. Learn how this powerful solution converts your entire SQL Server stack - from schemas and stored procedures to embedded logic - while accelerating modernization timelines by up to 5x. In this session, we'll demonstrate how AWS Transform helps you achieve enhanced security, performance, and scalability through purpose-built AWS services, revolutionizing your database modernization journey.
sessions.abstract_cn: 想要将 Microsoft 许可成本降低高达 70% 并同时实现 SQL Server 工作负载的现代化吗?加入我们,探索 AWS Transform 的突破性新功能,该功能可自动化完成从 SQL Server 到 Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL 的端到端迁移。了解这一强大解决方案如何转换您的整个 SQL Server 堆栈——从架构和存储过程到嵌入式逻辑——同时将现代化时间表加速高达 5 倍。在本次会议中,我们将演示 AWS Transform 如何通过专门构建的 AWS 服务帮助您实现增强的安全性、性能和可扩展性,彻底改变您的数据库现代化之旅。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Zero-Downtime at Scale: Migrating Peacock's Global Streaming to EKS (IND3325)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 规模化零停机：将Peacock全球流媒体迁移至EKS (IND3325)
sessions.abstract: Journey through the strategic migration of a major streaming platform from self-managed Kubernetes to Amazon EKS. Learn how, in less than 12 months, a multi-region transition was orchestrated spanning 200+ applications with zero service disruption for more than 41M subscribers. We'll explore the technical patterns, infrastructure automation, and collaboration strategies that enabled seamless cutover while maintaining developer productivity. Discover practical insights for planning large-scale EKS migrations and building resilient multi-region architectures.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索一个主要流媒体平台从自管理Kubernetes到Amazon EKS的战略迁移之旅。了解如何在不到12个月的时间内，协调跨越200多个应用程序的多区域转换，为超过4100万订阅者实现零服务中断。我们将探讨技术模式、基础设施自动化和协作策略，这些策略实现了无缝切换，同时保持了开发人员的生产力。发现规划大规模EKS迁移和构建弹性多区域架构的实用见解。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Go-to-market in today's political climate: a policy and AWS Marketplace overview
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 当前政治环境下的市场进入策略：政策与 AWS Marketplace 概述
sessions.abstract: Discover how open source projects can transform into profitable businesses through managed services and AI agents, leveraging AWS Global Startup Program support for technical and go-to-market success.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解开源项目如何通过托管服务和AI代理转变为盈利业务,利用AWS全球初创企业计划支持实现技术和市场推广成功。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A tale of two transactions (DAT455)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 两个事务的故事 (DAT455)
sessions.abstract: If you are curious how transactions are processed differently in Amazon Aurora DSQL versus Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL, join Marc Brooker, AWS VP and Distinguished Engineer, as he dives into how transactions are processed in these two databases – right down to the code level. You’ll understand how each database handles multiple transactions accessing or changing the data at the same time, why they use different approaches, and what that means for your architectures. You’ll leave with a deep intuition for what makes database workloads scale and ability to think about how to apply those lessons to your architectures and code.
sessions.abstract_cn: 如果您想了解 Amazon Aurora DSQL 与 Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL 在事务处理方面的差异，请加入 AWS 副总裁兼杰出工程师 Marc Brooker 的讲解，他将深入探讨这两个数据库如何处理事务——直至代码层面。您将了解每个数据库如何处理多个事务同时访问或更改数据，它们为何使用不同的方法，以及这对您的架构意味着什么。您将深入理解数据库工作负载扩展的本质，并能够将这些经验应用到您的架构和代码中。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Metrics to Management: Practical Observability on EKS (DEV202)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从指标到管理：EKS 上的实用可观测性 (DEV202)
sessions.abstract: This talk shows how to bake observability into Amazon EKS so you can see exactly how each deployment impacts your SLOs. I’ll cover setting up Prometheus and Grafana, cutting noise with smarter instrumentation, and turning metrics into release decisions. You’ll leave with configs and patterns you can drop straight into your own clusters using best practice.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本讲座展示了如何将可观测性融入 Amazon EKS，以便您能够准确了解每次部署对 SLO 的影响。我将介绍如何设置 Prometheus 和 Grafana，通过更智能的监控手段减少噪音，以及将指标转化为发布决策。您将获得可以直接应用到自己集群中的配置和模式，这些都遵循最佳实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Integration patterns for distributed systems (API315)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 分布式系统的集成模式 (API315)
sessions.abstract: Today's applications are interconnected: they expose APIs, publish events, call third-party services, and externalize states. They must therefore address the fundamental challenges of distributed systems, such as out-of-order delivery, retries, idempotence, and partial failures. To address these challenges, architects must carefully evaluate integration options while considering how to manage complex system interactions. In this session, learn about common design trade-offs for distributed systems and how to navigate them with design patterns, illustrated by examples.
sessions.abstract_cn: 当今的应用程序是相互连接的：它们公开API、发布事件、调用第三方服务并外部化状态。因此，它们必须解决分布式系统的基本挑战，例如乱序交付、重试、幂等性和部分故障。为了应对这些挑战，架构师必须仔细评估集成选项，同时考虑如何管理复杂的系统交互。在本次会议中，了解分布式系统的常见设计权衡以及如何通过设计模式来应对这些权衡，并通过示例进行说明。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Break through AI performance and cost barriers with AWS Trainium (AIM201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 借助 AWS Trainium 突破 AI 性能和成本障碍 (AIM201)
sessions.abstract: Generative AI deployments face challenges with high computing costs and complex scaling requirements. AWS Trainium2 and Inferentia2 chips deliver compelling price-performance for both training and inference workloads. In this session, discover innovations that enable efficient scaling of advanced AI workloads, from training and serving MoE models to deploying agentic systems with reasoning capabilities. Learn how customers are achieving exceptional performance while significantly reducing costs.
sessions.abstract_cn: 生成式AI部署面临高计算成本和复杂扩展需求的挑战。AWS Trainium2和Inferentia2芯片为训练和推理工作负载提供出色的性价比。在本次会议中，探索能够高效扩展高级AI工作负载的创新技术，从训练和服务MoE模型到部署具有推理能力的智能体系统。了解客户如何在显著降低成本的同时实现卓越性能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Aurora DSQL: A developer's perspective  (DAT401)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Aurora DSQL：开发者视角 (DAT401)
sessions.abstract: In this live coding session, we'll show you how to work with Amazon Aurora DSQL from a developer's perspective. We'll develop a sample application to highlight some of the ways developing for Aurora DSQL is different than PostgreSQL. We'll cover authentication and connection management, optimistic concurrency transaction patterns, primary key selection, analyzing query performance, and best practices.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在这个实时编程会话中，我们将从开发者的角度向您展示如何使用 Amazon Aurora DSQL。我们将开发一个示例应用程序，重点介绍为 Aurora DSQL 开发与 PostgreSQL 开发的不同之处。我们将涵盖身份验证和连接管理、乐观并发事务模式、主键选择、查询性能分析以及最佳实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From AI Promise to KPI Impact: Connected Agents & Orchestration (API204)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从AI承诺到KPI影响：连接代理与编排 (API204)
sessions.abstract:
Enterprise success hinges on KPIs buried in complex, cross-functional processes. Yet most AI agents today lack the enterprise context to deliver meaningful impact, leaving teams stuck playing defense.

With AI agents delivered through AWS Bedrock, Workato brings the orchestration and enterprise context required to turn promise into KPI impact. Capabilities like IDP, decision models, data pipeline workflows, enterprise MCP, and agentic collaboration unite on Workato’s platform—empowering context-powered agents that shift teams from defense to offense and drive measurable business outcomes. This presentation is brought to you by Workato, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn:
企业成功取决于隐藏在复杂跨职能流程中的关键绩效指标。然而，当今大多数AI代理缺乏企业上下文来产生有意义的影响，导致团队陷入被动防守状态。

通过AWS Bedrock交付的AI代理，Workato带来了将承诺转化为KPI影响所需的编排和企业上下文。IDP、决策模型、数据管道工作流、企业MCP和代理协作等功能在Workato平台上统一——赋能具备上下文感知的代理，使团队从防守转向进攻，推动可衡量的业务成果。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Workato为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Browser Power: Building MCP Tools That Do Real Work (AIM224)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 浏览器力量：构建真正有效的MCP工具 (AIM224)
sessions.abstract: Most AI tools just retrieve info—but what if they could actually do things, like book a tennis court, fill out a form, or navigate a UI? In this talk, we’ll go beyond APIs and show how to build browser-powered MCP tools that complete real tasks. I’ll demo an MCP server on Cloudflare Workers using browser rendering to log in, solve CAPTCHAs, handle 2FA, and book a court. We’ll cover the anatomy of effective tools, lessons learned (including tool poisoning), and what makes a “real tool” vs. a brittle script—so you can design safe, composable, and useful tools in the wild. This presentation is brought to you by Cloudflare, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 大多数AI工具只是检索信息——但如果它们能够实际执行任务，比如预订网球场、填写表单或导航用户界面会怎样？在这次演讲中，我们将超越API，展示如何构建基于浏览器的MCP工具来完成实际任务。我将演示一个在Cloudflare Workers上运行的MCP服务器，使用浏览器渲染来登录、解决验证码、处理双因素认证并预订球场。我们将涵盖有效工具的结构、经验教训（包括工具中毒）以及"真正的工具"与脆弱脚本的区别——这样您就可以设计出安全、可组合且实用的野外工具。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Cloudflare为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Digital sovereignty and data residency w/ AWS Hybrid and Edge services (HMC310)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过AWS混合云和边缘服务实现数字主权和数据驻留 (HMC310)
sessions.abstract: Countries around the world are increasingly introducing or updating data residency and digital sovereignty laws that require at least one copy, or sometimes all data, to be stored or processed in a specific geographic or sovereign location. This introduces new challenges for customers. This session explores how AWS services, including AWS Dedicated Local Zones, AWS Local Zones, and AWS Outposts can help with your digital sovereignty use cases. We’ll examine best practices for data residency, security controls, and operational consistency across deployments at the edge.
sessions.abstract_cn: 世界各国正在越来越多地引入或更新数据驻留和数字主权法律,这些法律要求至少一份副本,有时是所有数据,必须存储或处理在特定的地理位置或主权区域内。这给客户带来了新的挑战。本次会议探讨 AWS 服务,包括 AWS Dedicated Local Zones、AWS Local Zones 和 AWS Outposts,如何帮助您应对数字主权使用场景。我们将研究边缘部署中数据驻留、安全控制和运营一致性的最佳实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Personalize customer experiences at scale w/ AI-powered Amazon Connect (BIZ219)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用AI驱动的Amazon Connect大规模个性化客户体验 (BIZ219)
sessions.abstract: Customers today expect personalized and relevant service at every touchpoint in their journey. Join this session to hear from AWS and your peers how you can gain a 360-degree customer view with Amazon Connect - utilizing advanced analytics and AI-driven capabilities to centralize digital outbound campaigns, empower agents with unified experiences, and proactively engage customers. Walk away with insights on how to turn casual customers into passionate advocates through personalized interactions and streamlined operations.
sessions.abstract_cn: 当今客户期望在其旅程的每个接触点都能获得个性化和相关的服务。加入本次会议，聆听AWS和您的同行分享如何通过Amazon Connect获得360度客户视图 - 利用高级分析和AI驱动的功能来集中数字化外呼活动，为座席提供统一体验，并主动与客户互动。通过个性化互动和简化运营，了解如何将普通客户转变为忠实拥护者。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming Cable Network Reliability with Agentic AI & Graphs (IND3332)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用智能体AI和图技术转变有线网络可靠性 (IND3332)
sessions.abstract: Join this technical deep-dive into Cox Communications' Service Health, an AWS-powered solution transforming network management into intelligent, autonomous operations. Discover how Cox achieves point-of-interest event isolation using Amazon Neptune Graph Database, processing sub-second telemetry across 26 million topology nodes and profiling events in seconds. Learn how Cox built network data foundations enabling Agentic AI with Amazon Bedrock and Strands Agents to proactively detect and isolate faults. Explore the AWS stack powering topology hygiene management and Cox's vision for fully autonomous network operations delivering faster outage detection, improved prioritization, and intelligent remediation at scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 深入探讨Cox Communications的服务健康解决方案，这是一个由AWS驱动的方案，将网络管理转变为智能自主运营。了解Cox如何使用Amazon Neptune图数据库实现关注点事件隔离，在2600万拓扑节点上处理亚秒级遥测数据并在数秒内完成事件分析。学习Cox如何构建网络数据基础，通过Amazon Bedrock和Strands Agents实现代理AI，主动检测和隔离故障。探索支持拓扑卫生管理的AWS技术栈，以及Cox对全自主网络运营的愿景，实现更快的故障检测、改进的优先级排序和大规模智能修复。

presenter.name: Joseph Keller
presenter.title: VP Network Analytics and Reliability Enablement

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Architecting scalable and secure agentic AI with Bedrock AgentCore (AIM431)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Bedrock AgentCore 构建可扩展且安全的智能体 AI (AIM431)
sessions.abstract: Go deep into how AgentCore works under the hood. This technical deep-dive session breaks down the ReAct loop—how agents iteratively reason, plan, and perform tool calls to accomplish complex goals. Learn how context management, memory, and data grounding shape each reasoning step and response. Explore how AgentCore operationalizes this loop with modular services: Runtime for scalable execution, Gateway for dynamic tool and data access, Policy for deterministic controls, Observability for monitoring agent behavior, and Evaluations for continuous quality improvements. Understand how AgentCore’s architecture enables reliable, secure, and production-ready deployment of autonomous, data-driven AI agents.
sessions.abstract_cn: 深入探讨 AgentCore 的底层工作原理。本技术深度剖析会议将分解 ReAct 循环——代理如何迭代推理、规划并执行工具调用以完成复杂目标。了解上下文管理、内存和数据基础如何塑造每个推理步骤和响应。探索 AgentCore 如何通过模块化服务来操作此循环：Runtime 用于可扩展执行，Gateway 用于动态工具和数据访问，Policy 用于确定性控制，Observability 用于监控代理行为，以及 Evaluations 用于持续质量改进。理解 AgentCore 的架构如何实现可靠、安全且可用于生产环境的自主数据驱动型 AI 代理部署。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagining large-scale migration planning with agentic AI (MAM226)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用智能体AI重新构想大规模迁移规划 (MAM226)
sessions.abstract: Dive deep into strategies for planning your large-scale AWS migration. In this session, we'll explore how to use AWS Transform and AI agents to accelerate your discovery, assessment, and planning for large-scale migrations. We will show you how planning migrations in spreadsheets is a thing of the past and how AI agents remove the heavy manual work of curating discovery data, building a business case, and planning a migration.
sessions.abstract_cn: 深入探讨规划大规模 AWS 迁移的策略。在本次会议中，我们将探索如何使用 AWS Transform 和 AI 代理来加速大规模迁移的发现、评估和规划。我们将向您展示在电子表格中规划迁移已成为过去，以及 AI 代理如何消除整理发现数据、构建业务案例和规划迁移的繁重手动工作。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Binge-worthy: Netflix's journey to Amazon Aurora at scale (DAT322)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 值得狂欢：Netflix 大规模迁移至 Amazon Aurora 的历程 (DAT322)
sessions.abstract: In this session, learn how Netflix successfully orchestrated the migration of terabytes of mission-critical data across 100+ clusters to Amazon Aurora while ensuring continuous service for millions of global subscribers. Through a detailed examination of their innovative approach combining AWS Database Migration Service and Netflix's proprietary Data Streaming Platform, explore how they achieved near-zero downtime and maintained data integrity throughout this complex transition. Technical leaders will gain actionable insights into architecting similar migrations, managing risks, and leveraging AWS tools effectively. Join us to learn how Netflix's experience can inform your own database modernization strategy.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，了解Netflix如何成功编排数TB关键任务数据在100多个集群间迁移至Amazon Aurora，同时确保为全球数百万订阅用户提供持续服务。通过详细分析他们结合AWS数据库迁移服务和Netflix专有数据流平台的创新方法，探索他们如何在这一复杂转换过程中实现近零停机时间并保持数据完整性。技术领导者将获得关于架构类似迁移、管理风险和有效利用AWS工具的可操作见解。加入我们，了解Netflix的经验如何为您自己的数据库现代化策略提供指导。

presenter.name: Vlad Vlasceanu
presenter.title: Sr. Principal SA, Database Tech Leader

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Builder's Job Is Not to Build: A Mindset for Better Outcomes (DEV347)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建者的工作不是构建：实现更好成果的思维方式 (DEV347)
sessions.abstract: Builders often form their identity around the things they build and their chosen tools. This is natural, as it reflects how they spend their time and direct their focus. But output and tools should not define the builder's role. When attachment to building becomes too strong, the primary task of problem-solving gets overlooked. A builder's true job is solving problems, which may or may not require building something. Building an outcome-focused mindset requires understanding its challenges and seeing how it reshapes our approach to system design.
sessions.abstract_cn: 构建者往往围绕他们构建的事物和所选择的工具来形成自己的身份认同。这很自然，因为这反映了他们如何分配时间和集中精力。但产出和工具不应定义构建者的角色。当对构建的执着过于强烈时，解决问题这一首要任务就会被忽视。构建者的真正工作是解决问题，这可能需要也可能不需要构建某些东西。建立以结果为导向的思维方式需要理解其挑战，并了解它如何重塑我们的系统设计方法。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Tapping into the Power of Agentic AI: Driving Mission Success with NVIDIA & AWS
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 释放智能体AI的力量：携手NVIDIA与AWS推动任务成功
sessions.abstract: Step into the future of autonomous systems with NVIDIA Agentic AI, where intelligent agents aren't just reactive, they're proactive, collaborators. In this session, discover how NVIDIA is harnessing the power of accelerated computing to build, train, and deploy agentic AI systems that reason, plan, and adapt in complex environments. Whether optimizing logistics, enhancing decision support, or enabling real-time simulations in digital twins, these AI agents are transforming how government and industry operate at the edge and in the cloud. Join us for a deep dive into use cases, cutting-edge architectures, and the tools that make scalable, secure agentic AI a reality today. This presentation is brought to you by NVIDIA, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 踏入NVIDIA Agentic AI自主系统的未来，在这里智能代理不仅仅是被动响应，更是主动的协作者。在本次会议中，探索NVIDIA如何利用加速计算的力量来构建、训练和部署能够在复杂环境中进行推理、规划和适应的代理AI系统。无论是优化物流、增强决策支持，还是在数字孪生中实现实时模拟，这些AI代理正在改变政府和行业在边缘和云端的运营方式。加入我们，深入了解用例、前沿架构以及使可扩展、安全的代理AI成为现实的工具。本演示由AWS合作伙伴NVIDIA为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Automating Amazon Fulfillment Center Operations with Generative AI (IND393)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用生成式AI自动化亚马逊履行中心运营 (IND393)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Amazon improved fulfillment center launches by building a computer vision solution using Amazon Bedrock, Amazon Nova Pro and Anthropic Claude models. In this session, we discuss architectural decisions that enable automated image detection at scale, reducing verification time by over 60%. We explore our journey from concept to deployment, sharing learnings on rapid prototyping, experimentation, and on-site pilot testing. Join this session to learn about practical approaches to optimize performance, resilience, and cost, and how you can apply these practices in building your own operational readiness solution.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解亚马逊如何使用 Amazon Bedrock、Amazon Nova Pro 和 Anthropic Claude 模型构建计算机视觉解决方案，从而改进履行中心的启动流程。在本次会议中，我们将讨论能够实现大规模自动化图像检测的架构决策，将验证时间缩短了 60% 以上。我们将探讨从概念到部署的整个过程，分享在快速原型设计、实验和现场试点测试方面的经验教训。参加本次会议，了解优化性能、弹性和成本的实用方法，以及如何将这些实践应用于构建您自己的运营就绪解决方案。

presenter.name: Joseph Rosing
presenter.title: Head of Manufacturing & Supply Chain CoE

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - GenAI-Powered Contextual Security Analysis & Remediation (ISV315)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 生成式AI驱动的上下文安全分析与修复 (ISV315)
sessions.abstract: For ISVs, managing security and costs in multi-tenant environments is complex: threats can spread across boundaries, cost attribution becomes unclear, and understanding true impact radius is challenging. This technical session demonstrates how to overcome these challenges by mapping tenant infrastructure relationships using Amazon Neptune and OpenSearch. Watch how graph-based architecture with GenAI integration provides deep contextual understanding of cross-tenant dependencies. Learn patterns for security analysis and cost attribution that reduce operational risks in multi-tenant environments.
sessions.abstract_cn: 对于ISV而言，在多租户环境中管理安全性和成本非常复杂：威胁可能跨边界传播，成本归属变得不清晰，理解真实影响范围也极具挑战性。本技术会议演示如何通过使用Amazon Neptune和OpenSearch映射租户基础设施关系来克服这些挑战。观看基于图的架构如何与GenAI集成，提供对跨租户依赖关系的深度上下文理解。学习用于安全分析和成本归属的模式，以降低多租户环境中的运营风险。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Nissan Accelerated Software-Defined Vehicle Development with AWS (IND382)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 日产如何利用AWS加速软件定义汽车开发 (IND382)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Nissan built a comprehensive SDV ecosystem and reduced software testing time by 75%, combining advanced software development environments, robust data platforms, and scalable EE architecture all powered by AWS. We'll explore how the implementation of AWS Generative AI capabilities, test automation, and custom engineering workbenches has enabled Nissan to decouple service development from vehicle development cycles, allowing for more frequent and agile service releases.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解日产如何构建全面的软件定义汽车(SDV)生态系统，并将软件测试时间缩短75%，结合先进的软件开发环境、强大的数据平台和可扩展的电子电气架构，全部由AWS提供支持。我们将探讨AWS生成式AI能力、测试自动化和定制工程工作台的实施如何使日产能够将服务开发与车辆开发周期解耦，从而实现更频繁和敏捷的服务发布。

presenter.name: Kazuo Kajimoto
presenter.title: Principal SA & Sr. Manager of BD

presenter.name: Kazuma Sugimoto
presenter.title: General Manager, Software Engineering Department, Software Defined Vehicle Engineering Division

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate building Serverless apps with Amazon Q and MCP servers (CNS373)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Q 和 MCP 服务器加速构建无服务器应用程序 (CNS373)
sessions.abstract: Experience the future of application development as we demonstrate how to transform a simple prompt into a fully functional serverless application. Watch live coding that showcases how to combine Amazon Q with AWS serverless services using MCP servers to create dynamic, scalable solutions. This session will demonstrate practical implementation techniques, architectural best practices, and how to accelerate development while maintaining production-ready quality.
sessions.abstract_cn: 体验应用程序开发的未来，我们将演示如何将简单的提示转换为功能齐全的无服务器应用程序。观看现场编码，展示如何将Amazon Q与AWS无服务器服务结合使用MCP服务器来创建动态、可扩展的解决方案。本次会议将演示实用的实现技术、架构最佳实践，以及如何在保持生产就绪质量的同时加速开发。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Traeger accelerates contact center agent productivity with agentic AI (BIZ214)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Traeger 通过智能体 AI 加速联络中心座席生产力 (BIZ214)
sessions.abstract: Looking to learn how to transform customer insights into exceptional customer service experiences? Join this session to hear how Traeger Grills uses AI-powered Amazon Connect to drive automation, enabling agents and supervisors to focus on the human aspects of customer service. Learn how the agentic AI capabilities of Amazon Connect can help you streamline contact center workflows and automate routine actions, all while keeping the service experience top of mind.
sessions.abstract_cn: 想要学习如何将客户洞察转化为卓越的客户服务体验？加入本次会议，了解Traeger Grills如何使用AI驱动的Amazon Connect实现自动化，让座席和主管能够专注于客户服务的人性化方面。了解Amazon Connect的智能体AI功能如何帮助您简化联络中心工作流程并自动化日常操作，同时始终将服务体验放在首位。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernize managed file transfer workflows with event-driven SFTP (STG339)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用事件驱动SFTP现代化托管文件传输工作流 (STG339)
sessions.abstract: Managing file transfers can come at a high cost as you maintain infrastructure, licensing, resources, and adherence to regulatory and business requirements. In this session, learn how AWS Transfer Family provides fully managed, highly available file transfers over protocols including SFTP, and how to implement this at scale using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) with Terraform. Learn how enterprises have transformed their MFT infrastructure into an event-driven architecture to reduce operational overhead. Additionally, we'll dive into how you can leverage agentic AI to automate intelligent data pipelines to process and deliver incoming data while maintaining security and compliance.
sessions.abstract_cn: 管理文件传输可能会产生高昂成本，因为您需要维护基础设施、许可证、资源以及遵守监管和业务要求。在本次会议中，了解AWS Transfer Family如何提供完全托管的高可用文件传输服务，支持包括SFTP在内的协议，以及如何使用Terraform基础设施即代码(IaC)大规模实施此服务。了解企业如何将其MFT基础设施转换为事件驱动架构以减少运营开销。此外，我们还将深入探讨如何利用代理AI自动化智能数据管道，在保持安全性和合规性的同时处理和交付传入数据。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating Engineering: Cross-Industry HPC Cloud Transformations (CMP302)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 加速工程：跨行业HPC云转型 (CMP302)
sessions.abstract: This breakout session highlights how AWS HPC is transforming engineering and product development across industries. From accelerating prototyping cycles to scaling semiconductor design, organizations are overcoming traditional on-premises limitations with the cloud. You’ll hear how global R&D teams are leveraging AWS HPC instances, Elastic Fabric Adapter, FSx for Lustre, and ParallelCluster to achieve faster design iterations, reduced time-to-market, and more efficient innovation at scale. Join us to see how AWS empowers engineers and researchers to push boundaries in simulation, design, and development across automotive, semiconductor, and consumer product domains.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本分会重点介绍 AWS HPC 如何在各行业中变革工程和产品开发。从加速原型设计周期到扩展半导体设计，各组织正在通过云计算克服传统本地部署的局限性。您将了解全球研发团队如何利用 AWS HPC 实例、Elastic Fabric Adapter、FSx for Lustre 和 ParallelCluster 实现更快的设计迭代、缩短上市时间以及更高效的大规模创新。加入我们，了解 AWS 如何赋能工程师和研究人员在汽车、半导体和消费品领域突破仿真、设计和开发的边界。

presenter.name: Thierry Pellegrino
presenter.title: Director WWSO Core and Advanced Computing

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Debug Lambda functions deployed in cloud like never before (CNS367)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 以前所未有的方式调试部署在云端的 Lambda 函数 (CNS367)
sessions.abstract: Discover AWS Lambda's groundbreaking remote debugging capability, allowing developers to debug functions deployed in AWS cloud from local IDE for the first time. Learn how to set breakpoints, step through code line-by-line, inspect variables, and analyze call stacks in live Lambda functions. Experience practical debugging techniques for complex serverless scenarios with minimal setup and performance impact. Whether you're new to Lambda or an experienced developer, this session will transform your debugging workflow, dramatically reducing troubleshooting time and improving development efficiency.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索 AWS Lambda 突破性的远程调试功能,让开发者首次能够从本地 IDE 调试部署在 AWS 云中的函数。学习如何在实时 Lambda 函数中设置断点、逐行单步执行代码、检查变量和分析调用堆栈。体验针对复杂无服务器场景的实用调试技术,只需最少的设置且对性能影响极小。无论您是 Lambda 新手还是经验丰富的开发者,本次会议都将改变您的调试工作流程,大幅缩短故障排除时间并提高开发效率。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Ripple: Building an intelligent, multi-agent system for 24/7 operations-IND3301
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Ripple：构建智能多代理系统实现全天候运营-IND3301
sessions.abstract: Financial institutions face challenges analyzing massive log volumes, requiring hours or days of manual review for critical incidents. Learn how Ripple is building an automated, multi-agent system using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and the Strands Agents framework to process 30-50GB of daily logs in minutes. Explore architectural patterns for integrating Amazon CloudWatch, AWS Lambda, Amazon S3, and Amazon OpenSearch to correlate log entries with codebase sections. Discover approaches for designing specialized agents that create conversational user interfaces for guided investigations. See how this system transforms blockchain operations and walk away with strategies for implementing a scalable foundation for building multi-agent applications.
sessions.abstract_cn: 金融机构在分析海量日志时面临挑战，对关键事件进行人工审查需要数小时甚至数天时间。了解 Ripple 如何使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 和 Strands Agents 框架构建自动化多代理系统，在几分钟内处理每天 30-50GB 的日志。探索集成 Amazon CloudWatch、AWS Lambda、Amazon S3 和 Amazon OpenSearch 的架构模式，将日志条目与代码库部分关联起来。了解设计专业化代理的方法，这些代理可创建对话式用户界面以进行引导式调查。了解该系统如何改变区块链运营，并掌握实施可扩展多代理应用程序基础架构的策略。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Performance engineering on Neuron: How to optimize your LLM with NKI (AIM414)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Neuron性能工程：如何使用NKI优化您的LLM (AIM414)
sessions.abstract: Trying to eek out every ounce of performance of your LLM? Trying to speed up inference or understand what is going on inside a language model? In this session, you will learn how to profile a model on AWS purpose built accelerators and build a custom kernel to achieve better performance.
sessions.abstract_cn: 想要榨取LLM的每一分性能？想要加速推理或了解语言模型内部运行机制？在本次会议中，您将学习如何在AWS专用加速器上对模型进行性能分析，并构建自定义内核以实现更好的性能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - No More Orphans: Bringing Work and People Data Into Decisions with MCP (ISV319)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 不再孤立：通过 MCP 将工作和人员数据纳入决策 (ISV319)
sessions.abstract: Managers make dozens of high-impact decisions every week — but too often, work and people data is missing from the table especially in ad hoc decisions. The result? Strategy built on partial context, disconnected systems, and underused insights. In this session, we’ll explore how Visier’s Model Context Protocol (MCP) server changes that. By transforming fragmented HR and workforce data into a unified, AI-ready semantic layer, MCP lets organizations combine people data with critical business data, automate context delivery, and surface insights where decisions happen.
sessions.abstract_cn: 管理者每周要做出数十个高影响力的决策——但工作和人员数据往往缺失，尤其是在临时决策中。结果如何？基于片面背景、系统割裂和洞察利用不足而制定的战略。在本次会议中，我们将探讨 Visier 的模型上下文协议（MCP）服务器如何改变这一现状。通过将分散的人力资源和劳动力数据转换为统一的、AI 就绪的语义层，MCP 让组织能够将人员数据与关键业务数据相结合，自动化上下文交付，并在决策发生的地方呈现洞察。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building at global scale: Engineering AWS expansion (ARC312)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 全球规模构建：AWS扩展工程 (ARC312)
sessions.abstract: Explore how AWS continually expands its global infrastructure through sophisticated software engineering. This session reveals the evolution of AWS's approach to building new infrastructure, from manual processes to today's automated systems. Examine how changing global landscapes and business needs have shaped our strategies. Learn about the design patterns, testing frameworks, and operational practices that enable AWS to accelerate regional expansion while maintaining high security and reliability across our global infrastructure. Gain insights into architecting for massive scale and global distribution.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索AWS如何通过先进的软件工程持续扩展其全球基础设施。本次会议揭示了AWS构建新基础设施方法的演进，从手动流程发展到今天的自动化系统。研究不断变化的全球格局和业务需求如何塑造我们的策略。了解使AWS能够加速区域扩展同时在全球基础设施中保持高安全性和可靠性的设计模式、测试框架和运营实践。获得大规模架构和全球分布式系统设计的深入见解。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Maximizing customer outcomes: AWS Partner Led Customer Success (PEX106)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 最大化客户成果：AWS 合作伙伴主导的客户成功 (PEX106)
sessions.abstract: As customer needs become more sophisticated, especially with the increased adoption of AI, and the range of AWS services continues to expand, partners play an increasingly critical role in ensuring successful outcomes and value realization for our customers. Through our new Partner Led Customer Success initiatives, we're equipping you with the mechanisms needed to systematically drive value realization. Whether you're supporting customers in their early AI experiments or guiding large-scale deployments, this session will preview the actionable frameworks and best practices we will share to enhance your customer success capabilities and deliver lasting value in partnership with AWS.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着客户需求变得更加复杂，特别是随着AI采用率的提高，以及AWS服务范围的持续扩展，合作伙伴在确保客户成功实现预期成果和价值方面发挥着越来越关键的作用。通过我们新推出的合作伙伴主导客户成功计划，我们为您提供系统化推动价值实现所需的机制。无论您是在支持客户进行早期AI实验，还是指导大规模部署，本次会议都将预览我们将分享的可操作框架和最佳实践，以增强您的客户成功能力，并与AWS携手为客户提供持久价值。

presenter.name: Cynthia Starr
presenter.title: Sr Manager, Partner Led Customer Success

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating workload modernization using next generation agentic AI (PEX203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用下一代智能体AI加速工作负载现代化 (PEX203)
sessions.abstract: This session will focus on how AWS is leveraging generative AI tools to accelerate the migration and modernization of workloads either to AWS or running on AWS. This session will explore the latest agentic AI tools from for VMware, .Net, Mainframe, Java, and SQL Server. Additionally, we will cover how these tools are enabling AWS Partners to integrate with AWS tools, and third party ISV tools.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本次会议将重点介绍 AWS 如何利用生成式 AI 工具加速工作负载迁移和现代化改造，无论是迁移到 AWS 还是在 AWS 上运行。本次会议将探讨针对 VMware、.NET、大型机、Java 和 SQL Server 的最新代理式 AI 工具。此外，我们还将介绍这些工具如何帮助 AWS 合作伙伴与 AWS 工具以及第三方 ISV 工具进行集成。

presenter.name: Keith Groom
presenter.title: WW Migration & Modernization Partner GTM Strategy Leader

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - ServiceNow + AWS: The Enterprise Standard for AI-Driven Workflows (AIM283)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - ServiceNow + AWS：AI驱动工作流的企业标准 (AIM283)
sessions.abstract: ServiceNow and AWS are redefining what’s possible when intelligence meets scale. Together, we deliver AI-driven workflows with built-in trust, compliance, and performance—on the cloud designed for the enterprise. See how ServiceNow’s AI Agent Fabric, Control Tower, and Vault integrate with AWS Bedrock, SageMaker, and Security Hub to create a foundation for governed, intelligent automation at scale. Real stories from DXC reveal how organizations accelerate innovation, cut costs, and build the future of work with ServiceNow and AWS. This presentation is brought to you by ServiceNow, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: ServiceNow和AWS正在重新定义智能与规模结合的可能性。我们共同提供具有内置信任、合规性和性能的AI驱动工作流程——基于为企业设计的云平台。了解ServiceNow的AI Agent Fabric、Control Tower和Vault如何与AWS Bedrock、SageMaker和Security Hub集成，为大规模治理化智能自动化创建基础。来自DXC的真实案例展示了组织如何通过ServiceNow和AWS加速创新、降低成本并构建未来工作模式。本演示由AWS合作伙伴ServiceNow为您呈现。

presenter.name: Courtney McShane
presenter.title: AVP, Global Head of AWS Business, ServiceNow

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Skill Builder: Product Launches and New Features (TNC107)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Skill Builder：产品发布和新功能 (TNC107)
sessions.abstract: Discover how AWS Skill Builder is transforming AWS Cloud learning! Learn about the new features we are launching as part of Skill Builder Next.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索AWS Skill Builder如何变革AWS云学习！了解我们作为Skill Builder Next一部分推出的新功能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building software like never before with Agentic AI (DVT220)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用智能体AI前所未有地构建软件 (DVT220)
sessions.abstract: Discover the future of software development as we explore the transformative power of agents with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and Kiro’s spec-driven development in modernizing your entire software development lifecycle (SDLC). Agentic AI is impacting software development by automating tasks, improving efficiency, and enabling more autonomous workflows throughout the development lifecycle. It allows teams to go beyond simple code generation to handle project planning, designing, testing, documentation, building agents into workflows, and retiring technical debt. In this session, you'll also hear from Rackspace about their journey building with Kiro and the transformational impact it is having on their organization. Join us to explore how these powerful capabilities work together to help organizations accelerate from prototype to production ready applications.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索软件开发的未来，了解Amazon Bedrock AgentCore的代理和Kiro规范驱动开发的变革力量如何实现整个软件开发生命周期(SDLC)的现代化。代理AI正在通过自动化任务、提高效率以及在整个开发生命周期中实现更自主的工作流程来影响软件开发。它使团队能够超越简单的代码生成，处理项目规划、设计、测试、文档编写、将代理构建到工作流程中以及清除技术债务。在本次会议中，您还将听到Rackspace关于使用Kiro构建的历程以及其对组织产生的变革性影响。加入我们，探索这些强大功能如何协同工作，帮助组织加速从原型到生产就绪应用程序的过程。

presenter.name: Svetlana Kolomeyskaya
presenter.title: Head of Outbound GTM, Generative AI

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Human-Centric AI: Avoiding the High Cost of Getting It Wrong in IT (AIM205)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 以人为本的AI：避免在IT中犯错的高昂代价 (AIM205)
sessions.abstract: AI isn’t a silver bullet — it’s a strategic investment for IT. To truly unlock its potential in reducing costs, easing burnout, and improving security, IT organizations should adopt AI thoughtfully, with people at the center of their approach. Done right, AI enhances teams and operations — it doesn’t replace them. Too often, hasty adoption leads to wasted time, broken trust, and poor outcomes. In this session, NinjaOne Field CTO Jeff Hunter explores the real costs of bad AI and outlines a smarter, human-centric path forward — one that integrates AI into everyday IT workflows to elevate teams and deliver stronger business outcomes. This presentation is brought to you by NinjaOne, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI并非万能解决方案——它是IT的战略投资。要真正释放其在降低成本、缓解倦怠和改善安全性方面的潜力，IT组织应当深思熟虑地采用AI，以人为中心的方式进行。正确实施时，AI能够增强团队和运营——而非取代它们。匆忙采用往往导致时间浪费、信任破裂和糟糕结果。在本次会议中，NinjaOne现场首席技术官Jeff Hunter探讨了糟糕AI的真实成本，并概述了更明智的、以人为中心的前进道路——将AI集成到日常IT工作流程中，以提升团队并交付更强的业务成果。本演示由AWS合作伙伴NinjaOne提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating SAP Transformation with Amazon EC2 with the latest Intel Xeon CPUs
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 借助搭载最新英特尔至强CPU的Amazon EC2加速SAP转型
sessions.abstract: This session explores how EC2 instance families like the High Memory U7inh series (with up to 32 TB RAM) and memory-optimized R8i instances deliver exceptional scale-up capabilities and price-performance for SAP HANA, SAP application servers, and RISE with SAP deployments. Learn how certified EC2 instances enable fast, secure deployment of SAP workloads in the cloud, supporting business continuity and operational resilience—backed by real-world success stories and insights from industry experts. Hear from a leading global automotive manufacturer who rapidly deployed a business-critical SAP landscape using AWS EC2 U7i instances, powered by Intel Xeon processors, to meet demanding performance and reliability requirements. This presentation is brought to you by Intel, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨 EC2 实例系列（如高内存 U7inh 系列，最高支持 32 TB RAM）和内存优化型 R8i 实例如何为 SAP HANA、SAP 应用服务器和 RISE with SAP 部署提供卓越的纵向扩展能力和性价比。了解经过认证的 EC2 实例如何在云中实现 SAP 工作负载的快速、安全部署，支持业务连续性和运营韧性——并通过真实案例和行业专家的见解加以佐证。聆听一家全球领先汽车制造商如何使用搭载英特尔至强处理器的 AWS EC2 U7i 实例快速部署关键业务 SAP 环境，以满足严苛的性能和可靠性要求。本演讲由 AWS 合作伙伴英特尔呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From idea to impact: Harness AI agents and tools in AWS Marketplace (AIM3318)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从创意到影响：在 AWS Marketplace 中利用 AI 代理和工具 (AIM3318)
sessions.abstract: In this lightning talk we show practical approaches for integrating AI agents and tools into your existing workflows, helping you boost productivity and innovation. We review real-world examples from engineering, marketing, and other key business functions. You'll gain insights into how you can find and leverage ready-to-use third-party tools and agents to accelerate and streamline your AI initiatives.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在这次闪电演讲中，我们展示了将AI代理和工具集成到现有工作流程中的实用方法，帮助您提高生产力和创新能力。我们回顾了来自工程、营销和其他关键业务职能的实际案例。您将深入了解如何找到并利用现成的第三方工具和代理，以加速和简化您的AI计划。

presenter.name: Michael Levy
presenter.title: Principal Business Development Manager, AWS Marketplace

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Innovations in AWS analytics: Data processing (ANT305)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 分析创新：数据处理 (ANT305)
sessions.abstract: Explore the latest advancements in AWS Analytics designed to transform your data processing landscape. This session unveils powerful new capabilities across key services, including Amazon EMR for scalable big data processing, AWS Glue for seamless data integration, Amazon Athena for optimized querying, and Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow (MWAA) for workflow orchestration. Discover how these innovations can supercharge performance, optimize costs, and streamline your data ecosystem. Whether you're looking to enhance scalability, improve data integration, accelerate queries, or refine workflow management, join us to gain actionable insights that will position your organization at the forefront of data processing innovation.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索AWS Analytics的最新进展，旨在转变您的数据处理格局。本次会议揭示了关键服务的强大新功能，包括用于可扩展大数据处理的Amazon EMR、用于无缝数据集成的AWS Glue、用于优化查询的Amazon Athena，以及用于工作流编排的Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow (MWAA)。了解这些创新如何能够提升性能、优化成本并简化您的数据生态系统。无论您是希望增强可扩展性、改进数据集成、加速查询，还是完善工作流管理，加入我们以获得可操作的洞察，这将使您的组织处于数据处理创新的前沿。

presenter.name: Anjali Norwood
presenter.title: Engineering Senior Manager, Big Data Analytics Platform

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cox Automotive's Blueprint for Agentic AI on Amazon Bedrock AgentCore (IND3329)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cox Automotive 基于 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 的智能体 AI 蓝图 (IND3329)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Cox Automotive scaled Agentic AI from experimentation to production in just one month using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and Strands. We'll share Cox's methodology for scaling Agentic AI, including reference architectures and governance frameworks that enable startup speed with enterprise controls. Discover how AgentCore primitives—runtime, identity, gateway, and memory—accelerated their journey. Hear directly from the implementation teams and leave with actionable frameworks, architectural patterns, and governance models to accelerate your organization's Agentic AI initiatives.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解Cox Automotive如何使用Amazon Bedrock AgentCore和Strands在短短一个月内将代理AI从实验阶段扩展到生产环境。我们将分享Cox扩展代理AI的方法论，包括参考架构和治理框架，这些框架能够在企业级控制下实现初创公司般的速度。探索AgentCore原语——运行时、身份、网关和内存——如何加速他们的发展历程。直接听取实施团队的经验分享，并获得可操作的框架、架构模式和治理模型，以加速您组织的代理AI计划。

presenter.name: Brian Lloyd-Newberry
presenter.title: AVP Architecture - Cox Automotive Technology Innovation Lab

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Long-Horizon Coding Agents: Complex Software Projects with Claude (AIM3316)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 长期编程代理：使用 Claude 进行复杂软件项目 (AIM3316)
sessions.abstract:
Vibe coding with AI to write functions & fix bugs? Table stakes. Building an agent that architects, implements, tests, and deploys a full application to AWS? That's fundamentally different.
This session explores design patterns that enable Claude on AWS Bedrock to achieve "escape velocity"—the ability to make sustained, autonomous progress toward production deployment. You'll learn Anthropic's core principles for building agents that can handle full-stack development tasks independently.
We'll cover two critical pattern areas. First, state and environment management: how agents orient themselves through scaffolding techniques, structured state management, and version control integration. Second, progress and quality control: incremental development patterns and self-verification loops that ensure reliable outputs.
See practical examples, understand failure modes, and learn strategies for building production agentic systems. This presentation is brought to you by Anthropic, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn:
与AI一起编写函数和修复错误？这只是基础。构建一个能够架构、实现、测试并将完整应用程序部署到AWS的智能体？这是根本不同的。

本次会议探讨了使AWS Bedrock上的Claude实现"逃逸速度"的设计模式——即能够朝着生产部署目标持续、自主推进的能力。您将学习Anthropic构建能够独立处理全栈开发任务的智能体的核心原则。

我们将涵盖两个关键模式领域。首先是状态和环境管理：智能体如何通过脚手架技术、结构化状态管理和版本控制集成来定位自己。其次是进度和质量控制：增量开发模式和自我验证循环，确保可靠的输出。

了解实际示例，理解失败模式，学习构建生产级智能体系统的策略。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Anthropic为您呈现。

presenter.name: Nadine Yasser
presenter.title: Member of Technical Staff - Applied AI

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Enterprise AI Without the Chaos: A New Path to Secure, Compliant Applications
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 企业AI无混乱：通往安全合规应用的新路径
sessions.abstract: AI innovation is exploding, but the abundance of tools and models often leaves developers overwhelmed and enterprises at risk. Moving from experimentation to production requires more than speed, it demands security, scalability, and compliance. This session shows how cloud-native practices with Docker and AWS provide a clear path forward. Learn how familiar workflows can cut through the noise, accelerate deployment, and align with enterprise standards. Leave with a blueprint for building AI applications that are robust, modular, and enterprise-ready. This presentation is brought to you by Docker, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI 创新正在爆发式增长，但大量的工具和模型往往让开发人员不知所措，并使企业面临风险。从实验阶段迈向生产环境不仅需要速度，还需要安全性、可扩展性和合规性。本次会议展示了如何通过 Docker 和 AWS 的云原生实践提供清晰的前进路径。了解熟悉的工作流程如何突破噪音、加速部署并符合企业标准。您将获得构建强大、模块化且企业就绪的 AI 应用程序的蓝图。本演讲由 AWS 合作伙伴 Docker 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Federal Fast Lane: Deploying Mission Technology at Commercial Speed(API101)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 联邦快车道：以商业速度部署任务技术(API101)
sessions.abstract: Commercial innovation thrives on agility – cloud-native platforms, rapid iteration, and user-first design. Federal missions, however, demand assurance: security, compliance, and deployment in complex environments. In this Lightning Talk, Jared Summers shares how agencies can leverage AWS and commercial-grade platforms to balance both speed and trust. They’ll outline strategies for scaling securely, navigating compliance hurdles, and accelerating adoption of AI and emerging technologies without compromising mission integrity. With real-world lessons from federal deployment, you’ll learn how to deliver innovation at commercial speed, mission-ready from day one. This presentation is brought to you by LMI, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 商业创新依赖于敏捷性——云原生平台、快速迭代和用户优先设计。然而，联邦任务需要保障：安全性、合规性以及在复杂环境中的部署。在这次闪电演讲中，Jared Summers分享了政府机构如何利用AWS和商业级平台来平衡速度和信任。他们将概述安全扩展策略、应对合规障碍，以及在不损害任务完整性的前提下加速采用AI和新兴技术。通过联邦部署的实际经验，您将学习如何以商业速度交付创新，从第一天起就做好任务准备。本演示由AWS合作伙伴LMI提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Closing the gap between speed and safety: shipping faster at scale (AIM259)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 缩小速度与安全之间的差距：大规模快速交付 (AIM259)
sessions.abstract: AI has enabled teams to ship software at an unprecedented rate, but safety around release practices hasn’t kept up. In this session, LaunchDarkly CEO Edith Harbaugh will explore how modern teams can use automated guardrails like progressive rollouts, real-time observability, and instant rollbacks to reduce release risks while shipping faster at scale. We’ll also highlight how these controls apply to AI-powered applications, where speed and safety are both critical. Edith will be joined by select LaunchDarkly customers to share how they’ve built cultures of velocity and confidence in software and AI delivery. This presentation is brought to you by LaunchDarkly, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 人工智能使团队能够以前所未有的速度交付软件，但围绕发布实践的安全性却没有跟上。在本次会议中，LaunchDarkly首席执行官Edith Harbaugh将探讨现代团队如何使用自动化防护措施，如渐进式推出、实时可观测性和即时回滚，来降低发布风险，同时大规模快速交付。我们还将重点介绍这些控制措施如何应用于AI驱动的应用程序，在这些应用中，速度和安全性都至关重要。Edith将与精选的LaunchDarkly客户一起分享他们如何在软件和AI交付中建立速度和信心的文化。本演示由AWS合作伙伴LaunchDarkly为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Fidelity: AWS Health & Support Data Pipelines to GenAI Actions (SPS318)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Fidelity：AWS Health 与 Support 数据管道到 GenAI 行动 (SPS318)
sessions.abstract: Transform high-volume AWS Health and Support data into strategic advantage. While AWS provides comprehensive data streams, the volume and complexity present challenges for teams managing thousands of applications. This session explores how Fidelity collaborated with AWS through CENTS (Cloud Events Notification Transport System), successfully ingesting AWS Health data using prescriptive guidance. We demonstrate event routing across thousands of accounts, then showcase adding Support data and Amazon Bedrock for intelligent automation. Learn how GenAI enables individualized guidance and aggregate synthesis, advancing from reactive monitoring to predictive AI-augmented operational excellence with proven strategies.
sessions.abstract_cn: 将大量 AWS Health 和 Support 数据转化为战略优势。虽然 AWS 提供了全面的数据流，但数据量和复杂性给管理数千个应用程序的团队带来了挑战。本次会议探讨了 Fidelity 如何通过 CENTS（云事件通知传输系统）与 AWS 合作，使用规范性指导成功摄取 AWS Health 数据。我们演示了跨数千个账户的事件路由，然后展示了如何添加 Support 数据和 Amazon Bedrock 以实现智能自动化。了解 GenAI 如何实现个性化指导和聚合综合，从被动监控推进到预测性 AI 增强的卓越运营，并提供经过验证的策略。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [NEW LAUNCH] Deep Dive on AWS Lambda durable functions (CNS380)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [新发布] AWS Lambda 持久化函数深度解析 (CNS380)
sessions.abstract: AWS Lambda durable functions enhances Lambda's programming model to simplify building fault-tolerant applications using familiar programming language patterns in JavaScript, TypeScript, or Python. We'll explore new capabilities that simplify failure handling through built-in retry mechanisms, efficient handling of human-in-the-loop interactions, and state management to track progress. Through an interactive demo, you'll see how to get started with Lambda durable functions in your IDE, and use primitives like “steps” and “waits” for state management, failure handling, and seamless execution of long-running business logic. Leave equipped to leverage durable functions for your next project, simplifying architectures and deliver fault-tolerant applications faster.
sessions.abstract_cn: AWS Lambda 持久函数增强了 Lambda 的编程模型，通过 JavaScript、TypeScript 或 Python 中熟悉的编程语言模式简化了构建容错应用程序的过程。我们将探索新功能，这些功能通过内置重试机制简化故障处理，高效处理人工干预交互，以及通过状态管理来跟踪进度。通过交互式演示，您将了解如何在 IDE 中开始使用 Lambda 持久函数，并使用"步骤"和"等待"等原语进行状态管理、故障处理和无缝执行长时间运行的业务逻辑。您将掌握在下一个项目中利用持久函数的能力，简化架构并更快地交付容错应用程序。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-Using event-driven architectures to modernize legacy applications at scale-API207
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-使用事件驱动架构大规模现代化遗留应用程序-API207
sessions.abstract: Want to modernize your monolithic applications but unsure where to start? Event-driven architecture (EDA) offers a powerful approach to decomposing complex systems into small, decoupled services that can scale independently.  In this session, learn about common design trade-offs for distributed systems and how to navigate them with design patterns, illustrated by real-world examples, learn how to apply integration patterns in complex use cases.
sessions.abstract_cn: 想要现代化您的单体应用程序但不确定从何开始？事件驱动架构（EDA）提供了一种强大的方法，将复杂系统分解为可独立扩展的小型解耦服务。在本次会议中，了解分布式系统的常见设计权衡以及如何通过设计模式来应对这些挑战，通过真实世界的示例进行说明，学习如何在复杂用例中应用集成模式。

presenter.name: Anand Bilgaiyan
presenter.title: Senior Specialist Partner solution Architect Enterprise Transformation

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scaling Pinterest: Iceberg solutions for petabyte-scale challenges (STG211)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 扩展 Pinterest：针对 PB 级挑战的 Iceberg 解决方案 (STG211)
sessions.abstract: Pinterest's management of petabyte-scale data lakes serving 500M+ users showcases innovative solutions for critical data challenges using Apache Iceberg on Amazon S3. You’ll learn practical strategies to optimize storage costs, enhance query performance, and maintaining data integrity at massive scale. See how Pinterest achieved breakthrough results, including significant error reduction through user agent-based access control and hash-based location patterns. These solutions demonstrate tangible business impact through substantial cost savings and performance improvements, making it essential for organizations managing large-scale data operations.
sessions.abstract_cn: Pinterest 对服务超过 5 亿用户的 PB 级数据湖的管理展示了使用 Amazon S3 上的 Apache Iceberg 解决关键数据挑战的创新方案。您将学习优化存储成本、增强查询性能以及在大规模场景下维护数据完整性的实用策略。了解 Pinterest 如何取得突破性成果，包括通过基于用户代理的访问控制和基于哈希的位置模式显著减少错误。这些解决方案通过可观的成本节约和性能改进展示了切实的业务影响，对于管理大规模数据操作的组织至关重要。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Live hallucination detection in prod with LaunchDarkly’s AI Configs (AIM258)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 LaunchDarkly 的 AI 配置在生产环境中进行实时幻觉检测 (AIM258)
sessions.abstract: When bringing generative AI applications to production, accuracy is key. LaunchDarkly's AI Configs give you the flexibility to change your generative AI applications at runtime, so you can measure model performance more effectively in a real-world setting. In this session, we'll walk through a simplified RAG implementation of an insurance chatbot using an Amazon Bedrock knowledge base. You'll see a demo of how this chatbot uses LaunchDarkly AI Evals to detect hallucinations in production. We'll also cover how to collect metrics such as latency and cost, and discuss strategies for building guardrail logic directly into your runtime configuration. This presentation is brought to you by LaunchDarkly, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在将生成式AI应用投入生产时，准确性至关重要。LaunchDarkly的AI配置为您提供了在运行时更改生成式AI应用的灵活性，让您能够在真实环境中更有效地衡量模型性能。在本次会议中，我们将演示一个使用Amazon Bedrock知识库的保险聊天机器人的简化RAG实现。您将看到该聊天机器人如何使用LaunchDarkly AI评估来检测生产环境中的幻觉现象。我们还将介绍如何收集延迟和成本等指标，并讨论将护栏逻辑直接构建到运行时配置中的策略。本演示由AWS合作伙伴LaunchDarkly为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon S3 Tables architecture, use cases, and best practices (STG334)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon S3 Tables 架构、使用案例和最佳实践 (STG334)
sessions.abstract: Explore Amazon S3 Tables architecture and latest features that improve data lake performance. Learn proven optimization strategies, automated maintenance capabilities, and simplified security controls that reduce operational overhead while scaling efficiently. Discover how Indeed is actively modernizing their data infrastructure through an ambitious migration of 80 petabytes from Hive to S3 Tables, achieving significant performance gains and cost reductions. Through real-world use cases and architectural deep-dives, understand how S3 Tables transforms analytics workloads from petabyte-scale processing to real-time dashboards and complex ETL pipelines. You'll gain practical knowledge for table design, cost optimization, and performance tuning to accelerate query speeds and reduce infrastructure costs in your data architecture.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索 Amazon S3 Tables 架构和最新功能，了解如何提升数据湖性能。学习经过验证的优化策略、自动化维护能力以及简化的安全控制，在高效扩展的同时降低运营开销。了解 Indeed 如何通过将 80 PB 数据从 Hive 迁移到 S3 Tables 来积极推进其数据基础设施现代化，实现显著的性能提升和成本降低。通过真实用例和架构深度剖析，理解 S3 Tables 如何转变分析工作负载，从 PB 级数据处理到实时仪表板和复杂的 ETL 管道。您将获得表设计、成本优化和性能调优的实用知识，以加快查询速度并降低数据架构中的基础设施成本。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - FINRA: Accelerate Massive Data Processing with NVIDIA on AWS EMR (AIM279)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - FINRA：在 AWS EMR 上使用 NVIDIA 加速大规模数据处理 (AIM279)
sessions.abstract: This session explores how NVIDIA GPU acceleration with Apache Spark on AWS EMR and AWS EMR on EKS (Kubernetes) can enhance the scalability, performance, and cost-efficiency of BigData analytics for financial market regulation.  Using industry standard benchmarks and FINRA’s workloads as a case study, we demonstrate improvements for next-generation ETL pipelines. Attendees will learn how FINRA, a leader in market data- driven fraud detection, leverages cutting-edge hardware and software to meet rising data volumes and strict business SLAs without linear cost growth. The talk presents quantitative results from benchmarking Spark GPU clusters against traditional CPU deployments. This presentation is brought to you by NVIDIA, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨了在AWS EMR和AWS EMR on EKS（Kubernetes）上使用NVIDIA GPU加速Apache Spark如何提升金融市场监管大数据分析的可扩展性、性能和成本效益。通过行业标准基准测试和以FINRA工作负载为案例研究，我们展示了下一代ETL管道的改进效果。与会者将了解FINRA这一市场数据驱动欺诈检测领域的领导者，如何利用前沿硬件和软件来应对不断增长的数据量和严格的业务SLA要求，同时避免成本的线性增长。本次演讲展示了Spark GPU集群与传统CPU部署对比的量化基准测试结果。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴NVIDIA提供支持。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Cloud to AI Securing the New Cloud Attack Surface (SEC220)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从云到 AI：保护新的云攻击面 (SEC220)
sessions.abstract: AI adoption marks the next generation of cloud innovation and it’s reshaping the attack surface. Shadow AI projects, new control planes, and sensitive data pipelines are converging with traditional cloud misconfigurations and identity gaps. This session shows how Wiz helps organizations secure both cloud and AI by surfacing risks in context from S3 pipelines to SageMaker models and unifying ASM and AI-SPM to give teams the visibility, context, and confidence to act. This presentation is brought to you by Wiz, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI 采用标志着云创新的下一代发展，正在重塑攻击面。影子 AI 项目、新的控制平面和敏感数据管道正在与传统的云配置错误和身份差距融合。本次会议展示了 Wiz 如何帮助组织保护云和 AI，通过在上下文中显示从 S3 管道到 SageMaker 模型的风险，并统一 ASM 和 AI-SPM，为团队提供可见性、上下文和采取行动的信心。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Wiz 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Trigger to Execution: The Journey of Events in AWS Lambda (CNS423)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从触发到执行：AWS Lambda 中事件的旅程 (CNS423)
sessions.abstract: Dive deep into AWS Lambda's event processing ecosystem. We'll explore diverse event sources including queuing (SQS), streaming (Kinesis, DynamoDB Streams), and private sources (EventBridge Pipes, Kafka). Uncover Lambda's sophisticated message buffering and synchronous invocation mechanisms. Learn how Lambda ensures high availability through static stability and rapid AZ failover, and manages backpressure to prevent system overload.
