presenter.name: Vishal Mummigatti
presenter.title: Senior Product Manager Technical - External Services

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Evolution of AWS Skills Validation (TNC106)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 技能验证的演进 (TNC106)
sessions.abstract: Discover how AWS is transforming the way we validate cloud computing skills. As organizations seek professionals who can demonstrate practical abilities alongside theoretical knowledge, AWS is evolving its approach to skills validation. Join us to learn how these changes will benefit both hiring managers and cloud practitioners in proving real-world capabilities.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解AWS如何改变我们验证云计算技能的方式。随着组织寻求能够展示实践能力和理论知识的专业人员,AWS正在不断发展其技能验证方法。加入我们,了解这些变化将如何使招聘经理和云从业者在证明实际能力方面受益。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Secure Amazon ECS observability with CDK and Grafana (DEV338)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 CDK 和 Grafana 实现安全的 Amazon ECS 可观测性 (DEV338)
sessions.abstract: Observability is critical for running secure workloads. This session shows how to combine the AWS Cloud Development Kit (CDK), Grafana, and OpenTelemetry to build an observability solution for Amazon ECS. Learn practical methods to detect anomalies, strengthen security posture, and improve developer productivity.
sessions.abstract_cn: 可观测性对于运行安全工作负载至关重要。本次会议展示如何结合 AWS Cloud Development Kit (CDK)、Grafana 和 OpenTelemetry 为 Amazon ECS 构建可观测性解决方案。学习检测异常、增强安全态势和提高开发人员生产力的实用方法。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Just Walk Out by Amazon: How AI is Giving Your Lunch Break Back (BIZ201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Just Walk Out技术：AI如何让你的午休时间回归 (BIZ201)
sessions.abstract: Just Walk Out technology transforms how people shop, leveraging computer vision and machine learning to eliminate checkout across retail environments. Discover how Amazon implemented Just Walk Out across its fulfillment network, transforming break room experiences for frontline workers by providing food and beverage selections with 24/7 access and no lines. Learn about the technical challenges of deploying AI systems at scale—from integrating retail technology into complex operational environments to rolling out new shopping experiences to employees in industrial settings. Amazon leaders share practical lessons from deployment: co-creating solutions through feedback from operations teams, shoppers, and partners.
sessions.abstract_cn: Just Walk Out技术改变了人们的购物方式,利用计算机视觉和机器学习在零售环境中消除结账环节。了解亚马逊如何在其履行网络中部署Just Walk Out技术,通过提供全天候无需排队的食品和饮料选择,改变一线员工的休息室体验。了解大规模部署AI系统的技术挑战——从将零售技术集成到复杂的运营环境中,到在工业环境中向员工推出新的购物体验。亚马逊领导者分享部署中的实践经验:通过运营团队、购物者和合作伙伴的反馈共同创建解决方案。

presenter.name: Jaclyn Richeson
presenter.title: Site Procurement Operations, Head of Strategic Initiatives

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A leader's guide to cloud-native application modernization (SNR302)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 云原生应用现代化领导者指南 (SNR302)
sessions.abstract: Legacy applications run mission-critical processes, but increasingly limit innovation and organizational agility through outdated architectures. This session equips leaders with frameworks to refactor applications into cloud-native solutions while preserving business operations. Successful modernization requires answering strategic questions: why modernize, at what cost, how to modernize, what risks exist, and when to act. Learn how to define scope, prioritize features, and reskill teams through proven organizational models. Discover adaptive governance that replace traditional project management to deliver incremental value while managing inherent modernization risks. Leaders will explore how generative AI accelerates application analysis and migration, reducing modernization timelines.
sessions.abstract_cn: 传统应用程序运行关键业务流程，但由于过时的架构，越来越限制创新和组织敏捷性。本课程为领导者提供框架，将应用程序重构为云原生解决方案，同时保持业务运营。成功的现代化需要回答战略问题：为什么要现代化、成本是多少、如何现代化、存在哪些风险以及何时采取行动。了解如何通过经过验证的组织模型定义范围、确定功能优先级和提升团队技能。探索取代传统项目管理的自适应治理，以交付增量价值，同时管理固有的现代化风险。领导者将探索生成式人工智能如何加速应用程序分析和迁移，缩短现代化时间表。

presenter.name: Sree Ratnasinghe
presenter.title: Director, Customer Solutions, AWS Strategic Accounts

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG's migration & modernization journey: blueprint for cloud success (MAM206)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG的迁移与现代化之旅：云成功蓝图 (MAM206)
sessions.abstract: London Stock Exchange Group (LSEG) navigated significant hurdles in their digital transformation journey, including legacy processes, tight timelines, scalability issues, organizational silos, and operational friction. In this session, LSEG will reveal how they conquered these challenges to accelerate cloud value realization and maintain their competitive edge. Learn about their strategic architecture decisions, migration framework, and modernization approach that drove success. Discover how they developed end-to-end solutions to scale repeatable patterns, fostering a new cloud-fluent culture. Join us for firsthand insights into LSEG's transformation journey that you can apply to your own organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 伦敦证券交易所集团(LSEG)在数字化转型过程中克服了重大障碍,包括遗留流程、紧迫的时间表、可扩展性问题、组织孤岛和运营摩擦。在本次会议中,LSEG将揭示他们如何战胜这些挑战,加速云价值实现并保持竞争优势。了解他们推动成功的战略架构决策、迁移框架和现代化方法。探索他们如何开发端到端解决方案以扩展可重复模式,培育新的云流畅文化。加入我们,获取LSEG转型之旅的第一手见解,您可以将其应用于自己的组织。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LPL Financial and Incedo: Accelerating Advisor Success with AI & Cloud (ANT102)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LPL Financial 和 Incedo：通过 AI 和云加速顾问成功 (ANT102)
sessions.abstract: Wealth management firms are reimagining advisor productivity and client engagement through Cloud and AI. In this session, LPL Financial, in collaboration with Incedo, will share real-world examples of how these technologies are accelerating speed-to-market and transforming the advisor experience. Learn how LPL is leveraging modern data platforms, AI-driven insights, and intelligent automation to reduce operational friction, enhance decision-making, and deliver personalized client outcomes faster. Discover practical use cases that show how Cloud and AI are enabling future-ready, data-driven wealth management. This presentation is brought to you by Incedo Inc, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 财富管理公司正在通过云计算和人工智能重新定义顾问生产力和客户参与度。在本次会议中，LPL Financial与Incedo合作，将分享这些技术如何加速产品上市速度并转变顾问体验的真实案例。了解LPL如何利用现代数据平台、AI驱动的洞察和智能自动化来减少运营摩擦、增强决策制定并更快地提供个性化客户成果。探索展示云计算和AI如何实现面向未来、数据驱动的财富管理的实际用例。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Incedo Inc提供支持。

sessions.title: [Deleted video]
sessions.title_cn: I understand you're trying to reference a video, but I can only see "[Deleted video]" in your message. Could you please provide the actual text content you'd like me to help with? I'm here to assist with AWS-related questions, code, configurations, or any other technical tasks you might need help with.
sessions.abstract: Discover how Amazon Nova MM Embeddings expands your enterprise semantic search/RAG solutions through unified multi-modal understanding. While traditional text-based systems struggle with multimedia content, our solution excels at extracting insights from product catalogs, training videos, and customer recordings. In this session, we'll demonstrate how Nova's new video-audio native and spatial-temporal understanding capabilities enhance visual product search and video moment retrieval use cases. Participants will learn how to implement enterprise-scale semantic search solutions that seamlessly integrate text, image, audio, and video content, transforming how businesses discover and leverage their extensive multimedia assets.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Amazon Nova MM Embeddings 如何通过统一的多模态理解扩展您的企业语义搜索/RAG 解决方案。传统的基于文本的系统在处理多媒体内容时存在困难，而我们的解决方案擅长从产品目录、培训视频和客户录音中提取洞察。在本次会议中，我们将演示 Nova 的新视频音频原生和时空理解能力如何增强视觉产品搜索和视频片段检索用例。参与者将学习如何实施企业级语义搜索解决方案，无缝集成文本、图像、音频和视频内容，改变企业发现和利用其广泛多媒体资产的方式。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-Driven Operations: Scaling Observability and Cost Optimization (GBL201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI驱动运营：扩展可观测性和成本优化 (GBL201)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Kakao and Samsung transformed operations with AI on AWS. Kakao achieved 400x faster observability for 50 million daily users using EKS with ClickHouse and AI-driven analytics, processing billions of log events and reducing query times from hours to seconds while enabling proactive anomaly detection. Samsung revolutionized cloud cost management with autonomous multi-agent systems using Strands SDK and Bedrock AgentCore, achieving hundreds of thousands of dollars in savings through real-time collaboration and automatic optimization. Learn practical architectures and blueprints for deploying enterprise-scale AI automation that delivers measurable business impact across observability and cost management.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解Kakao和三星如何通过AWS上的AI转型运营。Kakao使用EKS结合ClickHouse和AI驱动分析，为5000万日活用户实现了400倍更快的可观测性，处理数十亿日志事件，将查询时间从数小时缩短至数秒，同时实现主动异常检测。三星使用Strands SDK和Bedrock AgentCore的自主多智能体系统彻底改革了云成本管理，通过实时协作和自动优化节省了数十万美元。学习用于部署企业级AI自动化的实用架构和蓝图，在可观测性和成本管理方面实现可衡量的业务影响。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Threat-Modeling-As-Code - Transforming Your Threat Statements into Attack Trees
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 威胁建模即代码 - 将威胁声明转换为攻击树
sessions.abstract: Threat modeling adoption is growing, but teams hit a wall converting 'what can go wrong' into realistic threats with actionable defense strategies. The challenge? Insufficient time and knowledge. In this code talk, we'll demonstrate how ThreatForest, our Threat-Model-as-Code solution, solves this problem. We'll step through setting up automated workflows that take application context, architecture diagrams, and threat statements as inputs, then convert them into attack trees and attack steps with associated mitigation controls using AWS Threat Technique Catalog and other threat intelligence data. You'll leave with a practical framework and automation templates for making threat modeling a seamless part of your development process.
sessions.abstract_cn: 威胁建模的采用正在增长，但团队在将"可能出现的问题"转换为具有可操作防御策略的现实威胁时遇到了障碍。挑战在于时间和知识不足。在这次代码演讲中，我们将演示 ThreatForest（我们的威胁模型即代码解决方案）如何解决这个问题。我们将逐步介绍如何设置自动化工作流程，该工作流程以应用程序上下文、架构图和威胁声明作为输入，然后使用 AWS Threat Technique Catalog 和其他威胁情报数据将它们转换为攻击树和攻击步骤以及相关的缓解控制措施。您将获得一个实用的框架和自动化模板，使威胁建模成为开发过程中的无缝组成部分。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build resilient SaaS: multi-account resilience testing patterns (ISV404)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建弹性 SaaS：多账户弹性测试模式 (ISV404)
sessions.abstract: Enterprise SaaS providers face increasing pressure to maintain high availability while preventing failures from spreading across tenant boundaries. Learn how leading ISVs use AWS Fault Injection Service to validate their multi-tenant architecture's resilience through controlled reslience testing experiments. We'll explore real-world examples from Security and HR tech providers who test cross-account failure scenarios while maintaining strict tenant isolation. Discover patterns for implementing resilience testing that strengthen your SaaS architecture without risking customer availability.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业 SaaS 提供商面临着越来越大的压力，需要在维持高可用性的同时防止故障跨租户边界传播。了解领先的 ISV 如何使用 AWS Fault Injection Service 通过受控的弹性测试实验来验证其多租户架构的弹性。我们将探讨来自安全和人力资源技术提供商的真实案例，他们在维持严格租户隔离的同时测试跨账户故障场景。发现实施弹性测试的模式，在不影响客户可用性的情况下增强您的 SaaS 架构。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How TE Connectivity Transforms Product Engineering with Agentic AI (IND369)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - TE Connectivity 如何利用智能体 AI 转型产品工程 (IND369)
sessions.abstract: Join to learn how TE Connectivity's agentic AI platform accelerates product development while optimizing costs. The platform unifies 500,000+ documents and 2 million engineering data points through a conversational interface, powered by Amazon Bedrock with RAG architecture. Agentic workflows enable engineers to synthesize documents, interpret code and design specifications, translate content, compare technical specifications, and generate compliance drafts autonomously. In three months, TE Connectivity processed 2.5 million documents and onboarded 40,000 engineers. Through optimized agentic architecture and precise model tuning, TE Connectivity delivers gen AI capabilities while maintaining low operational costs and securely scaling expertise across global teams.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们，了解TE Connectivity的智能体AI平台如何在优化成本的同时加速产品开发。该平台通过对话界面统一了50万+文档和200万工程数据点，由Amazon Bedrock提供支持，采用RAG架构。智能体工作流使工程师能够自主合成文档、解释代码和设计规范、翻译内容、比较技术规格并生成合规草案。在三个月内，TE Connectivity处理了250万份文档，并让4万名工程师上线使用。通过优化的智能体架构和精确的模型调优，TE Connectivity在保持低运营成本的同时提供生成式AI能力，并在全球团队中安全地扩展专业知识。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scaling Globally: Priority Pass's Journey with AWS Amplify (DVT319)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 全球扩展：Priority Pass 使用 AWS Amplify 的实践之旅 (DVT319)
sessions.abstract: In this session, attendees will learn how Priority Pass adopted AWS Amplify to deliver a faster, more reliable, and globally distributed web experience. As part of their wider technology transformation, the Priority Pass engineering team set out to modernize their web platform by retiring legacy systems in favor of a scalable, serverless, and globally performant solution. The talk will cover the evaluation process between Amplify and alternative hosting platforms, key architectural decisions, and technical challenges encountered, including how the team collaborated with AWS engineers to overcome platform constraints. Attendees will gain practical insights for planning enterprise-scale migrations to AWS Amplify.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，与会者将了解 Priority Pass 如何采用 AWS Amplify 来提供更快速、更可靠且全球分布的 Web 体验。作为其更广泛技术转型的一部分，Priority Pass 工程团队着手通过淘汰传统系统来实现 Web 平台现代化，转而采用可扩展、无服务器且全球高性能的解决方案。本次演讲将涵盖 Amplify 与其他托管平台之间的评估过程、关键架构决策以及遇到的技术挑战，包括团队如何与 AWS 工程师合作克服平台限制。与会者将获得规划企业级迁移到 AWS Amplify 的实用见解。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - FinOps+: A New Era of Accelerating Value (COP211)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - FinOps+：加速价值创造的新时代 (COP211)
sessions.abstract:
FinOps is evolving and AI is accelerating the shift. As organizations face increasing complexity, traditional FinOps approaches are no longer enough. We are entering a new era of FinOps; one that requires automation, governance & scale.
FinOps+ introduces an AI-powered approach that unifies CloudOps, emphasizes automation and expands into holistic spend management within a single platform. This talk will show how AI-driven FinOps and proactive governance can transform the way teams manage technology, enabling smarter decisions, streamlined operations & accelerated value.
Whether you’re beginning your FinOps journey or looking to scale, you’ll leave with a clear vision for how to move beyond traditional practices into the future of FinOps. This presentation is brought to you by Kion, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn:
FinOps正在演进，AI正在加速这一转变。随着组织面临日益增长的复杂性，传统的FinOps方法已不再足够。我们正在进入FinOps的新时代；一个需要自动化、治理和规模化的时代。

FinOps+引入了一种AI驱动的方法，统一CloudOps，强调自动化，并在单一平台内扩展到全面的支出管理。本次演讲将展示AI驱动的FinOps和主动治理如何改变团队管理技术的方式，实现更智能的决策、精简的运营和加速的价值创造。

无论您是刚开始FinOps之旅还是希望扩大规模，您都将获得清晰的愿景，了解如何超越传统实践，迈向FinOps的未来。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Kion为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Netflix Shapes our Fleet for Efficiency and Reliability (IND387)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Netflix 如何塑造我们的机群以实现效率和可靠性 (IND387)
sessions.abstract: Netflix's strategy for optimizing its cloud architecture for efficiency and reliability. Placement of workloads on price-optimal hardware by automatically modeling capacity requirements and understanding AWS hardware performance and pricing. The talk will also cover a continuous optimization loop that monitors and reshapes the fleet to maintain business outcomes as load patterns change. Finally, it will touch upon managing traffic demand and compute supply to ensure availability during unexpected load shifts.
sessions.abstract_cn: Netflix通过自动建模容量需求并了解AWS硬件性能和定价，将工作负载部署在价格最优的硬件上，从而优化其云架构的效率和可靠性。该演讲还将介绍一个持续优化循环，该循环监控并重塑机群以在负载模式变化时维持业务成果。最后，它将涉及管理流量需求和计算供应，以确保在意外负载变化期间的可用性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From automation to autonomy: How AWS Partners drive SMB AI evolution at scale
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从自动化到自主化：AWS 合作伙伴如何大规模推动中小企业 AI 演进
sessions.abstract: In today's AI landscape, Small and Medium Business (SMB) face a pivotal moment: with 86% increasing their AI investments in 2026 and 77% expecting AI to deliver end-to-end process automation, expert partnership is the key to success. This lightning talk reveals how AWS Partners guide SMB customers from initial automation to true operational autonomy. Learn how partners address critical challenges in data readiness, talent gaps, security, and integration while maximizing return on investments. Through real-world case studies and practical strategies, discover how partners can help position your business at the forefront of AI innovation, from packaged solutions to cutting-edge implementations.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在当今的人工智能领域，中小型企业（SMB）正面临关键时刻：86%的企业将在2026年增加AI投资，77%的企业期望AI实现端到端流程自动化，专业合作伙伴是成功的关键。本次简短演讲揭示了AWS合作伙伴如何引导中小企业客户从初始自动化迈向真正的运营自主。了解合作伙伴如何应对数据就绪性、人才缺口、安全性和集成方面的关键挑战，同时最大化投资回报。通过真实案例研究和实用策略，探索合作伙伴如何帮助您的企业站在AI创新的前沿，从打包解决方案到前沿实施。

presenter.name: Niki Moshiri
presenter.title: Worldwide Partner Leader - Small & Medium Business

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Simplify discovery and deployment of software with AWS Marketplace (MAM107)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 AWS Marketplace 简化软件的发现和部署 (MAM107)
sessions.abstract: Discover how AWS Marketplace simplifies access to third-party software and tools across your entire infrastructure. In this session, explore the diverse delivery methods AWS Marketplace offers, including SaaS solutions, Amazon Machine Images (AMIs), containerized applications, and API-based agents. Learn how to efficiently discover products available globally, select flexible pricing models that fit your needs, and streamline spend management across your organization. See firsthand how AWS Marketplace accelerates your modernization and migration initiatives by providing enterprise-ready solutions exactly where and when you need them.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 AWS Marketplace 如何简化对第三方软件和工具的访问，覆盖您的整个基础设施。在本次会议中，探索 AWS Marketplace 提供的多种交付方式，包括 SaaS 解决方案、Amazon Machine Images (AMI)、容器化应用程序和基于 API 的代理。了解如何高效地发现全球可用的产品，选择符合您需求的灵活定价模型，并简化整个组织的支出管理。亲身体验 AWS Marketplace 如何通过在您需要的时间和地点提供企业级解决方案，加速您的现代化和迁移计划。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Alert to Resolution: Supercharge AWS Ops with the Agentic AI SRE (AIM225)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从告警到解决：使用智能体AI SRE增强AWS运维 (AIM225)
sessions.abstract: Modern AWS environments generate massive volumes of telemetry, yet incident diagnosis remains highly manual. Learn how enterprises are leveraging secure agentic AI to investigate incidents in real time, and turn CloudWatch and observability data from Datadog, Dynatrace and others into actionable fixes. Powered by Amazon Bedrock, NeuBird’s Hawkeye correlates signals across tools instantly, identifies root causes, and provides remediation within minutes, reducing MTTR by up to 90%. Join the session to see how enterprises adopt agentic AI to operationalize observability data and improve service reliability. Walk away with practical insights into building Agentic workflows that integrate seamlessly into AWS operations. This presentation is brought to you by NeuBird AI, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 现代AWS环境产生大量遥测数据，但事件诊断仍然高度依赖人工。了解企业如何利用安全的智能体AI实时调查事件，并将CloudWatch和来自Datadog、Dynatrace等的可观测性数据转化为可操作的修复方案。基于Amazon Bedrock，NeuBird的Hawkeye能够即时关联各工具间的信号，识别根本原因，并在几分钟内提供修复方案，将MTTR降低高达90%。参加本次会议，了解企业如何采用智能体AI来运营化可观测性数据并提高服务可靠性。带走构建智能体工作流的实用见解，这些工作流可无缝集成到AWS运营中。本演示由AWS合作伙伴NeuBird AI提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Enhance SaaS applications with Quick Suite agentic capabilities (BIZ208)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Quick Suite 智能体功能增强 SaaS 应用程序 (BIZ208)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Amazon Quick Suite agentic AI capabilities increase customer engagement and application value by 50%. Hear from a customer speaker who leverages ISV application integrated with conversational AI, agentic AI capabilities while maintaining multi-tenant security and performance. Explore embedding patterns, API integration strategies along with agents and actions communication for SaaS applications. Discover implementation approaches that add intelligent workplace productivity features without disrupting existing user workflows or application architectures.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解Amazon Quick Suite代理AI功能如何将客户参与度和应用价值提升50%。聆听客户演讲者分享如何利用集成了对话AI、代理AI功能的ISV应用，同时保持多租户安全性和性能。探索嵌入模式、API集成策略以及SaaS应用的代理和操作通信。发现在不干扰现有用户工作流程或应用架构的情况下添加智能工作场所生产力功能的实施方法。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [NEW LAUNCH] Patching data leak vulnerabilities using VPC Egress Proxy (NET216)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [新发布] 使用 VPC 出口代理修补数据泄露漏洞 (NET216)
sessions.abstract: Cyber attackers are becoming sophisticated. Through leaked credentials and elevated IAM roles, they can compromise workloads and exfiltrate data while remaining undetected for extended periods. In this session, discover how AWS Network Firewall proxy provides advanced protection against sophisticated cyber threats. You’ll learn how this new feature patches data leak vulnerabilities in your environment, helping detect and prevent unauthorized data exfiltration attempts. We’ll deep dive into ways to identify compromised workloads that may be operating with stolen credentials or escalated IAM privileges, demonstrate practical implementation strategies, and share best practices for configuring inspection policies to strengthen your organization's security posture.
sessions.abstract_cn: 网络攻击者正变得越来越复杂。通过泄露的凭证和提升的IAM角色，他们可以入侵工作负载并窃取数据，同时在较长时间内保持不被发现。在本次会议中，了解AWS网络防火墙代理如何提供针对复杂网络威胁的高级保护。您将学习这一新功能如何修补环境中的数据泄露漏洞，帮助检测和防止未经授权的数据窃取尝试。我们将深入探讨识别可能使用被盗凭证或升级IAM权限运行的受损工作负载的方法，演示实际实施策略，并分享配置检查策略的最佳实践，以加强您组织的安全态势。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming Integrated Diagnostics: Philips' AI Journey with AWS (IND219)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 转型综合诊断：飞利浦与AWS的AI之旅 (IND219)
sessions.abstract: Healthcare providers struggle with disconnected patient data sources across diagnostic platforms, hampering clinical decision-making. Philips addresses this through integrated cloud-based solutions in radiology, cardiology, and digital pathology, powered by AI capabilities. As digital pathology emerges as the next innovation frontier, cloud infrastructure becomes crucial for managing massive imaging datasets and enabling collaboration.Incorporating AWS HealthImaging and AWS generative AI tools, Philips has developed comprehensive digital pathology solutions that streamline workflows, enhance diagnostic accuracy, and enables global collaboration. The goal is to improve diagnosis and treatment planning through standardized DICOM implementation, AI-assisted analysis, and seamless data sharing across healthcare institutions worldwide.
sessions.abstract_cn: 医疗服务提供者面临着诊断平台间患者数据源分散的困境，这阻碍了临床决策。飞利浦通过在放射学、心脏病学和数字病理学领域提供集成的基于云的解决方案来解决这一问题，这些解决方案由人工智能能力驱动。随着数字病理学成为下一个创新前沿，云基础设施对于管理海量影像数据集和实现协作变得至关重要。结合AWS HealthImaging和AWS生成式人工智能工具，飞利浦开发了全面的数字病理学解决方案，可简化工作流程、提高诊断准确性并实现全球协作。其目标是通过标准化DICOM实施、人工智能辅助分析以及全球医疗机构间的无缝数据共享来改善诊断和治疗规划。

presenter.name: Jaron Nix
presenter.title: Senior Product Manager, AWS Applied AI Solutions

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build a chat app for smart home appliances (DEV339)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为智能家居设备构建聊天应用 (DEV339)
sessions.abstract: Smart appliances are no longer just connected. They can now communicate. In this session, learn how to build a chat application that gives home appliances human-like personalities through generative AI. See how to combine natural language interfaces with device data to create interactive and engaging experiences. Explore architecture options, integration patterns, and design choices that make appliances more relatable to end users. Leave with practical guidance for developing conversational applications that blend smart home technology with AI-powered interactions.
sessions.abstract_cn: 智能家电不再仅仅是联网设备，它们现在可以进行交流。在本次会议中，了解如何构建一个聊天应用程序，通过生成式AI为家用电器赋予类人个性。了解如何将自然语言界面与设备数据相结合，创造互动且引人入胜的体验。探索架构选项、集成模式和设计选择，使家电对最终用户更具亲和力。带走开发对话式应用程序的实用指导，将智能家居技术与AI驱动的交互相融合。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Using AI to improve humanitarian workload resilience (AIM336)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用人工智能提高人道主义工作负载的韧性 (AIM336)
sessions.abstract: Almost everyone has experienced a bad IT day, when systems fail in unpredictable ways. For organizations operating in a humanitarian crisis, contextual continuity is mission critical. In this code talk, we'll explore how generative AI can help build more resilient humanitarian systems. Drawing from Werner Vogels' wisdom that "everything fails, all the time, so plan for failure and nothing will fail", we'll demonstrate practical techniques for identifying and mitigating potential system failures. Through live coding, attendees will learn to leverage AI to anticipate and address vulnerabilities, ensuring more robust and reliable humanitarian technology.
sessions.abstract_cn: 几乎每个人都经历过糟糕的IT日子，系统以不可预测的方式发生故障。对于在人道主义危机中运营的组织来说，上下文连续性至关重要。在本次代码讲座中，我们将探讨生成式AI如何帮助构建更具弹性的人道主义系统。借鉴Werner Vogels的智慧"一切都会失败，无时无刻，所以要为失败做好计划，这样就不会有任何失败"，我们将演示识别和缓解潜在系统故障的实用技术。通过现场编码，与会者将学习如何利用AI来预测和解决漏洞，确保更强大、更可靠的人道主义技术。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-Driven Automation for Modern Operations (AIM219)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 现代运维的AI驱动自动化 (AIM219)
sessions.abstract: See how AI-powered automation is revolutionizing digital operations at organizations like Warner Brothers Discovery. AI agents now work across the entire lifecycle, reducing toil by adjusting schedules, diagnosing issues, scribing incidents, executing remediation, and standardizing responses, freeing teams for higher-value work. Discover how organizations apply agentic AI to three types of operational work: well-understood, partially understood, and novel or major events. Learn how to evaluate which tasks are best for agents, where GenAI adds value, and what still demands human expertise so your teams can innovate faster, operate smarter, and continuously improve. This presentation is brought to you by PagerDuty, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解AI驱动的自动化如何在华纳兄弟探索等组织中革命性地改变数字化运营。AI代理现在贯穿整个生命周期，通过调整计划、诊断问题、记录事件、执行修复和标准化响应来减少繁重工作，让团队专注于更高价值的工作。探索组织如何将代理AI应用于三种类型的运营工作：充分理解的、部分理解的，以及新颖或重大事件。学习如何评估哪些任务最适合代理，GenAI在哪里增加价值，以及什么仍需要人类专业知识，让您的团队能够更快创新、更智能运营并持续改进。本演示由AWS合作伙伴PagerDuty提供。

presenter.name: Nora Jones
presenter.title: Head of Product Strategy and Growth

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Cloud to AI Securing the New Cloud Attack Surface (SEC220)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从云到AI：保护新的云攻击面 (SEC220)
sessions.abstract:
Everything we learned from running 20% of the internet-yours by default. Go from idea to production readiness instantly.
Join David Liu (AI specialist) as he reveals how Cloudflare's developer platform eliminates infrastructure provisioning and management for developers.  How Cloudflare has both stateful and ephemeral compute specifically designed to run your AI agents. Discover how the platform's intelligent auto-scaling handles traffic spikes and failures, ensuring you only pay for actual compute time and not wait time.
Learn how companies are deploying once and running their applications better than anybody else on Cloudflare's globally distributed serverless platform. This presentation is brought to you by Cloudflare, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn:
从运行互联网20%流量中学到的一切——默认属于您。从想法到生产就绪，瞬间实现。

加入David Liu（AI专家），了解Cloudflare开发者平台如何为开发者消除基础设施配置和管理。Cloudflare如何提供专为运行AI代理而设计的有状态和临时计算。了解平台的智能自动扩展如何处理流量峰值和故障，确保您只为实际计算时间付费，而非等待时间。

了解公司如何在Cloudflare全球分布式无服务器平台上一次部署，比任何人都更好地运行应用程序。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Cloudflare为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building a culture of API Excellence (API208)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建API卓越文化 (API208)
sessions.abstract: Effective API discovery and reuse remain significant challenges in many organizations, often resulting in redundant development and underutilized APIs. This session examines how leading organizations have implemented API cataloging to transform their development culture. Discover practical approaches to API cataloging that drive both internal collaboration and external adoption. Through real-world examples, learn how to implement an API-first culture that maximizes the value of your API investments.
sessions.abstract_cn: 有效的 API 发现和重用在许多组织中仍然是重大挑战，往往导致冗余开发和 API 利用不足。本次会议探讨领先组织如何实施 API 编目来转变其开发文化。了解推动内部协作和外部采用的 API 编目实用方法。通过真实案例，学习如何实施 API 优先文化，最大化您的 API 投资价值。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unify Data for a Strong AI Foundation with AWS & Salesforce (DAT206)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过AWS和Salesforce统一数据构建强大的AI基础 (DAT206)
sessions.abstract: Unify data across AWS and within Salesforce without complex, costly replication, using Zero Copy data integration between Salesforce Data 360 and AWS. This presentation is brought to you by Salesforce, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 使用Salesforce Data 360和AWS之间的零拷贝数据集成，统一AWS和Salesforce内的数据，无需复杂、昂贵的复制。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Salesforce为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Customer Trust with AI Agents: Transform Your MSP Operations (PEX318)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过AI代理建立客户信任：转型您的MSP运营 (PEX318)
sessions.abstract: As Managed Service Providers (MSPs) evolve to meet the growing demand for proactive cloud management, AI agents are becoming essential collaborators in service delivery. Through live demonstrations, you'll learn how to build and deploy incident response and infrastructure monitoring agents using AWS's agentic AI capabilities. Follow along as we will walk through the code required to create AI agents with Strands and integrate them with AWS services and third-party solutions through MCP servers to create comprehensive agentic workflows. This hands-on session will equip you with the technical knowledge to enhance your MSP services through practical AI agent implementation.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着托管服务提供商（MSP）不断发展以满足对主动云管理日益增长的需求，AI代理正在成为服务交付中不可或缺的协作者。通过现场演示，您将学习如何使用AWS的代理AI能力构建和部署事件响应和基础设施监控代理。跟随我们一起了解使用Strands创建AI代理所需的代码，并通过MCP服务器将它们与AWS服务和第三方解决方案集成，以创建全面的代理工作流。本实践课程将为您提供通过实际AI代理实施来增强MSP服务的技术知识。

presenter.name: Bappaditya Dutta
presenter.title: Global Tech Lead, AWS MSP Program

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Architecting multicloud solutions from data mesh to generative AI (HMC210)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从数据网格到生成式AI的多云解决方案架构 (HMC210)
sessions.abstract: As organizations operate across multiple cloud providers, they often struggle to unlock the full potential of generative and agentic AI capabilities with data spread across cloud providers. Some of the challenges include federating data access, orchestrating model deployments across cloud providers, and implementing guardrails around generative AI. In this session, we will dive deep into practical approaches to multicloud data strategy, such as data mesh architecture and materialized views. You will learn effective strategies you can use to securely deploy and manage generative AI applications leveraging services and models across cloud providers.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着组织在多个云提供商之间运营,他们常常难以充分发挥生成式AI和智能体AI能力的潜力,因为数据分散在各个云提供商之间。面临的一些挑战包括联合数据访问、跨云提供商编排模型部署,以及围绕生成式AI实施护栏机制。在本次会议中,我们将深入探讨多云数据策略的实用方法,例如数据网格架构和物化视图。您将学习可以使用的有效策略,以安全地部署和管理利用跨云提供商服务和模型的生成式AI应用程序。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - State of the Art: AWS data protection in 2025 (ft. Vanguard) (SEC203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 最新技术：2025年AWS数据保护（特邀先锋集团）(SEC203)
sessions.abstract: Join AWS Cryptography leaders for a comprehensive tour of 2025's groundbreaking security innovations. Discover the latest launches across Cloudfront, KMS, Private CA, and Secrets Manager, showcasing AWS's implementation of NIST-standardized post quantum cryptography. Learn how we're revolutionizing cloud security through quantum-resistant algorithms, advanced certificate management, and automated secrets handling. Get an inside look at Vanguards enterprise-wide PQC migration and how they made it a strategic business priority. See firsthand how AWS continues raising the bar on data protection for your most sensitive workloads.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入AWS密码学领导者，全面了解2025年突破性的安全创新。探索CloudFront、KMS、Private CA和Secrets Manager的最新发布，展示AWS对NIST标准化后量子密码学的实施。了解我们如何通过抗量子算法、高级证书管理和自动化密钥处理彻底改变云安全。深入了解Vanguard企业级PQC迁移以及他们如何将其作为战略业务优先事项。亲眼见证AWS如何持续提高对您最敏感工作负载的数据保护标准。

presenter.name: Ken Beer
presenter.title: GM - Cryptographic Libraries and AWS Key Management Service

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unlocking possibilities with AWS Compute (INV207)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过AWS计算服务释放无限可能 (INV207)
sessions.abstract: Join Willem Visser, Vice President of Amazon EC2, for an inside look at AWS's transformative compute innovations across instances, containers, serverless technologies, and more. Willem will explore how AWS’ customer obsession led to implementing radical new ideas that revolutionized cloud computing, and will be joined by Barry Cooks, Vice President of Compute Abstractions at AWS. Discover how AWS's comprehensive compute capabilities enable you to build, run, and scale breakthrough applications in the cloud and at the edge.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入 Amazon EC2 副总裁 Willem Visser，深入了解 AWS 在实例、容器、无服务器技术等方面的变革性计算创新。Willem 将探讨 AWS 的客户至上理念如何推动实施彻底改变云计算的激进新想法，并将与 AWS 计算抽象副总裁 Barry Cooks 一同参与。了解 AWS 的全面计算能力如何让您在云端和边缘构建、运行和扩展突破性应用程序。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating incident response through AIOps (COP334)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 AIOps 加速事件响应 (COP334)
sessions.abstract: Discover how cutting-edge AI technologies are revolutionizing incident management and dramatically reducing Mean Time to Resolution (MTTR). This session explores how generative AI is transforming operational practices by automatically analyzing telemetry data, identifying patterns, surfacing actionable insights and leveraging AI agents. Learn how modern AI capabilities can convert hours of manual troubleshooting across multiple systems into streamlined investigations resolved in minutes.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解前沿AI技术如何彻底改变事件管理并显著缩短平均解决时间(MTTR)。本次会议探讨生成式AI如何通过自动分析遥测数据、识别模式、提供可操作的洞察以及利用AI代理来转变运营实践。了解现代AI能力如何将跨多个系统数小时的手动故障排查转变为几分钟内完成的精简调查。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-Driven Design at Scale: Tempo Labs' Move to AWS Bedrock (MAM325)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模AI驱动设计：Tempo Labs迁移至AWS Bedrock (MAM325)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Tempo Labs migrated production generative AI workloads from OpenAI to Amazon Bedrock, improving scalability, model choice, and security. Through AWS's Migration Acceleration Program (MAP) and generative AI Innovation Center, Tempo built a code-first UI/UX collaboration platform that enables product managers, designers, and engineers to collaborate directly in code—replacing image-based design workflows. This session covers the complete migration journey: model selection and prompt re-optimization, implementing guardrails and evaluation frameworks, plus infrastructure modernization with Kubernetes and data migration. Walk away with practical migration patterns, responsible AI implementation strategies, and proven approaches for building enterprise-grade genAI platforms at scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Tempo Labs 如何将生产环境的生成式 AI 工作负载从 OpenAI 迁移到 Amazon Bedrock，从而提升可扩展性、模型选择和安全性。通过 AWS 的迁移加速计划 (MAP) 和生成式 AI 创新中心，Tempo 构建了一个代码优先的 UI/UX 协作平台，使产品经理、设计师和工程师能够直接在代码中协作——取代了基于图像的设计工作流程。本次会议涵盖完整的迁移历程：模型选择和提示词重新优化、实施护栏和评估框架，以及使用 Kubernetes 进行基础设施现代化和数据迁移。您将获得实用的迁移模式、负责任的 AI 实施策略，以及构建企业级大规模生成式 AI 平台的成熟方法。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building AI Agents with Serverless, Strands, and MCP  (NTA405)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用无服务器、Strands 和 MCP 构建 AI 代理 (NTA405)
sessions.abstract: Join this session to master the art of building AI agents on AWS. Witness the evolution of generative AI (GenAI) that has enabled agentic systems to surpass traditional language models, and learn the fundamental principles that define an AI agent. Dive into the process of leveraging AWS serverless compute, the Strands Agents SDK, and the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to create these dynamic, adaptable agents. Observe the implementation of key capabilities like context awareness, authentication, security, and observability. Explore techniques to extend agent functionality with local tools, and unlock unprecedented integration by connecting to remote MCP servers. Walk away with the skills to elevate your intelligent applications with the transformative power of AWS-powered AI agents.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入此会议，掌握在 AWS 上构建 AI 代理的艺术。见证生成式 AI (GenAI) 的演进，它使代理系统能够超越传统语言模型，并学习定义 AI 代理的基本原则。深入了解如何利用 AWS 无服务器计算、Strands Agents SDK 和 Model Context Protocol (MCP) 来创建这些动态、适应性强的代理。观察关键功能的实现，如上下文感知、身份验证、安全性和可观测性。探索使用本地工具扩展代理功能的技术，并通过连接到远程 MCP 服务器解锁前所未有的集成。带着使用 AWS 驱动的 AI 代理的变革力量提升智能应用程序的技能离开。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Cloud Modernization to Autonomous Enterprise: The Next Frontier (AIM344)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从云现代化到自主企业：下一个前沿 (AIM344)
sessions.abstract: Enterprises are moving beyond cloud migration toward a future defined AI-driven autonomy. This session explores why modernization across infrastructure, applications, and data is critical to unlock AI’s full potential. Panelists will share real-world examples of predictive, self-healing, and AI-orchestrated operations, and discuss the mindset shift required for CIOs and technology leaders to achieve success. Attendees will learn how cloud-native architectures, AI agents, and intelligent workflows are converging to create autonomous enterprises. By building modernization as the foundation, organizations can enhance efficiency, break down silos, and accelerate innovation, positioning themselves to thrive in an AI-powered future. This presentation is brought to you by Genpact, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业正在超越云迁移，迈向由AI驱动的自主化未来。本次会议探讨为什么跨基础设施、应用程序和数据的现代化对于释放AI的全部潜力至关重要。小组成员将分享预测性、自愈性和AI编排操作的真实案例，并讨论CIO和技术领导者实现成功所需的思维转变。与会者将了解云原生架构、AI代理和智能工作流如何融合创建自主企业。通过将现代化作为基础，组织可以提高效率、打破孤岛、加速创新，使自己在AI驱动的未来中蓬勃发展。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Genpact为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unpredictable by Design: Finding Innovation with Generative AI (AIM223)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 设计中的不可预测性：通过生成式AI寻找创新 (AIM223)
sessions.abstract: Great ideas are often a glitch in the system – a deviation from the plan.  Workflows, meetings, and even code are often designed to reward the predictable, silencing the very thinking that leads to real discovery.  This talk highlights using one system to challenge another—with Generative AI as the “translator” for unconventional thought—to create a space where atypical ideas are essential to creating and sustaining market value.  We’ll explore how AWS solutions can help identify the brilliant glitches in your own organization – inviting the voices you haven’t heard to build the future you haven’t yet imagined. This presentation is brought to you by Deloitte, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 伟大的想法往往是系统中的故障——偏离计划的异常。工作流程、会议甚至代码通常被设计为奖励可预测性，压制了真正导致发现的思维。本次演讲重点介绍如何使用一个系统来挑战另一个系统——以生成式AI作为非常规思维的"翻译器"——创造一个非典型想法对创造和维持市场价值至关重要的空间。我们将探讨AWS解决方案如何帮助识别您组织中的卓越故障——邀请您尚未听到的声音来构建您尚未想象的未来。本演示由AWS合作伙伴德勤为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Innovation Sandbox on AWS: Automating Temporary Cloud Environments (COP351)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 创新沙盒：自动化临时云环境 (COP351)
sessions.abstract: Cloud administrators face challenges in efficiently managing temporary sandbox environments while maintaining security and cost control. Innovation Sandbox on AWS addresses this by automating the deployment and management of short-lived sandbox environments. It implements service control policies, spend controls, and account recycling mechanisms, saving weeks of administration time. This solution enhances operational efficiency, establishes cost governance, and empowers teams to experiment and innovate on AWS within controlled, standardized environments. Whether you're running GenAI experiments, managing student labs, or developer environments, learn how this solution can streamline your sandbox operations.
sessions.abstract_cn: 云管理员在高效管理临时沙箱环境的同时保持安全性和成本控制方面面临挑战。AWS 上的创新沙箱通过自动化部署和管理短期沙箱环境来解决这一问题。它实施服务控制策略、支出控制和账户回收机制,节省数周的管理时间。该解决方案提高运营效率,建立成本治理,并使团队能够在受控的标准化环境中在 AWS 上进行实验和创新。无论您是运行生成式 AI 实验、管理学生实验室还是开发者环境,了解该解决方案如何简化您的沙箱操作。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The future of Kubernetes on AWS (CNS205)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS上Kubernetes的未来 (CNS205)
sessions.abstract: Kubernetes has become a standard way for organizations looking to modernize their application portfolios. AWS developed Amazon EKS to make Kubernetes more accessible to organizations of all sizes, helping them focus on what matters most for their businesses. In this session, join Amazon EKS product leadership to learn about the latest innovations and strategies for building Kubernetes platforms and applications faster. Discover how various organizations use Amazon EKS to run their most demanding applications in the cloud, on premises, and at the edge.
sessions.abstract_cn: Kubernetes已成为希望实现应用程序组合现代化的组织的标准方式。AWS开发了Amazon EKS，使各种规模的组织更容易使用Kubernetes，帮助他们专注于对其业务最重要的事项。在本次会议中，请与Amazon EKS产品领导团队一起了解构建Kubernetes平台和应用程序的最新创新和策略。了解各种组织如何使用Amazon EKS在云端、本地和边缘运行其最苛刻的应用程序。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG: Transforming market intelligence at massive scale (IND3305)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG：大规模转型市场情报 (IND3305)
sessions.abstract: London Stock Exchange Group (LSEG) processes over 220 billion market data updates daily across 575+ global exchanges, forming the backbone of global financial markets. Learn how LSEG built their Matrix Signals Platform—a serverless architecture that detects patterns and anomalies across billions of messages. Explore their historical data migration to Amazon S3, development of a cloud-native real-time market data delivery platform, and implementation of sophisticated analytics with AWS Glue, Amazon Athena, and Amazon Bedrock. Discover how LSEG overcame cost-optimization challenges at petabyte scale, maintained consistency across 34 sites, and achieved a 5x cost reduction while improving anomaly detection from days to minutes.
sessions.abstract_cn: 伦敦证券交易所集团（LSEG）每天处理超过2200亿条市场数据更新，覆盖全球575多个交易所，构成了全球金融市场的支柱。了解LSEG如何构建其Matrix Signals平台——一个无服务器架构，可检测数十亿条消息中的模式和异常。探索他们将历史数据迁移到Amazon S3、开发云原生实时市场数据交付平台，以及使用AWS Glue、Amazon Athena和Amazon Bedrock实现复杂分析。了解LSEG如何在PB级规模上克服成本优化挑战，在34个站点间保持一致性，并实现5倍成本降低，同时将异常检测时间从数天缩短至数分钟。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Innovating with AWS Confidential Computing: An Integrated Approach (CMP407)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用AWS机密计算进行创新：集成方法 (CMP407)
sessions.abstract: Confidential computing enables customers to protect code and data from unauthorized access during processing.  This session explores AWS's innovation on confidential computing capabilities including the AWS Nitro System, AWS Nitro Enclaves, and the Nitro Trusted Platform Module.  Learn how Nitro System capabilities can be used to meet evolving data protection challenges, such as confidential inferencing. The session will cover concepts that range from isolation from cloud operators to leveraging cryptographic capabilities on CPU, GPU, and AI accelerator-based instances for applications handling highly sensitive data such as personally identifiable information, financial assets, medical information, intellectual property, and AI data.
sessions.abstract_cn: 机密计算使客户能够在处理过程中保护代码和数据免受未经授权的访问。本会议探讨了AWS在机密计算能力方面的创新，包括AWS Nitro系统、AWS Nitro Enclaves和Nitro可信平台模块。了解如何使用Nitro系统能力来应对不断发展的数据保护挑战，例如机密推理。会议将涵盖从云运营商隔离到在基于CPU、GPU和AI加速器的实例上利用加密能力的概念，适用于处理高度敏感数据的应用程序，如个人身份信息、金融资产、医疗信息、知识产权和AI数据。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Easy cross-cloud authN : AWS outbound identity federation in action (SEC233)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 简化跨云身份验证：AWS出站身份联合实践 (SEC233)
sessions.abstract: Does your AWS workload need to access Azure, Databricks, or other external services? Join us to learn how outbound identity federation can enable you to securely authenticate your AWS workloads with a wide range of cloud providers, SaaS platforms and self-hosted applications.. Through a live demo, we'll show how to federate an AWS identity into a third-party cloud provider, demonstrating how to generate standards-based JSON Web Tokens (JWTs) that can be exchanged for access tokens from external services.
sessions.abstract_cn: 您的AWS工作负载是否需要访问Azure、Databricks或其他外部服务？加入我们，了解出站身份联合如何让您安全地将AWS工作负载与各种云提供商、SaaS平台和自托管应用程序进行身份验证。通过现场演示，我们将展示如何将AWS身份联合到第三方云提供商，演示如何生成基于标准的JSON Web令牌(JWT)，这些令牌可以与外部服务的访问令牌进行交换。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [NEW LAUNCH] United Airlines: Operational Excellence with AWS (SPS317)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [新发布] 联合航空：借助 AWS 实现卓越运营 (SPS317)
sessions.abstract: Join United Airlines and AWS leaders as they share how AWS Unified Operations transformed United’s approach to managing mission-critical systems. Learn how United enhanced their operational resilience through proactive architectural guidance, rapid incident response, and continuous improvement practices. Discover the journey of implementing a new support model that combines context-aware expertise to prevent issues and accelerate resolution. This session offers valuable insights for executives managing complex technology landscapes who want to improve architectural and operational excellence while enabling innovation. See how United’s success story can inform your organization’s path to enhanced operational reliability.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入联合航空和AWS领导者的行列，了解AWS统一运营如何改变联合航空管理关键任务系统的方式。了解联合航空如何通过主动的架构指导、快速的事件响应和持续改进实践来增强其运营韧性。探索实施新支持模型的历程，该模型结合了情境感知专业知识来预防问题并加速解决方案。本次会议为管理复杂技术环境的高管提供宝贵见解，帮助他们在实现创新的同时提高架构和运营卓越性。了解联合航空的成功案例如何为您的组织增强运营可靠性的路径提供参考。

presenter.name: Jason Bower
presenter.title: Director AWS Field Support N. America

presenter.name: Ninos Gabriel
presenter.title: Managing Director, Enterprise Architecture and Strategic Platforms

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Shapeshifting Application: Architecture That Transforms Across AWS (CNS426)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 变形应用程序：跨AWS转换的架构 (CNS426)
sessions.abstract: Imagine an application that changes its deployment form while maintaining its essential nature—a digital shapeshifter adapting to any AWS compute environment. This session unveils the architectural patterns enabling true deployment flexibility, transforming applications to flow seamlessly between Lambda functions, ECS containers, and EKS pods. Through practical demonstrations, discover design principles that separate business logic from infrastructure concerns, creating applications that leverage AWS's specialized services without becoming tightly coupled. Learn to craft adaptable applications that maintain their core functionality while thriving in any AWS compute environment.
sessions.abstract_cn: 想象一个应用程序在保持其本质特性的同时改变其部署形式——一个数字变形者，能够适应任何AWS计算环境。本次会议揭示了实现真正部署灵活性的架构模式，将应用程序转换为在Lambda函数、ECS容器和EKS Pod之间无缝流动。通过实际演示，发现将业务逻辑与基础设施关注点分离的设计原则，创建能够利用AWS专业化服务而不会紧密耦合的应用程序。学习如何构建适应性强的应用程序，在任何AWS计算环境中都能保持其核心功能并蓬勃发展。

presenter.name: Leandro Cavalcante Damascena
presenter.title: Senior SA Engineer - Powertools for AWS

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build production AI agents with the Strands Agents SDK for TypeScript (AIM3331)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Strands Agents SDK for TypeScript 构建生产级 AI 代理 (AIM3331)
sessions.abstract: Discover how to build enterprise-ready AI agents using the newly launched Strands Agents SDK for TypeScript. This session introduces developers to a simple model-driven framework for building agents that run on any cloud, support multiple LLM providers, and integrate with the tools you already have. Learn how TypeScript developers can now leverage the same production-ready agent framework that Python teams have been using, with full type safety and seamless integration into modern JavaScript ecosystems. We'll cover key features, demonstrate multi-agent patterns, and explore deployment options from Amazon EKS to Amazon Bedrock AgentCore with live coding examples.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何使用新推出的 Strands Agents SDK for TypeScript 构建企业级 AI 代理。本次会议向开发者介绍一个简单的模型驱动框架，用于构建可在任何云上运行、支持多个 LLM 提供商并与您现有工具集成的代理。了解 TypeScript 开发者现在如何利用 Python 团队一直在使用的同一个生产就绪代理框架，具备完整的类型安全性和与现代 JavaScript 生态系统的无缝集成。我们将涵盖关键功能，演示多代理模式，并通过实时编码示例探索从 Amazon EKS 到 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 的部署选项。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Apollo Tyres Accelerates Engineering Workflows with HPC on AWS (IND368)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Apollo Tyres 通过 AWS 上的 HPC 加速工程工作流程 (IND368)
sessions.abstract: Apollo Tyres transformed their engineering workflows by migrating to AWS High Performance Computing (HPC). This move integrated simulation applications with design tools, improving performance by up to 59% and reducing costs by over 60%. The company built their infrastructure using AWS ParallelCluster, Amazon DCV for seamless remote workstation access, and FSx for ONTAP storage. Their implementation includes the Tachyon platform for self-service job management, enabling engineers to submit and monitor simulation jobs efficiently. The session covers architecture decisions, instance selection strategies, and practical solutions for common migration challenges including network latency and storage optimization.
sessions.abstract_cn: Apollo Tyres通过迁移到AWS高性能计算(HPC)改变了他们的工程工作流程。此举将仿真应用程序与设计工具集成，性能提升高达59%，成本降低超过60%。该公司使用AWS ParallelCluster构建基础设施，使用Amazon DCV实现无缝远程工作站访问，并使用FSx for ONTAP存储。他们的实施包括Tachyon平台用于自助作业管理，使工程师能够高效地提交和监控仿真作业。该会议涵盖架构决策、实例选择策略，以及常见迁移挑战的实用解决方案，包括网络延迟和存储优化。

presenter.name: Shailender Gupta
presenter.title: Global Head - Cloud Infra, Reporting, and Analytics

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Protecting web apps & APIs with AI and an as-a-Service approach (SEC210)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用AI和即服务方法保护Web应用程序和API (SEC210)
sessions.abstract: Modern apps demand protection that matches cloud speed. In this session, learn best practices of implementing prevention-first security powered by AI engines to protect AWS-hosted web apps and APIs. This approach adapts to zero-day security issues in real time, and can simplify operations and keep latency low across a global footprint. You’ll see how organizations around the globe have hardened web and API traffic without heavy tuning. You will see a demonstration of WAF-as-a-Service that demonstrates AWS-native deployment through Marketplace, showing integrations to deliver unified policy, visibility, and faster, safer adoption. This presentation is brought to you by Check Point Software, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 现代应用需要与云速度相匹配的保护。在本次会议中，了解实施由AI引擎驱动的预防优先安全的最佳实践，以保护AWS托管的Web应用和API。这种方法能够实时适应零日安全问题，并可以简化操作，在全球范围内保持低延迟。您将看到全球各地的组织如何在无需大量调优的情况下加固Web和API流量。您将看到WAF即服务的演示，展示通过Marketplace进行AWS原生部署，显示集成以提供统一策略、可见性以及更快、更安全的采用。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Check Point Software提供。

presenter.name: Eduardo Redondo Garcia
presenter.title: Global Head of Cloud Security Architecture

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Powering AI and agentic platforms with Amazon Bedrock (AIM3305)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock 驱动 AI 和智能体平台 (AIM3305)
sessions.abstract: Organizations are rapidly building AI applications and workflows to automate manual processes and boost productivity. The reality: many of these initiatives never reach production. This session explores the critical challenges of building, deploying, and scaling end-to-end enterprise AI systems and shares proven technical architectures and best practices to go from POC to production with Amazon Bedrock. You'll hear directly from Vercel, a leading provider of AI dev tools, as they share how they built and scaled their production AI platform with Amazon Bedrock and how their AI SDK accelerates building AI applications with Amazon Bedrock integrations.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业正在快速构建AI应用程序和工作流程，以实现手动流程自动化并提高生产力。但现实是：许多此类计划从未投入生产。本次会议探讨了构建、部署和扩展端到端企业AI系统的关键挑战，并分享了经过验证的技术架构和最佳实践，帮助您使用Amazon Bedrock从概念验证阶段过渡到生产环境。您将直接听取Vercel（领先的AI开发工具提供商）的分享，了解他们如何使用Amazon Bedrock构建和扩展其生产AI平台，以及他们的AI SDK如何通过Amazon Bedrock集成加速AI应用程序的构建。

presenter.name: Julia Bodea
presenter.title: Senior Product Manager Technical, Amazon Bedrock

presenter.name: Lowry Snow
presenter.title: Principal, WW GTM, Bedrock and GenAI

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic AI for VMware migrations with AWS Transform for VMware (MAM202)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Transform for VMware 实现 VMware 迁移的智能体 AI (MAM202)
sessions.abstract: Accelerate your VMware migration journey with AWS Transform, the first agentic AI service for large-scale VMware workload migrations to Amazon EC2. Discover how to migrate from on-premises VMware infrastructure to a modernized, cloud-native architecture while overcoming challenges like evolving licensing models and vendor lock-in. Meet the team behind AWS Transform and see a live demonstration showcasing automated application discovery, dependency mapping, network translation, wave planning, and server migration with optimized EC2 instance selection. Learn practical approaches to streamline large-scale migrations and modernize VMware workloads to AWS with greater speed and confidence.
sessions.abstract_cn: 使用 AWS Transform 加速您的 VMware 迁移之旅，这是首个用于大规模 VMware 工作负载迁移到 Amazon EC2 的智能体 AI 服务。了解如何从本地 VMware 基础设施迁移到现代化的云原生架构，同时克服不断变化的许可模式和供应商锁定等挑战。认识 AWS Transform 背后的团队，观看实时演示，展示自动化应用程序发现、依赖关系映射、网络转换、批次规划以及通过优化 EC2 实例选择进行服务器迁移。学习简化大规模迁移的实用方法，以更快的速度和更高的信心将 VMware 工作负载现代化迁移到 AWS。

presenter.name: Sean Lewis
presenter.title: Director, Enterprise Apps, Migration and Modernization

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Optimizing generative AI workloads for sustainability and cost (AIM253)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 优化生成式AI工作负载的可持续性和成本 (AIM253)
sessions.abstract: Learn how to build efficient generative AI solutions using AWS services like SageMaker and Bedrock. We'll explore practical optimization techniques including quantization and pruning, along with cost-saving infrastructure features such as spot instances and intelligent storage tiering. Discover how to leverage AWS's native capabilities to create high-performance AI solutions that are both environmentally conscious and budget-friendly.
sessions.abstract_cn: 学习如何使用 AWS 服务（如 SageMaker 和 Bedrock）构建高效的生成式 AI 解决方案。我们将探索实用的优化技术，包括量化和剪枝，以及节省成本的基础设施功能，如竞价型实例和智能存储分层。了解如何利用 AWS 的原生能力创建高性能 AI 解决方案，既环保又经济实惠。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI in Action: How Companies Unlock Global Value & Fuel Growth (GBL205)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI 实战：企业如何释放全球价值并推动增长 (GBL205)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Tuya, Lark and Deloitte China leverage AWS Generative AI capabilities to drive innovation globally. Tuya leverages AWS Bedrock and Amazon SageMaker to power smart home innovations and optimize operations globally, reducing ML model deployment time from months to weeks. Lark showcases enterprise AI features powered by AWS Generative AI infrastructure and serve thousands of customers with DeepSeek integration. Deloitte China leverage AWS China's Generative AI solutions, empowers 10,000+ employees with AI capabilities and serves multinationals as a CAC-approved solution.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解涂鸦智能、飞书和德勤中国如何利用AWS生成式AI能力在全球推动创新。涂鸦智能利用AWS Bedrock和Amazon SageMaker为智能家居创新提供支持并在全球范围内优化运营，将机器学习模型部署时间从数月缩短至数周。飞书展示了由AWS生成式AI基础设施支持的企业AI功能，并通过DeepSeek集成为数千客户提供服务。德勤中国利用AWS中国的生成式AI解决方案，为10,000多名员工赋能AI能力，并作为CAC批准的解决方案为跨国企业提供服务。

presenter.name: Xavier WANG
presenter.title: Sr. Mgr SSA AWS Greater China

presenter.name: Jason Wang
presenter.title: Chief AI Architech
presenter.company: Hangzhou Tuya Information Technology Co., Ltd.

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Powering Enterprise AI: Architecting and Governing Agents at Iberdrola on AWS
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为企业AI赋能：在AWS上架构和治理Iberdrola的智能代理
sessions.abstract: Iberdrola leverages AWS to deploy Claude 4 AI agents that enhance operational efficiency through compressed decision cycles. The implementation focuses on three use cases demonstrating the design of domain-specific agents with comprehensive telemetry and safe scalability. Their approach transforms experimental prompts into reliable services through robust governance that balances innovation with risk management. Performance metrics directly connect agent activities to business outcomes. Iberdrola's vision includes developing an enterprise Agent Hub - a marketplace for teams to share and reuse certified AI agents. This platform will serve as a strategic asset, enabling Iberdrola to maximize AI benefits across its operations.
sessions.abstract_cn: Iberdrola利用AWS部署Claude 4 AI代理，通过压缩决策周期来提高运营效率。该实施专注于三个用例，展示了具有全面遥测和安全可扩展性的领域特定代理的设计。他们的方法通过强大的治理将实验性提示转化为可靠的服务，在创新与风险管理之间取得平衡。性能指标直接将代理活动与业务成果联系起来。Iberdrola的愿景包括开发企业级Agent Hub——一个供团队共享和重用经过认证的AI代理的市场。该平台将作为战略资产，使Iberdrola能够在其运营中最大化AI效益。

presenter.name: Joseph Santamaria
presenter.title: Global Director AWS Solution Architecture and Customer Success, Energy

presenter.name: Unai Bermejo
presenter.title: Global AI Expert Engineer at Iberdrola

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How well do you know EC2? (CMP356)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 你对 EC2 了解多少？(CMP356)
sessions.abstract: Many organizations deploy Amazon EC2 instances without fully leveraging available optimization opportunities. EC2 offers over 850 instance types across six categories: general purpose, compute optimized, memory optimized, storage optimized, accelerated computing, and high-performance computing. Most instances run on the AWS Nitro System, which delivers enhanced performance through dedicated hardware for compute, storage, and networking functions. This session explores EC2's breadth, from processor architectures including Intel, AMD, and AWS Graviton processors that deliver up to 40% better price performance, to purchase options like Spot Instances offering up to 90% savings and Savings Plans for predictable workloads. Discover practical strategies for matching workloads to optimal instance configurations and purchasing models.
sessions.abstract_cn: 许多组织在部署 Amazon EC2 实例时未能充分利用可用的优化机会。EC2 提供超过 850 种实例类型，涵盖六个类别：通用型、计算优化型、内存优化型、存储优化型、加速计算型和高性能计算型。大多数实例运行在 AWS Nitro System 上，该系统通过专用硬件为计算、存储和网络功能提供增强的性能。本次会议探讨 EC2 的广度，从包括 Intel、AMD 和 AWS Graviton 处理器在内的处理器架构（可提供高达 40% 的性价比提升），到购买选项，如可节省高达 90% 成本的 Spot 实例以及适用于可预测工作负载的 Savings Plans。了解将工作负载与最佳实例配置和购买模式相匹配的实用策略。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Testing GuardDuty’s Runtime Detections:Hands-on with real world attack scenarios
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 测试 GuardDuty 的运行时检测：真实世界攻击场景实践
sessions.abstract: Join this lightning talk to learn how to validate Amazon GuardDuty's runtime threat detection capabilities using test cases that reflect realworld threats. We'll demonstrate practical examples of executing controlled MITRE ATT&CK-mapped tests to verify GuardDuty's ability to detect common attack techniques, including execution, privilege escalation, persistence and impact. Through live demonstrations, discover how to safely simulate threats in your AWS environment, interpret GuardDuty's findings, and gain confidence in your security controls. Leave with practical knowledge to implement your own GuardDuty validation testing strategy using realistic test scenarios.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入这场闪电演讲，了解如何使用反映真实世界威胁的测试用例来验证 Amazon GuardDuty 的运行时威胁检测能力。我们将演示执行受控的 MITRE ATT&CK 映射测试的实际示例，以验证 GuardDuty 检测常见攻击技术的能力，包括执行、权限提升、持久化和影响。通过现场演示，了解如何在您的 AWS 环境中安全地模拟威胁、解读 GuardDuty 的发现结果，并增强对安全控制措施的信心。您将获得实用知识，可以使用真实的测试场景实施自己的 GuardDuty 验证测试策略。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - High-performance NLP & geospatial analysis with Amazon Redshift (ANT334)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Redshift 进行高性能 NLP 和地理空间分析 (ANT334)
sessions.abstract: This session explores how Cambridge Mobile Telematics (CMT) uses Amazon Redshift for large-scale geospatial and text data analysis. We'll discuss why CMT chose AWS and Redshift based on scalability and integration needs, highlighting how Redshift's geospatial solution using H3 functions enable efficient processing of billions of location records. The presentation demonstrates CMT's use of Redshift's NLP capabilities, featuring QEv2 and Vega for advanced ad-hoc reporting. Finally, we examine how Redshift's architecture delivers the optimal price-performance balance for CMT's demanding data operations.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨了Cambridge Mobile Telematics (CMT)如何使用Amazon Redshift进行大规模地理空间和文本数据分析。我们将讨论CMT基于可扩展性和集成需求选择AWS和Redshift的原因,重点介绍Redshift使用H3函数的地理空间解决方案如何实现数十亿条位置记录的高效处理。演示展示了CMT对Redshift自然语言处理能力的使用,包括QEv2和Vega用于高级即席报告。最后,我们研究了Redshift的架构如何为CMT要求严苛的数据操作提供最优的性价比平衡。

presenter.name: Ryan McMahon
presenter.title: Senior Vice President of Strategy and Corporate Devlopment

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-Driven Testing: Scaling Automation with KaneAI and HyperExecute (AIM230)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI驱动测试：使用KaneAI和HyperExecute扩展自动化 (AIM230)
sessions.abstract: Discover how KaneAI and HyperExecute redefine modern AI-native testing workflows for QA, developers, and DevOps teams. Go from natural language to executable automated tests with seamless integration into the AWS ecosystem. Unlock blazing-fast execution speeds—up to 70% faster than legacy automation grids—while LambdaTest delivers a unified, AI-first testing platform. Accelerate release velocity by 64%, achieve over 90% stability, and cut audit preparation time by 70%. Embrace conversational test authoring, resilient execution, and audit-ready traceability—all deeply embedded within your CI/CD pipelines for a truly AI-native workflow.  This presentation is brought to you by LambdaTest, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索KaneAI和HyperExecute如何重新定义面向QA、开发人员和DevOps团队的现代AI原生测试工作流程。从自然语言到可执行的自动化测试，与AWS生态系统无缝集成。释放极速执行能力——比传统自动化网格快高达70%——同时LambdaTest提供统一的AI优先测试平台。将发布速度提升64%，实现超过90%的稳定性，并将审计准备时间缩短70%。拥抱对话式测试编写、弹性执行和审计就绪的可追溯性——所有这些都深度嵌入到您的CI/CD管道中，实现真正的AI原生工作流程。本演示由AWS合作伙伴LambdaTest为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Great ReImagining: Thriving in the Age of AI Agents (AIM3322)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 伟大的重新构想：在AI智能体时代中蓬勃发展 (AIM3322)
sessions.abstract: Join Cathal McCarthy (CSO) covering why emergence of Agentic AI is not just another technology trend; it's a fundamental shift in how businesses will operate and compete. This session is for the leaders, the strategists, and the innovators who need to prepare their organizations for what's next. We'll explore the strategic implications of a world where every employee has a team of AI agents, and every business process is orchestrated by a network of intelligent systems built on Kore.ai's platform and Amazon's cloud-native infrastructure. You'll leave with a clear understanding of the opportunities and threats, and a framework for leading your organization through this "Great Re:Imagining". This presentation is brought to you by Kore.ai, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入Cathal McCarthy（首席战略官）的讲座，探讨为什么智能体AI的兴起不仅仅是另一个技术趋势；它是企业运营和竞争方式的根本性转变。本次会议面向需要为组织准备迎接未来的领导者、战略家和创新者。我们将探讨一个世界的战略影响，在这个世界中，每个员工都拥有一个AI智能体团队，每个业务流程都由基于Kore.ai平台和亚马逊云原生基础设施构建的智能系统网络进行编排。您将清楚地了解机遇和威胁，并获得引领组织度过这次"伟大重构"的框架。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Kore.ai为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Optimize gen AI apps with semantic caching in Amazon ElastiCache (DAT451)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon ElastiCache 中的语义缓存优化生成式 AI 应用程序 (DAT451)
sessions.abstract: Multi-agent AI systems now orchestrate complex workflows requiring frequent foundation model calls. In this session, learn how you can reduce latencies to single-digit milliseconds from single-digit seconds with vector search for Amazon ElastiCache for Valkey in agentic AI applications using semantic caching, while also reducing the cost incurred from your foundation models for production workloads. By implementing semantic caching in agentic architectures like RAG-powered assistants and autonomous agents, customers can create performant and cost-effective production-scale agentic AI systems.
sessions.abstract_cn: 多智能体AI系统现在可以编排需要频繁调用基础模型的复杂工作流。在本次会议中，了解如何在智能体AI应用程序中使用Amazon ElastiCache for Valkey的向量搜索进行语义缓存，将延迟从数秒级降低到个位数毫秒级，同时还能降低生产工作负载中基础模型产生的成本。通过在RAG驱动的助手和自主智能体等智能体架构中实施语义缓存，客户可以创建高性能且具有成本效益的生产规模智能体AI系统。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scale agent tools with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway (AIM3313)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway 扩展代理工具 (AIM3313)
sessions.abstract: Unlock AI agent potential with this advanced session on scaling tools using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway. Learn to build and manage secure, production-ready agent tool environments. We'll cover multi-tenant architecture, deployment strategies, and integration patterns for agentic tools. Explore zero-code MCP tool creation with intelligent tool discovery. Gain insights on security controls, monitoring, and performance optimization for enterprise-scale agent tool ecosystems.
sessions.abstract_cn: 通过这个关于使用Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway扩展工具的高级会议，释放AI代理的潜力。学习构建和管理安全的、生产就绪的代理工具环境。我们将涵盖多租户架构、部署策略以及代理工具的集成模式。探索具有智能工具发现功能的零代码MCP工具创建。获得关于企业级代理工具生态系统的安全控制、监控和性能优化的见解。

presenter.name: Dhawal Patel
presenter.title: Tech Lead - Principal Generative AI Architect

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Knowledge Graphs for AI and Intelligent Systems (DAT209)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 面向AI和智能系统的知识图谱 (DAT209)
sessions.abstract: Enterprise-grade AI needs a unified data strategy for accurate, reliable results. Learn how knowledge graphs bridge the gap between how the real world operates and how companies actually store and organize data - transforming data into knowledge. See how Agentic GraphRAG (retrieval-augmented generation with knowledge graphs) drives real success: Learn how Neo4j customers have deployed GenAI to build chatbots grounded in knowledge graphs, improving productivity and trust, while a major gaming company achieved 10x faster insights. We’ll share real examples and practical steps for successful GenAI deployment. This presentation is brought to you by Neo4j, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业级AI需要统一的数据策略来获得准确、可靠的结果。了解知识图谱如何弥合现实世界运作方式与企业实际存储和组织数据方式之间的差距——将数据转化为知识。了解代理式GraphRAG（基于知识图谱的检索增强生成）如何推动真正的成功：学习Neo4j客户如何部署GenAI构建基于知识图谱的聊天机器人，提高生产力和信任度，同时一家大型游戏公司实现了10倍更快的洞察。我们将分享成功部署GenAI的真实案例和实用步骤。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Neo4j提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Observability & Security unite: Unify your data in Amazon CloudWatch (COP361)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 可观测性与安全性结合：在 Amazon CloudWatch 中统一您的数据 (COP361)
sessions.abstract: Managing operational, security, and compliance data in separate silos slows troubleshooting and weakens security posture. Learn how Amazon CloudWatch's enhanced capabilities unify your data with flexible analytics across teams and use cases. See how leading organizations leverage CloudWatch's simplified log management and integrated analytics to accelerate root cause analysis and enable comprehensive insights
sessions.abstract_cn: 在独立的孤岛中管理运营、安全和合规数据会减缓故障排查速度并削弱安全态势。了解 Amazon CloudWatch 的增强功能如何通过跨团队和用例的灵活分析来统一您的数据。了解领先组织如何利用 CloudWatch 的简化日志管理和集成分析来加速根本原因分析并实现全面洞察

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Customize Amazon Nova models for enhanced tool calling (AIM380)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 定制Amazon Nova模型以增强工具调用功能 (AIM380)
sessions.abstract: Learn how to leverage Amazon SageMaker's training jobs with recipes to fine-tune Nova models using Direct Preference Optimization (DPO) and Supervised Fine-Tuning (SFT) techniques and seamlessly deploy them in Amazon Bedrock. This session demonstrates how to fine-tune Nova models for advanced tool-calling capabilities, enabling intelligent agents that can autonomously execute workflows by interfacing with multiple AWS services, custom APIs, and internal tools. Learn how to customize, evaluate, and deploy Nova models for production-ready agentic systems that can handle multi-step business processes while maintaining reliability and control.
sessions.abstract_cn: 学习如何利用Amazon SageMaker的训练作业和配方，使用直接偏好优化(DPO)和监督微调(SFT)技术对Nova模型进行微调，并在Amazon Bedrock中无缝部署。本课程演示如何微调Nova模型以实现高级工具调用功能，构建能够通过与多个AWS服务、自定义API和内部工具交互来自主执行工作流的智能代理。学习如何为生产就绪的代理系统定制、评估和部署Nova模型，使其能够处理多步骤业务流程，同时保持可靠性和控制力。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-powered SaaS Observability using OpenSearch  (ISV313)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 OpenSearch 的 AI 驱动 SaaS 可观测性 (ISV313)
sessions.abstract: SaaS providers struggle with observability at scale, balancing costs, combining cross-tenant and single-tenant data, and surfacing actionable insights. In this code talk, learn how to build next-generation observability for your SaaS platform using semantic search, agent-led search, and other AI-powered techniques. We’ll dive deep on index mappings, ingestion flows, and query patterns, live coding a solution using Amazon OpenSearch Service.
sessions.abstract_cn: SaaS提供商在大规模可观测性方面面临挑战，需要平衡成本、结合跨租户和单租户数据，并提供可操作的洞察。在这个代码演讲中，学习如何使用语义搜索、智能体引导搜索和其他AI驱动技术为您的SaaS平台构建下一代可观测性。我们将深入探讨索引映射、数据摄取流程和查询模式，使用Amazon OpenSearch Service实时编码解决方案。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scale Trusted AI Adoption with Salesforce and AWS (AIM266)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 Salesforce 和 AWS 扩展可信 AI 采用 (AIM266)
sessions.abstract: Unlock powerful multi-agent workflows with Agentforce and AWS. Learn how to deploy Anthropic models on Amazon Bedrock to ensure compliant, secure AI adoption at enterprise scale. This presentation is brought to you by Salesforce, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 通过 Agentforce 和 AWS 解锁强大的多智能体工作流。了解如何在 Amazon Bedrock 上部署 Anthropic 模型，以确保企业级规模的合规、安全 AI 采用。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Salesforce 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Data modeling core concepts for Amazon DynamoDB (DAT311)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon DynamoDB 数据建模核心概念 (DAT311)
sessions.abstract: Join this session to learn the core concepts of Amazon DynamoDB data modeling. Explore best practices for common access patterns used by DynamoDB customers for applications that need consistent, fast performance at any scale. Developers experienced with DynamoDB can learn best practices and trade-offs to make when deciding on single-table and multi-table designs, indexing strategies, and more.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入此会话，学习Amazon DynamoDB数据建模的核心概念。探索DynamoDB客户在需要任何规模下一致、快速性能的应用程序中使用的常见访问模式的最佳实践。有DynamoDB经验的开发人员可以学习在决定单表和多表设计、索引策略等方面的最佳实践和权衡。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI is Breaking the SDLC: Here's How to Fix It (DVT103)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI正在打破SDLC：修复方法 (DVT103)
sessions.abstract: AI code generation is fast. Your ability to validate and ship it? Probably in need of an upgrade. Join Michael Webster, Principal Engineer at CircleCI, to learn about CircleCI’s AI engineering team’s experience deploying AI agents and coding assistants. Discover why 10x output is overwhelming traditional DevOps, which patterns unlock velocity without chaos, and why the solution isn't more tooling complexity, but smarter abstractions that make AI-generated code safer to ship. This presentation is brought to you by CircleCI, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI代码生成速度很快。你验证和发布代码的能力？可能需要升级。加入CircleCI首席工程师Michael Webster，了解CircleCI AI工程团队部署AI代理和编码助手的经验。了解为什么10倍产出会让传统DevOps不堪重负，哪些模式能在不造成混乱的情况下释放速度，以及为什么解决方案不是更复杂的工具，而是让AI生成的代码更安全发布的智能抽象。本演示由AWS合作伙伴CircleCI为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Developer Experience Economics: Moving Past Productivity Metrics (DVT207)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 开发者体验经济学：超越生产力指标 (DVT207)
sessions.abstract: Measuring the value of software development has challenged organizations for decades. This session shares insights to Amazon's approach of understanding the impact of developer experience and tooling. Learn how to apply these insights to your own team to go beyond lines of code and bring a more strategic level of thinking to your improvements to developer experience.
sessions.abstract_cn: 衡量软件开发的价值几十年来一直是组织面临的挑战。本次会议分享了亚马逊在理解开发者体验和工具影响方面的方法见解。了解如何将这些见解应用于您自己的团队，超越代码行数的局限，为改善开发者体验带来更具战略性的思维层次。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Fixing AI’s Confidently Wrong Problem in the Enterprise (AIM269)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 解决企业中AI自信错误问题 (AIM269)
sessions.abstract:
As Dwarkesh Patel notes, humans excel not just through intelligence but through context-building, self-correction, and continuous improvement — things today’s AI lacks.
This gap explains why enterprise adoption lags behind the hype, even as transformation feels inevitable. This talk explores how “confident inaccuracy” stalls impact and how to fix it. We’ll share lessons from delivering high-accuracy, high-impact AI Analyst in recent 7-figure deals with Fortune 500s and top tech companies. You’ll learn practical ways to build organic, continuous learning loops that make AI a reliable and evolving business partner. This presentation is brought to you by PromptQL, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn:
正如Dwarkesh Patel所指出的，人类的卓越表现不仅仅来自智能，更来自于构建上下文、自我纠错和持续改进的能力——这些是当今AI所缺乏的。

这一差距解释了为什么企业采用滞后于炒作，尽管变革感觉不可避免。本次演讲探讨了"自信的不准确性"如何阻碍影响力，以及如何解决这个问题。我们将分享在与财富500强和顶级科技公司的近7位数交易中交付高准确性、高影响力AI分析师的经验教训。您将学习构建有机、持续学习循环的实用方法，使AI成为可靠且不断发展的业务合作伙伴。本演示由AWS合作伙伴PromptQL为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Pioneering Agentic AI Transformation: CSL VMware & SAP modernization (MAM346)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 开创代理式AI转型：CSL VMware与SAP现代化 (MAM346)
sessions.abstract: Explore CSL's comprehensive transformation strategy focused on migrating complex VMware workloads and consolidating fragmented SAP systems to build a more agile and resilient foundation. Learn how CSL leveraged agentic AI with AWS Transform to reduce technical debt and licensing costs across 4000+ VMware servers, revolutionizing traditional migration approaches and accelerating discovery and planning processes by 10x. You'll also discover how CSL unified their fragmented ERP landscape and established enterprise-wide data standards through RISE with SAP on AWS. Gain technical guidance, get inspired with lessons learned, and walk away with actionable insights that you can use in your organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索CSL的全面转型战略，重点关注迁移复杂的VMware工作负载并整合分散的SAP系统，以构建更加敏捷和具有韧性的基础架构。了解CSL如何利用AWS Transform的代理AI来减少4000多台VMware服务器的技术债务和许可成本，彻底改变传统迁移方法，并将发现和规划流程加速10倍。您还将了解CSL如何通过AWS上的RISE with SAP统一其分散的ERP环境并建立企业级数据标准。获取技术指导，从经验教训中获得启发，并带走可在您的组织中使用的可操作见解。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unifying AWS observability, logs, and traces with Dynatrace (AIM210)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Dynatrace 统一 AWS 可观测性、日志和链路追踪 (AIM210)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Dynatrace Grail® and Davis® AI provide a unified approach to logs, metrics, and traces across Amazon Web Services. Eliminate monitoring silos, gain real-time insights, and speed up root-cause analysis with expert strategies for streamlined observability and enhanced AWS operations. This presentation is brought to you by Dynatrace, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Dynatrace Grail® 和 Davis® AI 如何为 Amazon Web Services 提供统一的日志、指标和链路追踪方法。消除监控孤岛，获得实时洞察，并通过专家策略加速根因分析，实现简化的可观测性和增强的 AWS 运营。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Dynatrace 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - What Database Would Your AI Agents Choose -  Escape the Frankenstack (DAT203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI代理会选择什么数据库 - 摆脱混合技术栈 (DAT203)
sessions.abstract: Most AI agents run on a stitched-together mix of vector stores, search engines, OLAP systems, and pipelines. It works — until you need real-time reasoning, consistent multi-modal results, or to scale without latency. Hidden costs pile up: data movement, overhead, and specialized skills just to keep it running. In this lightning talk, we’ll share optimizations to the standard approach, highlight signs it’s breaking down, and reveal a unified design that starts from the agent’s needs. Learn how to unify structured, unstructured, and vector data to build and deploy agents faster — without the Frankenstack. This presentation is brought to you by SingleStore, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 大多数AI代理运行在拼凑的向量存储、搜索引擎、OLAP系统和管道混合体上。这种方式有效——直到您需要实时推理、一致的多模态结果或无延迟扩展。隐藏成本不断累积：数据移动、开销以及仅为保持运行所需的专业技能。在这次闪电演讲中，我们将分享标准方法的优化，突出其崩溃的征象，并揭示从代理需求出发的统一设计。了解如何统一结构化、非结构化和向量数据，以更快地构建和部署代理——无需Frankenstack。本演示由AWS合作伙伴SingleStore为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - GenAI, Hold the Waste: How H2O Fixed Its Storage Bottleneck (STG204)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 生成式AI，消除浪费：H2O如何解决其存储瓶颈问题 (STG204)
sessions.abstract: Generative AI demands fast, flexible, and cost-efficient infrastructure. In this joint session, H2O.ai shares how they support rapid growth in AI workloads by leveraging Datafy’s autonomous storage scaling. As customer adoption of GenAI surged, so did block storage needs, along with cost and complexity. Learn how Datafy helped H2O.ai slash EBS waste, maintain performance, and scale seamlessly, all with zero downtime and near-instant deployment. Walk away with practical insights into architecting a resilient storage layer that adapts to unpredictable GenAI workloads without overprovisioning or firefighting. This presentation is brought to you by Datafy, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 生成式AI需要快速、灵活且成本高效的基础设施。在这个联合会议中，H2O.ai分享了他们如何通过利用Datafy的自主存储扩展来支持AI工作负载的快速增长。随着客户对生成式AI采用的激增，块存储需求也随之增长，同时成本和复杂性也在增加。了解Datafy如何帮助H2O.ai大幅减少EBS浪费、保持性能并无缝扩展，所有这些都实现了零停机时间和近乎即时的部署。带走关于构建弹性存储层的实用见解，该存储层能够适应不可预测的生成式AI工作负载，而无需过度配置或紧急处理。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Datafy为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagine business intelligence with Amazon Quick Sight (BIZ228)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon QuickSight 重新构想商业智能 (BIZ228)
sessions.abstract: Enterprises are transforming with AI-powered BI from Quick Sight, turning scattered data into strategic action. Watch as we demonstrate how Quick Sight eliminates barriers to data-driven decision making using AI agents, allowing everyone to uncover critical insights and achieve better business outcomes. Hear from Intuit as they share how they transformed their analytics capabilities with Quick Sight—helping users perform advanced data analysis and analyze both structured and unstructured data using AI. Discover how Intuit is democratizing insights across their organization, analyzing massive high-velocity data sets efficiently, and achieving scalability, all without managing infrastructure.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业正在通过 Quick Sight 的 AI 驱动型商业智能进行转型，将分散的数据转化为战略行动。观看我们演示 Quick Sight 如何使用 AI 代理消除数据驱动决策的障碍，让每个人都能发现关键洞察并实现更好的业务成果。聆听 Intuit 分享他们如何通过 Quick Sight 转变其分析能力——帮助用户执行高级数据分析，并使用 AI 分析结构化和非结构化数据。了解 Intuit 如何在整个组织中实现洞察民主化，高效分析海量高速数据集，并实现可扩展性，而无需管理基础设施。

presenter.name: NEAL CAULEY
presenter.title: WW GTM Leader Amazon Quick Suite

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [NEW LAUNCH] Deep dive into AWS Database Savings Plans (DAT326)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [新发布] 深入了解 AWS 数据库节省计划 (DAT326)
sessions.abstract: In this session, deep dive into the newly launched AWS Database Savings Plans, a flexible pricing model that works across multiple AWS database services. With Database Savings Plans, reduce your database costs by up to 35% when using serverless deployments and eligible instances over a 1-year term with no upfront payment. Learn how to analyze usage patterns, implement cost optimization strategies, and maximize savings while maintaining workload flexibility. Discover how to combine Database Savings Plans with existing pricing models and modernization initiatives. Walk away with best practices for optimizing database costs across your organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，深入了解新推出的AWS数据库节省计划，这是一种适用于多个AWS数据库服务的灵活定价模式。通过数据库节省计划，在使用无服务器部署和符合条件的实例时，可在1年期限内无需预付费用的情况下将数据库成本降低多达35%。学习如何分析使用模式、实施成本优化策略，并在保持工作负载灵活性的同时最大化节省。了解如何将数据库节省计划与现有定价模式和现代化举措相结合。掌握在整个组织中优化数据库成本的最佳实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Maximize the value of cold data with Amazon S3 Glacier storage classes (STG208)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过Amazon S3 Glacier存储类最大化冷数据价值 (STG208)
sessions.abstract: The data world has massive amounts of cold data, but with advanced analytics and increased demand for machine learning, it could be put to work at any time.
