In this session, learn how to use Amazon S3 Glacier storage classes to modernize your data archive and cost-effectively store long-term data without worrying about expensive tape drives or off-premises archival data. Discover the options for ingesting and restoring your data at petabyte scale while taking into consideration cost and retrieval performance.
sessions.abstract_cn: 数据世界拥有大量冷数据，但随着高级分析和机器学习需求的增加，这些数据随时可能被重新利用。在本次会议中，了解如何使用Amazon S3 Glacier存储类来现代化您的数据归档，并经济高效地存储长期数据，无需担心昂贵的磁带驱动器或异地归档数据。探索在PB级规模下摄取和恢复数据的选项，同时考虑成本和检索性能。

services: Amazon Simple Storage Service Glacier (Amazon S3 Glacier)

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Run and Scale Agentic AI Applications in Production (AIM243)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在生产环境中运行和扩展智能体AI应用程序 (AIM243)
sessions.abstract: Scalable, reliable agentic AI applications need infrastructure that can build, deploy, and manage through a single, repeatable workflow. This session demonstrates how to use HashiCorp Cloud Platform (HCP) Terraform chain dependent infrastructure stages, keep post-run automations in Terraform, and bring unmanaged AWS resources under control using Stacks, Actions and Search & Import. We’ll also cover how, when Kubernetes is the application platform, HCP Vault fits seamlessly into workflows to strengthen security. Expect practical patterns you can apply to run agentic AI with confidence, safeguard sensitive data, and scale operations on AWS without unnecessary complexity. This presentation is brought to you by HashiCorp, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 可扩展、可靠的智能体AI应用程序需要能够通过单一、可重复工作流程进行构建、部署和管理的基础设施。本次会议演示如何使用HashiCorp云平台(HCP) Terraform链接依赖的基础设施阶段，在Terraform中保持运行后自动化，并使用Stacks、Actions和Search & Import将未管理的AWS资源纳入控制。我们还将介绍当Kubernetes作为应用平台时，HCP Vault如何无缝集成到工作流程中以加强安全性。期待您能应用实用模式，自信地运行智能体AI，保护敏感数据，并在AWS上扩展操作而无需不必要的复杂性。本演示由AWS合作伙伴HashiCorp为您呈现。

presenter.name: Cole Morrison
presenter.title: Head of Brand Story & Principal Evangelist

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-Disagree in Commits:The Performance Improvements That Cut Costs by a Third-OPN309
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-在提交中持不同意见：将成本降低三分之一的性能改进-OPN309
sessions.abstract: When paths diverge in open source, innovation often follows. Join Corey Quinn and Madelyn Olson as they dive into how Amazon ElastiCache for Valkey cut prices by up to 33% while simultaneously improving both performance and reliability through community-driven development. You'll discover how open governance enables optimization decisions that benefit all users, why performance improvements and stability aren't mutually exclusive, and what it really takes to create a seamless migration path at scale. Whether you're currently running Redis, evaluating alternatives, or simply interested in how open-source economics can benefit cloud customers, you'll leave with practical insights on reducing infrastructure costs without compromising on reliability.
sessions.abstract_cn: 当开源路径出现分歧时,创新往往随之而来。与 Corey Quinn 和 Madelyn Olson 一起深入探讨 Amazon ElastiCache for Valkey 如何通过社区驱动的开发,在降低高达 33% 价格的同时提升性能和可靠性。您将了解开放治理如何实现让所有用户受益的优化决策,为什么性能改进和稳定性并非相互排斥,以及大规模创建无缝迁移路径的真正要求。无论您当前正在运行 Redis、评估替代方案,还是只是对开源经济学如何让云客户受益感兴趣,您都将获得在不影响可靠性的情况下降低基础设施成本的实用见解。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building agentic AI platform engineering solutions with open source (OPN303)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用开源构建代理式AI平台工程解决方案 (OPN303)
sessions.abstract: Join us for this session as we share our vision for driving innovation through open source agentic AI, and enhancing work-life quality for platform engineers worldwide. We'll explore real-world examples of how platform teams can apply autonomous agentic AI to their organizations, integrating AWS services alongside other open source projects such as Kubernetes, ArgoCD, Backstage and more.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们的会议，我们将分享通过开源代理式AI推动创新的愿景，并提升全球平台工程师的工作生活质量。我们将探讨平台团队如何将自主代理式AI应用于其组织的实际案例，将AWS服务与其他开源项目（如Kubernetes、ArgoCD、Backstage等）集成。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Solving the Observability Mystery with AWS Step Functions (API321)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Step Functions 解决可观测性难题 (API321)
sessions.abstract: This session explores advanced observability techniques for AWS Step Functions. You'll learn effective patterns combining metrics, tracing, and composite alarms to gain comprehensive insights into your workflow executions. Drawing from real-world enterprise experiences, we'll share practical approaches that have proven effective in maintaining reliability at scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本会话探讨AWS Step Functions的高级可观测性技术。您将学习结合指标、追踪和复合告警的有效模式，以全面洞察工作流执行情况。基于真实的企业经验，我们将分享在大规模维护可靠性方面已被证明有效的实用方法。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating data engineering with AI Agents for AWS Analytics (ANT215)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用AWS分析AI代理加速数据工程 (ANT215)
sessions.abstract: Data engineers face critical time sinks: writing code to build analytics pipelines from scratch and upgrading Apache Spark versions. In this lightning talk, discover how AWS is addressing both challenges with AI agents that accelerate development cycles. Learn how the Amazon SageMaker Data Agent transforms natural language instructions into executable SQL and Python code within SageMaker notebooks, maintaining full context awareness of your data sources and schemas. Then explore the Apache Spark upgrade agent, which accelerates complex multi-month upgrade projects into week-long initiatives through automated code analysis and transformation. Walk away understanding how these agents work to automate manual work from your data engineering workflows, whether you're building new applications or modernizing existing ones.
sessions.abstract_cn: 数据工程师面临关键的时间消耗问题：从零开始编写代码构建分析管道以及升级Apache Spark版本。在这个闪电演讲中，了解AWS如何通过AI代理来解决这两个挑战，从而加速开发周期。学习Amazon SageMaker数据代理如何将自然语言指令转换为SageMaker笔记本中可执行的SQL和Python代码，同时保持对数据源和模式的完整上下文感知。然后探索Apache Spark升级代理，它通过自动化代码分析和转换，将复杂的多月升级项目加速为周级别的工作。了解这些代理如何自动化数据工程工作流程中的手动工作，无论您是在构建新应用程序还是现代化现有应用程序。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernizing Java applications with generative AI (DVT210)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用生成式AI现代化Java应用程序 (DVT210)
sessions.abstract: In this session, use Amazon Q Developer's transformation capabilities to modernize a Java application. Learn how Amazon Q Developer can leverage generative AI to automate common language upgrade tasks like updating your code, conducting unit tests, and verifying deployment readiness. Save days' or even months' worth of the undifferentiated work involved in moving from older language versions.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会话中，使用Amazon Q Developer的转换功能来现代化Java应用程序。了解Amazon Q Developer如何利用生成式AI自动化常见的语言升级任务，如更新代码、执行单元测试和验证部署就绪性。节省从旧语言版本迁移所涉及的数天甚至数月的无差异化工作。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - CCC Intelligent Solutions gains better efficiency with Oracle to AWS PostgreSQL
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - CCC智能解决方案通过Oracle到AWS PostgreSQL迁移获得更高效率
sessions.abstract: CCC Intelligent Solutions (CCC), a leading digital solutions provider for the insurance and automotive industries, successfully migrated their critical databases from Oracle to PostgreSQL, leveraging AWS RDS and Aurora PostgreSQL. This strategic move eliminated Perpetual Unlimited License Agreement (PULA) cost and generated additional savings on a monthly basis. The migration involved massive, highly transactional databases, with one critical database reaching 170TB in size. The 15-month project involved massive, highly transactional databases (more than 15 Oracle databases), including a critical 170TB database supporting 80% of their workloads. This presentation is brought to you by Cognizant, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: CCC智能解决方案公司（CCC）是保险和汽车行业领先的数字解决方案提供商，成功将其关键数据库从Oracle迁移到PostgreSQL，利用AWS RDS和Aurora PostgreSQL。这一战略举措消除了永久无限许可协议（PULA）成本，并每月产生额外节省。迁移涉及大规模、高事务性数据库，其中一个关键数据库达到170TB。这个为期15个月的项目涉及大规模、高事务性数据库（超过15个Oracle数据库），包括一个支持80%工作负载的关键170TB数据库。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Cognizant为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - DynamoDB: Resilience & lessons from the Oct 2025 service disruption (DAT453)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - DynamoDB：韧性与2025年10月服务中断的经验教训 (DAT453)
sessions.abstract: In this session, we will walk through the architecture for the Amazon DynamoDB DNS management system that triggered the service disruption on October 20, 2025. We will share the lessons that the DynamoDB team learned from this event and explain how we are using these insights to improve both DynamoDB and AWS. You will walk away with actionable knowledge that you can apply to the systems you build.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，我们将详细介绍导致2025年10月20日服务中断的Amazon DynamoDB DNS管理系统架构。我们将分享DynamoDB团队从此次事件中学到的经验教训，并说明我们如何利用这些见解来改进DynamoDB和AWS。您将获得可应用于自己构建系统的实用知识。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build resilient SaaS: multi-account resilience testing patterns (ISV404)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建弹性SaaS：多账户弹性测试模式 (ISV404)
sessions.abstract: Enterprise SaaS providers face increasing pressure to maintain high availability while preventing failures from spreading across tenant boundaries. Learn how leading ISVs use AWS Fault Injection Service to validate their multi-tenant architecture's resilience through controlled reslience testing experiments. We'll explore real-world examples from Security and HR tech providers who test cross-account failure scenarios while maintaining strict tenant isolation. Discover patterns for implementing resilience testing that strengthen your SaaS architecture without risking customer availability.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业SaaS提供商面临着越来越大的压力，需要在维持高可用性的同时防止故障跨租户边界传播。了解领先的ISV如何使用AWS故障注入服务通过受控的弹性测试实验来验证其多租户架构的弹性。我们将探讨来自安全和HR技术提供商的真实案例，他们在保持严格租户隔离的同时测试跨账户故障场景。发现实施弹性测试的模式，在不影响客户可用性的情况下增强您的SaaS架构。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Amazon Teams Use AI Assistants to Accelerate Development  (DEV403)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 亚马逊团队如何使用AI助手加速开发 (DEV403)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Amazon developers achieve real productivity gains using Amazon Q Developer, an AI-powered coding assistant. This code talk demonstrates proven techniques for accelerating development workflows using Prompt-Driven Development and Agent Scripts. Through live examples, learn how development teams cut feature development time from weeks to days while maintaining code quality. Discover practical strategies for leveraging these patterns in both familiar and new codebases.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解亚马逊开发人员如何使用Amazon Q Developer（一个AI驱动的编码助手）实现真正的生产力提升。本代码演讲展示了使用提示驱动开发和代理脚本加速开发工作流程的成熟技术。通过实时示例，了解开发团队如何在保持代码质量的同时将功能开发时间从数周缩短到数天。发现在熟悉和新代码库中利用这些模式的实用策略。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Actionable controls for improving governance and compliance (COP347)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 改善治理和合规性的可操作控制措施 (COP347)
sessions.abstract: Organizations often struggle to translate complex regulatory requirements into practical controls while maintaining continuous compliance and security assurance. Learn how to transform compliance frameworks into actionable AWS controls through effective gap analysis and control mapping. This session shows how to leverage AWS Control Tower, AWS Security Hub, AWS Config, and AWS Audit Manager to build and maintain a scalable governance strategy. We'll explore real-world examples of mapping common controls across multiple frameworks, implementing automated compliance checks, and creating custom control deployments. Discover how to streamline compliance reporting while maintaining continuous security assurance across your AWS organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 组织在将复杂的监管要求转化为实际控制措施的同时保持持续合规性和安全保障方面常常面临挑战。了解如何通过有效的差距分析和控制映射将合规框架转化为可操作的 AWS 控制措施。本课程展示如何利用 AWS Control Tower、AWS Security Hub、AWS Config 和 AWS Audit Manager 构建和维护可扩展的治理策略。我们将探讨跨多个框架映射通用控制措施、实施自动化合规检查以及创建自定义控制部署的实际案例。了解如何在整个 AWS 组织中简化合规报告的同时保持持续的安全保障。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon S3 security and access control best practices (STG316)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon S3 安全性和访问控制最佳实践 (STG316)
sessions.abstract: Building a robust data security strategy begins with choosing the right storage foundation. Amazon S3 provides security settings and granular access controls to suit any workload. In this session, learn about the fundamentals of S3 security and dive deep into the latest enhancements in usability and functionality. Explore options for access control, encryption, monitoring, auditing, and remediation. Discover best practices for data security and access control in S3.
sessions.abstract_cn: 构建强大的数据安全策略始于选择正确的存储基础。Amazon S3 提供安全设置和细粒度访问控制以适应任何工作负载。在本次会议中，了解 S3 安全的基础知识，并深入探讨可用性和功能方面的最新增强功能。探索访问控制、加密、监控、审计和修复的选项。了解 S3 中数据安全和访问控制的最佳实践。

services: Amazon Simple Storage Service Glacier (Amazon S3 Glacier)

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Improve quality and speed across the SDLC with Atlassian Rovo Dev (AIM211)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Atlassian Rovo Dev 提升 SDLC 全流程的质量和速度 (AIM211)
sessions.abstract: Atlassian Rovo Dev, an AI-powered solution, transforms the software development lifecycle (SDLC) by automating repetitive tasks and boosting productivity. This talk explores how Rovo Dev agents streamline every SDLC phase—from planning to deployment—so developers can focus on innovation. Discover how Rovo Dev’s integration and intelligent automation help teams deliver high-quality software faster, reduce bottlenecks, and uphold engineering standards with ease. This presentation is brought to you by Atlassian, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: Atlassian Rovo Dev是一个AI驱动的解决方案，通过自动化重复性任务和提升生产力来变革软件开发生命周期（SDLC）。本次演讲探讨了Rovo Dev代理如何简化SDLC的每个阶段——从规划到部署——让开发人员能够专注于创新。了解Rovo Dev的集成和智能自动化如何帮助团队更快地交付高质量软件、减少瓶颈，并轻松维护工程标准。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Atlassian为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How customers build AI at scale with AWS AI infrastructure (AIM252)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 客户如何使用AWS AI基础设施大规模构建AI (AIM252)
sessions.abstract: Join industry leaders as they share their experiences scaling AI initiatives using AWS AI infrastructures. AWS customers will present their journeys demonstrating how they optimized their AI workloads across training and inference for maximum performance and cost efficiency. Discover real-world architectures, implementation strategies, and lessons learned from organizations deploying large language models, reasoning systems, and multimodal applications at scale. Learn practical approaches to selecting and leveraging the right AI infrastructure for your AI workloads while managing costs effectively.
sessions.abstract_cn: 与行业领导者一起分享他们使用AWS AI基础设施扩展AI计划的经验。AWS客户将展示他们的历程，演示如何优化训练和推理的AI工作负载以实现最大性能和成本效率。了解来自大规模部署大型语言模型、推理系统和多模态应用程序的组织的真实架构、实施策略和经验教训。学习为您的AI工作负载选择和利用正确AI基础设施的实用方法，同时有效管理成本。

presenter.name: Aniruddha Deodhar
presenter.title: Principal Specialist, Gen AI Accelerated Computing

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - What's New with AWS Cost Management (COP203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 成本管理新功能 (COP203)
sessions.abstract: Join us and learn new features in the AWS Cloud Financial Management portfolio that can transform how your organizations analyze, plan, and manage your cloud spending. In this session, explore new advanced data analytics capabilities, enhanced cost allocation features, and improved reporting tools that enable deeper financial insights. Learn how AWS is expanding its FinOps toolset with new AI-powered solutions and sophisticated data management features to support your cloud financial maturity journey.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们，了解 AWS 云财务管理产品组合中的新功能，这些功能可以改变您的组织分析、规划和管理云支出的方式。在本次会议中，探索新的高级数据分析功能、增强的成本分配功能以及改进的报告工具，这些工具可提供更深入的财务洞察。了解 AWS 如何通过新的 AI 驱动解决方案和复杂的数据管理功能扩展其 FinOps 工具集，以支持您的云财务成熟度之旅。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scaling Serverless with platform engineering: A blueprint for success (CNS361)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过平台工程扩展无服务器：成功蓝图 (CNS361)
sessions.abstract: As serverless adoption grows, teams need consistent patterns for security, observability, governance, and CI/CD to avoid duplicating efforts and architectural inconsistencies.This session explores serverless platform engineering through a lens of architectural blueprints: a structured approach that promotes consistency while empowering teams to focus on core business value. Learn what constitutes a practical serverless blueprint, technically and culturally, and how Agentic AI assistants are transforming platform operations. Leave with actionable insights for scaling serverless adoption across your organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着无服务器技术的普及，团队需要在安全性、可观测性、治理和CI/CD方面建立一致的模式，以避免重复工作和架构不一致。本次会议通过架构蓝图的视角探讨无服务器平台工程：这是一种结构化方法，既能促进一致性，又能让团队专注于核心业务价值。了解实用的无服务器蓝图在技术和文化层面的构成要素，以及智能体AI助手如何改变平台运营。您将获得可操作的见解，用于在整个组织中扩展无服务器技术的采用。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A practitioner’s guide to data for agentic AI (DAT315)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 代理AI数据实践指南 (DAT315)
sessions.abstract: In this session, gain the skills needed to deploy end-to-end agentic AI applications using your most valuable data. This session focuses on data management using processes like Model Context Protocol (MCP) and Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), and provides concepts that apply to other methods of customizing agentic AI applications. Discover best practice architectures using AWS database services like Amazon Aurora and OpenSearch Service, along with analytical, data processing and streaming experiences found in SageMaker Unified Studio. Learn data lake, governance, and data quality concepts and how Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and Bedrock Knowledge Bases, and other features tie solution components together.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，掌握使用您最有价值的数据部署端到端智能体AI应用程序所需的技能。本次会议重点关注使用模型上下文协议(MCP)和检索增强生成(RAG)等流程的数据管理，并提供适用于定制智能体AI应用程序其他方法的概念。了解使用AWS数据库服务（如Amazon Aurora和OpenSearch Service）以及SageMaker Unified Studio中的分析、数据处理和流式处理体验的最佳实践架构。学习数据湖、治理和数据质量概念，以及Amazon Bedrock AgentCore和Bedrock Knowledge Bases等功能如何将解决方案组件整合在一起。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Colgate, Commonwealth Bank and Mondelez: Why chose AWS for SAP transformation
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 高露洁、澳洲联邦银行和亿滋：为什么选择AWS进行SAP转型
sessions.abstract: For decades, SAP has been the business process backbone for leading companies across nearly every industry; and thousands of customers trust AWS to run SAP.Many customers who are still running their SAP applications on-premises, and their impending SAP migration is part of a broader transformation they are undertaking – where SAP is a critical application, but just one of the components of something bigger. In this session, customers like Colagate, Commonwealth Bank of Australia, and Mondelez will share their transformation journeys including moving SAP applications on AWS, and  how they are partnering with Amazon to chart the future for their organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 几十年来，SAP一直是各行各业领先企业的业务流程支柱；成千上万的客户信任AWS来运行SAP。许多仍在本地运行SAP应用程序的客户，他们即将进行的SAP迁移是他们正在进行的更广泛转型的一部分——SAP是关键应用程序，但只是更大整体的组成部分之一。在本次会议中，高露洁、澳大利亚联邦银行和亿滋等客户将分享他们的转型历程，包括将SAP应用程序迁移到AWS，以及他们如何与亚马逊合作为其组织规划未来。

presenter.name: Soulat Khan
presenter.title: WW Head of SAP Solution Architects

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Infrastructure for the impossible: Turning public sector barriers into...
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 不可能的基础设施：将公共部门障碍转化为...
sessions.abstract: Discover how AWS innovates on behalf of public sector customers with purpose-built infrastructure and AI. Learn about the journey from AWS GovCloud to the new Secret-West Region, a landmark AI and supercomputing investment for the U.S. government, and the upcoming European Sovereign Cloud. See how the U.S. Navy deployed generative AI at Impact Level 5, and how healthcare organizations are transforming patient care with AI. Hear from two featured speakers on cutting-edge AI for scientific research in national security and transforming government services with agentic AI. Experience how constraints become catalysts—and how AWS infrastructure leads to breakthrough innovation.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 AWS 如何通过专用基础设施和人工智能为公共部门客户进行创新。了解从 AWS GovCloud 到新的 Secret-West 区域的历程，这是美国政府在人工智能和超级计算方面的里程碑式投资，以及即将推出的欧洲主权云。了解美国海军如何在影响级别 5 部署生成式人工智能，以及医疗保健组织如何利用人工智能改变患者护理。聆听两位特邀演讲者介绍国家安全领域科学研究的前沿人工智能，以及如何利用智能体人工智能转变政府服务。体验约束如何成为催化剂，以及 AWS 基础设施如何引领突破性创新。

presenter.name: Dave Levy
presenter.title: Vice President of Worldwide Public Sector and Healthcare & Life Sciences North America

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS & GenAI Power CDG's Telecom Software Modernization Journey (SMB202)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS与生成式AI助力CDG电信软件现代化之旅 (SMB202)
sessions.abstract: Learn how AWS transformed a telecommunications software business in an era where reliable broadband connectivity is essential to daily life. Through AWS Enterprise Support and the Partner Program, Communications Data Group (CDG) achieved 100% year-over-year growth while modernizing solutions for telecom operators. AWS's 24/7 technical support and expertise in cloud architecture, generative AI, and business intelligence enabled CDG's next-generation platform. The session shows how CDG improved efficiency, demonstrating how AWS helps providers scale, manage costs, and enhance customer experiences.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解AWS如何在可靠的宽带连接对日常生活至关重要的时代转型一家电信软件企业。通过AWS企业支持和合作伙伴计划，Communications Data Group (CDG) 实现了100%的同比增长，同时为电信运营商提供现代化解决方案。AWS的全天候技术支持以及在云架构、生成式AI和商业智能方面的专业知识，助力CDG打造下一代平台。该案例展示了CDG如何提高效率，演示了AWS如何帮助服务提供商实现规模化、管理成本并提升客户体验。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Advanced data modeling with Amazon DynamoDB (DAT414)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon DynamoDB 进行高级数据建模 (DAT414)
sessions.abstract: Amazon DynamoDB is a popular choice for modern applications because it’s a serverless database that provides single-digit millisecond performance at any scale. Optimizing your usage of DynamoDB requires a different approach to data modeling than traditional relational databases. In this session, AWS Data Hero Alex DeBrie shows you advanced techniques to help you get the most out of DynamoDB. Learn how to “think in DynamoDB” by learning the DynamoDB foundations and principles for data modeling. Further, learn practical strategies and DynamoDB features to handle difficult use cases in your application.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon DynamoDB 是现代应用程序的热门选择,因为它是一个无服务器数据库,可在任何规模下提供个位数毫秒级性能。优化 DynamoDB 的使用需要采用与传统关系型数据库不同的数据建模方法。在本次会议中,AWS 数据英雄 Alex DeBrie 将向您展示高级技术,帮助您充分利用 DynamoDB。通过学习 DynamoDB 基础知识和数据建模原则,了解如何"以 DynamoDB 的方式思考"。此外,还将学习实用策略和 DynamoDB 功能,以处理应用程序中的复杂用例。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Secure-by-Design Environments with AWS Capabilities (SEC208)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用AWS功能构建安全设计环境 (SEC208)
sessions.abstract: Cloud providers deliver powerful security capabilities, yet most organizations struggle to fully leverage them. In this session, we’ll explore how to harness the latest AWS native security controls to build secure-by-design environments, shifting from detection to prevention. Drawing on real-world experience with AWS customers, including some of the largest enterprises, we’ll cover best practices for enforcing preventive policies such as SCPs and RCPs, reducing complexity, and operationalizing native controls. Attendees will leave with actionable insights to maximize the value of AWS investments, and accelerate adoption of a prevention-first model—while also seeing how these approaches can be standardized across providers. This presentation is brought to you by Native, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 云服务提供商提供强大的安全功能，但大多数组织难以充分利用这些功能。在本次会议中，我们将探讨如何利用最新的AWS原生安全控制来构建安全设计环境，从检测转向预防。基于与AWS客户（包括一些最大的企业）的实际经验，我们将涵盖执行预防性策略（如SCP和RCP）的最佳实践，降低复杂性，并将原生控制操作化。与会者将获得可操作的见解，以最大化AWS投资价值，并加速采用预防优先模型——同时了解这些方法如何在不同提供商之间标准化。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Native提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Data to Action: Agentic-Powered Humanitarian Response (AIM222)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从数据到行动：基于智能体的人道主义响应 (AIM222)
sessions.abstract:
Discover how Cloudera's "Data Anywhere for AI Everywhere" vision powers MercyCORE—an agentic AI platform developed with Mercy Corps, a global humanitarian aid organization, to revolutionize crisis response.
MercyCORE enables real-time access to diverse data sources, from news and social media to custom streams. Crisis responders can dynamically configure new information sources on-the-fly, while natural language interaction democratizes data science and accelerates decision-making.
This breakthrough delivers mission-critical insights where needed most, enabling faster, more effective humanitarian aid in rapidly evolving emergencies. Learn how to leverage AI agents for meaningful impact This presentation is brought to you by Cloudera, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn:
了解 Cloudera 的"数据无处不在，AI 无所不能"愿景如何为 MercyCORE 提供支持——这是与全球人道主义援助组织 Mercy Corps 共同开发的智能体 AI 平台，旨在革新危机响应。

MercyCORE 能够实时访问多样化的数据源，从新闻和社交媒体到自定义数据流。危机响应人员可以动态配置新的信息源，而自然语言交互使数据科学民主化并加速决策制定。

这一突破性技术在最需要的地方提供关键任务洞察，在快速演变的紧急情况下实现更快、更有效的人道主义援助。了解如何利用 AI 智能体产生有意义的影响。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Cloudera 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Prudential’s microagent platform with MCP and A2A on AWS (IND3302)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在AWS上使用MCP和A2A构建Prudential的微代理平台 (IND3302)
sessions.abstract: Enterprises are exploring ways to scale their AI agent implementations beyond initial use cases. Learn how Prudential Financial is moving beyond single-purpose deployments with a scalable, microagent architecture powered by Amazon Bedrock and MCP agent-to-agent (A2A) communication. Prudential will share how their financial advisor assistant became the foundation for an enterprise multi-agent system, supporting diverse scenarios through modular design, independent scaling, and seamless deployment on AWS. Whether you’re exploring AI agents for specific business needs or building a foundation for enterprise-wide adoption, walk away with patterns and best practices for scaling AI agents.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业正在探索如何将其AI代理实施扩展到初始用例之外。了解保德信金融如何通过由Amazon Bedrock和MCP代理到代理(A2A)通信驱动的可扩展微代理架构，超越单一用途部署。保德信将分享其财务顾问助手如何成为企业多代理系统的基础，通过模块化设计、独立扩展和在AWS上的无缝部署来支持多样化场景。无论您是在探索针对特定业务需求的AI代理，还是在构建企业级采用的基础，都可以获得扩展AI代理的模式和最佳实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AIOps Revolution: How iHeart slashed incident response time by 60% with Bedrock
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AIOps革命：iHeart如何利用Bedrock将事件响应时间缩短60%
sessions.abstract: When performance incidents strike entertainment businesses, downtime affects reputation and revenue. Traditional troubleshooting consumes time gathering logs and coordinating remediation. Discover how iHeartMedia transformed incident response using Amazon Bedrock to build an intelligent agent monitoring alerts from NewRelic, PagerDuty, and CloudWatch, automatically collecting diagnostics and initiating EKS remediation with minimal human intervention. We'll cover implementation approaches, remediation strategies, and building AI "memory" systems. Join us to see how this approach has slashed incident response time by 60% and is advancing the future of self-healing infrastructure.
sessions.abstract_cn: 当性能事故冲击娱乐业务时,停机会影响声誉和收入。传统故障排查需要耗费大量时间收集日志和协调修复工作。了解 iHeartMedia 如何使用 Amazon Bedrock 转变事故响应方式,构建智能代理监控来自 NewRelic、PagerDuty 和 CloudWatch 的告警,自动收集诊断信息并以最少的人工干预启动 EKS 修复。我们将介绍实施方法、修复策略以及构建 AI "记忆"系统。加入我们,了解这种方法如何将事故响应时间缩短 60%,并推动自愈基础设施的未来发展。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Your AI Agent Is Expensive and Wrong (Let's Fix Both) (AIM264)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 您的AI代理既昂贵又错误（让我们解决这两个问题）(AIM264)
sessions.abstract: More than 80% of AI projects fail. The reason? Customers are not ready to put AI in production in areas where the Agent can cause reputational or financial harm. Agent Bricks solves this by automatically generating domain‑specific synthetic data and task‑aware benchmarks, then using those benchmarks to optimize the Agents for accuracy, latency and expense—eliminating the tedious trial‑and‑error cycle. In this session you’ll see how to design and scale multi‑agent systems that combine retrieval, reasoning, and generation to answer complex, enterprise‑grounded queries, while tracking experiments, fine‑tuning models, and building governed, repeatable workflows that can be deployed at scale on AWS. This presentation is brought to you by Databricks, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 超过80%的AI项目失败。原因？客户不愿意在可能造成声誉或财务损害的领域将AI投入生产。AgentBricks通过自动生成特定领域的合成数据和任务感知基准来解决这个问题，然后使用这些基准来优化Agent的准确性、延迟和成本——消除繁琐的试错循环。在本次会议中，您将了解如何设计和扩展多智能体系统，该系统结合检索、推理和生成来回答复杂的企业级查询，同时跟踪实验、微调模型，并构建可在AWS上大规模部署的受治理、可重复的工作流。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Databricks为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Presidio Resonate: AI Agents Orchestrating Multimodal Data at Scale (DAT101)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Presidio Resonate: 大规模编排多模态数据的AI代理 (DAT101)
sessions.abstract: Enterprises are awash in unstructured data—video, audio, text, and images—spread across siloed systems. Presidio Resonate changes the game. Built on AWS, Resonate is an AI-native, agent-driven platform that ingests, normalizes, and links data across modalities in real time. Using graph-based reasoning and LLM-powered workflows, it transforms scattered assets into orchestrated intelligence ready for action. In this session, see how sports, media, finance, and public sector organizations are using Resonate to accelerate content packaging, surface hidden insights, and deliver personalized experiences—at scale. Learn how to break down data silos, boost operational speed, and unlock new value from your content. This presentation is brought to you by Presidio, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业被大量非结构化数据淹没——视频、音频、文本和图像——分散在孤立的系统中。Presidio Resonate改变了游戏规则。基于AWS构建，Resonate是一个AI原生、智能体驱动的平台，可实时摄取、标准化并链接跨模态数据。利用基于图的推理和LLM驱动的工作流，它将分散的资产转化为可操作的编排智能。在本次会议中，了解体育、媒体、金融和公共部门组织如何使用Resonate来加速内容打包、发现隐藏洞察并大规模提供个性化体验。学习如何打破数据孤岛、提升运营速度并从内容中释放新价值。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Presidio为您呈现。

presenter.name: Neerav Shah
presenter.title: Industry Principal, Media Entertainment and Sports

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Simplifying orchestrations with JSONata and AWS Step Functions (API323)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 JSONata 和 AWS Step Functions 简化编排 (API323)
sessions.abstract: Learn how to transform your workflows with AWS Step Functions and JSONata. This session demonstrates how to simplify your orchestrations and perform sophisticated data transformations directly within your state machines without additional AWS Lambda functions or compute resources. Through live examples, discover how this approach reduces costs and optimizes resource utilization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何使用 AWS Step Functions 和 JSONata 转换您的工作流程。本次会议演示如何简化编排并直接在状态机中执行复杂的数据转换，无需额外的 AWS Lambda 函数或计算资源。通过实时示例，探索这种方法如何降低成本并优化资源利用率。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Cloud WAN MCP Server: Transform network operations with GenAI (NET331)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Cloud WAN MCP 服务器：利用生成式AI转变网络运营 (NET331)
sessions.abstract: Ready to experience the power of debugging network issues through natural language queries? Discover how AWS Cloud WAN's Model Context Protocol (MCP) server leverages Generative AI to redefine network operations. In this session, learn how to use common, complex scenarios including trace network paths using natural language queries, analyzing AWS Cloud WAN Core Network policies through simple prompts, and troubleshoot global routing with AI-assisted intelligent analysis. Perfect for network professionals who want to explore streamlining their AWS infrastructure management while embracing the future of AI-powered networking tools.
sessions.abstract_cn: 准备好体验通过自然语言查询调试网络问题的强大功能了吗？了解AWS Cloud WAN的模型上下文协议(MCP)服务器如何利用生成式AI重新定义网络运营。在本次会议中，学习如何使用常见的复杂场景，包括使用自然语言查询跟踪网络路径、通过简单提示分析AWS Cloud WAN核心网络策略，以及通过AI辅助智能分析排查全球路由故障。非常适合希望探索简化AWS基础设施管理同时拥抱AI驱动网络工具未来的网络专业人员。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond Multi-Cloud Chaos: The Unified Cloud Mesh Architecture (ARC332)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越多云混乱：统一云网格架构 (ARC332)
sessions.abstract: Deploying applications across multiple regions, clouds, and Kubernetes clusters creates fragmented, insecure infrastructure. This complicates governance by forcing separate policies for north-south and east-west traffic. This session introduces the “Universal Mesh,” a unified connectivity layer that simplifies governance and observability across hybrid environments. This strategy delivers comprehensive control over all traffic patterns, from edge ingress through the mesh to backend services. Secure applications with consistent WAF and API protection at the perimeter while ensuring zero-trust internally. Discover how to centrally orchestrate policies and transform your multi-cloud deployments into a single, secure, cohesive platform. This presentation is brought to you by HAProxy Technologies, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 跨多个区域、云和 Kubernetes 集群部署应用程序会创建分散且不安全的基础设施。这通过强制对南北向和东西向流量采用单独的策略来使治理变得复杂。本会议介绍了"通用网格"，这是一个统一的连接层，可简化混合环境中的治理和可观测性。该策略对从边缘入口通过网格到后端服务的所有流量模式提供全面控制。在边界使用一致的 WAF 和 API 保护来保护应用程序，同时确保内部零信任。了解如何集中编排策略并将您的多云部署转换为单一、安全、统一的平台。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 HAProxy Technologies 提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building custom agents for intelligent AWS patch automation  (COP407)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为智能AWS补丁自动化构建自定义代理 (COP407)
sessions.abstract: Organizations face mounting challenges from manual patching, fragmented compliance, and limited visibility. In this code talk, we'll build an agentic solution with Strands Agents SDK and AWS services to transform patch management. We’ll walk through turning operational requirements into interactive, production-ready agent workflows—driving automated remediation and rapid vulnerability checks. Attendees will leave equipped with implementation patterns, code samples, and best practices to streamline operations, and strengthen security.
sessions.abstract_cn: 组织面临着手动补丁管理、分散合规性和有限可见性带来的日益严峻的挑战。在这次代码演讲中，我们将使用 Strands Agents SDK 和 AWS 服务构建一个智能体解决方案来转变补丁管理。我们将演示如何将运营需求转化为交互式、生产就绪的智能体工作流程——推动自动化修复和快速漏洞检查。与会者将掌握实施模式、代码示例和最佳实践，以简化运营并加强安全性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Breaking AWS networks on purpose to build resilience (DEV343)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 故意破坏AWS网络以构建弹性 (DEV343)
sessions.abstract: Most AWS networks only get tested during an outage or incident. This session shows how proactively breaking AWS networks helps ensure resilience. Learn techniques for controlled failure injection, monitoring, and recovery in complex environments. See practical examples of chaos engineering for networking that reveal weak points before they become real problems.
sessions.abstract_cn: 大多数AWS网络仅在中断或事故期间进行测试。本次会议展示了如何通过主动破坏AWS网络来确保弹性。学习在复杂环境中进行受控故障注入、监控和恢复的技术。查看网络混沌工程的实际示例，在弱点成为真正问题之前发现它们。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming FinServ AI DLC with Kiro Agentic IDE (DEV203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Kiro 智能体 IDE 转型金融服务 AI DLC (DEV203)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Kiro Agentic IDE revolutionizes financial services application development through intelligent code generation, automated compliance checks, and context-aware suggestions. This session shares real-world implementation experiences, productivity gains achieved, and lessons learned while building secure, regulated financial applications. Learn practical strategies for integrating AI-powered development tools into traditional FinServ workflows, overcoming regulatory challenges, and measuring developer productivity improvements in highly regulated environments.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Kiro Agentic IDE 如何通过智能代码生成、自动化合规检查和上下文感知建议彻底改变金融服务应用程序开发。本次会议分享真实的实施经验、取得的生产力提升，以及在构建安全、受监管的金融应用程序时获得的经验教训。学习将 AI 驱动的开发工具集成到传统金融服务工作流程中的实用策略，克服监管挑战，并在高度监管的环境中衡量开发人员生产力的提升。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Slack Platform: Build with AI-Powered Development (AIM111)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Slack 平台：使用 AI 驱动的开发构建 (AIM111)
sessions.abstract: Learn how to create, use, and launch AI-powered Slack apps, including existing AWS systems, into Slack with minimal effort. See how GitHub, Cursor, Codex, AWS and other tools run natively in Slack channels, enabling multi-player AI interactions. By bringing your custom and third-party solutions together in one context-rich conversational interface, your AI tools turn into collaborative teammates to streamline your business operations. This presentation is brought to you by Slack from Salesforce, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 学习如何创建、使用和启动AI驱动的Slack应用程序，包括将现有AWS系统以最小的努力集成到Slack中。了解GitHub、Cursor、Codex、AWS和其他工具如何在Slack频道中原生运行，实现多人AI交互。通过将您的自定义和第三方解决方案整合到一个富含上下文的对话界面中，您的AI工具将转变为协作队友，简化您的业务运营。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Salesforce旗下的Slack为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating the Connected Future: EDA for the unpredictable (IND308)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 加速互联未来：应对不可预测性的事件驱动架构 (IND308)
sessions.abstract: Join us to learn how BMW RemoteServices transformed their backend to a fully Serverless Event-Driven Architecture (EDA) to meet increased scaling demands and improve innovation velocity whilst maximizing cost efficiency. We share insights into the architecture supporting BMW's next generation of vehicles, Neue Klasse, and explore strategies for breaking down monolithic applications into flexible, event-driven microservices. This architecture, featuring various AWS Serverless services, demonstrates how to orchestrate loosely coupled services into discrete blocks of business logic.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们，了解BMW RemoteServices如何将其后端转型为完全无服务器的事件驱动架构(EDA)，以满足不断增长的扩展需求，提高创新速度，同时最大化成本效率。我们将分享支持BMW下一代车型Neue Klasse的架构见解，并探讨将单体应用程序分解为灵活的事件驱动微服务的策略。该架构采用了多种AWS无服务器服务，展示了如何将松耦合服务编排为离散的业务逻辑模块。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Greenfield unlocked: Best practices for expanding new customer engagement-PEX206
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 -绿地解锁：扩展新客户参与的最佳实践-PEX206
sessions.abstract: Experience the evolution of greenfield partner programs today. Discover what works and what doesn't through real partner feedback. Grow your new customer engagement practice by combining strategic funding with AI-powered tools and intelligent automation, like our Partner-First Scale model and more. Learn about the right sales motion for every customer need, allowing you to provide more personalized solutions as you streamline your customer's journey from initial engagement to successful implementation. Whether you're a consulting or technology partner, this session will teach you how to leverage AWS's funding, tools, and support to help you start growing your greenfield practice.
sessions.abstract_cn: 立即体验全新合作伙伴项目的演进。通过真实合作伙伴反馈了解哪些有效、哪些无效。通过将战略资金与AI驱动的工具和智能自动化相结合，例如我们的合作伙伴优先规模化模型等，发展您的新客户参与实践。了解适合每种客户需求的正确销售策略，使您能够提供更个性化的解决方案，同时简化客户从初始接触到成功实施的全过程。无论您是咨询合作伙伴还是技术合作伙伴，本课程将教您如何利用AWS的资金、工具和支持来帮助您开始发展全新业务实践。

presenter.name: Rehan Shah
presenter.title: Head of Channel and Partner Sales - US GF and T2k

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Sophos modernizes security data at scale with Cribl and AWS (MAM105)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Sophos如何通过Cribl和AWS大规模现代化安全数据 (MAM105)
sessions.abstract: Sophos, a British cybersecurity company, faced exponential growth and complexity in its internal security environment—processing terabytes of log and security telemetry daily. In this session, Chris O’Brien, VP of Security Operations, shares how Sophos used Cribl and AWS to cut costs by filtering data at the source, normalizing and routing heterogeneous logs, and accelerating SIEM migration from months to weeks. The team leveraged Cribl to centralize logging and migrate data off of legacy infrastructure for greater flexibility and simplified compliance. Learn how the Sophos team tackles massive telemetry data growth to meet compliance requirements and future-proof their security data operations. This presentation is brought to you by Cribl, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: Sophos是一家英国网络安全公司，其内部安全环境面临指数级增长和复杂性挑战——每日处理数TB的日志和安全遥测数据。在本次会议中，安全运营副总裁Chris O'Brien分享了Sophos如何使用Cribl和AWS通过在源头过滤数据、规范化和路由异构日志，以及将SIEM迁移时间从数月缩短至数周来降低成本。团队利用Cribl集中化日志记录，并将数据从传统基础设施迁移出来，以获得更大的灵活性和简化合规性。了解Sophos团队如何应对大规模遥测数据增长，满足合规要求并为其安全数据运营做好未来准备。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Cribl提供支持。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-How enterprises are deploying PolyAI's voice agents at scale to reduce handling..
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 企业如何大规模部署 PolyAI 的语音代理以减少处理...
sessions.abstract: Discover how PolyAI and AWS are redefining customer experience through generative voice AI. Learn how global enterprises are deploying natural-sounding, resilient voice assistants that run securely and at scale on AWS infrastructure. Join Michael Chen, VP of Strategic Alliances for insights, architecture highlights, and real-world customer success stories.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 PolyAI 和 AWS 如何通过生成式语音 AI 重新定义客户体验。了解全球企业如何在 AWS 基础设施上安全且大规模地部署自然流畅、稳健可靠的语音助手。加入 Michael Chen（战略联盟副总裁）的分享，获取洞察、架构亮点和真实的客户成功案例。

presenter.name: Michael Chen
presenter.title: VP of Strategic Alliances & Corporate Development

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Deploy Quick Suite at scale with confidence and control (BIZ225)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模部署Quick Suite，确保信心与控制 (BIZ225)
sessions.abstract: Learn how enterprise deployment strategies enable Quick Suite scale while maintaining security and operational excellence. Through a compelling customer story, discover how leading organizations have successfully deployed  AI agents, automation, and business intelligence capabilities of Quick Suite across global operations while meeting strict regulatory requirements. Explore identity management integration, access control patterns, and governance frameworks. Discover monitoring and audit strategies that ensure proper oversight while enable business agility across multi-account and cross-region deployments.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解企业部署策略如何在保持安全性和运营卓越的同时实现Quick Suite规模化。通过引人入胜的客户案例，探索领先组织如何在满足严格监管要求的同时，成功地在全球运营中部署Quick Suite的AI代理、自动化和商业智能功能。探索身份管理集成、访问控制模式和治理框架。发现监控和审计策略，确保在多账户和跨区域部署中实现适当监督的同时促进业务敏捷性。

presenter.name: Emily Zhu
presenter.title: Sr. Product Manager, Amazon Quick Suite, AWS

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI in the Cloud: Surveillance, Sabotage, and Security (AIM242)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 云端AI：监控、破坏与安全 (AIM242)
sessions.abstract: Your AI-powered cloud is humming with activity, running advanced AI applications, but so are your adversaries. Last year we introduced the security for AI blueprint; now it is time to step into the role of operative. Hidden in the layers of data and code are covert risks, adversarial models, poisoned pipelines, and stealthy attacks. In this session, we will decode the enemy’s playbook and arm you with actionable intelligence to stay ahead. Learn how to expose blind spots, neutralize threats, and carry out your mission of keeping your AI-driven cloud secure, no matter how advanced the opposition becomes. This presentation is brought to you by Trend Micro, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 您的AI驱动云正在高速运转，运行着先进的AI应用程序，但您的对手也是如此。去年我们推出了AI安全蓝图；现在是时候扮演特工的角色了。隐藏在数据和代码层中的是隐蔽风险、对抗性模型、中毒管道和隐秘攻击。在本次会议中，我们将解码敌人的策略手册，为您提供可操作的情报以保持领先。学习如何暴露盲点、中和威胁，并执行保护AI驱动云安全的任务，无论对手变得多么先进。本演示由AWS合作伙伴趋势科技为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From concept to production: Build with spec-driven development & Kiro  (DVT320)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从概念到生产：使用规范驱动开发和 Kiro 进行构建 (DVT320)
sessions.abstract: Join us for an exciting live coding session where we'll demonstrate the power of spec-driven development using Kiro, the AI IDE that's transforming how we build applications. Watch as we take a simple prompt and transform it into a fully functional application through Kiro's structured approach. You'll see firsthand how Kiro converts requirements into clear specifications, system designs, and discrete tasks while maintaining robust engineering practices.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们激动人心的现场编程会议，我们将演示使用Kiro进行规范驱动开发的强大功能，Kiro是正在改变我们构建应用程序方式的AI IDE。观看我们如何通过Kiro的结构化方法将简单的提示转换为功能完整的应用程序。您将亲眼看到Kiro如何将需求转换为清晰的规范、系统设计和离散任务，同时保持稳健的工程实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Global GenAI trends and learnings at re:Invent (GBL206)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - re:Invent全球生成式AI趋势与学习要点 (GBL206)
sessions.abstract: [This session is conducted in Japanese] Generative AI technology is advancing at an astonishingly fast pace globally and many customers are exploring innovation with it. In that time, re:Invent is one of the best way to find out insights and chances to your next innovation. This session provides you preliminary knowledge to make your understanding more deeper to up-coming service launches, exciting customer stories and your chances to the future. We will share you global customer stories, common challenges and key points of recent service launches. Please join this session and be prepared for up-coming re:Invent!
sessions.abstract_cn: 生成AI技術は世界的に驚異的な速度で進歩しており、多くのお客様がそれを使ったイノベーションを模索しています。そのような中、re:Inventは次のイノベーションへの洞察と機会を見つける最良の方法の一つです。このセッションでは、今後のサービスローンチ、エキサイティングなお客様事例、そして未来への機会についてより深く理解するための予備知識を提供します。グローバルなお客様事例、共通の課題、最近のサービスローンチの要点をお伝えします。このセッションにご参加いただき、今後のre:Inventに備えましょう！

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - An insider’s look into architecture choices for Amazon DynamoDB (DAT436)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon DynamoDB架构选择内幕解析 (DAT436)
sessions.abstract: To overcome the performance and scale limitations of relational databases, AWS built Amazon DynamoDB to deliver consistent single-digit millisecond performance at any scale for the most demanding applications on the planet. In this session, learn about the architecture choices for Amazon DynamoDB. Gain a better understanding of when to use DynamoDB and why DynamoDB is used by over one million AWS customers, and powers hundreds of applications that exceed half a million requests per second. Leave with a new perspective on how to design your own applications.
sessions.abstract_cn: 为了克服关系型数据库的性能和扩展限制，AWS构建了Amazon DynamoDB，为全球最苛刻的应用程序提供任意规模下一致的个位数毫秒性能。在本次会议中，了解Amazon DynamoDB的架构选择。更好地理解何时使用DynamoDB以及为什么DynamoDB被超过一百万AWS客户使用，并为数百个每秒超过五十万请求的应用程序提供支持。带着关于如何设计自己应用程序的全新视角离开。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Simplify backup for stateful Amazon EKS workloads (CNS209)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 简化有状态 Amazon EKS 工作负载的备份 (CNS209)
sessions.abstract: Protecting persistent data in Amazon EKS environments presents unique challenges. This lightning talk demonstrates practical approaches for backing up stateful workloads using AWS services. Learn how to configure backup policies for persistent storage used by containerized applications, automate protection schedules, and establish efficient restoration workflows. Discover strategies to enhance data protection and simplify management while maintaining a fully AWS-native infrastructure. This demonstration is ideal for teams looking to optimize their Amazon EKS backup strategies using AWS services.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在 Amazon EKS 环境中保护持久化数据面临独特挑战。本次闪电演讲展示了使用 AWS 服务备份有状态工作负载的实用方法。了解如何为容器化应用程序使用的持久化存储配置备份策略，自动化保护计划，并建立高效的恢复工作流程。探索增强数据保护和简化管理的策略，同时维护完全 AWS 原生基础设施。此演示非常适合希望使用 AWS 服务优化其 Amazon EKS 备份策略的团队。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Generative and Agentic AI on Amazon EKS (CNS344)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在 Amazon EKS 上的生成式和代理式 AI (CNS344)
sessions.abstract: AI is creating new opportunities, and organizations need speed-to-market, scalability, performance, and cost efficiency to bring ideas to life. Amazon EKS provides the trusted and flexible foundation for your AI journey as you build new experiences using AI inference, agents, and model fine-tuning. In this session, we will cover recent innovations in Amazon EKS that empower you with the latest AI capabilities and we will share real-world architectures, best practices, and examples to leave you equipped with the information you need to accelerate your AI initiatives.
sessions.abstract_cn: 人工智能正在创造新的机遇，组织需要快速上市、可扩展性、性能和成本效益来将想法变为现实。Amazon EKS 为您的 AI 之旅提供值得信赖且灵活的基础，帮助您使用 AI 推理、代理和模型微调构建新体验。在本次会议中，我们将介绍 Amazon EKS 的最新创新，这些创新为您提供最新的 AI 能力，我们还将分享真实世界的架构、最佳实践和示例，让您掌握加速 AI 计划所需的信息。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Fault-Tolerant Systems with AWS Messaging Services (API322)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 消息服务构建容错系统 (API322)
sessions.abstract: Cloud application reliability is essential for modern business success. In this session, explore how AWS messaging services enhance system resilience through fault-tolerant design patterns. We'll examine four proven architectural approaches that strengthen your cloud infrastructure and maintain continuous service delivery. Through practical demonstrations, learn how to implement these patterns using AWS services to build loosely coupled, scalable systems that handle disruptions effectively. Discover techniques to create architectures that not only withstand challenges but excel under scale, ensuring consistent customer experiences.
sessions.abstract_cn: 云应用程序可靠性对现代业务成功至关重要。在本次会议中，探索 AWS 消息服务如何通过容错设计模式增强系统弹性。我们将研究四种经过验证的架构方法，这些方法可以加强您的云基础设施并维持持续的服务交付。通过实际演示，学习如何使用 AWS 服务实施这些模式，构建松耦合、可扩展的系统，有效处理中断。了解创建架构的技术，这些架构不仅能够承受挑战，还能在规模化下表现出色，确保一致的客户体验。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From EC2 to EKS: Tipalti’s transformation to Windows containers on AWS (MAM339)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从 EC2 到 EKS：Tipalti 在 AWS 上向 Windows 容器的转型 (MAM339)
sessions.abstract: Is your Windows applications constrained by scaling limitations and complex operations? Discover how Tipalti transformed their traditional Windows application into a modern, containerized solution. Learn how to overcome process management challenges, implement auto-scaling, and achieve up to a 50% performance improvement. We'll walk through the implementation of Windows containers, logging solutions, and operational enhancements. Through Tipalti's transformation experience, key technical decisions, and lessons learned, you'll gain practical knowledge for modernizing your Windows applications.
sessions.abstract_cn: 您的Windows应用程序是否受到扩展限制和复杂操作的约束？了解Tipalti如何将其传统Windows应用程序转换为现代化容器化解决方案。学习如何克服进程管理挑战、实施自动扩展并实现高达50%的性能提升。我们将详细介绍Windows容器的实施、日志记录解决方案和运营增强功能。通过Tipalti的转型经验、关键技术决策和经验教训，您将获得现代化Windows应用程序的实用知识。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Yahoo! Finance built research multi-agent systems with Gen AI (SPS321)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Yahoo! Finance 如何使用生成式 AI 构建研究多智能体系统 (SPS321)
sessions.abstract: Explore how enterprises are adopting and scaling multi-agent systems with Amazon Bedrock and AgentCore for advanced data analysis and research applications. In this session, Dipen Rughwani from Yahoo Finance will share his journey on designing and implementing multi-agent systems for financial question answering. This work investigates methods for orchestrating agents, integrating with Yahoo Finance web services that deliver structured and unstructured data to web and mobile applications. We discuss approaches for enabling coordinated tool/API calling for heterogeneous sources and evaluating performance trade-offs in multi-agent architectures. The session provides practical guidance for architects and data scientists building enterprise-scale agent-based solutions.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索企业如何利用Amazon Bedrock和AgentCore采用和扩展多智能体系统，用于高级数据分析和研究应用。在本次会议中，来自Yahoo Finance的Dipen Rughwani将分享他在设计和实施用于金融问答的多智能体系统方面的经验。这项工作研究了编排智能体的方法，与Yahoo Finance网络服务集成，为网页和移动应用程序提供结构化和非结构化数据。我们讨论了为异构数据源实现协调工具/API调用的方法，以及评估多智能体架构中的性能权衡。本次会议为构建企业级智能体解决方案的架构师和数据科学家提供实用指导。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Moody’s: Architecting a multi-agent system on AWS (IND3303)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 穆迪：在AWS上构建多智能体系统架构 (IND3303)
sessions.abstract: Financial institutions need to orchestrate specialized analysis across diverse domains while maintaining regulatory compliance and performance at scale. Learn how Moody's built their Research Assistant using domain agents for ratings, climate, and economics; task agents for KYC screening and company credit assessment; and workflow agents for sales and marketing and portfolio monitoring with early warning signals on Amazon Bedrock. Explore architectural patterns for multi-agent coordination using Amazon DynamoDB, Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL, AWS Lambda, and Amazon ECS that accelerated insights by 60% and reduced task completion by 30%. Discover approaches to agent specialization and knowledge retrieval that ensure compliance while processing complex financial datasets.
sessions.abstract_cn: 金融机构需要在保持监管合规性和大规模性能的同时，协调跨不同领域的专业化分析。了解穆迪如何使用Amazon Bedrock构建其研究助手，该助手采用评级、气候和经济学领域代理；KYC筛查和公司信用评估任务代理；以及销售营销和投资组合监控工作流代理，并提供早期预警信号。探索使用Amazon DynamoDB、Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL、AWS Lambda和Amazon ECS进行多代理协调的架构模式，这些模式将洞察速度提升了60%，任务完成时间减少了30%。发现代理专业化和知识检索方法，确保在处理复杂金融数据集时保持合规性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building a State of the Art Agentic Infrastructure (AIM297)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建最先进的智能体基础设施 (AIM297)
sessions.abstract: The prompt is the new browser. It’s no secret that AI agents will transform how people interact with information and services, but what’s often overlooked is how agents can only thrive on the right foundation. Agents demand a new layer of connectivity, control, and security. Join Alex Drag and Michael Field from Kong as they explore how agents are becoming the new backbone of the internet — and what builders can do to get ready for it. This presentation is brought to you by Kong, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 提示就是新的浏览器。AI代理将改变人们与信息和服务交互的方式，这已不是秘密，但经常被忽视的是，代理只能在正确的基础上蓬勃发展。代理需要新的连接、控制和安全层。加入Kong的Alex Drag和Michael Field，探索代理如何成为互联网的新支柱——以及构建者可以做什么来为此做好准备。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Kong为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Drive operational excellence for modern applications (COP327)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 推动现代应用程序的卓越运营 (COP327)
sessions.abstract: Modern applications built with microservices, containers, and serverless require advanced observability practices. This session showcases how CloudWatch will help you understand your application and infrastructure as well as your business and customer experience.  Attendees will explore strategies for implementing observability in modern architectures and learn how to leverage new and existing AWS observability features to detect issues faster and reduce mean time to resolution while maintaining reliability at scale. Participants will also learn how to use these tools to accelerate deployments and break down silos between teams.
sessions.abstract_cn: 使用微服务、容器和无服务器构建的现代应用程序需要先进的可观测性实践。本次会议展示了 CloudWatch 如何帮助您了解应用程序和基础设施以及业务和客户体验。与会者将探索在现代架构中实施可观测性的策略，并学习如何利用新的和现有的 AWS 可观测性功能更快地检测问题并缩短平均解决时间，同时保持大规模的可靠性。参与者还将学习如何使用这些工具加速部署并打破团队之间的孤岛。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate Telco Transformation: AT&T's AI-Powered Migration at Scale (IND201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 加速电信转型：AT&T 的 AI 驱动大规模迁移 (IND201)
sessions.abstract: Join this session to explore how telecommunications companies are implementing AWS generative AI services, including AWS Transform and Amazon Bedrock, to automate legacy system migrations. Learn how CSPs are modernizing Mainframe systems and VMware environments using AI-powered assessment tools, automated infrastructure-as-code generation, and intelligent legacy code transformation. AT&T will present their strategic vision and implementation approach for AI-powered Mainframe modernization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 参加本次会议，探索电信公司如何实施 AWS 生成式 AI 服务，包括 AWS Transform 和 Amazon Bedrock，以自动化传统系统迁移。了解通信服务提供商如何使用 AI 驱动的评估工具、自动化基础设施即代码生成和智能传统代码转换来现代化大型机系统和 VMware 环境。AT&T 将展示其 AI 驱动的大型机现代化战略愿景和实施方法。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From prompt to production: On-brand marketing images with Amazon Nova (AIM373)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从提示到生产：使用 Amazon Nova 创建符合品牌形象的营销图像 (AIM373)
sessions.abstract: Ad and marketing teams are racing to harness text-to-image models, but creating high-quality, on-brand visuals at production scale has remained unsolved. Until now. Generating marketing images isn’t just about automation; it’s about balancing speed, creative fidelity, and brand alignment—which has never before been explored in a scalable, production-ready workflow with agents. In this breakout session, discover the challenges of bringing text-to-image into real-world campaigns and the breakthrough that makes it possible. Join this session to learn how to create scalable, robust, and brand-aligned agentic workflows using Nova Canvas and Nova Pro, and see how AI can supercharge your creative pipeline.
sessions.abstract_cn: 广告和营销团队正在竞相利用文本生成图像模型，但在生产规模上创建高质量、符合品牌形象的视觉内容一直是个未解决的难题。直到现在。生成营销图像不仅仅是自动化的问题；它关乎速度、创意保真度和品牌一致性的平衡——这在可扩展的、生产就绪的代理工作流中从未被探索过。在本分组会议中，了解将文本生成图像技术应用于实际营销活动的挑战，以及使其成为可能的突破性进展。参加本次会议，学习如何使用 Nova Canvas 和 Nova Pro 创建可扩展、稳健且符合品牌的代理工作流，并了解 AI 如何为您的创意流程注入强大动力。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Customer Services Reinvention powered by AWS (AIM110)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 由 AWS 驱动的客户服务重塑 (AIM110)
sessions.abstract: At Grupo Werthein in Latin America, Accenture are reinventing Customer Service with Generative AI powered by AWS. Our transformation enables up to 90% resolution through digital channels, delivering humanized and personalized customer interactions. By operating a cost-efficient, scalable technology ecosystem across all transformed digital touchpoints, we ensure continuous improvement, smarter processes, and seamless experiences. This reinvention not only enhances customer satisfaction but also drives operational efficiency and business value. AWS empowers us to reimagine the future of customer care — intelligent, efficient, and customer-first. This presentation is brought to you by Accenture, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在拉丁美洲的Grupo Werthein，埃森哲正在利用由AWS驱动的生成式AI重新定义客户服务。我们的转型实现了通过数字渠道高达90%的问题解决率，提供人性化和个性化的客户互动。通过在所有转型的数字触点上运营成本高效、可扩展的技术生态系统，我们确保持续改进、更智能的流程和无缝体验。这种重新定义不仅提升了客户满意度，还推动了运营效率和业务价值。AWS使我们能够重新构想客户服务的未来——智能、高效、以客户为先。本演示由AWS合作伙伴埃森哲为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Integrate any agent framework with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore (AIM396)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 将任何代理框架与 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 集成 (AIM396)
sessions.abstract: Bring existing agents to AWS with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore. Whether you've built custom agents or use frameworks like LangChain, LangGraph, CrewAI, or LlamaIndex, this session shows how to run them on secure, scalable AWS infrastructure without rewriting your logic. Discover how AgentCore's API-based orchestration integrates external agent frameworks and services, centralizing tooling, observability, memory, and security. Learn how Cohere Health successfully integrated their healthcare workflow agents with AgentCore to enable secure, scalable processing of healthcare prior authorization decisions, leveraging AgentCore's services like Runtime and Memory to meet strict healthcare compliance requirements while maintaining the flexibility to use their chosen frameworks.
sessions.abstract_cn: 使用Amazon Bedrock AgentCore将现有代理迁移到AWS。无论您构建了自定义代理还是使用LangChain、LangGraph、CrewAI或LlamaIndex等框架，本会议展示如何在安全、可扩展的AWS基础设施上运行它们，而无需重写您的逻辑。了解AgentCore基于API的编排如何集成外部代理框架和服务，集中化工具、可观测性、内存和安全性。学习Cohere Health如何成功将其医疗工作流代理与AgentCore集成，实现医疗预授权决策的安全、可扩展处理，利用AgentCore的Runtime和Memory等服务满足严格的医疗合规要求，同时保持使用其选择框架的灵活性。

presenter.name: Aris Tsakpinis
presenter.title: Sr WW Specialist SA, Amazon Bedrock

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Fidelity Investments: Text-to-SQL for data analytics at enterprise scale-IND3323
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Fidelity Investments：企业级数据分析的文本转SQL技术 - IND3323
sessions.abstract: Learn how Fidelity Institutional (FI) developed and implemented a sophisticated Text-to-SQL generative AI solution that enables non-technical domain experts to interact with complex structured data using natural language. Dive deep into the architecture and technical implementation details of a system that handles complex database schemas, multiple table relationships, and generates complex SQL queries. We’ll cover advanced topics including natural language understanding optimization, query re-write, vector search, SQL generation strategies, query safety mechanisms, and performance tuning for large-scale structured data operations. Discover the validation frameworks, monitoring systems, and API design patterns that make this solution robust and reusable.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解富达机构(FI)如何开发和实施一个复杂的文本转SQL生成式AI解决方案,使非技术领域专家能够使用自然语言与复杂的结构化数据进行交互。深入探讨该系统的架构和技术实施细节,该系统可处理复杂的数据库模式、多表关系并生成复杂的SQL查询。我们将涵盖高级主题,包括自然语言理解优化、查询重写、向量搜索、SQL生成策略、查询安全机制以及大规模结构化数据操作的性能调优。了解使该解决方案稳健且可重用的验证框架、监控系统和API设计模式。

presenter.name: Manish Worlikar
presenter.title: Head of FI Artificial Intelligence CoE

presenter.name: Ray Zhang
presenter.title: VP of AI/ML engineering, Fidelity Institution

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Driving business outcomes with complete AWS Marketplace solutions (PEX111)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过完整的 AWS Marketplace 解决方案推动业务成果 (PEX111)
sessions.abstract: Organizations are increasingly seeking complete, ready-to-deploy solutions rather than individual products. Learn how AWS Marketplace empowers Partners to deliver comprehensive business solutions that include multiple software products and professional services. This powerful capability enables buyers to procure complete, outcome-focused solutions through a streamlined experience. Whether you're an ISV adding professional services to your software, a systems integrator building solutions, or a buyer looking to simplify procurement, discover how the solution-centric approach in AWS Marketplace helps accelerate digital transformation while reducing procurement complexity.
sessions.abstract_cn: 组织越来越寻求完整的、即用型解决方案，而不是单个产品。了解AWS Marketplace如何赋能合作伙伴交付包含多个软件产品和专业服务的综合业务解决方案。这一强大功能使买家能够通过简化的体验采购完整的、以结果为导向的解决方案。无论您是为软件添加专业服务的ISV、构建解决方案的系统集成商，还是希望简化采购的买家，都可以了解AWS Marketplace中以解决方案为中心的方法如何帮助加速数字化转型，同时降低采购复杂性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Advanced RAG Architectures: From Basic Retrieval to Agentic RAG  (NTA403)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 高级 RAG 架构：从基础检索到智能体 RAG (NTA403)
sessions.abstract: Join us for this hands-on Code Talk where we'll dive deep into building advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) architectures that effectively handle large-scale documents. Through live coding demonstrations, we'll explore techniques to enhance retrieval accuracy and context preservation when dealing with complex documents. Watch and code along as we implement multi-step RAG, recursive retrieval, and agent-driven approaches that intelligently chunk and process large texts, decompose queries, evaluate responses, and orchestrate complex tasks. You'll see real AWS customer code examples and learn practical strategies for building more accurate, scalable Generative AI applications. Bring your laptop and questions for this interactive session with AWS experts.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们这个实践性的 Code Talk，我们将深入构建高级检索增强生成（RAG）架构，有效处理大规模文档。通过现场编码演示，我们将探索在处理复杂文档时增强检索准确性和上下文保持的技术。观看并跟随我们实现多步骤 RAG、递归检索和智能代理驱动的方法，这些方法能够智能地分块和处理大型文本、分解查询、评估响应并编排复杂任务。您将看到真实的 AWS 客户代码示例，并学习构建更准确、可扩展的生成式 AI 应用程序的实用策略。请带上您的笔记本电脑和问题，参加这个与 AWS 专家的互动会议。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Southwest Gas: Agentic AI readiness and SAP modernization (HMC205)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Southwest Gas：智能体 AI 就绪性和 SAP 现代化 (HMC205)
sessions.abstract: How Southwest Gas is laying the foundation for agentic AI using Amazon Bedrock and AWS services. This presentation is brought to you by IBM, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: Southwest Gas 如何使用 Amazon Bedrock 和 AWS 服务为智能体 AI 奠定基础。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 IBM 为您呈现。

presenter.name: Pankaj Kumar
presenter.title: Executive Partner at IBM Consulting and AWS Practice Leader for Comms and IND

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Code to Policies: Accelerate Development w/ IAM Policy Autopilot (SEC351)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从代码到策略：使用 IAM Policy Autopilot 加速开发 (SEC351)
sessions.abstract: Are you tired of spending hours debugging IAM permissions instead of building features? In this session, learn how IAM Policy Autopilot helps you get started quickly with creating IAM policies that you can refine as your application evolves. We'll demonstrate how this open source MCP server integrates with AI coding assistants to analyze your application code and generate valid identity-based policies in real-time. Through live demos, you'll see how IAM Policy Autopilot provides functional policies that work from day one. Whether you're building serverless functions, containerized applications, or using AI coding assistants, you'll leave with hands-on experience using IAM Policy Autopilot to accelerate your development workflow.
sessions.abstract_cn: 您是否厌倦了花费数小时调试 IAM 权限而不是构建功能？在本次会议中，了解 IAM Policy Autopilot 如何帮助您快速开始创建 IAM 策略，并可以随着应用程序的发展进行完善。我们将演示这个开源 MCP 服务器如何与 AI 编码助手集成，分析您的应用程序代码并实时生成有效的基于身份的策略。通过现场演示，您将看到 IAM Policy Autopilot 如何提供从第一天就能正常工作的功能性策略。无论您是在构建无服务器函数、容器化应用程序，还是使用 AI 编码助手，您都将获得使用 IAM Policy Autopilot 加速开发工作流程的实践经验。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reinvent your career: From developer to cloud leader (DEV101)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 重塑你的职业生涯：从开发者到云领导者 (DEV101)
sessions.abstract: Cloud careers evolve quickly. This session explores how developers can grow into cloud leadership roles, sharing practical strategies for building influence, technical expertise, and resilience along the way. Attendees gain insight into how to navigate career growth while staying grounded in engineering best practices.
sessions.abstract_cn: 云职业发展迅速。本次会议探讨开发人员如何成长为云领导角色，分享建立影响力、技术专长和韧性的实用策略。与会者将深入了解如何在保持工程最佳实践的同时实现职业成长。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Move beyond reactive: Transform cloud ops with AWS DevOps Agent (COP362)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越被动响应：使用 AWS DevOps Agent 转型云运维 (COP362)
sessions.abstract: Is your operations team consumed by daily firefighting? Do you lack the time to evaluate and improve your operational posture? Move from reactive firefighting to proactive operational improvement with AWS DevOps Agent, a frontier agent that resolves and proactively prevents incidents, continuously improving reliability and performance of applications in AWS, multicloud, and hybrid environments. We’ll show you how you can leverage AWS DevOps Agent to integrate with your DevOps toolset including AWS and non-AWS observability tools, code repositories, and pipelines to correlate and connect the dots across signals to surface concerning trends and provide prioritized improvements to drive operational excellence.
sessions.abstract_cn: 您的运维团队是否被日常救火工作所困扰？您是否缺乏时间来评估和改进运维状况？通过AWS DevOps Agent从被动救火转向主动运维改进，这是一个前沿代理，可以解决并主动预防事件，持续改进AWS、多云和混合环境中应用程序的可靠性和性能。我们将向您展示如何利用AWS DevOps Agent与您的DevOps工具集成，包括AWS和非AWS可观测性工具、代码存储库和管道，以关联和连接各种信号，发现令人担忧的趋势，并提供优先级改进建议来推动运维卓越。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Data protection and resilience with AWS Storage (STG338)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 存储实现数据保护和弹性 (STG338)
sessions.abstract: Data continues to be one of the world’s most valuable resources. Data protection and resilience are critical to business success, helping to keep workflows running and allow business recovery from data loss events such as unplanned outages, natural disasters, and ransomware. Join this session to dive deep on how AWS storage offers organizations defense-in-depth data protection and resilience for application data across recovery point and time objectives, helping to mitigate risks with immutable solutions, restore testing, policy-based access controls, encryption, and auditing and reporting.
sessions.abstract_cn: 数据仍然是世界上最有价值的资源之一。数据保护和韧性对业务成功至关重要，有助于保持工作流程运行，并使企业能够从数据丢失事件（如计划外中断、自然灾害和勒索软件）中恢复。加入本次会议，深入了解 AWS 存储如何为组织提供纵深防御的数据保护和应用程序数据韧性，涵盖恢复点和恢复时间目标，通过不可变解决方案、恢复测试、基于策略的访问控制、加密以及审计和报告来帮助降低风险。

presenter.name: Danny Johnston
presenter.title: Data Storage Specialist | Global Financial Services

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Secure in milliseconds: Visa's AI-powered fraud defense on AWS (IND3313)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 毫秒级安全防护：Visa 在 AWS 上的 AI 驱动欺诈防御系统 (IND3313)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Visa revolutionized real-time payment security by leveraging AWS services, including AWS Nitro Enclaves, Amazon EKS, and Amazon MemoryDB, for their Visa Protect solution. This session explores Visa's journey to a rapidly scalable, cloud-based fraud detection solution. Learn how Visa processes massive volumes of sensitive financial data with ultra-low latency while maintaining stringent security standards. We'll dive into the multi-region architecture, real-time AI/ML fraud detection on Amazon EKS, and compute-level isolation that allowed Visa to achieve sub-250 millisecond fraud detection latency and 99.99% availability. Join us to uncover the blueprint for secure, AI-driven payment risk scoring.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Visa 如何通过利用 AWS 服务（包括 AWS Nitro Enclaves、Amazon EKS 和 Amazon MemoryDB）为其 Visa Protect 解决方案彻底改变实时支付安全。本次会议探讨了 Visa 向快速可扩展的基于云的欺诈检测解决方案的转型之旅。了解 Visa 如何在保持严格安全标准的同时，以超低延迟处理大量敏感金融数据。我们将深入探讨多区域架构、Amazon EKS 上的实时 AI/ML 欺诈检测，以及使 Visa 能够实现低于 250 毫秒欺诈检测延迟和 99.99% 可用性的计算级隔离。加入我们，揭示安全、AI 驱动的支付风险评分蓝图。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A day in the life of an AWS WAF administrator (NET317)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS WAF 管理员的一天 (NET317)
sessions.abstract: From sunrise alerts to sunset cost reports, the AWS WAF administrator’s day is never dull. Join us as we follow a fictional (but all-too-relatable) admin navigating setup, fine-tuning rules, building dashboards, and taming budgets - while outsmarting emerging threats before they bite. You’ll see how to adapt quickly to shifting traffic, uncover hidden risks, and make data-driven decisions without breaking the bank - or the application. Packed with tips, real-world examples, and a dash of bot traffic, this session turns the daily grind of web application protection into a well-architected adventure (edited)
sessions.abstract_cn: 从日出警报到日落成本报告，AWS WAF管理员的一天从不枯燥。加入我们，跟随一位虚构（但极其真实）的管理员，了解如何进行设置、微调规则、构建仪表板和控制预算——同时在新兴威胁造成损害之前智胜它们。您将看到如何快速适应不断变化的流量，发现隐藏风险，并在不超出预算或破坏应用程序的情况下做出数据驱动的决策。本次会议充满技巧、真实案例和少量机器人流量，将Web应用程序保护的日常工作转变为架构良好的冒险之旅。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - GenAI game coach: Real-time gameplay feedback (DEV201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - GenAI游戏教练：实时游戏反馈 (DEV201)
sessions.abstract: What if your gameplay footage could talk back and tell you how to improve? In this Dev Chat, I’ll walk through how I built a lightweight GenAI-powered system that watches short clips of your gameplay and gives real-time coaching feedback in natural language. No SDKs, no engine mods, just video, voice, and AWS. Using a combination of Amazon Rekognition for visual cues, Amazon Transcribe for in-game voice analysis, and Amazon Bedrock for feedback generation, this system turns raw gameplay into structured insights. You’ll learn how to combine multimodal data (frames, audio, context) and prompt engineering to build an interactive review.
sessions.abstract_cn: 如果您的游戏录像能够回应并告诉您如何改进会怎样？在这次开发者聊天中，我将演示如何构建一个轻量级的生成式AI驱动系统，该系统可以观看您的游戏短片并提供实时的自然语言指导反馈。无需SDK，无需引擎修改，只需视频、语音和AWS。通过结合Amazon Rekognition进行视觉线索识别、Amazon Transcribe进行游戏内语音分析，以及Amazon Bedrock进行反馈生成，该系统将原始游戏录像转化为结构化洞察。您将学习如何结合多模态数据（帧、音频、上下文）和提示工程来构建交互式回顾。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -From Print to AI: The Economist's Digital Evolution w/ AWS Architecture (IND399)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 -从印刷到AI：《经济学人》与AWS架构的数字化演进 (IND399)
sessions.abstract: Discover how The Economist transformed its historic legacy into a cutting-edge AI powerhouse. This presentation reveals how the prestigious media group successfully integrated GenAI and ML technologies through strategic alignment of teams, workflows, and infrastructure. Learn their blueprint for secure data architecture and AI implementation using AWS SageMaker and Amazon Bedrock. Featuring live demonstrations, examine real-world applications, from sophisticated recommendation systems to advanced predictive analytics, demonstrating how traditional media can evolve in the AI era.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索《经济学人》如何将其历史传承转变为尖端的人工智能强国。本演示揭示了这家知名媒体集团如何通过团队、工作流程和基础设施的战略协调,成功整合生成式人工智能和机器学习技术。了解他们使用 AWS SageMaker 和 Amazon Bedrock 实现安全数据架构和人工智能部署的蓝图。通过现场演示,探讨从复杂推荐系统到高级预测分析的实际应用案例,展示传统媒体如何在人工智能时代实现演进。

presenter.name: Prof. Bogdan Vrusias
presenter.title: Head of AI and Data Engineering

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Netflix Connects Product Experiments to its AWS Bill (IND388)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Netflix 如何将产品实验与其 AWS 账单关联 (IND388)
sessions.abstract: How do you measure the cost of innovation? At Netflix, a "winning" A/B test can create hidden cloud infrastructure costs that offset its business value. This session details our strategy for connecting product experiments to their infrastructure costs. We'll share our framework for identifying an experiment's impact on our cloud systems and show how we translate that impact into a projected AWS cost. Learn how this enables our teams to make smarter, more cost-aware product decisions at scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 如何衡量创新的成本？在Netflix，一个"成功的"A/B测试可能会产生隐藏的云基础设施成本，从而抵消其业务价值。本次会议详细介绍了我们将产品实验与其基础设施成本关联起来的策略。我们将分享用于识别实验对云系统影响的框架，并展示如何将这种影响转化为预测的AWS成本。了解这如何使我们的团队能够大规模地做出更明智、更具成本意识的产品决策。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Inside Poolside’s Model Factory: Building Better Models Faster (AIM262)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Poolside模型工厂内部：更快构建更好的模型 (AIM262)
sessions.abstract: Step inside poolside’s Model Factory—an integrated framework for turning raw data into production-ready foundation models. From automated pipelines and distributed training to reinforcement learning and scalable inference, discover how the Model Factory streamlines the entire lifecycle. Attendees will gain insights into building reproducible, enterprise-grade AI systems that combine speed, automation, and innovation. This presentation is brought to you by poolside, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 深入了解poolside的模型工厂——一个将原始数据转化为生产就绪基础模型的集成框架。从自动化管道和分布式训练到强化学习和可扩展推理，探索模型工厂如何简化整个生命周期。与会者将深入了解如何构建可重现的企业级AI系统，结合速度、自动化和创新。本演示由AWS合作伙伴poolside为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -How Toyota Built an AI Platform that Revolutionizes the Dealer Experience-IND320
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 丰田如何构建革命性经销商体验的AI平台 - IND320
sessions.abstract: In this session, Toyota Connected North America and Toyota Enterprise AI showcase how they transformed dealer operations using Amazon Bedrock and Claude to create an intelligent assistant that answers complex vehicle questions in seconds. The system now serves 2,300+ dealerships with instant, accurate vehicle expertise and handles 7,000+ monthly dealer interactions across multiple Toyota models and years, leveraging Amazon Bedrock, OpenSearch Serverless, and Amazon EKS for enterprise-scale performance.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，丰田互联北美和丰田企业AI展示了他们如何使用Amazon Bedrock和Claude改造经销商运营，创建了一个能够在几秒钟内回答复杂车辆问题的智能助手。该系统现在为2,300多家经销商提供服务，提供即时、准确的车辆专业知识，每月处理7,000多次经销商交互，涵盖多个丰田车型和年份，利用Amazon Bedrock、OpenSearch Serverless和Amazon EKS实现企业级性能。

presenter.name: Stephen Ellis
presenter.title: Senior Manager, AI Strategy and Delivery

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build Advanced Search with Vector, Hybrid, and AI Techniques (ANT314)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用向量、混合和AI技术构建高级搜索 (ANT314)
sessions.abstract: Amazon OpenSearch Service is at the heart of how Artificial Intelligence is transforming the way we store, search, and use data. Learn how businesses are using AI to power their search-backed applications, achieving significant improvements in search accuracy and performance with OpenSearch Service’s advanced vector capabilities. Learn how Recruit uses OpenSearch Service to find available tables for "Hot Pepper Gourmet" diners. Dive deep into OpenSearch’s vector capabilities, and its role in building chat bots and agentic search. You’ll learn how to build scalable, high-performance, and cost-optimal solutions so that you can incorporate these technologies in your stack.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon OpenSearch Service 是人工智能转变我们存储、搜索和使用数据方式的核心。了解企业如何使用 AI 为其搜索支持的应用程序提供动力，通过 OpenSearch Service 的高级向量功能在搜索准确性和性能方面实现显著改进。了解 Recruit 如何使用 OpenSearch Service 为"Hot Pepper Gourmet"食客查找可用餐桌。深入探讨 OpenSearch 的向量功能及其在构建聊天机器人和代理搜索中的作用。您将学习如何构建可扩展、高性能且成本优化的解决方案，以便将这些技术融入您的技术栈中。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Exploring dual pathways to agentic commerce with AWS and Stripe (AIM114)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 和 Stripe 探索代理商务的双重路径 (AIM114)
sessions.abstract: The retail environment is changing with the emergence of gen AI–powered agents—intelligent storefronts that discover, recommend, and transact on behalf of shoppers. In this new era of agentic commerce, two pathways are taking shape: business to agent (B2A), where external answer engines connect customers with products, and agent to consumer (A2C), where retailers deploy custom on-site agents using solutions such as AWS’s gen AI stack. In both journeys, trust and simplicity at checkout are key. Discover how AWS and Stripe allow for real-time transaction analytics, automated fraud detection, and tailored payment solutions—helping retailers convert product discovery into revenue while simplifying operations and boosting conversion rates. This presentation is brought to you by Stripe, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 零售环境正在随着生成式AI驱动代理的出现而发生变化——这些智能店面能够代表购物者发现、推荐和交易。在这个代理商务的新时代，两条路径正在形成：企业对代理（B2A），外部答案引擎将客户与产品连接；以及代理对消费者（A2C），零售商使用AWS生成式AI堆栈等解决方案部署定制化现场代理。在这两个过程中，结账时的信任和简便性是关键。了解AWS和Stripe如何实现实时交易分析、自动化欺诈检测和定制化支付解决方案——帮助零售商将产品发现转化为收入，同时简化运营并提高转化率。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Stripe为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon's finops: Cloud cost lessons from a global e-commerce giant (AMZ308)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 亚马逊的FinOps：来自全球电商巨头的云成本经验教训 (AMZ308)
sessions.abstract: Get an insider's view of FinOps at Amazon from the AWS Cloud Economics team. Drawing from experience supporting thousands of internal teams, we'll share battle-tested strategies for building a cost-aware culture and scaling cloud financial management. Learn how Amazon approaches cost allocation, leverages AWS tools, and drives optimization across its complex enterprise. You'll leave with practical approaches and proven best practices that can be applied to organizations of any size.
sessions.abstract_cn: 从 AWS 云经济团队深入了解亚马逊的 FinOps 实践。我们将分享支持数千个内部团队的实战经验，介绍构建成本意识文化和扩展云财务管理的久经考验的策略。了解亚马逊如何进行成本分配、利用 AWS 工具以及在复杂企业环境中推动优化。您将获得可应用于任何规模组织的实用方法和经过验证的最佳实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Code to Policies: Accelerate Development w/ IAM Policy Autopilot (SEC351)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从代码到策略：使用 IAM 策略自动驾驶加速开发 (SEC351)
sessions.abstract: Are you tired of spending hours debugging IAM permissions instead of building features? In this session, learn how IAM Policy Autopilot helps you get started quickly with creating IAM policies that you can refine as your application evolves. We'll demonstrate how this open source MCP server integrates with AI coding assistants to analyze your application code and generate valid identity-based policies in real-time. Through live demos, you'll see how IAM Policy Autopilot provides functional policies that work from day one. Whether you're building serverless functions, containerized applications, or using AI coding assistants, you'll leave with hands-on experience using IAM Policy Autopilot to accelerate your development workflow.
sessions.abstract_cn: 您是否厌倦了花费数小时调试IAM权限而不是构建功能？在本次会议中，了解IAM Policy Autopilot如何帮助您快速开始创建IAM策略，这些策略可以随着应用程序的发展而完善。我们将演示这个开源MCP服务器如何与AI编码助手集成，分析您的应用程序代码并实时生成有效的基于身份的策略。通过现场演示，您将看到IAM Policy Autopilot如何提供从第一天就能工作的功能性策略。无论您是在构建无服务器函数、容器化应用程序，还是使用AI编码助手，您都将获得使用IAM Policy Autopilot加速开发工作流程的实践经验。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A leader's guide to AI strategy and implementation (SNR305)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 人工智能战略与实施领导者指南 (SNR305)
sessions.abstract: As generative and agentic AI transform business models, leaders must architect new operating models that bridge technology capabilities with business value. This advanced session reveals proven approaches for scaling AI from experiments to enterprise-wide value creation. Learn to shape AI-driven business strategies, design advanced decision systems, and build governance frameworks that accelerate adoption while managing risk.
