Leaders will leave with practical guidance to orchestrate AI capabilities and organizational transformation, execute their vision, drive innovation, and deliver quantifiable returns through scaled AI deployment.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着生成式和智能体AI改变商业模式，领导者必须构建新的运营模式，将技术能力与商业价值相结合。本高级会议揭示了将AI从实验扩展到企业级价值创造的成熟方法。学习塑造AI驱动的商业策略，设计先进的决策系统，并建立治理框架，在管理风险的同时加速采用。领导者将获得实用指导，以协调AI能力和组织转型，执行愿景，推动创新，并通过规模化AI部署实现可量化的回报。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagine work with Amazon Quick Suite (BIZ202)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 用 Amazon Quick Suite 重新构想工作方式 (BIZ202)
sessions.abstract: Amazon Quick Suite is an agentic teammate for business users that quickly answers their questions at work and turns those insights into actions. Join this session to hear compelling customer stories and discover how organizations are transforming workplace productivity with AI agents for automation, research, and business intelligence in a unified experience. Learn more about how Quick Suite eliminates application and context switching, breaks down data silos, delivers comprehensive insights, and accelerates decision making and taking action - all the while maintaining enterprise-grade security.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon QuickSight 是一个面向业务用户的智能助手，能够快速解答工作中的问题并将这些洞察转化为行动。参加本次会议，聆听引人注目的客户案例，了解各组织如何通过统一体验中的自动化、研究和商业智能 AI 代理来转变工作场所生产力。深入了解 QuickSight 如何消除应用程序和上下文切换，打破数据孤岛，提供全面洞察，加速决策制定和行动执行——同时保持企业级安全性。

presenter.name: Michael Armentano
presenter.title: Pr. WW GTM Spec, Agentic AI, APJ-C

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Multi-Agent Collaboration w/ Amazon Bedrock Agentcore for Advanced SecOps-NTA407
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock Agentcore 进行多智能体协作的高级安全运营 - NTA407
sessions.abstract: In this code talk session, we'll explore how multi-agent collaboration powered by Amazon Bedrock Agentcore transforms security and vulnerability management for SecOps teams. We'll demonstrate how specialized agents working in concert can automate vulnerability assessment and building remediation patches using AgenticAI. Through practical code examples, we'll show how to architect a resilient security system where agents share context on vulnerabilities, identified servers that are potentially impacted and create remediation artifacts to deploy the changes. Join us to learn how this approach reduces response times, improves threat intelligence, and creates a more robust security posture through intelligent agent orchestration.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在这个代码讲座中，我们将探索由Amazon Bedrock Agentcore驱动的多智能体协作如何为SecOps团队转变安全和漏洞管理。我们将演示专业化智能体如何协同工作，使用AgenticAI自动化漏洞评估和构建修复补丁。通过实际代码示例，我们将展示如何架构一个弹性安全系统，其中智能体共享漏洞上下文信息，识别可能受影响的服务器，并创建修复工件来部署变更。加入我们，了解这种方法如何通过智能智能体编排减少响应时间、改善威胁情报并创建更强大的安全态势。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate your growth: AWS Partner Programs for Software Partners (PEX103)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 加速您的增长：面向软件合作伙伴的 AWS 合作伙伴计划 (PEX103)
sessions.abstract: Discover how AWS Partner Programs empower software partners to build, market, sell, and grow. Explore tailored programs with compelling benefits at each partnership stage, from development to market expansion, including learning how AWS Marketplace listings connect you directly with AWS sales through the SaaS Co-Sell Benefit, expanding your customer reach and accelerating sales cycles. See how AWS Partners leverage these program like ISV Accelerate and AWS Marketplace & List Sell Program to drive business growth and customer success. Join us to unlock AWS's comprehensive support system designed specifically for ISVs, including go-to-marketing strategies, migration support and best practices through AWS ISV Workload Migration Program (WMP), and funding opportunities.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解AWS合作伙伴计划如何赋能软件合作伙伴进行构建、营销、销售和增长。探索在合作伙伴关系的各个阶段（从开发到市场扩张）提供引人注目的权益的定制化计划，包括了解AWS Marketplace列表如何通过SaaS联合销售权益将您直接与AWS销售团队连接，扩大您的客户覆盖范围并加速销售周期。了解AWS合作伙伴如何利用ISV Accelerate和AWS Marketplace及List Sell计划等项目来推动业务增长和客户成功。加入我们，解锁AWS专为ISV设计的全面支持体系，包括市场推广策略、通过AWS ISV工作负载迁移计划(WMP)提供的迁移支持和最佳实践，以及资金机会。

presenter.name: Mathangi Ranganathan
presenter.title: Sr. Manager, ISV Workload Migration Program

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Last HSM Standing: PayPal POS’s move to AWS Payment Cryptography (SEC215)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 最后的HSM守护者：PayPal POS迁移至AWS Payment Cryptography (SEC215)
sessions.abstract: Join Zettle by Paypal as they reveal how one of Europe's most innovative point-of-sale vendors is using AWS Payment Cryptography to retire their last on-premise hardware. Learn how they successfully migrated real-time transaction volumes in multiple geographies while maintaining PCI PIN & PCI P2PE compliance, increasing resiliency, and reducing infrastructure costs.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入 Zettle by PayPal，了解欧洲最具创新性的销售点供应商之一如何使用 AWS Payment Cryptography 淘汰其最后的本地硬件。了解他们如何在多个地理区域成功迁移实时交易量，同时保持 PCI PIN 和 PCI P2PE 合规性，提高弹性并降低基础设施成本。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Using Amazon Nova Act to simplify login workflows (AIM271)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Nova Act 简化登录工作流程 (AIM271)
sessions.abstract: Amazon Nova Act redefines what’s possible for intelligent and scalable automation. It can navigate the web independently, interpret complex patterns, and adapt as needed. In this session, you’ll learn how 1Password is using Amazon Nova Act to streamline the login experience for consumers and businesses alike. You’ll see how Amazon Nova Act makes it possible to understand and automate the login experience at scale, across thousands of sites. This presentation is brought to you by 1PASSWORD, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon Nova Act 重新定义了智能和可扩展自动化的可能性。它可以独立导航网络，解释复杂模式，并根据需要进行适应。在本次会议中，您将了解 1Password 如何使用 Amazon Nova Act 来简化消费者和企业的登录体验。您将看到 Amazon Nova Act 如何能够理解并自动化大规模的登录体验，覆盖数千个网站。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 1PASSWORD 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build an AI-ready data foundation (ANT304)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建AI就绪的数据基础 (ANT304)
sessions.abstract: An unparalleled level of interest in generative AI and agentic AI is driving organizations to rethink their data strategy. While there is a need for data foundation constructs such as data pipelines, data architectures, data stores and data governance to evolve, there are business elements that need to stay constant like cost-efficiency and  effectively collaborating across data estates. In this session we will cover how building your data foundation on AWS provides the tools and the building blocks to balance both needs, and empower organizations to grow their data strategy for building AI-ready applications.
sessions.abstract_cn: 对生成式AI和智能体AI前所未有的关注正在推动组织重新思考其数据策略。虽然数据管道、数据架构、数据存储和数据治理等数据基础构建需要演进，但成本效益和跨数据资产有效协作等业务要素需要保持不变。在本次会议中，我们将介绍如何在AWS上构建数据基础为平衡这两种需求提供工具和构建模块，并赋能组织发展其数据策略以构建AI就绪的应用程序。

presenter.name: Shikha Verma
presenter.title: Head of Product, AWS Analytics & Governance

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Next-Gen Scale for Next-Gen Play—EA's Apex Legends & Amazon GameLift (IND204)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 下一代规模支撑下一代游戏——EA的Apex英雄与Amazon GameLift (IND204)
sessions.abstract: Technical leaders from Electronic Arts share the story behind one of the most significant backend transformations in modern online gaming: the migration of EA’s Apex Legends to Amazon GameLift. EA’s move to Amazon GameLift represents a major shift in how large-scale multiplayer games are built, deployed, and operated. This session will dive deep into the motivations, challenges, and solutions that drove the transition. Attendees will gain insights into real-world cloud migration at scale, learn best practices for live service architecture, and explore how EA and AWS are shaping the next generation of infrastructure to deliver reliable experiences for players worldwide.
sessions.abstract_cn: 来自Electronic Arts的技术领导者分享现代在线游戏中最重要的后端转型故事之一：EA的Apex Legends迁移到Amazon GameLift。EA迁移到Amazon GameLift代表了大规模多人游戏构建、部署和运营方式的重大转变。本次会议将深入探讨推动这一转型的动机、挑战和解决方案。与会者将深入了解大规模云迁移的实际案例，学习实时服务架构的最佳实践，并探索EA和AWS如何塑造下一代基础设施，为全球玩家提供可靠的游戏体验。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Healthcare Transformed: Reimagining the Future with Generative AI (AIM241)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 医疗保健转型：用生成式AI重新构想未来 (AIM241)
sessions.abstract: Join a panel discussion hosted by PwC, featuring four Chief Information Officers from leading healthcare systems, as they explore the future of healthcare in a financially strained and rapidly evolving landscape. Discover how organizations are leveraging generative AI and secure, cloud-native platforms to boost productivity, reduce operational costs, and empower their clinical, operational, and research teams. Learn how to scale AI responsibly across complex enterprises, transform care delivery, and drive innovation with measurable outcomes. This presentation is brought to you by PwC, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 参加由普华永道主办的小组讨论，四位来自领先医疗保健系统的首席信息官将探讨在财务紧张和快速发展环境中医疗保健的未来。了解各组织如何利用生成式人工智能和安全的云原生平台来提高生产力、降低运营成本，并为其临床、运营和研究团队赋能。学习如何在复杂企业中负责任地扩展人工智能、转变护理服务模式，并通过可衡量的成果推动创新。本演示由AWS合作伙伴普华永道为您呈现。

presenter.name: Andy Crowder
presenter.title: SVP, Chief Digital and AI Officer

presenter.name: Geoffry Hook
presenter.title: Chief Information Officer - Part of Northwell Health

presenter.name: Rajesh Nair
presenter.title: CIO
presenter.company: WellSense Health Plan - Part of BMC

presenter.name: Michael Reagin
presenter.title: Executive Vice President, Chief Technology Officer

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building the Future Trading Platform leveraging AI and AWS (AIM3307)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用AI和AWS构建未来交易平台 (AIM3307)
sessions.abstract: LPL Financial is one of the fastest growing Broker Dealers, with an aim to grow their client base exponentially leading them to build a future ready Trading Platform. To build a futuristic Trading platform, know how can they integrate advanced technologies like artificial intelligence (AI), leverage microservices and cloud infrastructure, and plan for disruptive innovations. A modular, globally-focused Trading Platform that simplifies complex workflows will be critical to staying competitive in this Era of AI. The platform building adopts futuristics vision ensuring Scalability, Stability and resilience. This presentation is brought to you by Cognizant, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: LPL Financial是增长最快的经纪交易商之一，旨在指数级增长其客户群，这促使他们构建面向未来的交易平台。为了构建未来主义交易平台，了解如何集成人工智能(AI)等先进技术、利用微服务和云基础设施，并规划颠覆性创新。模块化、全球化的交易平台能够简化复杂工作流程，这对于在AI时代保持竞争力至关重要。平台构建采用未来主义愿景，确保可扩展性、稳定性和弹性。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Cognizant为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - All Power, No Pain: Scale Agentic AI Apps in an Open Lakehouse (AIM247)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 全功能，零痛点：在开放湖仓中扩展智能体AI应用 (AIM247)
sessions.abstract: Harness the power of Agentic AI without the data headaches. In this session, you’ll get a practical blueprint for building trusted, scalable AI applications using Apache Iceberg-based open lakehouse architectures. Learn how to fuel your lakehouse with real-time data, ensure data quality for accuracy, and provide a solid data foundation for your AI agents. See how to design systems where agents can seamlessly access data, leverage vector and relational data for enhanced reasoning, and execute complex workflows without bottlenecks. You’ll walk away ready to confidently deploy and scale data for your own agentic AI applications. This presentation is brought to you by Qlik, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 利用代理AI的强大功能，无需担心数据难题。在本次会议中，您将获得使用基于Apache Iceberg的开放湖仓架构构建可信、可扩展AI应用程序的实用蓝图。了解如何使用实时数据为您的湖仓提供动力，确保数据质量以提高准确性，并为您的AI代理提供坚实的数据基础。了解如何设计系统，使代理能够无缝访问数据，利用向量和关系数据增强推理能力，并执行复杂的工作流程而不会出现瓶颈。您将准备好自信地部署和扩展自己的代理AI应用程序的数据。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Qlik为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unified multicloud observability (COP368)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 统一的多云可观测性 (COP368)
sessions.abstract: Multicloud environments present unique observability challenges such as enabling end-to-end visibility of distributed applications and dealing with fragmented tools. This lightning talk will showcase implementation patterns using both open source and cloud-native tooling. You'll leave with clear selection criteria for choosing the right pattern based on your organization's scale, technical constraints, and operational maturity.
sessions.abstract_cn: 多云环境带来了独特的可观测性挑战，例如实现分布式应用程序的端到端可见性以及处理碎片化的工具。本次闪电演讲将展示使用开源和云原生工具的实施模式。您将获得明确的选择标准，以便根据组织的规模、技术约束和运营成熟度选择合适的模式。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Formula 1 Extends Fandom with AI, Data, and AWS Media Services (IND3326)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 一级方程式利用AI、数据和AWS媒体服务拓展粉丝体验 (IND3326)
sessions.abstract: In this session, you will learn how Formula 1 is revving up fan experiences with cloud and generative AI technology. Discover how Formula 1 is revolutionizing motorsport entertainment through cutting-edge cloud and AI technology. Learn how real-time data analytics and generative AI are transforming race broadcasts and fan engagement, and how AWS Media Services is powering 1 TV Premium, F1's new streaming service that launched in 2025. We'll explore F1's innovative solutions for enhancing race operations and fan experiences, demonstrating how technology is reshaping the future of live sports entertainment.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，您将了解一级方程式如何利用云和生成式AI技术提升车迷体验。探索一级方程式如何通过尖端的云和AI技术彻底改变赛车运动娱乐。了解实时数据分析和生成式AI如何改变赛事转播和车迷互动，以及AWS Media Services如何为F1 TV Premium（一级方程式于2025年推出的全新流媒体服务）提供支持。我们将探讨F1在增强赛事运营和车迷体验方面的创新解决方案，展示技术如何重塑现场体育娱乐的未来。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Introducing AI driven development lifecycle (AI-DLC) (DVT214)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 介绍AI驱动的开发生命周期 (AI-DLC) (DVT214)
sessions.abstract: The AI-Driven Development Life Cycle (AI-DLC) represents a transformative approach to software engineering that positions AI as a central collaborator throughout the development process. Unlike traditional AI-assisted development methods, AI-DLC reimagines the entire software lifecycle through two key dimensions: AI-powered execution with human oversight and dynamic team collaboration. The methodology operates in three phases - Inception, Construction, and Operations - where AI initiates workflows while maintaining persistent context across all stages. This innovative approach delivers significant benefits including increased velocity, enhanced quality, improved market responsiveness, and better developer experience, all while ensuring critical human oversight and collaboration.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI驱动开发生命周期(AI-DLC)代表了软件工程的一种变革性方法,将AI定位为整个开发过程中的核心协作者。与传统的AI辅助开发方法不同,AI-DLC通过两个关键维度重新构想整个软件生命周期:具有人工监督的AI驱动执行和动态团队协作。该方法分为三个阶段——启动、构建和运营——其中AI发起工作流程,同时在所有阶段保持持久的上下文。这种创新方法带来了显著的优势,包括提高速度、增强质量、改善市场响应能力和更好的开发者体验,同时确保关键的人工监督和协作。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Autodesk's ML Inference Optimization: Leveraging AWS AI Chips (SPS201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Autodesk的机器学习推理优化：利用AWS AI芯片 (SPS201)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Autodesk partnered with AWS Generative AI Innovation Center to optimize spatial GenAI models using Inferentia and Trainium chips. This collaboration reduced latency by 45% and improved price-per-inference by 62% across workflows generating 3D objects and CAD sketch constraints. Explore Autodesk's migration journey, including strategies for implementing custom kernels via the Neuron Kernel Interface. Discover the sustainability benefits and economic advantages of adopting custom silicon, from reduced carbon emissions to optimized infrastructure costs.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解Autodesk如何与AWS生成式AI创新中心合作，使用Inferentia和Trainium芯片优化空间生成式AI模型。此次合作将延迟降低了45%，在生成3D对象和CAD草图约束的工作流程中，每次推理的价格性能提升了62%。探索Autodesk的迁移历程，包括通过Neuron内核接口实现自定义内核的策略。了解采用定制芯片的可持续性优势和经济效益，从减少碳排放到优化基础设施成本。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Deep Dive into Deloitte's Amazon Neptune GenAI Security Intelligence Center
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 深入探讨德勤的Amazon Neptune GenAI安全智能中心
sessions.abstract: To adapt to an ever-changing threat landscape, effective cybersecurity must align policy interpretation, operational enforcement, and real-time metrics in a continuous feedback loop. Generative AI has a large role to play in retrieving relevant data and coordinating and adapting this complex task across a disparate set of tools and information sources. In this session you will learn about different options for developing GraphRAG capabilities using Amazon Neptune that supply highly relevant connected data to agentic workflows, and how Deloitte used the AWS GraphRAG Toolkit to build a Security Intelligence Center that produces predictive security guidance based on timely organizational context.
sessions.abstract_cn: 为了适应不断变化的威胁环境，有效的网络安全必须在持续反馈循环中协调政策解释、运营执行和实时指标。生成式AI在检索相关数据以及协调和适应这一复杂任务方面发挥着重要作用，涉及不同的工具和信息源。在本次会议中，您将了解使用Amazon Neptune开发GraphRAG功能的不同选项，这些功能为代理工作流提供高度相关的连接数据，以及德勤如何使用AWS GraphRAG工具包构建安全智能中心，基于及时的组织上下文生成预测性安全指导。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagining Public Sector with AWS Partner generative AI solutions (WPS203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用AWS合作伙伴生成式AI解决方案重新构想公共部门 (WPS203)
sessions.abstract: Generative AI is reshaping how public sector organizations deliver on their missions. In this session, discover practical approaches to adopting GenAI securely and effectively, guided by solutions from AWS Partners. We’ll explore four key pathways: weaving AI securely into your organization, preventing data loss with trusted controls, accelerating adoption through embedded AI, and solving complex business problems with partner-built solutions. Whether you’re just getting started or looking to scale, you’ll gain a roadmap for harnessing generative AI to drive impact across your agency or institution.
sessions.abstract_cn: 生成式人工智能正在重塑公共部门组织履行其使命的方式。在本次会议中，您将了解在AWS合作伙伴解决方案的指导下，安全有效地采用生成式AI的实用方法。我们将探讨四个关键路径：将AI安全地融入您的组织、通过可信控制防止数据丢失、通过嵌入式AI加速采用，以及利用合作伙伴构建的解决方案解决复杂的业务问题。无论您是刚刚起步还是希望扩大规模，您都将获得一份路线图，帮助您利用生成式AI在您的机构或组织中推动影响力。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Advanced multicloud cost reporting with FOCUS (COP419)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 FOCUS 进行高级多云成本报告 (COP419)
sessions.abstract: In this interactive code talk, we'll dive into adopting the FinOps Open Cost and Usage Specification (FOCUS) for unified cloud cost reporting. Participants will learn how to overcome cross-cloud reporting challenges, implement the FOCUS data model, query FOCUS data and visualize the data across multiple providers using FOCUS's standardized schema. Leave with working code samples and practical strategies to implement FOCUS in your organization, enabling true financial transparency across your multicloud environment.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在这个互动代码讲座中，我们将深入探讨如何采用FinOps开放成本和使用规范（FOCUS）来实现统一的云成本报告。参与者将学习如何克服跨云报告挑战，实施FOCUS数据模型，查询FOCUS数据，并使用FOCUS的标准化架构在多个提供商之间可视化数据。您将获得可用的代码示例和实用策略来在您的组织中实施FOCUS，从而在您的多云环境中实现真正的财务透明度。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond EHR: Leveraging AWS for Maximum Clinical and Operational Impact (IND213)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越电子健康记录：利用AWS实现最大临床和运营影响 (IND213)
sessions.abstract: Successful EHR hosting on AWS has become standard practice, as evidenced by AWS' 2025 Best in KLAS rating for public cloud. This session features two innovative health systems demonstrating how they've moved beyond basic EHR implementation to create competitive advantages with AWS. Leaders will share strategies for moving past "lift-and-shift" to drive meaningful innovation by leveraging cloud-native solutions, extending EHR functionality, and developing unique patient and provider experiences. Through real-world examples, attendees will learn practical approaches to healthcare innovation, value creation frameworks, and implementation insights. Designed for technology leaders, digital strategists, and clinical innovation teams seeking to differentiate their organizations.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在AWS上成功托管EHR已成为标准实践，AWS在2025年KLAS公有云评级中获得最佳评级即为证明。本次会议将展示两个创新型医疗系统如何超越基本的EHR实施，利用AWS创造竞争优势。领导者将分享超越"直接迁移"的策略，通过利用云原生解决方案、扩展EHR功能以及开发独特的患者和医疗服务提供者体验来推动有意义的创新。通过实际案例，与会者将学习医疗创新的实用方法、价值创造框架和实施见解。本会议专为寻求使其组织脱颖而出的技术领导者、数字战略师和临床创新团队设计。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Automatic Enterprise ML with Amazon SageMaker and Nextworld (SMB201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon SageMaker 和 Nextworld 实现自动化企业机器学习 (SMB201)
sessions.abstract: Machine learning has long helped businesses make smarter decisions, but it’s traditionally required data scientists, long development cycles, and heavy investment to deploy and maintain. In this session, see how business users can now build powerful AI models to solve problems like supply chain optimization or cash flow forecasting in hours instead of weeks. By combining Nextworld's enterprise-grade, AI-native application platform with Amazon SageMaker AutoML, organizations cut development time by up to 95%, democratize access to AI for non-technical roles, and solve critical business challenges faster.
sessions.abstract_cn: 机器学习长期以来一直帮助企业做出更明智的决策，但传统上需要数据科学家、漫长的开发周期以及大量投资来部署和维护。在本次会议中，了解业务用户现在如何能够在数小时而非数周内构建强大的AI模型来解决供应链优化或现金流预测等问题。通过将Nextworld的企业级AI原生应用平台与Amazon SageMaker AutoML相结合，组织可以将开发时间缩短高达95%，为非技术角色普及AI访问权限，并更快地解决关键业务挑战。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Redefining Operations: Caterpillar's Geospatial Intelligence Solution (IND322)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 重新定义运营：卡特彼勒的地理空间智能解决方案 (IND322)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Caterpillar's innovative GIS solution is revolutionizing construction and mining operations through advanced geospatial intelligence. By integrating real-time data from 20,000+ connected assets, this cloud-native platform delivers terrain modeling with 2-centimeter precision. The system combines sensor data, from ground elevation to equipment activity, with drone-generated surface scans, enabling data-driven decisions that optimize operations and enhance safety. This scalable solution minimizes infrastructure overhead while ensuring robust security and compliance. Learn how this intelligent ecosystem helps customers reduce rework, improve resource utilization, and gain competitive advantage in the heavy equipment industry.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解卡特彼勒创新的GIS解决方案如何通过先进的地理空间智能革命性地改变建筑和采矿作业。通过整合来自20,000多个互联资产的实时数据，这个云原生平台提供精度达2厘米的地形建模。该系统将从地面高程到设备活动的传感器数据与无人机生成的表面扫描相结合，实现数据驱动的决策，优化作业并增强安全性。这个可扩展的解决方案最大限度地减少基础设施开销，同时确保强大的安全性和合规性。了解这个智能生态系统如何帮助客户减少返工，提高资源利用率，并在重型设备行业获得竞争优势。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Leo: Building a Low Earth Orbit Satellite Network on AWS (AMZ302)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Leo：在AWS上构建低地球轨道卫星网络 (AMZ302)
sessions.abstract: Join us as we explore the cutting-edge Amazon Leo (fka Project Kuiper) internet service, designed to deliver low-latency, high-bandwidth connectivity to customers worldwide. Amazon Leo has harnessed the power of AWS Regions and the global backbone, unlocking unique capabilities to meet the demanding telco and networking requirements of this ambitious project. In this session, we'll dive into the innovative Amazon Leo architecture, its seamless integration with AWS infrastructure, and the intricate details involved in building a truly global network – spanning both space and the ground. Discover how AWS empowers Amazon Leo to revolutionize global connectivity, bringing the world closer together.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们，探索前沿的Amazon Leo（前称Project Kuiper）互联网服务，该服务旨在为全球客户提供低延迟、高带宽连接。Amazon Leo利用AWS区域和全球骨干网的强大功能，释放独特能力以满足这一雄心勃勃项目的严苛电信和网络要求。在本次会议中，我们将深入探讨创新的Amazon Leo架构、其与AWS基础设施的无缝集成，以及构建真正全球网络所涉及的复杂细节——跨越太空和地面。了解AWS如何赋能Amazon Leo革新全球连接，让世界更加紧密相连。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Hybrid connectivity at scale: A deep dive into AWS Direct Connect (NET403)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模混合连接：深入探讨 AWS Direct Connect (NET403)
sessions.abstract: Unlock the full potential of AWS Direct Connect in this advanced technical deep dive. In this session, explore both dedicated and hosted connections, Virtual Interfaces (VIFs), and BGP routing optimization for predictable bandwidth and reduced data transfer costs. Learn from experts about complex architectures including Direct Connect Gateway for multi-Region connectivity, LAG configurations for redundancy, and capabilities such as AWS Direct Connect SiteLink. After diving into advanced features like MACsec encryption and cross-connect processes, attendees will gain insights into troubleshooting methodologies, performance optimization, and integration patterns with AWS Transit Gateway and AWS Cloud WAN.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在这个高级技术深度解析中释放AWS Direct Connect的全部潜力。在本次会议中，探索专用和托管连接、虚拟接口(VIF)以及BGP路由优化，以实现可预测的带宽和降低数据传输成本。向专家学习复杂架构，包括用于多区域连接的Direct Connect网关、用于冗余的LAG配置，以及AWS Direct Connect SiteLink等功能。在深入了解MACsec加密和交叉连接流程等高级功能后，与会者将获得故障排除方法、性能优化以及与AWS Transit Gateway和AWS Cloud WAN集成模式的见解。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From threat to threat intel: 360 degrees of DDOS (NET318)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从威胁到威胁情报：DDoS 攻击的 360 度防护 (NET318)
sessions.abstract: Discover how AWS protects web applications at scale by analyzing billions of data points to detect attacks and automatically update defenses. Through real-world case studies, learn how CloudFront, ELB, Shield, and WAF uses threat intelligence to distinguish legitimate traffic from malicious requests while maintaining performance. Hear from Figma on how they leverage AWS’s global threat monitoring network for real-time DDoS protection to ensure business continuity and resilient web delivery. Walk away with actionable insights to safeguard your applications against sophisticated threats.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解AWS如何通过分析数十亿数据点来检测攻击并自动更新防御措施，从而大规模保护Web应用程序。通过真实案例研究，学习CloudFront、ELB、Shield和WAF如何使用威胁情报来区分合法流量和恶意请求，同时保持性能。听取Figma关于如何利用AWS全球威胁监控网络进行实时DDoS防护以确保业务连续性和弹性Web交付的经验分享。带走可操作的见解，保护您的应用程序免受复杂威胁。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Revolutionize media production: Field-ready cloud solutions (AMZ307)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 革新媒体制作：现场就绪的云解决方案 (AMZ307)
sessions.abstract: Get a behind-the-scenes peek at how Amazon MGM Studios leverages AWS to optimize film and TV production workflows, reduce costs, and even lower their carbon footprint. Discover how the studio modernizes legacy workflows across the content lifecycle, from live cloud production with 40+ cameras to an innovative "Media to Cloud from Anywhere" solution using a modified electric Rivian vehicle, solar-powered trailer, and mobile internet to upload camera files directly to Amazon S3. Learn practical patterns for reinventing legacy workflows with AWS. Perfect for media professionals, technical leaders, and anyone interested in future media workflows. Register today!
sessions.abstract_cn: 深入了解亚马逊米高梅工作室如何利用AWS优化影视制作工作流程、降低成本，甚至减少碳足迹。探索工作室如何在整个内容生命周期中实现传统工作流程的现代化，从使用40多台摄像机的实时云制作，到创新的"随时随地媒体上云"解决方案——使用改装的电动Rivian车辆、太阳能拖车和移动互联网将摄像机文件直接上传到Amazon S3。学习使用AWS重塑传统工作流程的实用模式。非常适合媒体专业人士、技术领导者以及任何对未来媒体工作流程感兴趣的人。立即注册！

presenter.name: Greg Young
presenter.title: Head of Production and Post Production Technology

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI Code to Production: Context Matters (NTA404)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI代码到生产：上下文很重要 (NTA404)
sessions.abstract: Why does AI-generated code break in production? Missing context. This interactive Code Talk transforms basic AI outputs into robust AWS solutions through strategic context injection. Watch live coding evolve generic "create an API" prompts into production-ready serverless architecture. Discover how business context, technical constraints, and AWS best practices dramatically improve AI results. Learn how development teams are shifting from code reviewers to context architects. Leave with actionable frameworks for prompt engineering, quality gates, and team dynamics that transform AI from development liability into strategic AWS advantage. Stop fighting AI-generated code—start directing it.
sessions.abstract_cn: 为什么AI生成的代码在生产环境中会出现问题？缺少上下文。这个交互式代码讲座通过战略性上下文注入，将基础AI输出转化为强大的AWS解决方案。观看实时编码如何将通用的"创建API"提示演变为生产就绪的无服务器架构。了解业务上下文、技术约束和AWS最佳实践如何显著改善AI结果。学习开发团队如何从代码审查者转变为上下文架构师。带走可操作的提示工程框架、质量门控和团队动态，将AI从开发负担转化为战略性AWS优势。停止与AI生成的代码作斗争——开始引导它。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming SAP with AWS AI services: AxFood and Harman’s AI journey (MAM214)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用AWS AI服务转型SAP：AxFood和Harman的AI之旅 (MAM214)
sessions.abstract: As artificial intelligence (AI) continues to revolutionize enterprise operations, SAP customers like AxFood and Harman International are harnessing the power of AWS's cutting-edge  AI capabilities to revolutionize enterprise operations. This session explores the transformative potential of integrating AWS's AI innovations with SAP ecosystems to drive unprecedented levels of efficiency, creativity, and user engagement.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着人工智能（AI）持续革新企业运营，像AxFood和Harman International这样的SAP客户正在利用AWS前沿AI能力的力量来革新企业运营。本次会议探讨了将AWS的AI创新与SAP生态系统集成的变革潜力，以推动效率、创造力和用户参与度达到前所未有的水平。

presenter.name: Erik Kamman
presenter.title: Head of WW Solution Architecture, SAP GTM

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building a Secure Foundation for SAP RISE and Non-SAP Workload (NTA318)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为 SAP RISE 和非 SAP 工作负载构建安全基础 (NTA318)
sessions.abstract: Discover how global enterprises successfully migrate SAP RISE and non-SAP workloads to AWS. This session explores the critical foundational aspects of AWS cloud migration, showcasing the implementation of a multi-account strategy that optimizes security and resource management.You'll learn how to build a secure landing zone, set up comprehensive backups, and establish integrated Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) capabilities.Learn how these key elements formed the backbone of AWS cloud migration, supporting both SAP and non-SAP ecosystems. You'll gain insights into overcoming challenges and implementing strategies that can accelerate AWS cloud adoption.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解全球企业如何成功将SAP RISE和非SAP工作负载迁移到AWS。本次会议探讨AWS云迁移的关键基础方面，展示多账户策略的实施，以优化安全性和资源管理。您将学习如何构建安全的着陆区、设置全面的备份以及建立集成的安全信息和事件管理(SIEM)功能。了解这些关键要素如何构成AWS云迁移的支柱，支持SAP和非SAP生态系统。您将获得克服挑战和实施策略的见解，从而加速AWS云采用。

presenter.name: Syafili Lie
presenter.title: Head of Solutions Architecture, Canada Enterprise Greenfield

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Agentic Code Generation for Industrial Analytics & Predictive Maintenance-PEX320
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 工业分析和预测性维护的智能体代码生成 - PEX320
sessions.abstract: Plant floor personnel face daily challenges monitoring critical equipment in real-time. While they possess deep operational expertise, they depend on IT teams for monitoring solutions and complex data analysis - creating delays and inefficiencies. Through live coding demonstrations, this session shows how Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Code Interpreter and Strands Agents enable operations teams to ask 'Analyze our motor's vibration patterns for maintenance scheduling' and watch the system generate and execute Python code using pandas, scipy, and scikit-learn for predictive analytics. We'll demonstrate IoT SiteWise data retrieval, AI-generated analytics, and MCP tools for work order creation - transforming natural language into executable machine learning that closes the operational loop without requiring data science expertise.
sessions.abstract_cn: 车间人员在实时监控关键设备方面面临日常挑战。虽然他们拥有深厚的运营专业知识，但依赖IT团队提供监控解决方案和复杂数据分析——造成延迟和低效。通过现场编码演示，本次会议展示Amazon Bedrock AgentCore代码解释器和Strands代理如何使运营团队能够询问"分析我们电机的振动模式以制定维护计划"，并观看系统使用pandas、scipy和scikit-learn生成并执行Python代码进行预测分析。我们将演示IoT SiteWise数据检索、AI生成的分析以及用于创建工单的MCP工具——将自然语言转换为可执行的机器学习，在不需要数据科学专业知识的情况下闭合运营循环。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Universal data connectivity with ETL and SQL queries (ANT209)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 ETL 和 SQL 查询实现通用数据连接 (ANT209)
sessions.abstract: Learn how AWS can help you with data integration and preparing data for analytics, machine learning (ML) and generative AI workloads. Explore new capabilities that enable your users to have controlled access to all relevant data, easily build and maintain scalable and resilient data pipelines, and enhance decision-making quality,all with exceptional price performance. See how zero-ETL and query federation can complement ETL and ELT data pipelines.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 AWS 如何帮助您进行数据集成并为分析、机器学习 (ML) 和生成式 AI 工作负载准备数据。探索新功能，使您的用户能够对所有相关数据进行受控访问，轻松构建和维护可扩展且具有弹性的数据管道，并提高决策质量，同时实现卓越的性价比。了解零 ETL 和查询联合如何补充 ETL 和 ELT 数据管道。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon S3 performance: Architecture, design, and optimization (STG335)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon S3 性能：架构、设计与优化 (STG335)
sessions.abstract: Go behind the scenes of Amazon S3 performance architecture while learning practical optimization strategies. We'll explore how S3's internal systems manage massive throughput, handle concurrent requests, and balance loads across its distributed infrastructure. Dive deep into the technical foundations - from request routing and partitioning strategies to caching mechanisms - that enable S3 to power demanding workloads like real-time analytics and ML training. You'll learn how to leverage this architectural understanding to make informed storage class selections, implement performance-enhancing patterns, and design applications that maximize S3's capabilities.
sessions.abstract_cn: 深入了解 Amazon S3 性能架构的幕后机制，同时学习实用的优化策略。我们将探讨 S3 的内部系统如何管理海量吞吐量、处理并发请求以及在其分布式基础设施中平衡负载。深入研究技术基础——从请求路由和分区策略到缓存机制——这些技术使 S3 能够支持实时分析和机器学习训练等高要求工作负载。您将学习如何利用这种架构理解来做出明智的存储类选择、实施性能增强模式，并设计能够最大化发挥 S3 能力的应用程序。

presenter.name: Devabrat Kumar
presenter.title: Principal Product Manager Technical - External Services

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modern SFTP: Deploy AWS Transfer Family, Identity, and Automation (STG419)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 现代化 SFTP：部署 AWS Transfer Family、身份验证和自动化 (STG419)
sessions.abstract: Learn to build enterprise-grade file transfer solutions using AWS Transfer Family with automated workflows and Infrastructure as Code using Terraform. This session covers building secure SFTP servers, integrating with enterprise identity providers like Okta and Azure AD, and automating file processing workflows such as security scanning with GuardDuty and leveraging agentic AI to transform business processes. Perfect for organizations looking to modernize their managed file transfer systems while maintaining security and compliance. Walk away with practical templates and patterns for implementing enterprise-grade file transfer solutions.
sessions.abstract_cn: 学习使用AWS Transfer Family构建企业级文件传输解决方案，包含自动化工作流程和使用Terraform的基础设施即代码。本课程涵盖构建安全的SFTP服务器、与Okta和Azure AD等企业身份提供商集成，以及自动化文件处理工作流程，如使用GuardDuty进行安全扫描和利用智能AI代理转换业务流程。非常适合希望在保持安全性和合规性的同时实现托管文件传输系统现代化的组织。您将获得实施企业级文件传输解决方案的实用模板和模式。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AgenticAI: Industry-Driven Architecture Excellence (NTA203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AgenticAI：行业驱动的架构卓越 (NTA203)
sessions.abstract: Discover how industry-specific requirements shape architectural patterns for effective Agentic AI implementations. This session explores how tailored architectural frameworks address unique challenges in healthcare, finance, manufacturing, and logistics. Through real-world use cases, learn the critical design considerations that drive innovation across sectors. Attendees will gain practical knowledge of implementation strategies that unlock Agentic AI's transformative potential, enabling them to apply these architectural patterns within their own industries.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索行业特定需求如何塑造有效代理AI实施的架构模式。本次会议探讨定制化架构框架如何应对医疗保健、金融、制造和物流领域的独特挑战。通过真实世界用例，了解推动各行业创新的关键设计考量。与会者将获得实施策略的实用知识，释放代理AI的变革潜力，使他们能够在自己的行业中应用这些架构模式。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - kro: Simplifying Kubernetes Resource Orchestration (OPN308)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - kro：简化 Kubernetes 资源编排 (OPN308)
sessions.abstract: Discover kro, the open source tool revolutionizing Kubernetes resource management through configuration-based orchestration. Learn how this vendor-neutral solution eliminates custom coding needs through Simple Schema and CEL expressions, making complex resource dependencies manageable for teams of all sizes. We'll demonstrate how kro transforms Kubernetes into a centralized platform that accelerates developer velocity, improves fleet management and streamlines infrastructure deployment while maintaining organizational best practices and governance.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索 kro，这个开源工具通过基于配置的编排彻底改变了 Kubernetes 资源管理。了解这个供应商中立的解决方案如何通过 Simple Schema 和 CEL 表达式消除自定义编码需求，使各种规模的团队都能轻松管理复杂的资源依赖关系。我们将演示 kro 如何将 Kubernetes 转变为一个集中式平台，加速开发者效率，改进集群管理并简化基础设施部署，同时保持组织最佳实践和治理。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Solution-based selling strategies in AWS Marketplace (PEX110)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Marketplace 中基于解决方案的销售策略 (PEX110)
sessions.abstract: Learn about new selling capabilities in AWS Marketplace. This session explores best practices for selling comprehensive solutions, including real-world patterns, contract structures, and technical considerations. Discover how to maximize your AWS Marketplace presence and streamline customer procurement through effective solution-based strategies.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 AWS Marketplace 中的新销售功能。本课程探讨销售综合解决方案的最佳实践，包括实际应用模式、合同结构和技术考虑因素。了解如何最大化您的 AWS Marketplace 影响力，并通过有效的基于解决方案的策略简化客户采购流程。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - What Anthropic Learned Building AI Agents in 2025 (AIM277)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Anthropic在2025年构建AI智能体的经验总结 (AIM277)
sessions.abstract: 2025 was the year AI agents went from demos to production. In this session, we share what Anthropic discovered building Claude Code and working alongside customers deploying agents at scale throughout the year. We'll examine how AI engineering practices evolved, then dive deep into the patterns that keep agents reliable across hours of autonomous work: context engineering, skills, and our newest frontier model Opus 4.5. Finally, we'll look ahead at the trends we believe will define the next wave of agentic AI. This presentation is brought to you by Anthropic, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 2025年是AI智能体从演示转向生产的一年。在本次会议中，我们分享Anthropic在构建Claude Code以及与客户合作在全年大规模部署智能体过程中的发现。我们将探讨AI工程实践如何演进，然后深入研究让智能体在数小时自主工作中保持可靠的模式：上下文工程、技能以及我们最新的前沿模型Opus 4.5。最后，我们将展望我们认为将定义下一波智能体AI的趋势。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Anthropic为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic Analytics in Action (AIM295)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 代理分析实战 (AIM295)
sessions.abstract: Analytics and data science are at an inflection point. The first wave of agentic analytics—HITL (human-in-the-loop), goal-driven agentic AI systems that reason, plan, execute and learn across data and models—is coming to life, delivering massive value by accelerating decision velocity in organizations. In this session, ZS MAX.AI presents real-world examples of organizations using agentic forecasting, segmentation, content intelligence, on-demand customer analytics and more. We will explore the power of AWS to deploy these new-age agentic analytics systems to unlock value through specific use cases and tackle key challenges including enterprise enablement, scaling and domain customization. This presentation is brought to you by ZS, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 分析和数据科学正处于拐点。第一波代理分析——HITL（人在回路中）、目标驱动的代理AI系统，能够跨数据和模型进行推理、规划、执行和学习——正在成为现实，通过加速组织中的决策速度来创造巨大价值。在本次会议中，ZS MAX.AI展示了组织使用代理预测、细分、内容智能、按需客户分析等的真实案例。我们将探索AWS部署这些新时代代理分析系统的强大能力，通过具体用例释放价值，并解决包括企业赋能、扩展和领域定制在内的关键挑战。本演示由AWS合作伙伴ZS为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Protect your data with AWS Backup: overview, use cases and what's new (STG207)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Backup 保护您的数据：概述、使用案例和新功能 (STG207)
sessions.abstract: AWS Backup helps over 140,000 customers protect more than 2.9 exabytes of application data across AWS services. It offers policy-based data protection, streamlining backup management, enhancing security controls, and simplifying compliance reporting. In this session, you'll learn how to use AWS Backup, hear what's new, and discover practical implementation strategies. Plus, hear directly from customers about their real-world experiences using AWS Backup to protect mission-critical workloads and maintain business continuity. Whether you're new to AWS Backup or a seasoned user, this session will provide valuable insights into protecting your AWS environment.
sessions.abstract_cn: AWS Backup 帮助超过 140,000 名客户保护跨 AWS 服务的超过 2.9 艾字节的应用程序数据。它提供基于策略的数据保护，简化备份管理，增强安全控制，并简化合规性报告。在本次会议中，您将学习如何使用 AWS Backup，了解最新功能，并发现实用的实施策略。此外，您还将直接听取客户关于使用 AWS Backup 保护关键任务工作负载和维护业务连续性的实际经验。无论您是 AWS Backup 的新用户还是经验丰富的用户，本次会议都将为保护您的 AWS 环境提供宝贵的见解。

presenter.name: Rooshir Patel
presenter.title: Managing Director, General Manager - Data Protection & Recovery Product Line

presenter.name: Chuck Uwanna
presenter.title: Principal Application Architect - Strategy and Modernization

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Securing the AI Era: From Hype to Real-World Defense (AIM106)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 保护AI时代：从炒作到现实世界防御 (AIM106)
sessions.abstract: As organizations race to embrace AI, the question is no longer if AI will transform security and business operations, but how leaders can harness it responsibly and effectively. This session explores the latest attacker innovations powered by AI, and the defensive strategies security teams must adopt to stay ahead. You’ll gain insight into the real-world challenges enterprises face in managing AI risk, balancing productivity with protection, and ensuring trust in rapidly evolving systems. Through practical examples and forward-looking analysis, we’ll cut through the hype to reveal the tangible ways AI is reshaping cybersecurity and enterprise resilience. This presentation is brought to you by Zscaler, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着组织竞相拥抱人工智能，问题不再是人工智能是否会改变安全和业务运营，而是领导者如何负责任且有效地利用它。本次会议探讨了由人工智能驱动的最新攻击者创新，以及安全团队必须采用的防御策略以保持领先地位。您将深入了解企业在管理人工智能风险、平衡生产力与保护以及确保快速发展系统中的信任方面面临的现实挑战。通过实际案例和前瞻性分析，我们将透过炒作揭示人工智能重塑网络安全和企业韧性的具体方式。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Zscaler为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Autonomous AI agents you can truly trust (AIM234)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 您可以真正信任的自主 AI 代理 (AIM234)
sessions.abstract: Learn how to power accurate and trusted agents at scale with AI-ready data and governance. This presentation is brought to you by IBM, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何利用 AI 就绪数据和治理来大规模支持准确可信的智能体。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 IBM 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Kiro: Your agentic IDE for spec-driven development (DVT209)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Kiro：您的智能代理 IDE，用于规范驱动开发 (DVT209)
sessions.abstract: In this session, learn how Kiro is helping you go from idea to production faster with spec-driven development. Learn how to delagate and automate development tasks using Kiro's agent hooks, multimodal agent chat and MCP support. We'll show you how Kiro’s agents challenge you to think beyond the code and work alongside you to solve hard engineering problems with confidence.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，了解 Kiro 如何通过规范驱动开发帮助您更快地从想法到生产。学习如何使用 Kiro 的代理钩子、多模态代理聊天和 MCP 支持来委托和自动化开发任务。我们将向您展示 Kiro 的代理如何挑战您超越代码思考，并与您一起自信地解决复杂的工程问题。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Service-oriented builders guide to agentic AI: Insights from WEX (ARC313)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 面向服务的构建者代理AI指南：来自WEX的洞察 (ARC313)
sessions.abstract: Large language models and agentic tools have reached enterprise viability, with Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) principles providing the foundation for robust agentic systems. This session examines which SOA design principles translate directly to generative AI implementations and which require rethinking for agent orchestration and nondeterministic behaviors. Learn architectural patterns for secure AI service integration, tools for enterprise-scale agent deployment, and techniques for building agents that work seamlessly with existing ecosystems. WEX demonstrates how extending SOA into the agentic domain enables generative AI solutions to deliver enterprise-grade operational support at scale. Gain practical insights into combining SOA best practices with modern AI architecture requirements.
sessions.abstract_cn: 大型语言模型和智能体工具已达到企业可行性，面向服务架构（SOA）原则为构建稳健的智能体系统提供了基础。本次会议探讨哪些SOA设计原则可直接应用于生成式AI实现，哪些需要针对智能体编排和非确定性行为进行重新思考。学习安全AI服务集成的架构模式、企业级智能体部署工具，以及构建与现有生态系统无缝协作的智能体的技术。WEX演示如何将SOA扩展到智能体领域，使生成式AI解决方案能够大规模提供企业级运营支持。获得将SOA最佳实践与现代AI架构要求相结合的实用见解。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate code delivery: Dev containers and Amazon Q Developer  (SPS324)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 加速代码交付：开发容器和 Amazon Q Developer (SPS324)
sessions.abstract: Explore advanced integration patterns between development containers, Amazon Q Developer, and validation tools to accelerate AWS infrastructure development. Through live coding, learn how containers enable consistent AI-assisted coding while automatically implementing security controls and quality gates in your IDE. See practical examples of container-based validation tools and discover how this approach transforms development practices. Leave the session with hands-on experience building secure, high-quality AWS solutions integrating AI and container technologies.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索开发容器、Amazon Q Developer 和验证工具之间的高级集成模式，以加速 AWS 基础设施开发。通过实时编码，了解容器如何实现一致的 AI 辅助编码，同时在 IDE 中自动实施安全控制和质量门禁。查看基于容器的验证工具的实际示例，并了解这种方法如何改变开发实践。带着构建集成 AI 和容器技术的安全、高质量 AWS 解决方案的实践经验离开会议。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Hesitate and You’re History: Why You Need Agentic AI Right Now (AIM246)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 犹豫不决就会被淘汰：为什么您现在就需要智能体AI (AIM246)
sessions.abstract: Agentic AI is no longer hype — it’s the next battleground for growth. Winning means the ability to create autonomous, goal-oriented systems and wield data effectively. Companies that execute will outpace the competition; those that don’t will be left behind explaining why they hesitated ... if they’re around at all. Join Ingersoll Rand to discover how they’re using Qlik® to accelerate insights, sharpen AI-driven decisions, and increase productivity — delivering real competitive advantage today while fulfilling their strategic vision of tomorrow’s AI-powered analytics. This presentation is brought to you by Qlik, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 代理AI不再是炒作——它是增长的下一个战场。获胜意味着能够创建自主的、目标导向的系统并有效利用数据。执行到位的公司将超越竞争对手；那些不这样做的公司将被甩在后面，解释他们为什么犹豫不决……如果他们还存在的话。加入英格索兰，了解他们如何使用Qlik®加速洞察、提升AI驱动的决策并提高生产力——在实现明天AI驱动分析战略愿景的同时，今天就提供真正的竞争优势。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Qlik为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Ops in the AI age: Innovating together for faster, more efficient operations
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI时代的运维：携手创新，实现更快速、更高效的运营
sessions.abstract: The rise of generative and agentic AI is transforming how organizations build, operate, and secure applications. As systems become increasingly autonomous and complex, intelligent operations are essential. Join us to discover how AWS Cloud Operations continues to innovate—helping you monitor AI agents wherever deployed, operate smarter across environments, and unlock insights through accelerated analytics. Explore AWS-native and managed open-source observability providing visibility into distributed AI systems. Experience faster querying and automated incident report generation for complex problem-solving. Through customer stories and demos, discover proven patterns for transforming operations to be more intelligent, secure, and efficient.
sessions.abstract_cn: 生成式和智能体AI的兴起正在改变组织构建、运营和保护应用程序的方式。随着系统变得越来越自主和复杂，智能运营变得至关重要。加入我们，了解AWS云运营如何持续创新——帮助您监控部署在任何地方的AI智能体，跨环境更智能地运营，并通过加速分析解锁洞察。探索AWS原生和托管开源可观测性，为分布式AI系统提供可见性。体验更快的查询和自动化事件报告生成，用于复杂问题解决。通过客户案例和演示，发现将运营转变为更智能、更安全、更高效的经验证模式。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernizing Global Payment Processing: Moving from Mainframe to AWS (SPS312)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 现代化全球支付处理：从大型机迁移到AWS (SPS312)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Global Payments is transforming its 40-year-old mainframe system into a modern AWS cloud platform. This major financial services company, which processes credit cards for over 600 million cardholders worldwide, is using enhanced support and monitoring tools to ensure a reliable transition to cloud-based processing.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解Global Payments如何将其拥有40年历史的大型机系统转型为现代化的AWS云平台。这家大型金融服务公司为全球超过6亿持卡人处理信用卡业务，正在使用增强的支持和监控工具来确保可靠地过渡到基于云的处理系统。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Lessons from leaders: Turn AI agents into business value (API102)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 领导者的经验教训：将AI代理转化为商业价值 (API102)
sessions.abstract: Drive value in agentic AI with the right data and AI capabilities to extract the full potential of agents at scale. This presentation is brought to you by IBM, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 通过正确的数据和AI能力在智能体AI中创造价值，充分挖掘大规模智能体的潜力。本演示由AWS合作伙伴IBM为您呈现。

presenter.name: Shailender Gupta
presenter.title: Global Head - Cloud Infra, Reporting, and Analytics

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Automating Certificate Management with Exportable Public Certificates (SEC322)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用可导出公共证书自动化证书管理 (SEC322)
sessions.abstract: Discover how to automate TLS certificate management using AWS Certificate Manager's exportable public certificates. We'll demonstrate an end-to-end automation framework utilizing AWS services like EventBridge, Lambda, Step Functions, and Systems Manager for certificate issuance, export, distribution, and renewal across diverse environments. Learn to implement automated deployment workflows, set up monitoring and notifications for certificate lifecycle events, and ensure seamless updates across EC2 instances, on-premises servers, and multi-cloud setups. By attending, you'll gain the skills to eliminate manual certificate management tasks and minimize the risk of certificate-related outages in your organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何使用AWS Certificate Manager的可导出公共证书自动化TLS证书管理。我们将演示一个端到端自动化框架，利用EventBridge、Lambda、Step Functions和Systems Manager等AWS服务进行证书颁发、导出、分发和跨不同环境的续期。学习实施自动化部署工作流，为证书生命周期事件设置监控和通知，并确保在EC2实例、本地服务器和多云设置中无缝更新。通过参与，您将获得消除手动证书管理任务并最小化组织中证书相关中断风险的技能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build autonomous code improvement agents with Amazon Nova 2 Lite (AIM429)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Nova 2 Lite 构建自主代码改进代理 (AIM429)
sessions.abstract: Dive deep into the reasoning capabilities of Amazon Nova 2 Lite to create intelligent agents that understand and improve your codebase autonomously. Watch live coding to learn practical implementation patterns, architectural considerations for long-horizon agentic workflows, and how to transform manual code maintenance into intelligent, automated engineering solutions.
sessions.abstract_cn: 深入探索 Amazon Nova 2 Lite 的推理能力，创建能够自主理解和改进代码库的智能代理。通过实时编程学习实用的实现模式、长期代理工作流的架构考虑，以及如何将手动代码维护转变为智能化、自动化的工程解决方案。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Implementing observability at scale: A blueprint for success (COP328)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模实施可观测性：成功蓝图 (COP328)
sessions.abstract: Achieving comprehensive observability to ensure optimal performance, reliability, and user experience is crucial for businesses. In this session, we will explore best practices for collecting and analyzing metrics, traces, and logs across your AWS environments. Discover techniques for streamlining agent management, optimizing alerting, and enabling cross-account observability. Learn how to reduce operational overhead while gaining deeper visibility into your applications' performance and health in a cost-optimized manner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 实现全面的可观测性以确保最佳性能、可靠性和用户体验对企业至关重要。在本次会议中，我们将探讨在AWS环境中收集和分析指标、链路追踪和日志的最佳实践。了解简化代理管理、优化告警以及启用跨账户可观测性的技术。学习如何在降低运营开销的同时，以成本优化的方式更深入地了解应用程序的性能和健康状况。

presenter.name: Alex Livingstone
presenter.title: Principal Specialist Solutions Architect, Cloud Operations

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon GameLift Streams Powers Bandai Namco Entertainment's Metaverse (IND394)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon GameLift Streams 助力万代南梦宫娱乐的元宇宙 (IND394)
sessions.abstract: Bandai Namco Entertainment built their Gundam metaverse into a globally scalable cloud streaming platform using Amazon GameLift Streams, serving 20+ countries with browser-based access. This session explores achieving minimal session startup times and cost efficiency through dynamic capacity management across 6 AWS regions with real-time demand optimization. The presentation covers multi-runtime architecture designed to enable both high-performance metaverse experiences and instant browser-based access, as well as network performance visualization. Additionally, we'll showcase Amazon integration that create immersive shopping experiences within the metaverse, bridging virtual and physical commerce. Attendees will gain insights into dynamic scaling strategies and multi-region deployment.
sessions.abstract_cn: 万代南梦宫娱乐使用 Amazon GameLift Streams 将其高达元宇宙构建为全球可扩展的云流媒体平台,通过基于浏览器的访问方式服务于 20 多个国家。本次会议探讨如何通过跨 6 个 AWS 区域的动态容量管理和实时需求优化来实现最短的会话启动时间和成本效益。演讲内容涵盖多运行时架构,该架构旨在同时支持高性能元宇宙体验和即时浏览器访问,以及网络性能可视化。此外,我们还将展示 Amazon 集成,在元宇宙中创造沉浸式购物体验,连接虚拟与实体商务。与会者将深入了解动态扩展策略和多区域部署。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - High-performance inference for frontier AI models (AIM226)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 前沿AI模型的高性能推理 (AIM226)
sessions.abstract: How do you go from state-of-the-art foundation model to a globally available usage-based API? This session provides an overview of the roadmap and architecture from model performance optimization to multi-region GPU-based infrastructure setup to the precise mechanics of request prioritization, token accounting, and rate limiting. Building on an inference stack that includes technologies like NVIDIA Dynamo, TensorRT-LLM, and Amazon EKS, we'll trace the path from model weights to a robust production service. This presentation is brought to you by Baseten, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 如何从最先进的基础模型发展为全球可用的基于使用量的API？本次会议概述了从模型性能优化到多区域GPU基础设施设置，再到请求优先级、令牌计费和速率限制精确机制的路线图和架构。基于包括NVIDIA Dynamo、TensorRT-LLM和Amazon EKS等技术的推理堆栈，我们将追踪从模型权重到稳健生产服务的路径。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Baseten提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Production Agent Swarms: Mastering Industrial AI (DEV311)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建生产级智能体集群：掌握工业AI (DEV311)
sessions.abstract: AI systems are evolving beyond multi-modal understanding into autonomous collaboration and problem-solving for industry-specific challenges. This technical session demonstrates how to build and orchestrate multi-agent systems that leverage industry expertise with LLMs. Topics include agent orchestration framework customization, advanced RAG patterns for domain knowledge, collaborative decision-making mechanisms, and production-scale observability. Drawing from real implementations, the session covers critical architecture decisions, common pitfalls, and proven solutions. Participants will gain practical patterns and code examples for building next-generation AI systems with memory, planning, and industry-specific collaboration capabilities.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI系统正在从多模态理解演进为针对行业特定挑战的自主协作和问题解决。本技术会议演示如何构建和编排利用行业专业知识与大语言模型的多智能体系统。主题包括智能体编排框架定制、用于领域知识的高级RAG模式、协作决策机制以及生产规模的可观测性。会议基于实际实施案例，涵盖关键架构决策、常见陷阱和经过验证的解决方案。参与者将获得用于构建具有记忆、规划和行业特定协作能力的下一代AI系统的实用模式和代码示例。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A complete guide to Amazon EVS: Unlock AWS scale for VMware workloads (MAM201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon EVS完整指南：为VMware工作负载释放AWS规模优势 (MAM201)
sessions.abstract: Amazon Elastic VMware Service (Amazon EVS) is your fastest path to run VMware workloads on AWS, eliminating the need to replatform or refactor. Discover how Amazon EVS helps you unlock AWS scale and agility while maximizing existing VMware investments and skillsets. Explore core building blocks and guidance on self-managing or leveraging AWS Partners for your environments. We'll cover strategies for customizing your virtualization stack in the cloud, including integration with storage, backup, and disaster recovery solutions. Through a live demo, we'll showcase intuitive deployment workflows and share the latest service innovations to provide you with more choice and flexibility.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon Elastic VMware Service (Amazon EVS) 是您在 AWS 上运行 VMware 工作负载的最快路径，无需重新平台化或重构。了解 Amazon EVS 如何帮助您释放 AWS 的规模和敏捷性，同时最大化现有 VMware 投资和技能组合的价值。探索核心构建模块以及自管理或利用 AWS 合作伙伴管理环境的指导。我们将涵盖在云中自定义虚拟化堆栈的策略，包括与存储、备份和灾难恢复解决方案的集成。通过现场演示，我们将展示直观的部署工作流程，并分享最新的服务创新，为您提供更多选择和灵活性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Enabling AI innovation with Amazon SageMaker Unified Studio (ANT352)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过Amazon SageMaker Unified Studio实现AI创新 (ANT352)
sessions.abstract: Many enterprises want to build a culture of AI innovation and manage it at scale. Learn how a leading financial institution implemented a unified data and AI platform with built-in governance to solve this challenge. Using the next generation of Amazon SageMaker, their petabyte-scale solution enables users to discover and access data in a cloud-native marketplace then build  in a unified data and AI development environment. This session is ideal for data and platform leaders looking to balance self-service capabilities with robust governance to enable AI initiatives.
sessions.abstract_cn: 许多企业希望构建AI创新文化并进行规模化管理。了解一家领先金融机构如何通过内置治理功能的统一数据和AI平台来解决这一挑战。利用下一代Amazon SageMaker，他们的PB级解决方案使用户能够在云原生市场中发现和访问数据，然后在统一的数据和AI开发环境中进行构建。本会议非常适合希望在自助服务能力与强大治理之间取得平衡以推动AI计划的数据和平台负责人。

presenter.name: Raghu Prabhu
presenter.title: Pr. WWSO GTM SageMaker Unified Studio

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming Apache Kafka into a Scalable Message Queue (OPN413)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 将 Apache Kafka 转变为可扩展的消息队列 (OPN413)
sessions.abstract: Event streaming in Apache Kafka is powerful, but sometimes a queue-based model is more suited for workloads where parallel consumption is more important than ordering. KIP-932 introduces share groups, a feature that allows consumers to cooperatively consume data from Kafka topics, akin to how message queues work. This enables per-message acknowledgment, retries, and load distribution without the complexities of partition management. Ideal for independent work items, this approach simplifies message handling and enhances scalability. Join us to learn how KIP-932 brings queuing semantics to Kafka, enabling more flexible, efficient processing in event-driven architectures.
sessions.abstract_cn: Apache Kafka 中的事件流处理功能强大，但有时基于队列的模型更适合并行消费比顺序更重要的工作负载。KIP-932 引入了共享组功能，允许消费者协作地从 Kafka 主题消费数据，类似于消息队列的工作方式。这实现了按消息确认、重试和负载分配，而无需处理分区管理的复杂性。这种方法非常适合独立的工作项，简化了消息处理并增强了可扩展性。加入我们，了解 KIP-932 如何将队列语义引入 Kafka，在事件驱动架构中实现更灵活、高效的处理。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagining Software Development and DevOps with Agentic AI (AIM293)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用智能体AI重新构想软件开发和DevOps (AIM293)
sessions.abstract: We are infusing Agentic AI into the entire Software Development Lifecycle from brainstorming new ideas, implementing a plan, crafting new code, reviewing code reviews, releasing software, and bringing insights back to the development team. See how GitHub Copilot is being reimagined through this entire lifecycle to boost productivity across teams. This presentation is brought to you by GitHub, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 我们正在将智能代理AI融入整个软件开发生命周期，从头脑风暴新想法、实施计划、编写新代码、审查代码评审、发布软件，到为开发团队带来洞察。了解GitHub Copilot如何通过整个生命周期重新构想，以提升团队生产力。本演示由AWS合作伙伴GitHub为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Future is Human: Intentional Innovation in the AI Era (WOC102)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 未来以人为本：AI时代的有意创新 (WOC102)
sessions.abstract: The pace of change in technology and the cloud demands human-centered leadership, grounded in intention and inclusion. Today’s leaders must deliver progress at speed while earning trust and creating cultures where both people and ideas can thrive in the future of work. This session brings together women driving transformation in the cloud to share how intentional leadership requires listening deeply, fostering confidence, and navigating uncertainty. Learn the priorities that drive meaningful impact and enable innovation in today’s rapidly evolving landscape. Moderated by Christina Mitine, Sr. Go-To-Market Lead. The panel will feature AWS Customers.
sessions.abstract_cn: 技术和云计算的变革步伐要求以人为本的领导力，植根于意图和包容性。当今的领导者必须快速推进进步，同时赢得信任并创造让人才和创意在未来工作中蓬勃发展的文化。本次会议汇集了推动云计算转型的女性领导者，分享有意图的领导力如何需要深入倾听、培养信心和驾驭不确定性。了解在当今快速演变的环境中推动有意义影响和促进创新的优先事项。由Christina Mitine（高级市场推广负责人）主持。小组成员将包括AWS客户。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Arrivia Stopped a Data Theft Ring with Teramind (SEC409)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Arrivia如何通过Teramind阻止数据盗窃团伙 (SEC409)
sessions.abstract: A routine productivity audit at Arrivia exposed a sophisticated insider stealing customer data during night shifts, building databases for potential sale. Traditional security measures could detect suspicious access patterns, but couldn't prove intent or methodology. The breakthrough came through Teramind’s behavioral analytics and comprehensive investigation features, which revealed the employee's sophisticated cover-up techniques. See how Teramind’s AI-powered technology transformed Arrivia's security posture and operations based on accurate workforce engagement data. Learn implementation strategies for insider threat detection and building trust through transparent monitoring policies. This presentation is brought to you by Teramind, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: Arrivia的例行生产力审计发现了一名复杂的内部人员在夜班期间窃取客户数据，构建数据库以备潜在销售。传统安全措施可以检测可疑访问模式，但无法证明意图或方法论。突破来自Teramind的行为分析和综合调查功能，揭示了该员工复杂的掩盖技术。了解Teramind的AI驱动技术如何基于准确的员工参与数据转变了Arrivia的安全态势和运营。学习内部威胁检测的实施策略以及通过透明监控政策建立信任。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Teramind提供。

presenter.name: Justin Skagen
presenter.title: VP of Revenue Integrity and Operational Compliance

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Own Your AI – Blazing Fast OSS AI on AWS (STP104)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 拥有您的AI – AWS上的超快开源AI (STP104)
sessions.abstract: Companies like Notion, GitLab, and DoorDash run their AI inference on Fireworks because they want to own their models without sacrificing performance. We'll show you how or stack optimizations – custom CUDA kernels, speculative decoding, disaggregated serving – enabling blazing fast inference at scale. Then we'll walk through real AWS deployment patterns: fully managed multi-region or in-VPC deployment on SageMaker/EKS/ECS, or locked down in your VPC. Plus, see how to build production agents using Fireworks with AWS AgentCore.
sessions.abstract_cn: 像 Notion、GitLab 和 DoorDash 这样的公司在 Fireworks 上运行他们的 AI 推理，因为他们希望拥有自己的模型而不牺牲性能。我们将向您展示我们的堆栈优化 - 自定义 CUDA 内核、推测解码、分解服务 - 实现大规模的超快推理。然后我们将介绍真实的 AWS 部署模式：在 SageMaker/EKS/ECS 上完全托管的多区域或 VPC 内部署，或在您的 VPC 中锁定部署。此外，了解如何使用 Fireworks 和 AWS AgentCore 构建生产代理。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Large-scale software deployments: Inside Amazon S3’s release pipeline (STG352)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模软件部署：深入了解 Amazon S3 的发布管道 (STG352)
sessions.abstract: Want to learn how Amazon S3, one of the world's largest distributed systems, manages software deployments at scale? This session reveals practical insights into our deployment tools, feature flag strategies, and progressive rollout techniques that enable reliable updates at massive scale. We'll share real-world lessons learned from critical deployments, including how we handle rollbacks, manage dependencies, and monitor service health during updates. Whether you're scaling your own deployment pipeline or interested in cloud infrastructure operations, you'll gain valuable strategies for building robust deployment processes that minimize risk while maximizing reliability.
sessions.abstract_cn: 想了解Amazon S3这个全球最大的分布式系统之一如何大规模管理软件部署吗？本次会议将揭示我们部署工具、特性开关策略和渐进式发布技术的实用见解，这些技术能够在大规模场景下实现可靠的更新。我们将分享关键部署中的实际经验教训，包括如何处理回滚、管理依赖关系以及在更新期间监控服务健康状况。无论您是在扩展自己的部署流水线，还是对云基础设施运营感兴趣，您都将获得宝贵的策略，用于构建稳健的部署流程，在最大化可靠性的同时最小化风险。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Kiro meets SaaS: Generating multi-tenant agentic applications with a GenAI IDE
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Kiro 遇见 SaaS：使用 GenAI IDE 生成多租户智能体应用程序
sessions.abstract: GenAI-powered development tools are changing how teams build multi-tenant agentic SaaS software. It's time to see how these tools can be used to accelerate the creation of entire SaaS environments. This session will walk through the end-to-end creation of a SaaS environment, using the AWS stack of GenAI services (such as Kiro and Strands) to construct an agentic-enabled SaaS environment. We'll build out the services of the control plane, create a sample agent-enabled multi-tenant application, and apply SaaS foundational principles to the solution (using best practices from the SaaS Builder Toolkit and the AWS Well-Architected SaaS Lens). The goal to provide a first-hand look at how a GenAI-powered experience can automate and streamline the creation of entire agentic SaaS environments.
sessions.abstract_cn: GenAI驱动的开发工具正在改变团队构建多租户代理SaaS软件的方式。现在是时候了解这些工具如何加速整个SaaS环境的创建。本次会议将演示端到端创建SaaS环境的过程,使用AWS的GenAI服务栈(如Kiro和Strands)来构建支持代理的SaaS环境。我们将构建控制平面的服务,创建支持代理的多租户应用程序示例,并将SaaS基础原则应用于解决方案(使用SaaS Builder Toolkit和AWS Well-Architected SaaS Lens的最佳实践)。目标是提供GenAI驱动体验如何自动化和简化整个代理SaaS环境创建的第一手视角。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - GenAI in the Beautiful Game: Data-Driven Success in Football (SPF302)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 美丽足球中的生成式AI：足球运动中的数据驱动成功之道 (SPF302)
sessions.abstract: Discover how top-tier football clubs are leveraging generative AI to gain a competitive edge. This session explores real-world applications of AI in professional sports, from tactical analysis to talent scouting. Learn how clubs are using AWS's data platform and AI technologies to identify defensive gaps, optimize formations, and uncover rising stars. Hear firsthand accounts of the transformational impact of AI on decision-making and performance both on and off the pitch. Join us to explore the intersection of technology and the beautiful game.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索顶级足球俱乐部如何利用生成式AI获得竞争优势。本次会议探讨AI在职业体育中的实际应用，从战术分析到球探选材。了解俱乐部如何使用AWS的数据平台和AI技术来识别防守漏洞、优化阵型并发掘新星。聆听AI对场上场下决策和表现产生变革性影响的第一手资料。加入我们，探索技术与足球运动的交汇点。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Streamline AI model development lifecycle with Amazon SageMaker AI (AIM364)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon SageMaker AI 简化 AI 模型开发生命周期 (AIM364)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Amazon SageMaker AI transforms model development with a unified environment for all your AI workloads - from interactive model development on IDEs to maximizing task and compute resource utilization across training and inference workloads. We'll demonstrate how to use SageMaker Studio as the familiar IDE to develop, submit, and monitor ML jobs, while leveraging the scalability and resiliency of HyperPod environment for computationally intensive tasks like training and deploying large foundation models. You will also learn how HyperPod task governance capability can help you automatically allocate compute resources based on task prioritization end-to-end through the model development lifecycle.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解Amazon SageMaker AI如何通过统一环境转变模型开发，满足您所有的AI工作负载需求——从IDE上的交互式模型开发到最大化训练和推理工作负载的任务和计算资源利用率。我们将演示如何使用SageMaker Studio作为熟悉的IDE来开发、提交和监控ML作业，同时利用HyperPod环境的可扩展性和弹性来处理计算密集型任务，如训练和部署大型基础模型。您还将了解HyperPod任务治理功能如何帮助您在整个模型开发生命周期中基于任务优先级自动分配计算资源。

presenter.name: Khushboo Srivastava
presenter.title: Senior Product Manager Technical External Services

presenter.name: Manikandan Paramasivan
presenter.title: Senior Staff Architect - Data and ML/AI

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unlock Cost Efficiency with AWS Graviton Savings Dashboard (CMP352)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 AWS Graviton 节省成本仪表板释放成本效率 (CMP352)
sessions.abstract: The Graviton Savings Dashboard offers a comprehensive analysis of your compute usage, identifying prime candidates for Graviton migration. The Graviton Savings Dashboard now provides deeper analytics for workload modernization, helping customers maximize their migration investments. Organizations using Graviton continue to achieve up to 40% better price performance, with new features enabling granular workload analysis and simplified migration planning. Learn how to leverage advanced dashboard capabilities to accelerate your cost optimization journey, identify new optimization opportunities, and create data-driven migration strategies that deliver measurable business impact. This lightning talk demonstrates how to turn efficiency insights into actionable migration plans.
sessions.abstract_cn: Graviton节省仪表板提供全面的计算使用分析，识别Graviton迁移的主要候选对象。Graviton节省仪表板现在为工作负载现代化提供更深入的分析，帮助客户最大化其迁移投资。使用Graviton的组织持续实现高达40%的性价比提升，新功能支持细粒度工作负载分析和简化的迁移规划。了解如何利用高级仪表板功能加速成本优化之旅，识别新的优化机会，并创建数据驱动的迁移策略以实现可衡量的业务影响。本闪电演讲展示如何将效率洞察转化为可执行的迁移计划。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cloud Application Security in the AI Era: Lessons from Adobe & Fortinet -HMC208
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI时代的云应用安全：Adobe和Fortinet的经验教训 -HMC208
sessions.abstract: AI and AI-based workloads are the new transformational effort and securing these modern web applications in the cloud requires a lot more than security gates.  In this session, Adobe and Fortinet share strategies and experience protecting AI-enabled applications, web APIs, and data.  Attendees will learn from Adobe’s cloud security experience, explore practical examples, and receive actionable guidance to strengthen their own cloud security posture. The session combines co-presented insights with audience Q&A for an engaging, interactive experience. This presentation is brought to you by Fortinet, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI和基于AI的工作负载是新的变革性努力，在云中保护这些现代Web应用程序需要的远不止安全门控。在本次会议中，Adobe和Fortinet分享保护AI驱动应用程序、Web API和数据的策略和经验。与会者将从Adobe的云安全经验中学习，探索实际案例，并获得加强自身云安全态势的可操作指导。本次会议结合了联合演讲见解和观众问答，提供引人入胜的互动体验。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Fortinet为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Measuring AI Impact with Amazon Q Developer and Jellyfish (DVT219)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Q Developer 和 Jellyfish 衡量 AI 影响 (DVT219)
sessions.abstract: Development leaders are struggling to show the impact of AI in software development. No single tool, such as Amazon Q Developer, can give the full picture. In this session hear from Genesys about their journey to measure the impact of AI and how the integration of Amazon Q Developer metrics into the Jellyfish platform gave them the visibility they needed. Attendees will learn about ways that AI Impacts software development, how the ingestion of Q Developer metrics into Jellyfish can shed light on those impacts over time and how a customer took that information and was able to tell the story of the impact of AI on their Development process.
sessions.abstract_cn: 开发领导者正在努力展示AI在软件开发中的影响。没有单一工具（如Amazon Q Developer）能够提供完整的全貌。在本次会议中，听取Genesys关于他们衡量AI影响的历程，以及将Amazon Q Developer指标集成到Jellyfish平台如何为他们提供所需的可见性。与会者将了解AI影响软件开发的方式，如何将Q Developer指标摄取到Jellyfish中以揭示这些影响随时间的变化，以及客户如何利用这些信息来讲述AI对其开发流程影响的故事。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Zoom’s Journey from Conversation to Completion with AI Companion 3.0 (ISV321)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Zoom 借助 AI Companion 3.0 从对话到完成的旅程 (ISV321)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Zoom shifted from AI that just reports on meetings to AI that helps you prepare for them. With AI Companion 3.0, a simple request like "Prepare me for my next meeting" starts an AI agent that automatically works across Calendar, Meetings, Chat, and Docs to gather what you need. This session shows how Zoom uses AWS services like Bedrock and OpenSearch to solve non-trivial challenges and change the way people work — moving beyond just finding information to taking action. See the real impact on how millions of users get ready for their day and work together
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Zoom 如何从仅报告会议的 AI 转变为帮助您准备会议的 AI。借助 AI Companion 3.0，一个简单的请求如"为我准备下一次会议"就能启动一个 AI 代理，自动跨 Calendar、Meetings、Chat 和 Docs 工作以收集您需要的内容。本次会议展示了 Zoom 如何使用 AWS 服务（如 Bedrock 和 OpenSearch）来解决重大挑战并改变人们的工作方式——从仅仅查找信息转向采取行动。了解这对数百万用户如何准备一天的工作和协作产生的实际影响

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-powered co-sell: Unlock partner success with AWS Partner Central  (PEX113)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI驱动的联合销售：通过AWS合作伙伴中心释放合作伙伴成功潜力 (PEX113)
sessions.abstract: Discover how to supercharge your co-selling efforts with enhancements available in AWS Partner Central. This session showcases new AI-enhanced features and APIs that streamline partner collaboration and deal registration. Learn to leverage secure access to APIs, access real-time insights, and automate workflows to accelerate your go-to-market strategy. Whether you're a seasoned AWS Partner or just getting started, you'll walk away with actionable steps to maximize Partner benefits and drive revenue growth with AWS through Partner Central.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何通过AWS合作伙伴中心的增强功能来提升您的联合销售工作。本次会议展示了新的AI增强功能和API，可简化合作伙伴协作和交易注册。学习如何利用API的安全访问，获取实时洞察，并自动化工作流程以加速您的市场推广策略。无论您是经验丰富的AWS合作伙伴还是刚刚起步，您都将获得可操作的步骤，以最大化合作伙伴权益并通过合作伙伴中心推动AWS收入增长。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic AI for member-owned financials: Systems that serve  (AIM337)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 面向会员制金融机构的智能体AI：服务型系统 (AIM337)
sessions.abstract: Credit unions and insurance organizations can leverage AI agents for automating complex workflows. In this code talk we’ll demonstrate going from concept to production with spec-driven development. We’ll work backwards from your business processes such as lending automation, claims processing, and fraud detection to turn prompts into detailed specifications, code, documents, and tests. Using prompts as code, we'll build production-ready agents using Strands Agents SDK and AWS services. Attendees will leave equipped with implementation tools, sample code, and best practices for building and deploying agentic AI solutions that transform credit union and insurance operations while ensuring explainable, compliant AI decision-making.
sessions.abstract_cn: 信用合作社和保险机构可以利用AI代理来自动化复杂工作流程。在这次代码演讲中，我们将演示如何通过规范驱动开发从概念到生产的全过程。我们将从您的业务流程（如放贷自动化、理赔处理和欺诈检测）出发，将提示转换为详细的规范、代码、文档和测试。使用提示即代码的方式，我们将利用Strands Agents SDK和AWS服务构建生产就绪的代理。参会者将掌握实施工具、示例代码以及构建和部署代理AI解决方案的最佳实践，这些解决方案将变革信用合作社和保险业务运营，同时确保AI决策的可解释性和合规性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Leverage Graph Insights to Turbocharge Amazon Q for Business (IND209)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用图洞察为Amazon Q商业版提速 (IND209)
sessions.abstract: Unlocking AI's full potential requires labeling of all sensitive data and fine-grained access control to enterprise data. This session introduces a unique graph-based data intelligence solution that works across all data sources to classify data and extract data access insights in order to create a comprehensive Data+AI mapping needed to track what data AI users have access to. Learn to safeguard sensitive data and reliably prevent unintended access to accelerate your rollout of Amazon Q. We will show you how to leverage Amazon Q’s native security controls to mitigate emerging AI risks, such as prompt injections, and improve AI response quality by identifying and minimizing redundant and obsolete data. This presentation is brought to you by Securiti AI, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 释放AI全部潜力需要对所有敏感数据进行标记，并对企业数据实施细粒度访问控制。本次会议介绍了一种独特的基于图的数据智能解决方案，该方案可跨所有数据源对数据进行分类并提取数据访问洞察，以创建跟踪AI用户可访问哪些数据所需的全面Data+AI映射。学习如何保护敏感数据并可靠防止意外访问，以加速Amazon Q的推广部署。我们将向您展示如何利用Amazon Q的原生安全控制来缓解新兴AI风险（如提示注入），并通过识别和最小化冗余和过时数据来提高AI响应质量。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Securiti AI为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Peak Performance: IoT Innovation in Professional Sports (SPF301)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 巅峰表现：专业体育中的物联网创新 (SPF301)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Catapult revolutionizes elite sports performance using AWS IoT technology. From the English Premier League to the NFL and NBA, learn how the world's leading teams leverage Catapult's cutting-edge wearable technology to capture millions of data points per athlete. This session reveals how Catapult architected their next-generation tracking system on AWS IoT, transforming raw biometric data into predictive insights that prevent injuries, optimize training loads, and maximize athlete performance. See how the combination of IoT, analytics, and AI/ML is reshaping the future of professional sports science.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索Catapult如何利用AWS IoT技术革命性地改变精英体育表现。从英超联赛到NFL和NBA，了解世界领先的球队如何利用Catapult的尖端可穿戴技术为每位运动员捕获数百万个数据点。本次会议揭示了Catapult如何在AWS IoT上构建其下一代追踪系统，将原始生物识别数据转化为预测性洞察，从而预防伤病、优化训练负荷并最大化运动员表现。了解IoT、分析和AI/ML的结合如何重塑专业运动科学的未来。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG Risk Intelligence: Accelerating World-Check with AI (GBL207)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG风险智能：利用AI加速World-Check (GBL207)
sessions.abstract: LSEG’s Risk Intelligence business offers various solutions in the risk screening, digital identity and due diligence space to Financial Institutions. The Content Curation AI project is focused on improving data services which rely on manual processes to analyse and identify media coverage of individuals or companies engaged in risky behaviour. The goal is to automate, ingest and analyse information, alleviating tactical burden on staff and in doing so, free up human resources to focus on higher level value add contributions. Thus increasing LSEG's competitive advantage in the product marketplace. Programme running live in production and being run with AWS, LSEG and MeshAI.
sessions.abstract_cn: LSEG的风险情报业务为金融机构提供风险筛查、数字身份和尽职调查领域的各种解决方案。内容策展AI项目专注于改进依赖人工流程来分析和识别从事风险行为的个人或公司媒体报道的数据服务。该项目的目标是自动化、摄取和分析信息,减轻员工的战术负担,从而释放人力资源以专注于更高层次的增值贡献。这将提升LSEG在产品市场中的竞争优势。该项目目前在生产环境中运行,由AWS、LSEG和MeshAI共同运营。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Advancing Patient and Business Operations Insights with Gen AI (IND212)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用生成式AI推进患者和业务运营洞察 (IND212)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Huron is using generative AI to transform patient satisfaction and revenue cycle analytics. Harnessing the power of AWS Bedrock, Amazon Nova LLM, and Amazon Redshift in diverse areas of healthcare analytics, Huron is achieving 90% accuracy in real-time sentiment analysis and proactively diagnosing opportunities for revenue cycle improvement. Learn how their solution drives hospital revenue through improved funding and staff coaching, successfully scaling to over 100 healthcare providers. Discover practical insights for integrating AWS AI services to transform patient experience measurement and achieve immediate business impact in healthcare operations.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解Huron如何利用生成式AI转变患者满意度和收入周期分析。通过在医疗分析的多个领域中运用AWS Bedrock、Amazon Nova LLM和Amazon Redshift的强大功能，Huron在实时情感分析中实现了90%的准确率，并主动诊断收入周期改进机会。了解他们的解决方案如何通过改善资金和员工培训来推动医院收入，成功扩展到100多家医疗服务提供商。探索集成AWS AI服务的实用见解，以转变患者体验测量并在医疗运营中实现即时业务影响。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond SFTP and NFS: Automate enterprise file transfers at scale (STG361)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越 SFTP 和 NFS：大规模自动化企业文件传输 (STG361)
sessions.abstract: Modern enterprises need flexible file transfer strategies addressing one-time migrations, recurring workflows, and processing-intensive transfers. This session explores comprehensive solutions using AWS Transfer Family and DataSync across these three scenarios. Learn to segment requirements and select appropriate services through real customer stories. We'll cover migration patterns for moving data from on-premises and other clouds, establishing secure recurring workflows, and integrating processing capabilities. Walk away with practical guidance on service selection, reference architectures, and best practices for building unified data movement strategies that scale with your business needs.
sessions.abstract_cn: 现代企业需要灵活的文件传输策略来应对一次性迁移、定期工作流和处理密集型传输。本次会议探讨使用 AWS Transfer Family 和 DataSync 在这三种场景下的综合解决方案。通过真实客户案例学习如何细分需求并选择合适的服务。我们将介绍从本地和其他云迁移数据的迁移模式、建立安全的定期工作流以及集成处理能力。您将获得关于服务选择、参考架构和构建可随业务需求扩展的统一数据移动策略的最佳实践的实用指导。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building AI Agents with Kiro, MCP, and Amazon Bedrock AgentCore (DEV331)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Kiro、MCP 和 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 构建 AI 代理 (DEV331)
sessions.abstract: Model Context Protocol (MCP) provides the foundation for building AI agents and code assistants that connect to your data, infrastructure, and services. Whether developing enterprise customer service AI or code that runs on AWS, MCP brings together intelligence and integration.
