We'll dive into Kraken's pioneering use of generative AI, including their proprietary 'Magic Ink' system built on AWS services, like Amazon Transcribe and Amazon Comprehend, which now handles 50% of customer emails with an 80% satisfaction rate.
sessions.abstract_cn: Kraken Technologies是Octopus Energy Group的子公司，借助AWS成为能源行业增长最快的软件平台之一，目前为35家公司的7000万消费者提供服务。本次会议将展示Kraken基于AWS的云原生架构如何实现快速扩展和创新。我们将深入探讨Kraken在生成式AI方面的开创性应用，包括他们基于AWS服务（如Amazon Transcribe和Amazon Comprehend）构建的专有"Magic Ink"系统，该系统目前处理50%的客户邮件，满意度达到80%。

presenter.name: Tyler Rogers
presenter.title: Head of Business Development, North America

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Code to Market: Build and Launch AI Agents on AWS Marketplace (ISV314)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从代码到市场：在 AWS Marketplace 上构建和发布 AI 代理 (ISV314)
sessions.abstract: Creating AI agents is just the beginning – ISVs face the greater challenge of monetizing them effectively. In this CodeTalk you will learn how to implement metering APIs, manage licensing, and navigate ISV-specific requirements using two deployment approaches: containers based agents with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore running in customer environments, and API-based agents hosted by ISVs. Join this session to accelerate your AI solutions from development to revenue-generating products in AWS Marketplace.
sessions.abstract_cn: 创建AI代理只是开始——ISV面临的更大挑战是如何有效地将其货币化。在本次CodeTalk中，您将学习如何实现计量API、管理许可证，以及使用两种部署方式应对ISV特定需求：基于容器的代理（使用在客户环境中运行的Amazon Bedrock AgentCore）和由ISV托管的基于API的代理。加入本次会议，加速您的AI解决方案从开发到AWS Marketplace上创收产品的转变。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Kinesis Data Streams under the hood (ANT423)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 深入了解 Amazon Kinesis Data Streams (ANT423)
sessions.abstract: Discover how AWS is changing data streaming with Amazon Kinesis Data Streams for infrastructure and operations. This session will explore recent innovations in how Kinesis Data Streams enables you to build robust, scalable data streaming applications that can handle millions of events per second. Join this session to see how you can leverage Amazon Kinesis Data Streams to build scalable, resilient data streaming applications for faster insights and improved decision-making.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 AWS 如何通过 Amazon Kinesis Data Streams 改变基础设施和运营的数据流处理。本次会议将探讨 Kinesis Data Streams 的最新创新，了解它如何帮助您构建强大、可扩展的数据流应用程序，能够每秒处理数百万个事件。加入本次会议，了解如何利用 Amazon Kinesis Data Streams 构建可扩展、具有弹性的数据流应用程序，以获得更快的洞察和改进决策制定。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Dive into Poolside: AI Models for Highly Secure Software Environments (AIM261)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 深入了解 Poolside：高度安全软件环境的 AI 模型 (AIM261)
sessions.abstract: Join poolside and Northrop Grumman Space Systems to explore how poolside’s foundational AI models accelerate enterprise software development efforts—working securely within regulated environments. This session covers poolside's platform architecture and security model, followed by demos of key use cases such as reviewing code, generating tests, and integrating with CI/CD pipelines. Hear directly from Northrop Grumman Space Systems on their perspective in deploying poolside’s foundational AI models for secure, high-velocity software development. Learn how this collaboration improves code quality, productivity, and iteration speed. This presentation is brought to you by poolside, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入poolside和诺斯罗普·格鲁曼空间系统公司，探索poolside的基础AI模型如何加速企业软件开发工作——在受监管环境中安全运行。本次会议涵盖poolside的平台架构和安全模型，随后演示关键用例，如代码审查、测试生成以及与CI/CD管道集成。直接听取诺斯罗普·格鲁曼空间系统公司关于部署poolside基础AI模型进行安全、高速软件开发的观点。了解这种合作如何提高代码质量、生产力和迭代速度。本演示由AWS合作伙伴poolside提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Lead resilient security teams through psychological safety (SEC219)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过心理安全领导有韧性的安全团队 (SEC219)
sessions.abstract: What makes security teams excel? This lightning talk explores four key psychological safety elements that strengthen security operations. Learn practical ways to help your team feel secure being themselves, learning openly, contributing ideas, and challenging the status quo. Walk away with actionable steps to build trust and improve team performance.
sessions.abstract_cn: 是什么让安全团队表现卓越?这场闪电演讲探讨了加强安全运营的四个关键心理安全要素。了解帮助团队成员自在做自己、公开学习、贡献想法和挑战现状的实用方法。带走可操作的步骤来建立信任并提升团队绩效。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Aurora DSQL: A developer's perspective  (DAT401)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Aurora DSQL：开发者视角 (DAT401)
sessions.abstract: In this live coding session, we'll show you how to work with Amazon Aurora DSQL from a developer's perspective. We'll develop a sample application to highlight some of the ways developing for Aurora DSQL is different than PostgreSQL. We'll cover authentication and connection management, optimistic concurrency transaction patterns, primary key selection, analyzing query performance, and best practices.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在这个实时编程会话中，我们将从开发者的角度向您展示如何使用Amazon Aurora DSQL。我们将开发一个示例应用程序，重点介绍为Aurora DSQL开发与PostgreSQL开发的一些不同之处。我们将涵盖身份验证和连接管理、乐观并发事务模式、主键选择、查询性能分析以及最佳实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scale Security Operations with AWS Security Incident Response Service (SEC329)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 安全事件响应服务扩展安全运营 (SEC329)
sessions.abstract: Ready to modernise your incident response? Learn how Infor accelerated their security operations using AWS Security Incident Response service. Through Infor's implementation journey, learn how to automate investigation and remediation while maintaining consistency at scale. We'll cover service integration with Security Hub and GuardDuty, automated playbook execution, and cross-account coordination. SOC teams will learn practical strategies for implementing automated workflows for containment and forensics collection. Walk away with implementation patterns to reduce response times while maintaining audit controls across your AWS environment.
sessions.abstract_cn: 准备好实现事件响应现代化了吗？了解 Infor 如何使用 AWS Security Incident Response 服务加速其安全运营。通过 Infor 的实施历程，学习如何自动化调查和修复，同时保持大规模的一致性。我们将介绍该服务与 Security Hub 和 GuardDuty 的集成、自动化剧本执行以及跨账户协调。SOC 团队将学习实施自动化工作流程的实用策略，用于遏制和取证收集。您将掌握实施模式，以缩短响应时间，同时在整个 AWS 环境中维护审计控制。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Democratizing Whirlpool's Virtual Product Development with AWS (IND331)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 借助 AWS 实现惠而浦虚拟产品开发的民主化 (IND331)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Whirlpool leverages AWS to democratize Virtual Product Development and speed up design decisions. By running cloud-based cost and performance simulations, Whirlpool generates training data to build explainable machine learning models with Amazon SageMaker, deployed through a modular front-end on AWS Elastic Beanstalk. These tools empower enterprise-wide stakeholders to quickly explore trade-offs and perform multi-objective optimizations using Genetic Algorithms. This session highlights the journey from siloed tools to a unified cloud ecosystem, enabling faster, smarter product architecture choices and driving measurable improvements in cost, performance, and time-to-market.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解惠而浦如何利用 AWS 实现虚拟产品开发的民主化并加速设计决策。通过运行基于云的成本和性能模拟，惠而浦生成训练数据，使用 Amazon SageMaker 构建可解释的机器学习模型，并通过 AWS Elastic Beanstalk 上的模块化前端进行部署。这些工具使企业范围内的利益相关者能够快速探索权衡方案，并使用遗传算法执行多目标优化。本次会议重点介绍了从孤立工具到统一云生态系统的转变历程，实现了更快、更智能的产品架构选择，并在成本、性能和上市时间方面取得了可衡量的改进。

presenter.name: Saurabh Bahl
presenter.title: Business Development Lead Manufacturing and Industrials

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-How Heidi Health is leveraging GenAI to transform the global healthcare industry
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Heidi Health 如何利用生成式人工智能改变全球医疗保健行业
sessions.abstract: Heidi Health started building generative AI for healthcare when most regulators were still grappling with what that meant. After pivoting from appointment prep to AI medical scribing with the explosion of Gen AI, the team confronted challenges unique to gen AI startups: validating non-deterministic outputs at scale, selling probabilistic technology to risk-averse hospitals, and navigating compliance frameworks designed for rule-based software. The biggest bottleneck wasn’t engineering, it was finding expert clinicians to evaluate AI-generated clinical notes. This is the story of finding product-market fit, surviving enterprise sales cycles, building scalable AI evaluation, and adapting language models across four continents.
sessions.abstract_cn: Heidi Health 在大多数监管机构仍在努力理解生成式人工智能含义时就开始为医疗保健构建生成式 AI。在生成式 AI 爆发后，团队从预约准备转向 AI 医疗记录，面临着生成式 AI 初创公司独有的挑战：大规模验证非确定性输出、向风险规避的医院销售概率性技术，以及应对为基于规则的软件设计的合规框架。最大的瓶颈不是工程技术，而是寻找专业临床医生来评估 AI 生成的临床记录。这是一个关于寻找产品市场契合度、在企业销售周期中生存、构建可扩展 AI 评估以及在四大洲适应语言模型的故事。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Fault-Tolerant Systems with AWS Messaging Services (API322)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 消息服务构建容错系统 (API322)
sessions.abstract: Cloud application reliability is essential for modern business success. In this session, explore how AWS messaging services enhance system resilience through fault-tolerant design patterns. We'll examine four proven architectural approaches that strengthen your cloud infrastructure and maintain continuous service delivery. Through practical demonstrations, learn how to implement these patterns using AWS services to build loosely coupled, scalable systems that handle disruptions effectively. Discover techniques to create architectures that not only withstand challenges but excel under scale, ensuring consistent customer experiences.
sessions.abstract_cn: 云应用程序可靠性对现代企业成功至关重要。在本次会议中，探索AWS消息服务如何通过容错设计模式增强系统弹性。我们将研究四种经过验证的架构方法，这些方法可以加强您的云基础设施并维持持续的服务交付。通过实际演示，学习如何使用AWS服务实施这些模式，构建松耦合、可扩展的系统，有效处理中断。发现创建架构的技术，这些架构不仅能够承受挑战，还能在规模化下表现出色，确保一致的客户体验。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Adding agentic AI to legacy apps with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore  (MAM345)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 为传统应用程序添加智能代理 AI (MAM345)
sessions.abstract: In this code-first session, we demonstrate how to add agentic AI capabilities and augment a legacy application using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and the Amazon Strands Agents SDK. We will explore how to build AI-powered features for a legacy application without modifying the existing backend code. We will showcase how to leverage existing APIs and Lambda functions as the backbone for your agentic AI experience. You'll learn how to execute code in isolated sandbox environments, ensuring security while accessing internal data sources with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Code Interpreter.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在这个以代码为主的会议中，我们演示如何使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 和 Amazon Strands Agents SDK 为传统应用程序添加智能体 AI 功能并进行增强。我们将探索如何在不修改现有后端代码的情况下为传统应用程序构建 AI 驱动的功能。我们将展示如何利用现有的 API 和 Lambda 函数作为智能体 AI 体验的支柱。您将学习如何在隔离的沙箱环境中执行代码，确保安全性，同时使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Code Interpreter 访问内部数据源。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Secure, Easy and Performant VPC Resource Connectivity with Tailscale (CDN201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Tailscale 实现安全、简便且高性能的 VPC 资源连接 (CDN201)
sessions.abstract: Connecting to private subnet resources inside a VPC is often complex, requiring VPNs, bastion hosts, or custom networking. In this lightning talk, we’ll show how Tailscale simplifies secure access to VPC resources with minimal setup. Learn how developers and services can connect to everything from AWS RDS to Lambda functions and beyond inside private VPC subnets without opening inbound security group rules or managing security infrastructure. We’ll cover how Tailscale leverages WireGuard®, identity-aware access, and standard AWS services to make connectivity both performant and secure - so you can focus on building, not networking. This presentation is brought to you by Tailscale, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 连接VPC内私有子网资源通常很复杂，需要VPN、堡垒机或自定义网络配置。在这个闪电演讲中，我们将展示Tailscale如何通过最少的设置简化对VPC资源的安全访问。了解开发人员和服务如何连接到私有VPC子网内的AWS RDS、Lambda函数等各种资源，而无需开放入站安全组规则或管理安全基础设施。我们将介绍Tailscale如何利用WireGuard®、身份感知访问和标准AWS服务来实现高性能和安全的连接 - 让您专注于构建，而非网络配置。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Tailscale提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Runtime + AI: Reinventing Cloud Security on AWS (SEC223)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 运行时 + AI：重新定义AWS云安全 (SEC223)
sessions.abstract: Cloud adoption and AI innovation are accelerating risk in ways posture tools alone can’t solve. In this session, we’ll show how a runtime security fabric extends AWS-native services like Bedrock to secure AI workloads, unify posture management, and deliver real-time defense. Attendees will learn how combining DSPM, CSPM, and runtime insights helps reduce noise, prioritize what matters, and strengthen their AWS environments. The result is faster remediation, lower costs, and a security foundation built for the scale and speed of cloud-native and AI applications. This presentation is brought to you by Upwind Security, Inc., an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 云采用和AI创新正在以态势工具无法单独解决的方式加速风险。在本次会议中，我们将展示运行时安全架构如何扩展AWS原生服务（如Bedrock）来保护AI工作负载、统一态势管理并提供实时防护。与会者将了解如何结合DSPM、CSPM和运行时洞察来减少噪音、优先处理重要事项并加强其AWS环境。结果是更快的修复、更低的成本，以及为云原生和AI应用程序的规模和速度而构建的安全基础。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Upwind Security, Inc.为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Epic journey: Navigating the AI-powered SDLC from backlog to production(DVT208)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 史诗之旅：从待办事项到生产环境的AI驱动软件开发生命周期导航(DVT208)
sessions.abstract: Developers, join an epic journey as we follow a humble backlog item through the winding path of the software development lifecycle from user story to deployment. Most developers spend less than an hour per day writing code. So why do focus so much attention on using AI to write code faster? In this session you will learn how Kiro CLI can help you with every stage of the SDLC.
sessions.abstract_cn: 开发者们，加入我们的史诗之旅，跟随一个普通的待办事项穿越软件开发生命周期的曲折路径，从用户故事到部署。大多数开发者每天花在编写代码上的时间不到一小时。那么为什么我们如此关注使用AI来更快地编写代码呢？在本次会议中，您将了解Kiro CLI如何在软件开发生命周期的每个阶段为您提供帮助。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Technical deep dive: Composable AI agents for partner solutions (MAM217)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 技术深度解析：合作伙伴解决方案的可组合AI代理 (MAM217)
sessions.abstract: Accelerate enterprise modernization through agentic AI and composability. This innovation enables migration and modernization competency partners to build differentiated solutions by combining their specialized tools, industry knowledge bases, and custom agents with powerful capabilities. Through an intuitive chat-based interface, AWS partners can create customized transformation solutions that reflect their unique value propositions for specific industries and customers. Each transformation further enhances our AI agents' intelligence, continuously improving their ability to handle complex enterprise environments. Join us for a technical deep dive to learn how you can leverage agentic AI to build differentiated migration and modernization solutions.
sessions.abstract_cn: 通过智能体AI和可组合性加速企业现代化。这一创新使迁移和现代化能力合作伙伴能够通过将其专业工具、行业知识库和自定义智能体与强大功能相结合来构建差异化解决方案。通过直观的基于聊天的界面，AWS合作伙伴可以创建定制的转型解决方案，体现其针对特定行业和客户的独特价值主张。每次转型都进一步增强我们AI智能体的智能，持续提高其处理复杂企业环境的能力。加入我们的技术深度解析，了解如何利用智能体AI构建差异化的迁移和现代化解决方案。

presenter.name: Murtaza Chowdhury
presenter.title: Head of Product Management, Agentic AI, AWS

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reinventing the Retail Edge with YUM! Brands, AWS & Spectro Cloud (HMC204)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 与百胜餐饮集团、AWS 和 Spectro Cloud 重塑零售边缘计算 (HMC204)
sessions.abstract:
Innovation in global restaurants now goes beyond the menu. For YUM! Brands—parent of Taco Bell, KFC, Pizza Hut, and Habit Burger—digital experiences are key to customer satisfaction and operational excellence. But delivering these consistently across thousands of stores demands a new kind of architecture: modular, portable, and built edge-to-cloud.
In this joint session, leaders from YUM! Brands, AWS, and Spectro Cloud will share how they’re deploying next-gen edge platforms to support AI/ML workloads, boost uptime, and drive agility. Learn how AWS and Spectro Cloud enable centralized management, and scalable, production-grade infrastructure to bring innovation closer to customers—whether in retail, industrial, or remote settings. This presentation is brought to you by Spectro Cloud, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn:
全球餐厅的创新现在已经超越了菜单本身。对于YUM! Brands——塔可钟、肯德基、必胜客和Habit Burger的母公司——数字化体验是客户满意度和运营卓越的关键。但要在数千家门店中始终如一地提供这些体验，需要一种新型架构：模块化、可移植且构建于边缘到云端。

在这次联合会议中，来自YUM! Brands、AWS和Spectro Cloud的领导者将分享他们如何部署下一代边缘平台来支持AI/ML工作负载、提升正常运行时间并推动敏捷性。了解AWS和Spectro Cloud如何实现集中化管理以及可扩展的生产级基础设施，将创新更贴近客户——无论是在零售、工业还是偏远环境中。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Spectro Cloud为您呈现。

presenter.name: Shiv Adhiappan
presenter.title: Vice President, Global Reliability & Engineering Ops

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building multi-tenant SaaS agents with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore (SAS407)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 构建多租户 SaaS 代理 (SAS407)
sessions.abstract: The introduction of Amazon Bedrock AgentCore equips builders with a range of new tools and technologies. These tools enable a range of new strategies and techniques that will directly impact how teams build multi-tenant AI solutions and agents. This session will dig into working examples how tenancy is leveraged and landed in an intelligence-as-a-service environment,  highlighting the multi-tenant nuances and possibilities that can built with the latest AI-powered AWS services. This includes a deep dive AgentCore multi-tenant pattern, spanning the identity, memory, gateway, observability, and run-time elements of the AgentCore experience. The goal here is to understand how SaaS providers can introduce tenant-context into their agents to support core SaaS mechanisms and constructs (onboarding, isolation, data partitioning, identity, etc.).
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon Bedrock AgentCore的推出为构建者提供了一系列新的工具和技术。这些工具支持一系列新的策略和技术，将直接影响团队构建多租户AI解决方案和智能体的方式。本次会议将深入探讨租户在智能即服务环境中如何被利用和实施的实际示例，重点介绍使用最新AI驱动的AWS服务可以构建的多租户细节和可能性。这包括对AgentCore多租户模式的深入剖析，涵盖AgentCore体验的身份、内存、网关、可观测性和运行时元素。这里的目标是了解SaaS提供商如何将租户上下文引入其智能体，以支持核心SaaS机制和构造（入门、隔离、数据分区、身份等）。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Master AI model development with Amazon SageMaker AI (AIM272)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon SageMaker AI 掌握 AI 模型开发 (AIM272)
sessions.abstract: Unlock the full potential of AI model customization with Amazon SageMaker AI. This session explores SageMaker AI's comprehensive model development tools, highlighting how it caters to any use case - from hands-on compute control to fully managed solutions. Dive into key features like Amazon Nova customization, end to end development with HyperPod, and flexible development environments. Listen to our customers share their journey, demonstrating how SageMaker AI accelerates AI innovation while optimizing resource utilization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 通过Amazon SageMaker AI释放AI模型定制的全部潜力。本次会议探讨SageMaker AI的综合模型开发工具，重点介绍它如何满足任何用例需求——从动手计算控制到完全托管解决方案。深入了解关键功能，如Amazon Nova定制、HyperPod端到端开发和灵活的开发环境。聆听我们客户分享他们的历程，展示SageMaker AI如何在优化资源利用的同时加速AI创新。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming AI storage economics with Amazon S3 Vectors (STG318)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 Amazon S3 Vectors 转变 AI 存储经济性 (STG318)
sessions.abstract: Amazon S3 Vectors introduces native support for you to store, retrieve, and query vectors in S3. In this session, explore how S3 Vectors complements high-performance vector databases, reducing storage and querying costs by up to 90%. Learn how to integrate S3 Vectors with Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases and OpenSearch Service for RAG and semantic search at reduced cost and complexity. We’ll cover architecture design, performance considerations, and how S3 Vectors supports scalable AI agent memory and search. Also hear from S3 Vectors customer, March Networks, about using the feature to transform operations and power smart video search capabilities.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon S3 Vectors 引入了原生支持，让您能够在 S3 中存储、检索和查询向量。在本次会议中，探索 S3 Vectors 如何补充高性能向量数据库，将存储和查询成本降低高达 90%。了解如何将 S3 Vectors 与 Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases 和 OpenSearch Service 集成，以降低成本和复杂性实现 RAG 和语义搜索。我们将介绍架构设计、性能考虑因素，以及 S3 Vectors 如何支持可扩展的 AI 代理内存和搜索。还将听取 S3 Vectors 客户 March Networks 分享如何使用该功能转变运营并支持智能视频搜索能力。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI Pioneers: Shipping Transformative GenAI Architectures to Production (SMB301)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI先锋：将变革性生成式AI架构交付到生产环境 (SMB301)
sessions.abstract: Join our session to discover production-ready generative architectures AI pioneers leverage to ship tomorrow’s customer experiences and transform industries with lean teams, constrained budgets but accelerated timelines. You’ll learn how to apply the platform mindset and AWS Generative AI services - Amazon Q, Amazon Bedrock, and Amazon SageMaker and integrate them with other AWS services to deliver both agentic and non-agentic workloads at scale that stay secure, cost-efficient, and aligned with responsible-AI guardrails. Leave with actionable patterns and inspiration that you can use in your own organizations to scale Generative AI workloads.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们的会议，探索AI先锋们利用的生产就绪型生成式架构，以精简团队、有限预算但加速的时间表交付未来的客户体验并改变行业。您将学习如何应用平台思维和AWS生成式AI服务——Amazon Q、Amazon Bedrock和Amazon SageMaker，并将它们与其他AWS服务集成，以大规模交付代理型和非代理型工作负载，同时保持安全、成本效益和符合负责任AI的护栏。您将获得可在自己组织中用于扩展生成式AI工作负载的可操作模式和灵感。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Ditch your old SRE playbook: AI SRE for root cause in minutes (AIM260)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 抛弃旧的SRE手册：AI SRE在几分钟内找到根本原因 (AIM260)
sessions.abstract: When the pager goes off, engineers face a wall of noise: logs, metrics, traces, configs, code, and fractured tribal knowledge. Traditional observability adds data but rarely a path to resolution, leaving teams with heavy cognitive load and little context of the whole production system. In this session, see how AI SRE agents cut through the chaos by reasoning across every source, using tools like humans, testing hypotheses, surfacing evidence-backed root causes in minutes, and learning from every interaction. Learn what it takes to make multi-agent AI SRE production-ready, and how enterprises use Resolve AI to put machines on-call for humans. This presentation is brought to you by Resolve AI, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 当寻呼机响起时，工程师面临着信息噪音墙：日志、指标、链路追踪、配置、代码和零散的部落知识。传统可观测性增加了数据但很少提供解决路径，给团队带来沉重的认知负担，对整个生产系统缺乏全面了解。在本次会议中，了解AI SRE代理如何通过跨所有数据源进行推理来突破混乱局面，像人类一样使用工具，测试假设，在几分钟内找出有证据支持的根本原因，并从每次交互中学习。了解使多代理AI SRE投入生产所需的条件，以及企业如何使用Resolve AI让机器为人类值班。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Resolve AI提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Zydus implemented regulated DR on AWS (NTA320)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Zydus如何在AWS上实施合规灾难恢复 (NTA320)
sessions.abstract: This session explores Zydus Lifesciences' cloud-driven disaster recovery strategy for safeguarding Terabytes of regulated data across 10+ critical pharma applications. The session details how Zydus achieved < 15 minutes of RPO and < 3 hours of RTO across main Data Center and multiple Plant locations and increased the resiliency of critical Pharma Applications while meeting strict regulatory requirements. We will cover in-depth technical & Network architecture covering AWS Elastic Disaster Recovery (DRS), Elastic Block Storage, Direct Connect & Transit Gateway AWS services.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨了Zydus生命科学公司基于云的灾难恢复策略，用于保护10多个关键制药应用程序中的TB级受监管数据。会议详细介绍了Zydus如何在主数据中心和多个工厂位置实现小于15分钟的RPO和小于3小时的RTO，并在满足严格监管要求的同时提高了关键制药应用程序的弹性。我们将深入介绍涵盖AWS弹性灾难恢复(DRS)、弹性块存储、专线连接和中转网关AWS服务的技术和网络架构。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Securing event-driven architectures: from sync to async security (SPS323)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 保护事件驱动架构：从同步到异步安全 (SPS323)
sessions.abstract: The shift from synchronous to asynchronous communication fundamentally transforms security requirements. Learn how to protect event buses from common attacks such as poison pill messages, denial of wallet attacks or message replay exploits. Through live coding, we'll demonstrate how to secure decoupled producers and consumers while maintaining confidentiality, integrity and availability of our event driven systems. You will leave with a comprehensive framework for building secure and resilient event-driven architectures using AWS services.
sessions.abstract_cn: 从同步通信向异步通信的转变从根本上改变了安全要求。学习如何保护事件总线免受常见攻击，如毒丸消息、拒绝钱包攻击或消息重放漏洞。通过实时编码，我们将演示如何保护解耦的生产者和消费者，同时维护事件驱动系统的机密性、完整性和可用性。您将获得一个使用AWS服务构建安全且具有弹性的事件驱动架构的综合框架。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scale and Optimize your Solutions Globally with AWS Expansion Programs (ISV317)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过AWS扩展计划全球扩展和优化您的解决方案 (ISV317)
sessions.abstract: This comprehensive session reveals how to build, scale, and optimize your software solutions globally through powerful integrations. Through technical deep-dives and real-world case studies, AWS ISV builders will share practical insights on Navigating regional compliance and regulatory requirements, implementing market-specific customizations, optimizing costs across different geographical deployments, Building resilient multi-region architectures. Whether you're a startup planning your first international move or an established ISV expanding into new markets, discover how AWS's Global Passport Program provides the tools, resources, and expertise to support your global growth journey while maintaining operational excellence and innovation at scale
sessions.abstract_cn: 这个综合会议揭示了如何通过强大的集成在全球范围内构建、扩展和优化您的软件解决方案。通过技术深度剖析和真实案例研究，AWS ISV构建者将分享以下实用见解：导航区域合规和监管要求，实施特定市场的定制化，优化不同地理部署的成本，构建弹性多区域架构。无论您是计划首次国际化扩张的初创公司，还是正在进入新市场的成熟ISV，都可以了解AWS全球通行证计划如何提供工具、资源和专业知识，支持您的全球增长之旅，同时保持卓越运营和规模化创新。

presenter.name: Paul Peterson
presenter.title: Global Offering Manager New Regions and Regulated Markets

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating Business Value with Cloud and AI (BIZ324)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过云和人工智能加速业务价值 (BIZ324)
sessions.abstract: Unlock the full potential of your Enterprise AI initiatives. Listen to enterprises as they reveal how the right cloud strategy is integral to accelerating AI innovation and value realization, driving more impactful business outcomes. This presentation is brought to you by Infosys, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 释放您企业 AI 计划的全部潜力。聆听企业分享正确的云策略如何成为加速 AI 创新和价值实现的关键，推动更具影响力的业务成果。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Infosys 为您呈现。

presenter.name: Mythili Madhira
presenter.title: SVP of Engineering at LPL Financial

presenter.name: Sri Kadasinghanahalli
presenter.title: Head of Data Platforms and Ops

presenter.name: Jen Scott
presenter.title: Manging Director, Head of C&I Digital technology

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The incident is over: Now what? (COP216)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 事故已结束：现在怎么办？(COP216)
sessions.abstract: Optimal operational practice defines how to handle inevitable incidents and recover quickly. What about the aftermath? How do we ensure that the true root cause is tracked down and that effective preventive actions are planned for implementation? How do we turn every incident into an organization-wide learning opportunity? How do the shared responsibility model and third-party software vendors come into play? We'll share our mental models and decades-long experience around Root Cause Analysis and Correction of Error (COE), so you can drive an effective practice in your own organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 最佳运营实践定义了如何处理不可避免的事件并快速恢复。那么事后呢？我们如何确保追踪到真正的根本原因并制定有效的预防措施计划？我们如何将每个事件转化为组织范围内的学习机会？共同责任模型和第三方软件供应商如何发挥作用？我们将分享我们在根本原因分析和错误纠正(COE)方面的思维模型和数十年的经验，以便您能够在自己的组织中推动有效的实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building a Cloud-Native Risk Decisioning Platform for Resilience (AIM273)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建云原生风险决策平台以提升韧性 (AIM273)
sessions.abstract: Capital One’s governance, risk and compliance platform represents a leap in risk management—built natively on AWS to deliver real-time decisioning, regulatory compliance, & enterprise resilience. While many financial institutions are just beginning to move from on-prem to cloud, Capital One is already ahead. In this session, leaders Solomon Francis & Matt Davis share how they built a GRC platform from the ground up on AWS using Bedrock, SageMaker, & S3. The platform demonstrates how a cloud-native platform can future-proof financial institutions against rising risk & compliance demands. This session offers practical lessons in designing & building risk platform in AWS. This presentation is brought to you by PwC, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: Capital One的治理、风险和合规平台代表了风险管理的飞跃——在AWS上原生构建，提供实时决策、监管合规和企业韧性。当许多金融机构刚刚开始从本地部署迁移到云端时，Capital One已经领先一步。在本次会议中，领导者Solomon Francis和Matt Davis分享了他们如何使用Bedrock、SageMaker和S3在AWS上从零开始构建GRC平台。该平台展示了云原生平台如何帮助金融机构应对不断增长的风险和合规需求。本次会议提供了在AWS中设计和构建风险平台的实用经验。本演示由AWS合作伙伴PwC提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernize Legacy Applications with Agentic AI (DEV333)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用智能体AI现代化遗留应用程序 (DEV333)
sessions.abstract: Legacy monolithic codebases trap organizations in technical debt and slow innovation. Generative AI tools, including Amazon Q and AWS Transform, accelerate modernization through automated dependency analysis, code refactoring, and microservices migration. Practical patterns enable business continuity while transforming monoliths into scalable cloud-native services. Architects and developers will learn proven techniques for automated code analysis, strategic refactoring, and systematic migration to microservices architecture.
sessions.abstract_cn: 传统单体代码库使组织陷入技术债务并减缓创新速度。生成式AI工具，包括Amazon Q和AWS Transform，通过自动化依赖分析、代码重构和微服务迁移来加速现代化进程。实用模式能够在将单体应用转型为可扩展的云原生服务的同时确保业务连续性。架构师和开发人员将学习经过验证的自动化代码分析、战略性重构以及系统化迁移到微服务架构的技术。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How to prep Telemetry data for AI consumption (DVT222)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 如何为 AI 消费准备遥测数据 (DVT222)
sessions.abstract: Engineering team are stuck between a rock and a hard place when it comes to observability: either collect all the data on how your system is behaving or risk not having that one thing needed during an incident. Grepr acts as a proxy between your observability agents and your observability vendor and uses real-time ML to understand the behavior of every piece of data. Grepr's Intelligent Data Engine automatically reduces noise, while keeping all the original raw data in low-cost storage, automatically handling new usage patterns or spikes. The result: minimal configuration, immediate 90% reduction in costs, with no migrations needed. Learn how Grepr works and see it in action in this session. This presentation is brought to you by Grepr, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 工程团队在可观测性方面面临两难境地：要么收集系统行为的所有数据，要么冒着在事故期间缺少关键信息的风险。Grepr 作为可观测性代理和可观测性供应商之间的代理，使用实时机器学习来理解每个数据片段的行为。Grepr 的智能数据引擎自动减少噪音，同时将所有原始数据保存在低成本存储中，自动处理新的使用模式或峰值。结果是：最少的配置，立即减少 90% 的成本，无需迁移。了解 Grepr 的工作原理并在此会话中看到它的实际应用。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Grepr 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The New York Times: From Google Cloud Platform to AWS (MAM337)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 纽约时报：从谷歌云平台迁移到AWS (MAM337)
sessions.abstract: Discover how The New York Times overhauled its gaming platform by migrating critical gaming workloads from Google Cloud Platform to Amazon Web Services. Learn why this media giant chose to make the switch and explore the best practices that ensured a seamless transition of some of the internet's most popular pages and games. We'll delve into the journey from Google's Datastore, App Engine, and GKE to Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service(EKS) and Amazon DynamoDB. Uncover how this strategic move not only modernized The Times' tech stack but also significantly enhanced performance, scalability, and operational efficiency.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解《纽约时报》如何通过将关键游戏工作负载从谷歌云平台迁移到亚马逊云科技来全面改造其游戏平台。了解这家媒体巨头选择进行迁移的原因,并探索确保互联网上一些最受欢迎的页面和游戏实现无缝过渡的最佳实践。我们将深入探讨从Google Datastore、App Engine和GKE迁移到Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service(EKS)和Amazon DynamoDB的历程。揭示这一战略举措如何不仅实现了《纽约时报》技术栈的现代化,还显著提升了性能、可扩展性和运营效率。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond Vector Search: Ultra-Resilient GenAI Apps with AWS Bedrock (DAT202)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越向量搜索：使用 AWS Bedrock 构建超弹性生成式 AI 应用 (DAT202)
sessions.abstract:
As AI moves from proof-of-concept to production, standalone vector databases face limits in synchronization, ACID compliance, and resilience. This session shows how PostgreSQL-compatible distributed databases address these issues while keeping a familiar developer experience. Topics include: Using AWS Bedrock with Distributed SQL, why standalone vector databases create production friction, scaling RAG architectures with pgvector across regions, Multi-agent patterns in modern AI, and delivering ultra-resilience for peak traffic, grey failures, and disasters. 
AWS users will gain practical strategies for building GenAI applications that scale globally while delivering the reliability, consistency, and performance enterprise systems demand. This presentation is brought to you by YugabyteDB, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn:
随着AI从概念验证转向生产环境，独立向量数据库在同步、ACID合规性和弹性方面面临限制。本次会议展示了PostgreSQL兼容的分布式数据库如何解决这些问题，同时保持熟悉的开发者体验。主题包括：将AWS Bedrock与分布式SQL结合使用，为什么独立向量数据库会在生产环境中产生摩擦，使用pgvector跨区域扩展RAG架构，现代AI中的多智能体模式，以及为峰值流量、灰色故障和灾难提供超高弹性。

AWS用户将获得构建GenAI应用程序的实用策略，这些应用程序可以全球扩展，同时提供企业系统所需的可靠性、一致性和性能。本演示由AWS合作伙伴YugabyteDB提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How AWS and Next Gen Stats Redefine Football Intelligence
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS与下一代统计数据如何重新定义橄榄球智能
sessions.abstract:
This isn't just sports analytics—it's a masterclass in operating ML and AI at unprecedented scale. In 2015, the NFL and AWS launched Next Gen Stats, transforming how millions experience football. What began with simple sport metrics has evolved into sophisticated machine learning capturing the game's complexity—completion probability, expected yards, pressure prediction, and coverage responsibility.

This session marks 10 years of innovation through Then → Now → Next. Then: basic stats gave fans new vocabulary. Now: advanced ML models reveal hidden dimensions, powering broadcasts, player safety, and experiences like Toy Story Funday Football. Next: AWS is architecting football's AI-first future with predictive and generative capabilities at NFL scale.

Discover how AWS processes billions of data points for real-time insights and explore ML breakthroughs behind probability engines.
sessions.abstract_cn:
这不仅仅是体育分析——这是在前所未有的规模下运营机器学习和人工智能的大师课。2015年，NFL和AWS推出了Next Gen Stats，改变了数百万人体验橄榄球的方式。从简单的运动指标开始，已经演变为捕捉比赛复杂性的复杂机器学习——完成概率、预期码数、压力预测和防守责任。

本次会议标志着10年的创新历程：过去→现在→未来。过去：基础统计数据为球迷提供了新的词汇。现在：先进的机器学习模型揭示了隐藏的维度，为广播、球员安全以及《玩具总动员趣味橄榄球日》等体验提供支持。未来：AWS正在以NFL规模构建橄榄球的AI优先未来，具备预测和生成能力。

了解AWS如何处理数十亿数据点以获得实时洞察，并探索概率引擎背后的机器学习突破。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Commonwealth Bank of Australia reimagines modernization via agentic AI (SPS310)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 澳大利亚联邦银行通过智能体AI重新构想现代化 (SPS310)
sessions.abstract: Commonwealth Bank of Australia (CBA) revolutionizes legacy modernization using AWS Bedrock's agentic AI architecture. Their groundbreaking solution slashes application assessment time from 6 weeks to under 1 hour and reduces overall modernization cycles from 16 weeks to just 1 week. Through specialized AI agents, CBA automatically analyzes legacy code, detects vulnerabilities, and orchestrates complex transformations while maintaining strict banking compliance. Multi-agent workflows handle security assessments, cloud readiness analysis, and automated network flow implementations, enabling transformation of monolithic systems into cloud-native applications with unprecedented speed and precision.
sessions.abstract_cn: 澳大利亚联邦银行（CBA）利用AWS Bedrock的代理式AI架构彻底革新了遗留系统现代化。他们的突破性解决方案将应用程序评估时间从6周缩短至1小时以内，并将整体现代化周期从16周减少到仅1周。通过专业化AI代理，CBA自动分析遗留代码、检测漏洞并编排复杂转换，同时保持严格的银行合规性。多代理工作流处理安全评估、云就绪性分析和自动化网络流实施，能够以前所未有的速度和精确度将单体系统转换为云原生应用程序。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Protecting Your Infrastructure with Amazon Threat Intelligence (SEC311)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon 威胁情报保护您的基础设施 (SEC311)
sessions.abstract: Come see how AWS Security processes 5 billion events per second to transparently protect all AWS customers. Learn how AWS builds and  leverages threat intelligence so customers can protect their infrastructure  through three key components: MadPot threat disruption system, Amazon Threat  Intelligence, and active threat defense architecture. We'll deep dive into  our data architectures used to analyze against incoming security data, our  threat intelligence capabilities and how they are integrated into AWS  security services. Discover how to maximize these intelligence-driven  services within your own security operations and improve your cloud security  posture.
sessions.abstract_cn: 来看看 AWS 安全如何每秒处理 50 亿个事件，以透明地保护所有 AWS 客户。了解 AWS 如何构建和利用威胁情报，使客户能够通过三个关键组件保护其基础设施：MadPot 威胁破坏系统、Amazon 威胁情报和主动威胁防御架构。我们将深入探讨用于分析传入安全数据的数据架构、我们的威胁情报能力以及它们如何集成到 AWS 安全服务中。了解如何在您自己的安全运营中最大化利用这些情报驱动的服务，并改善您的云安全态势。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - vLLM on AWS: testing to production and everything in between (OPN414)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS上的vLLM：从测试到生产及其间的一切 (OPN414)
sessions.abstract: This session explores practical architectural patterns for deploying and scaling large language models (LLMs) in production environments. We'll walk through a comprehensive journey from initial testing to production deployment, covering essential steps including model evaluation with vLLM, performance benchmarking, and optimization techniques. Attendees will learn how to implement efficient autoscaling solutions using Ray and vLLM, compare different inference servers like Triton and vLLM, and understand their trade-offs. The session concludes with a deep dive into productionalization using AIBrix, providing attendees with actionable insights for building robust, scalable LLM infrastructures. Suitable for ML engineers and architects working on LLM deployments.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨在生产环境中部署和扩展大语言模型（LLM）的实用架构模式。我们将全面介绍从初始测试到生产部署的完整流程，涵盖使用 vLLM 进行模型评估、性能基准测试和优化技术等关键步骤。参会者将学习如何使用 Ray 和 vLLM 实现高效的自动扩展解决方案，比较 Triton 和 vLLM 等不同推理服务器及其权衡取舍。会议最后将深入探讨使用 AIBrix 进行生产化部署，为参会者提供构建稳健、可扩展 LLM 基础设施的可行性见解。适合从事 LLM 部署工作的机器学习工程师和架构师参加。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Programmatically access AWS with your console credentials (SEC354)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用控制台凭证以编程方式访问AWS (SEC354)
sessions.abstract: Join us to learn about new capabilities that will enable you to use AWS services programmatically with your existing console credentials. You'll discover how to lower operational overhead while maintaining existing security practices through automatic management of temporary session-based credentials that fully enforce your organization's security controls. We will show how seamless integration across development tools enhances productivity by enabling fluid movement between CLI, SDKs, and local developer tools without learning different authentication processes. You will leave this session ready to implement a more streamlined, secure, and productive development workflow
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们，了解新功能，这些功能将使您能够使用现有的控制台凭证以编程方式使用AWS服务。您将了解如何通过自动管理临时会话凭证来降低运营开销，同时保持现有的安全实践，这些凭证完全执行您组织的安全控制。我们将展示开发工具之间的无缝集成如何通过在CLI、SDK和本地开发工具之间实现流畅切换来提高生产力，而无需学习不同的身份验证流程。您将在本次会议结束时准备好实施更加简化、安全和高效的开发工作流程。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The AI Discussion Control Plane: How Your Agentic Team Redefines Ops (AIM418)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI讨论控制平面：您的智能体团队如何重新定义运维 (AIM418)
sessions.abstract: Dashboards and alerts are outdated. The future is autonomous AI teammates, each fluent with expertise in a different role, working together to solve problems and self heal. In this session, we’ll introduce Discussion Control Plane: an environment where specialized AI agents collaborate through structured debate and MCP to interpret code, understand deployments, view logs, correlate metrics, trace distributed requests, and analyze security events. By partnering as real teammates, these agents surface richer context, resolve conflicts, and orchestrate actionable responses. Attendees will learn how this shift creates not just faster detection and resolution, but a way for the human-in-the-loop to uplevel. This presentation is brought to you by Edge Delta, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 仪表板和警报已经过时。未来是自主AI队友，每个都精通不同角色的专业知识，协同工作解决问题并自我修复。在本次会议中，我们将介绍讨论控制平面：一个专业化AI代理通过结构化辩论和MCP协作的环境，用于解释代码、理解部署、查看日志、关联指标、跟踪分布式请求和分析安全事件。通过作为真正的队友合作，这些代理提供更丰富的上下文，解决冲突，并编排可操作的响应。与会者将了解这种转变不仅创造了更快的检测和解决方案，还为人在回路中的提升提供了途径。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Edge Delta提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Motability Operations' unified backup strategy: From fragmented to fortified
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Motability Operations的统一备份策略：从分散到强化
sessions.abstract: Discover how Motability Operations, the UK's largest accessible vehicle leasing organization, transformed their fragmented backup environment into a unified, ransomware-resilient architecture using AWS Backup. Learn about their implementation of a distributed, multi-account strategy aligned with the 3-2-1-0 resilience framework, incorporating automated daily restore testing and ransomware scanning. This session explores how they achieved continuous validation of critical data, ensuring clean recovery points are always available to meet strict RTO and RPO targets. Gain insights into evolving from basic backup processes to assured recovery capabilities that protect against modern ransomware threats.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解英国最大的无障碍车辆租赁组织 Motability Operations 如何使用 AWS Backup 将其分散的备份环境转变为统一的抗勒索软件架构。了解他们如何实施符合 3-2-1-0 弹性框架的分布式多账户策略，并结合自动化每日恢复测试和勒索软件扫描。本次会议探讨了他们如何实现关键数据的持续验证，确保始终有干净的恢复点可用，以满足严格的 RTO 和 RPO 目标。深入了解如何从基本备份流程演进到有保障的恢复能力，以抵御现代勒索软件威胁。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Introducing the new Amazon SageMaker notebooks for analytics and ML (ANT212)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 介绍全新的 Amazon SageMaker 笔记本用于分析和机器学习 (ANT212)
sessions.abstract: Getting started with your data shouldn't require hours of setup or juggling multiple tools. Discover how the latest launches for Amazon SageMaker, including one-click onboarding of existing datasets and a new serverless notebook with a built-in AI agent help you move from raw data to production-grade pipelines and applications. We'll show you how our newest announcements translates into faster time-to-value, reduced operational overhead, and the ability to scale from exploration to production.
sessions.abstract_cn: 开始使用您的数据不应该需要数小时的设置或在多个工具之间切换。了解 Amazon SageMaker 的最新发布功能，包括现有数据集的一键式载入和内置 AI 代理的新型无服务器笔记本，如何帮助您从原始数据转向生产级管道和应用程序。我们将向您展示我们的最新公告如何转化为更快的价值实现时间、减少的运营开销，以及从探索到生产的扩展能力。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Derisk your mainframe exit with agentic AI-powered refactoring ft BMW & Fiserv
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过智能AI驱动的重构降低大型机迁移风险，宝马和Fiserv案例分享
sessions.abstract: Discover how industry leaders Fiserv and BMW modernized mission-critical mainframe applications using AWS Transform's agentic AI capabilities. Learn how Fiserv implemented a mainframe modernization factory that reduced modernization time while improving code quality and maintainability of refactored applications. Through BMW's transformation journey, explore how critical systems were migrated to a new technology stack within months, achieving unprecedented speed and efficiency. This session explores AWS Transform's AI-powered capabilities—from code analysis to intelligent refactoring—and their game-changing results. Get practical insights for large-scale refactoring from organizations that have successfully modernized millions of lines of mission-critical code across diverse industries.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解行业领导者Fiserv和BMW如何使用AWS Transform的智能AI功能现代化关键任务大型机应用程序。了解Fiserv如何实施大型机现代化工厂，在提高重构应用程序代码质量和可维护性的同时缩短现代化时间。通过BMW的转型之旅，探索关键系统如何在数月内迁移到新技术栈，实现前所未有的速度和效率。本次会议探讨AWS Transform的AI驱动功能——从代码分析到智能重构——及其颠覆性成果。从成功现代化数百万行跨不同行业关键任务代码的组织中获得大规模重构的实用见解。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI agents in action: Architecting the future of applications (INV202)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI代理实战：构建应用程序的未来架构 (INV202)
sessions.abstract: Explore how agentic AI is transforming cloud-native application architecture, unlocking faster innovation cycles and entirely new application patterns. Learn how new AWS capabilities empower builders to design secure, reasoning-driven agents that orchestrate data, code, and tools at scale, with an emphasis on governance, reliability, and cost efficiency. Discover how AWS customers are deploying production-ready agents today, and learn best practices to help you architect agentic applications that autonomously adapt, optimize, and act in real-time.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索智能体AI如何变革云原生应用架构,释放更快的创新周期并催生全新的应用模式。了解AWS的新功能如何赋能构建者设计安全、推理驱动的智能体,在规模化场景下编排数据、代码和工具,同时强调治理、可靠性和成本效率。发现AWS客户如何在今天部署生产就绪的智能体,并学习最佳实践,帮助您构建能够自主适应、优化和实时行动的智能体应用。

presenter.name: Olawale Oladehin
presenter.title: Managing Director, Solutions Architects - Technology Segments

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate Your Cloud Journey with AWS Transform (TNC208)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 AWS Transform 加速您的云之旅 (TNC208)
sessions.abstract: Embark on a faster, smoother cloud transformation with agentic AI and integrated solutions. This session reveals how AWS Transform accelerates your cloud journey, addressing migration and modernization challenges through intelligent automation. Through real-world examples, discover how to leverage this powerful integration to fast-track your cloud adoption and transformation efforts. With the specialized AI agents of AWS Transform, customers can migrate VMware workloads to Amazon EC2, modernize .NET applications to cross-platform .NET, and modernize IBM z/OS mainframe applications, delivering transformation projects up to 4x faster.
sessions.abstract_cn: 借助智能 AI 和集成解决方案，开启更快速、更顺畅的云转型之旅。本次会议揭示了 AWS Transform 如何通过智能自动化加速您的云之旅，应对迁移和现代化挑战。通过真实案例，了解如何利用这一强大的集成来快速推进您的云采用和转型工作。借助 AWS Transform 的专业 AI 代理，客户可以将 VMware 工作负载迁移到 Amazon EC2，将 .NET 应用程序现代化为跨平台 .NET，并对 IBM z/OS 大型机应用程序进行现代化改造，使转型项目的交付速度提升至多 4 倍。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cyber Risk is Business Risk: Managing Cloud Security Without Disruption(SEC212)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 网络风险即业务风险：在不中断业务的情况下管理云安全(SEC212)
sessions.abstract: Cyber risk is business risk, and managing it without disruption is essential to growth, trust, and resilience. As digital transformation accelerates, organizations face mounting pressure to unify visibility, quantify exposure, and align cybersecurity strategies with business goals. Northeast Georgia Health System exemplifies this shift, strengthening compliance, reducing complexity, and improving operational efficiency by connecting security insights to business outcomes. In this session, learn how NGHS is moving from reactive defense to proactive risk management to drive performance and resilience in the cloud and beyond. This presentation is brought to you by Trend Micro, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 网络风险就是业务风险，在不中断业务的情况下管理网络风险对于增长、信任和韧性至关重要。随着数字化转型的加速，组织面临着统一可见性、量化风险暴露以及将网络安全策略与业务目标保持一致的巨大压力。Northeast Georgia Health System 体现了这一转变，通过将安全洞察与业务成果相连接来加强合规性、降低复杂性并提高运营效率。在本次会议中，了解 NGHS 如何从被动防御转向主动风险管理，以推动云端及其他环境中的性能和韧性。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Trend Micro 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A leader's guide to navigating multicloud strategies and decisions (SNR204)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 领导者多云策略和决策导航指南 (SNR204)
sessions.abstract: As organizations seek to accelerate their cloud migration and transformation, some find themselves in situations where they have to manage IT operations in a multicloud environment, or simply decide whether and how to adopt a multicloud strategy in the first place. Leaders must consider how operating multiple cloud environments impacts business outcomes and their ability to innovate.  In this session, the AWS Enterprise Strategy team will share unique insights and prescriptive guidance for successfully navigating multicloud decisions and difficulties gleaned from thousands of engagements with leading organizations and extensive research into how multicloud impacts cloud adoption and transformation.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着组织寻求加速其云迁移和转型，一些组织发现自己处于必须在多云环境中管理IT运营的情况下，或者只是决定是否以及如何首先采用多云策略。领导者必须考虑运营多个云环境如何影响业务成果和他们的创新能力。在本次会议中，AWS企业策略团队将分享独特的见解和规范性指导，帮助成功应对多云决策和困难，这些见解来自与领先组织的数千次接触以及对多云如何影响云采用和转型的广泛研究。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Keynote with Peter DeSantis and Dave Brown
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Peter DeSantis 和 Dave Brown 主题演讲
sessions.abstract: Join AWS SVP Peter DeSantis and Dave Brown, Vice President of Compute and Machine Learning Services as they dive deep into the technology that powers AWS services. Get a closer look at how our unique approach and culture of innovation help create leading-edge solutions, from silicon to services.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入AWS高级副总裁Peter DeSantis和计算与机器学习服务副总裁Dave Brown，深入探讨为AWS服务提供支持的技术。近距离了解我们独特的方法和创新文化如何帮助创建领先的解决方案，从芯片到服务。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagining Business Processes with Joule Agents (AIM107)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Joule 代理重新构想业务流程 (AIM107)
sessions.abstract: See how enterprises are achieving measurable business results with generative AI solutions built on SAP Business Technology Platform (SAP BTP) and powered by AWS. Explore high-impact use cases—from optimizing supply chains and forecasting financial performance to strengthening operational resilience and deploying intelligent AI agents that work seamlessly across business processes. Discover how to combine trusted SAP data with AWS GenAI services and tap into the expertise of a broad partner ecosystem to accelerate solution development, reduce risk, and deliver greater business impact This presentation is brought to you by SAP, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解企业如何通过基于SAP业务技术平台(SAP BTP)构建并由AWS驱动的生成式AI解决方案实现可衡量的业务成果。探索高影响力用例——从优化供应链和预测财务绩效到加强运营韧性以及部署能够在业务流程中无缝协作的智能AI代理。了解如何将可信的SAP数据与AWS GenAI服务相结合，并利用广泛合作伙伴生态系统的专业知识来加速解决方案开发、降低风险并产生更大的业务影响。本演示由AWS合作伙伴SAP为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building for Efficiency & Reliability with Performance Testing on AWS (CMP351)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过AWS性能测试构建高效可靠的系统 (CMP351)
sessions.abstract: Learn how to run and leverage performance testing on AWS to drive cost optimization, validate system behavior, identify bottlenecks, and significantly improve reliability, while informing architectural decisions and optimal instance type selection for your workloads. You'll discover methods for pinpointing performance thresholds across different traffic patterns and understanding system reliability when stressed beyond normal parameters. Dive deep into techniques for measuring critical percentiles and determining breaking points as demand fluctuates, ultimately architecting for improved efficiency and building confidence in your system's resilience at scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 学习如何在AWS上运行和利用性能测试来推动成本优化、验证系统行为、识别瓶颈并显著提高可靠性，同时为架构决策和工作负载的最佳实例类型选择提供依据。您将发现在不同流量模式下精确定位性能阈值的方法，以及了解系统在超出正常参数压力下的可靠性。深入探讨测量关键百分位数和确定需求波动时临界点的技术，最终实现更高效的架构设计，并建立对系统大规模弹性的信心。

presenter.name: Luis Guirigay
presenter.title: WW Head Infrastructure Solutions on AWS

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Behind the curtain: How Amazon’s AI innovations are powered by AWS (INV211)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 幕后揭秘：亚马逊的AI创新如何由AWS提供支持 (INV211)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Amazon leaders across Zoox, Prime Video, and Amazon Stores are leveraging AI to power their next-generation innovations with AWS and create better experiences for customers. Through three key stories discover how customer needs sparked transformative experiences: fan feedback revolutionizing sports broadcasting with AI-powered highlights, shopping patterns evolving Amazon’s mobile commerce platform, and robotics and automation delivering advances in supply chain optimization and fulfillment. Learn the best practices Amazon has applied using AWS that can help scale innovation in your organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解亚马逊 Zoox、Prime Video 和 Amazon Stores 的领导者如何利用 AI 和 AWS 推动下一代创新，为客户创造更好的体验。通过三个关键案例了解客户需求如何激发变革性体验：球迷反馈通过 AI 驱动的精彩集锦彻底改变体育转播、购物模式推动亚马逊移动商务平台演进，以及机器人技术和自动化在供应链优化和履约方面取得的进展。学习亚马逊使用 AWS 应用的最佳实践，这些实践可以帮助您的组织扩展创新。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming contact centers in financial services with Amazon Connect (BIZ220)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Connect 转型金融服务联络中心 (BIZ220)
sessions.abstract: In financial services, balancing personalization with compliance and security presents unique challenges to delivering superior customer experiences. Zepz, the global payments group behind leading remittance brands WorldRemit and Sendwave, began their Amazon Connect journey in 2021. Operating in over 130 countries with 5,000+ money transfer corridors and facilitating more than $16 billion in transfers, Zepz has transformed their customer service operations. In this session, learn how they manage 20 million customer profiles while achieving impressive results: 30% contact deflection using generative AI, comprehensive analytics across all voice and chat interactions, case and ticket management, data-driven quality assurance, and modernized customer feedback systems.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在金融服务领域，平衡个性化与合规性和安全性为提供卓越客户体验带来了独特挑战。Zepz是全球支付集团，旗下拥有领先的汇款品牌WorldRemit和Sendwave，于2021年开始了他们的Amazon Connect之旅。Zepz在130多个国家运营，拥有5000多条汇款通道，促成了超过160亿美元的转账，已经转型了他们的客户服务运营。在本次会议中，了解他们如何管理2000万客户档案，同时取得令人印象深刻的成果：使用生成式AI实现30%的联系转移，对所有语音和聊天交互进行全面分析，案例和工单管理，数据驱动的质量保证，以及现代化的客户反馈系统。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Speed to Impact: AI Factory in the Cloud with NVIDIA on AWS (AIM116)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 影响速度：基于AWS的NVIDIA云端AI工厂 (AIM116)
sessions.abstract: Developing and deploying mission-critical AI systems is increasingly complex and resource-intensive. This panel discussion demonstrates how organizations can accelerate AI development with turnkey, full-stack AI factories in the cloud—combining NVIDIA’s optimized hardware, software, and AI expertise with AWS’ scalable, co-engineered infrastructure. Attendees will hear customer success stories illustrating how this collaboration enables rapid, efficient delivery of advanced generative and Agentic AI applications by optimizing every infrastructure layer and leveraging best-in-class tools from both NVIDIA and AWS. This presentation is brought to you by NVIDIA, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 开发和部署关键任务AI系统日益复杂且资源密集。本小组讨论展示了组织如何通过云端一站式全栈AI工厂加速AI开发——结合NVIDIA优化的硬件、软件和AI专业知识与AWS可扩展的协同工程基础设施。与会者将听到客户成功案例，说明这种合作如何通过优化每个基础设施层并利用NVIDIA和AWS的顶级工具，实现先进生成式和智能体AI应用的快速高效交付。本演示由AWS合作伙伴NVIDIA提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming Supply Chains with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore (API206)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 转型供应链 (API206)
sessions.abstract: Supply chain management has become increasingly challenging in recent years, with rapidly changing requirements and limitations. Our SCM systems must evolve to meet this demanding environment. Learn how we applied Agentic and Autonomous AI agents, built leveraging the power of Amazon Bedrock AgentCore, to reimagine how supply chain teams can address this growing complexity and accelerate our customers’ ability to adapt in the ever more dynamic market. This presentation is brought to you by Fujitsu, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 供应链管理在近年来变得越来越具有挑战性，需求和限制快速变化。我们的SCM系统必须不断发展以适应这种苛刻的环境。了解我们如何应用基于Amazon Bedrock AgentCore强大功能构建的代理式和自主AI智能体，重新构想供应链团队如何应对这种日益增长的复杂性，并加速我们客户在日益动态的市场中的适应能力。本演示由AWS合作伙伴富士通为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-How to build an AI Engine to generate near real time insights for videos at scale
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 如何构建AI引擎以大规模生成视频的近实时洞察
sessions.abstract: Japanese startup, SDio, has been transforming streaming data into actionable intelligence through cutting-edge Deep Search & Analytics empowering enterprises with precise video and audio intelligence to redefine business agility.  Find out how they built large scale video understanding engine to unlock intelligence for enterprises.
sessions.abstract_cn: 日本初创公司SDio一直致力于通过尖端的深度搜索与分析技术将流数据转化为可操作的智能洞察，为企业提供精准的视频和音频智能，重新定义业务敏捷性。了解他们如何构建大规模视频理解引擎，为企业释放智能价值。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building autonomous AI at scale with Amazon Bedrock (AIM390)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock 大规模构建自主 AI (AIM390)
sessions.abstract: Building autonomous AI at scale with Amazon Bedrock	2025 marks the breakthrough year for autonomous AI systems, from vibe coding to specialized assistants and super agents disrupting multi-billion dollar industries. Amazon Bedrock empowers disruptive startups to rapidly prototype autonomous applications and agents, seamlessly scaling from proof-of-concept to production systems serving millions of users. We'll tackle top scaling challenges, share best practices, and hear from Genspark, a cutting-edge super agent startup, showcasing their complete journey—from rapid MVP development to handling production traffic at scale. Discover specific Bedrock capabilities and support programs that optimize performance, reduce cost, achieve global scalability, and enable your vision without enterprise-level infrastructure investments.
sessions.abstract_cn: 使用 Amazon Bedrock 大规模构建自主 AI2025 年标志着自主 AI 系统的突破之年，从氛围编码到专业助手和颠覆数十亿美元产业的超级代理。Amazon Bedrock 赋能颠覆性初创企业快速原型化自主应用程序和代理，无缝扩展从概念验证到服务数百万用户的生产系统。我们将解决主要扩展挑战，分享最佳实践，并听取 Genspark（一家前沿超级代理初创公司）的经验，展示他们的完整旅程——从快速 MVP 开发到大规模处理生产流量。了解特定的 Bedrock 功能和支持计划，这些功能可优化性能、降低成本、实现全球可扩展性，并在无需企业级基础设施投资的情况下实现您的愿景。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Evaluating architectural trade-offs: Cloud patterns for flexibility (ARC321)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 评估架构权衡：云灵活性模式 (ARC321)
sessions.abstract: Transform traditional lock-in concerns into strategic architectural decisions using practical evaluation frameworks. Learn how organizations leverage proven analysis tools to assess switching costs against unique service capabilities. Explore patterns for determining when AWS-native services provide the best value versus when portability matters most. Through real-world examples, discover how to make pragmatic architectural choices that maximize business impact. Gain actionable strategies for balancing strategic flexibility with AWS-optimized patterns.
sessions.abstract_cn: 将传统的供应商锁定顾虑转化为战略性架构决策，使用实用的评估框架。了解组织如何利用经过验证的分析工具来评估切换成本与独特服务能力之间的权衡。探索用于确定何时AWS原生服务提供最佳价值以及何时可移植性最为重要的模式。通过真实案例，发现如何做出务实的架构选择以最大化业务影响。获得平衡战略灵活性与AWS优化模式的可行策略。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Architecting AI solutions for mission-critical systems w/ UK MetOffice (ARC406)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 与英国气象局共同构建关键任务系统的AI解决方案架构 (ARC406)
sessions.abstract: Explore how organizations can transform mission-critical operations using generative AI through the lens of the UK Met Office's journey. This session provides an in-depth look at a dual-model approach using Large Language Models (LLMs) and Vision Language Models (VLMs), achieving 62% and 52% accuracy respectively. Examine architectural patterns for complex data processing using Amazon Bedrock, Amazon SageMaker, and AWS CDK, with insights into fine-tuning Amazon Nova models for precise maritime forecasting. Discover how cloud-native, serverless architectures can modernize traditional systems while maintaining reliability.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索组织如何通过英国气象局的实践历程，利用生成式AI转型关键任务运营。本次会议深入剖析了采用大语言模型(LLM)和视觉语言模型(VLM)的双模型方法，分别实现了62%和52%的准确率。研究使用Amazon Bedrock、Amazon SageMaker和AWS CDK进行复杂数据处理的架构模式，并深入了解如何微调Amazon Nova模型以实现精确的海事预报。探讨云原生无服务器架构如何在保持可靠性的同时实现传统系统的现代化改造。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Maximizing EC2 Performance: A Hands-on Guide to Instance Optimization  (CMP333)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 最大化 EC2 性能：实例优化实践指南 (CMP333)
sessions.abstract: In this hands-on session, learn to build robust data perimeter controls using service control policies (SCPs), resource control policies (RCPs), and VPC endpoint policies to protect sensitive data across AWS accounts. Through hands-on labs, you’ll build data perimeter policies for real-life security scenarios and validate their effectiveness using a custom assessment tool. Learn practical techniques on how to ensure only trusted identities can access trusted resources from expected networks.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在这个实践课程中，学习使用服务控制策略（SCP）、资源控制策略（RCP）和VPC终端节点策略构建强大的数据边界控制，以保护AWS账户中的敏感数据。通过实践实验，您将为真实的安全场景构建数据边界策略，并使用自定义评估工具验证其有效性。学习实用技术，确保只有受信任的身份可以从预期网络访问受信任的资源。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Automate any business process using Amazon Quick Suite (BIZ224)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Quick Suite 自动化任何业务流程 (BIZ224)
sessions.abstract: Discover how to automate any business process using Amazon Quick Flows and Amazon Quick Automate, empowering every user in your organization to safely leverage agentic AI. Learn from real-world success stories as companies like 3M, Kitsa, dLocal, and Propulse Labs use Amazon Quick Suite to save time and money while improving customer outcomes. Hear directly from Jabil as they share their automation success story leveraging Amazon Quick Suite's automation capabilities, key insights, and vision for scaling automation enterprise-wide. Walk away with practical insights for implementing agentic automations to transform how you and your teams work.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何使用 Amazon Quick Flows 和 Amazon Quick Automate 自动化任何业务流程，使组织中的每位用户都能安全地利用智能体 AI。从 3M、Kitsa、dLocal 和 Propulse Labs 等公司的真实成功案例中学习，了解他们如何使用 Amazon Quick Suite 节省时间和成本，同时改善客户成果。直接聆听 Jabil 分享他们利用 Amazon Quick Suite 自动化能力实现的自动化成功故事、关键洞察以及在企业范围内扩展自动化的愿景。获取实施智能体自动化的实用见解，以转变您和团队的工作方式。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Maximize ROI: How Octus migrated CreditAI from Azure to Amazon Bedrock (SMB305)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 最大化投资回报率:Octus 如何将 CreditAI 从 Azure 迁移到 Amazon Bedrock (SMB305)
sessions.abstract: This session reveals how Octus migrated CreditAI to Amazon Bedrock. We will detail Octus' journey from managing multiple cloud providers and costly GPU instances to implementing a streamlined architecture using Amazon Bedrock, AWS Fargate, and Amazon OpenSearch. Learn how Octus achieved zero downtime while reducing costs, improving scalability to handle millions of documents, and enhancing response quality. Discover practical strategies for consolidating AI operations and leveraging AWS to deliver powerful, conversational intelligence at enterprise scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本次会议展示了 Octus 如何将 CreditAI 迁移到 Amazon Bedrock。我们将详细介绍 Octus 从管理多个云服务提供商和昂贵的 GPU 实例，到使用 Amazon Bedrock、AWS Fargate 和 Amazon OpenSearch 实现精简架构的历程。了解 Octus 如何在实现零停机的同时降低成本、提升可扩展性以处理数百万份文档，并增强响应质量。探索整合 AI 运营的实用策略，以及如何利用 AWS 在企业规模上提供强大的对话式智能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scaling Data Transformation w/ dbt & Nasdaq: Unlocking Ent Power Global Mkts
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 dbt 和纳斯达克扩展数据转换：释放企业级力量驱动全球市场
sessions.abstract: As organizations expand into new markets, scaling data transformation capabilities while maintaining consistency and best practices becomes critical. In this session, Nasdaq shares how it is partnering with dbt to deliver enterprise-grade transformation tooling to their customers through an OEM approach. By embedding dbt Enterprise alongside Nasdaq’s library of best practices, macros, and reusable pipeline templates, customers can accelerate their data initiatives and build their own transformation workflows with confidence. Drawing from data mesh concepts, this joint presentation will showcase how clients can leverage standardized contracts and pipelines while tailoring solutions to their unique needs This presentation is brought to you by dbt Labs, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着组织向新市场扩张，在保持一致性和最佳实践的同时扩展数据转换能力变得至关重要。在本次会议中，纳斯达克分享了其如何与 dbt 合作，通过 OEM 方式向客户提供企业级转换工具。通过将 dbt Enterprise 与纳斯达克的最佳实践库、宏和可重用管道模板相结合，客户可以加速其数据计划并自信地构建自己的转换工作流。本联合演示将借鉴数据网格概念，展示客户如何利用标准化合约和管道，同时根据其独特需求定制解决方案。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 dbt Labs 提供支持。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From VM to Cloud: Tenable’s Approach to Cloud Vulnerability Management (HMC306)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从虚拟机到云：Tenable 的云漏洞管理方法 (HMC306)
sessions.abstract: As organizations adopt cloud infrastructure, a critical challenge emerges: how to be effective in managing vulnerabilities across disparate on-premises and cloud environments. This session introduces Tenable's new Cloud Vulnerability Management offering. We'll demonstrate several highly industry-relevant use cases for which Tenable Cloud VM provides comprehensive visibility and actionable insights. Through Tenable One, you can gain that same seamless visibility with other Tenable products as well. Join us to see how this Tenable offering can improve and make VM easier for your cloud workloads and with a consistent, single pane of glass. This presentation is brought to you by Tenable, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着组织采用云基础设施，出现了一个关键挑战：如何有效管理分散的本地和云环境中的漏洞。本次会议介绍了 Tenable 的新云漏洞管理产品。我们将演示几个与行业高度相关的用例，Tenable Cloud VM 为这些用例提供全面的可见性和可操作的洞察。通过 Tenable One，您也可以获得与其他 Tenable 产品相同的无缝可见性。加入我们，了解这一 Tenable 产品如何改进并简化您的云工作负载的漏洞管理，提供一致的单一管理界面。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Tenable 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Automating IAM policy validation and analysis using GitHub Actions  (SEC341)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 GitHub Actions 自动化 IAM 策略验证和分析 (SEC341)
sessions.abstract: In this code talk, we'll demonstrate how to automate the validation and analysis of AWS IAM policies using GitHub Actions and IAM Access Analyzer. Through live coding examples, you'll see how policy validation and analysis, powered by automated reasoning, can minimise deployment of unwanted IAM policies. While security teams oversee organizational security posture, developers create applications needing permissions. Watch as we code the solution for enabling developer speed with security through delegated IAM policy authoring. Through interactive demonstrations, you'll learn how cfn-policy-validator and GitHub Actions can automatically validate and analyze IAM policies to uphold security when permitting developers policy authoring abilities. Follow along with the code as we show you how to enable developer speed without compromising security posture.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在这个代码演讲中，我们将演示如何使用GitHub Actions和IAM Access Analyzer自动化验证和分析AWS IAM策略。通过实时编码示例，您将看到由自动推理驱动的策略验证和分析如何最大限度地减少不需要的IAM策略的部署。虽然安全团队负责监督组织安全态势，但开发人员创建需要权限的应用程序。观看我们编写解决方案，通过委托IAM策略编写实现开发人员速度与安全性的平衡。通过交互式演示，您将学习cfn-policy-validator和GitHub Actions如何自动验证和分析IAM策略，在允许开发人员策略编写能力的同时维护安全性。跟随代码演示，我们将向您展示如何在不影响安全态势的情况下提高开发人员速度。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic Workflows: How Salesforce Manages 1000+ Clusters (OPN310)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 代理工作流：Salesforce 如何管理 1000+ 个集群 (OPN310)
sessions.abstract: As Kubernetes environments grow increasingly complex, platform teams struggle with the escalating challenges of managing multi-tenant clusters efficiently. This session presents a groundbreaking approach to Kubernetes operations, leveraging generative AI and multi-agent collaboration to create a self-healing, intelligent cluster management system. Drawing from real-world implementations, the session will demonstrate how Salesforce were able to manage and troubleshoot over 1,000 Kubernetes clusters using intelligent agents, dramatically reducing mean time to identify (MTTI) and mean time to resolve (MTTR).
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着 Kubernetes 环境日益复杂，平台团队在高效管理多租户集群方面面临着不断升级的挑战。本次会议展示了一种突破性的 Kubernetes 运维方法，利用生成式 AI 和多智能体协作来创建自愈的智能集群管理系统。会议将基于真实世界的实施案例，演示 Salesforce 如何使用智能代理管理和排查超过 1,000 个 Kubernetes 集群，显著降低平均识别时间 (MTTI) 和平均解决时间 (MTTR)。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Migrate, modernize, and move your business into the AI era (INV212)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 迁移、现代化并将您的业务带入AI时代 (INV212)
sessions.abstract: Legacy systems shouldn't hold back your AI ambitions. Join Dr. Asa Kalavade to see how AWS is making migration and modernization simpler and faster with agentic AI, building on nearly two decades of enterprise experience. Learn how we're using AI to build domain-specific agents that continuously learn, streamlining and accelerating transformations like never before. Recognizing the collaborative nature of transformation projects, see how we're building a new composable experience integrating first and third-party agents. Through customer success stories and interactive fireside chats with customers and partners, you'll learn proven approaches to accelerate your enterprise AI transformation.
sessions.abstract_cn: 传统系统不应阻碍您的AI雄心。加入Asa Kalavade博士，了解AWS如何利用代理AI，基于近二十年的企业经验，使迁移和现代化变得更简单、更快速。了解我们如何使用AI构建持续学习的特定领域代理，以前所未有的方式简化和加速转型。认识到转型项目的协作性质，了解我们如何构建集成第一方和第三方代理的新型可组合体验。通过客户成功案例以及与客户和合作伙伴的互动炉边谈话，您将学习加速企业AI转型的成熟方法。

presenter.name: Daryl Hammett
presenter.title: Director, AI/ML and Operations AWS Marketing

presenter.name: Morgan Lunt
presenter.title: Senior Product Manager - Technical, External Services

presenter.name: Sree Ratnasinghe
presenter.title: Director, Customer Solutions, AWS Strategic Accounts

presenter.name: Ravinder Khokhar
presenter.title: Global Head of Cloud for Financial Services

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI, Cloud & Public Sector Transformation: PwC & AWS Driving Change Now (AIM115)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI、云计算与公共部门转型：普华永道与AWS共同推动变革 (AIM115)
sessions.abstract: Join this dynamic session to see how PwC and AWS are redefining public sector service with cloud and AI. Medway NHS Foundation Trust has deployed an AI-powered contact solution that streamlines patient inquiries, bookings, and follow-ups, slashing wait times and easing staff workloads, while upholding data security and NHS compliance. Meanwhile, Birmingham City Council, in partnership with PwC and AWS, migrated legacy services to a scalable cloud platform, boosting service delivery, resilience, and cross department collaboration. Attendees will explore governance, risk management, cyber security, and disaster recovery, plus tangible wins: reduced on-prem dependence and faster, data driven decision making for smarter outcomes. This presentation is brought to you by PwC, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入这个动态会议，了解普华永道和AWS如何通过云计算和人工智能重新定义公共部门服务。梅德韦NHS基金会信托部署了AI驱动的联系解决方案，简化患者咨询、预约和跟进流程，大幅缩短等待时间并减轻员工工作负担，同时维护数据安全和NHS合规性。与此同时，伯明翰市议会与普华永道和AWS合作，将传统服务迁移到可扩展的云平台，提升服务交付、弹性和跨部门协作。与会者将探讨治理、风险管理、网络安全和灾难恢复，以及切实收益：减少本地部署依赖，实现更快速、数据驱动的决策制定，获得更智能的成果。本演示由AWS合作伙伴普华永道为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Sky’s the limit with crew operations modernization for United Airlines(AIM2200)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 联合航空机组运营现代化的无限可能(AIM2200)
sessions.abstract: United has embarked on a modernization program for the team central to achieving its mission of “connecting people” and “uniting the world”: flight crews. For crew operations, real-time visibility, collaborative communication, and streamlined scheduling tools are essential for fast responses during IRROPS, optimize resource usage, and on-time departures. United partnered with TCS to transform crew operation’s tools and processes. TCS leaders will discuss approach to modernizing United’s legacy systems on AWS to build UCREW, a crew tracking and monitoring platform. Sean Carson, United Airlines Managing Director, will share how UCREW has enhanced operational agility, improved decision-making, and affirmed system reliability and resiliency. This presentation is brought to you by Tata Consultancy Services, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 美联航启动了一项现代化计划，针对实现其"连接人们"和"团结世界"使命的核心团队：飞行机组人员。对于机组运营而言，实时可见性、协作沟通和简化的调度工具对于在不正常运营期间快速响应、优化资源使用和准时起飞至关重要。美联航与TCS合作，转型机组运营的工具和流程。TCS领导者将讨论在AWS上现代化美联航遗留系统以构建UCREW（机组跟踪和监控平台）的方法。美联航董事总经理Sean Carson将分享UCREW如何增强运营敏捷性、改善决策制定，并确认系统可靠性和弹性。本演示由AWS合作伙伴塔塔咨询服务公司为您呈现。

presenter.name: Sean Carson
presenter.title: Managing Director, Field Services and Engineering

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Networking and observability strategies for Kubernetes (CNS417)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Kubernetes网络和可观测性策略 (CNS417)
sessions.abstract: Join this session to explore advanced networking and observability capabilities in Amazon EKS, from securing multi-tenant environments to gaining deep visibility into cluster traffic patterns. We'll share comprehensive strategies for implementing layered network security controls at both infrastructure and application layers which enable granular traffic observability and optimize network performance across distributed workloads. Learn best practices for fine-grained access control, efficient traffic monitoring, and automated policy enforcement. Finally, discover how to leverage Amazon EKS' integration with AWS services to build robust, observable, and secure Kubernetes environments while maintaining operational efficiency.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入此会话，探索 Amazon EKS 中的高级网络和可观测性功能，从保护多租户环境到深入了解集群流量模式。我们将分享在基础设施和应用程序层实施分层网络安全控制的综合策略，这些策略能够实现精细的流量可观测性并优化分布式工作负载的网络性能。学习精细访问控制、高效流量监控和自动化策略执行的最佳实践。最后，了解如何利用 Amazon EKS 与 AWS 服务的集成来构建强大、可观测且安全的 Kubernetes 环境，同时保持运营效率。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build a Future-Ready SOC:Transform security logging with OCSF and generative AI
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建面向未来的SOC：利用OCSF和生成式AI转型安全日志
sessions.abstract: Learn how Merck revolutionized their central logging using Open Cybersecurity Schema Framework (OCSF) to achieve 48% labor efficiency gains and 47% infrastructure cost reduction. Discover how OCSF enables generative AI insights, reducing time-to-insight from full-day analysis to 30-minute solutions. Witness the power of OCSF using Agentic SOC AI Demo.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解默克如何利用开放网络安全架构框架(OCSF)彻底改革其中央日志系统,实现48%的劳动效率提升和47%的基础设施成本降低。探索OCSF如何实现生成式AI洞察,将洞察时间从全天分析缩短至30分钟解决方案。通过Agentic SOC AI演示见证OCSF的强大功能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Demystify attestation: Cryptographically verify execution environment (CMP317)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 揭秘认证：加密验证执行环境 (CMP317)
sessions.abstract: Highly sensitive workloads often rely on cryptographic proof about the code, config and other aspects of the execution environment before unsealing code, data to be processed. In this code talk we will see examples of cryptographic attestation using AWS Nitro Enclaves, NitroTPM and Amazon EC2 Instance Identification document. We will also visit common scenarios where this is useful in multi party computation setups for data analytics, Generative AI.
sessions.abstract_cn: 高度敏感的工作负载通常依赖于对代码、配置和执行环境其他方面的加密证明，然后才会解封代码和待处理数据。在本次代码讲座中，我们将看到使用 AWS Nitro Enclaves、NitroTPM 和 Amazon EC2 实例标识文档进行加密认证的示例。我们还将探讨这在多方计算设置中对数据分析和生成式 AI 有用的常见场景。

presenter.name: Alexander Graf (AWS)
presenter.title: Principal Engineer
presenter.company: Amazon Web Services Development Center Germany GmbH

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Powering Real-Time Applications with a Modernized Cache (API210)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用现代化缓存为实时应用程序提供动力 (API210)
sessions.abstract: Caching has evolved beyond key-value lookups. Modern applications demand flexibility and extreme performance. Redis 8 introduces two major innovations: Client-side caching, which solves the “hot keys” problem by storing frequently accessed data near the application and cascading invalidations for scalability under load; and the Redis Query Engine, enabling search across nested JSON and complex data types. Redis 8.4 further reduces JSON memory usage and adds new commands. Combined with Redis Data Integration (RDI), Redis now serves as a high-speed data layer for real-time apps in e-commerce, healthcare, fintech, and AI. iFood is joining this session to share their Redis journey. This presentation is brought to you by Redis, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 缓存已经超越了键值查找。现代应用程序需要灵活性和极致性能。Redis 8 引入了两项重大创新：客户端缓存，通过在应用程序附近存储频繁访问的数据和级联失效来解决"热键"问题，实现负载下的可扩展性；以及 Redis Query Engine，支持跨嵌套 JSON 和复杂数据类型的搜索。Redis 8.4 进一步减少了 JSON 内存使用并添加了新命令。结合 Redis Data Integration (RDI)，Redis 现在可作为电子商务、医疗保健、金融科技和人工智能实时应用程序的高速数据层。iFood 将加入本次会议分享他们的 Redis 之旅。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Redis 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 800GB of AI data: Lessons from a failed project (DEV345)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 800GB的AI数据：一个失败项目的教训 (DEV345)
sessions.abstract: What happens when an ambitious AI project runs into scale, cost, and data hurdles? This session examines the attempt to process 800GB of gameplay data with AI and the technical roadblocks that prevented completion. Learn about the infrastructure bottlenecks, data preparation issues, and cost overruns that derailed the effort. Discover practical lessons to apply when managing large-scale AI workloads on AWS.
sessions.abstract_cn: 当一个雄心勃勃的AI项目遇到规模、成本和数据障碍时会发生什么？本次会议探讨了尝试使用AI处理800GB游戏数据以及阻碍项目完成的技术障碍。了解导致项目失败的基础设施瓶颈、数据准备问题和成本超支。发现在AWS上管理大规模AI工作负载时可应用的实用经验教训。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scaling MONOPOLY GO! to millions with DynamoDB & ElastiCache (DAT324)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 DynamoDB 和 ElastiCache 将 MONOPOLY GO! 扩展至数百万用户 (DAT324)
sessions.abstract: Curious how to scale a global gaming phenomenon with minimal to no resources? In this session, join Scopely to learn how they used Amazon DynamoDB and Amazon ElastiCache Serverless to power MONOPOLY GO!'s rapid growth, handling an incredible 2.1 million writes per second at peak traffic. Learn the architectural patterns and optimization strategies that enabled seamless matchmaking, friend discovery, and real-time gameplay for millions of concurrent users. Explore practical insights on managing unpredictable traffic spikes, reducing operational complexity, and achieving cost savings through serverless technologies.
sessions.abstract_cn: 想了解如何以最少甚至零资源扩展全球游戏现象级产品？在本次会议中，与 Scopely 一起了解他们如何使用 Amazon DynamoDB 和 Amazon ElastiCache Serverless 为 MONOPOLY GO! 的快速增长提供支持，在流量高峰期处理高达每秒 210 万次写入。了解支持数百万并发用户实现无缝匹配、好友发现和实时游戏的架构模式和优化策略。探索管理不可预测流量峰值、降低运营复杂性以及通过无服务器技术实现成本节约的实用见解。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Centralize Multicloud Management using AWS (COP342)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 集中化多云管理 (COP342)
sessions.abstract: Operating in a multicloud environment can introduce operational complexity. In this session, learn to streamline operations with AWS Systems Manager, which allows for easier instance management across all environments. Gain insights into performance with Amazon CloudWatch and Amazon Managed Grafana, which delivers a unified dashboard of metrics and logs from any data source. With these services, you can simplify day-to-day tasks, maintain control, and optimize resources; whether your workloads span AWS, on-premises, or multiple clouds. Take the complexity out of multicloud and focus on what really matters—running your business.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在多云环境中运营可能会带来操作复杂性。在本次会议中，学习如何使用 AWS Systems Manager 简化操作，它允许在所有环境中更轻松地管理实例。通过 Amazon CloudWatch 和 Amazon Managed Grafana 获得性能洞察，后者提供来自任何数据源的指标和日志的统一仪表板。借助这些服务，您可以简化日常任务、保持控制并优化资源；无论您的工作负载跨越 AWS、本地还是多个云。消除多云的复杂性，专注于真正重要的事情——运营您的业务。

presenter.name: Erik Weber
presenter.title: Sr. WW Specialist SA, Cloud Operations

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building event-driven architectures using Amazon ECS with AWS Fargate (CNS307)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon ECS 和 AWS Fargate 构建事件驱动架构 (CNS307)
sessions.abstract: Event-driven architecture (EDA) enables organizations to build highly flexible and resilient systems, and customers are leveraging serverless containers to run EDA workloads due to its ease of use, scalability, and deep integrations with AWS serverless services. This session explores practical aspects of implementing EDA on Amazon ECS with AWS Fargate, focusing on patterns for consuming events in containerized environments using AWS Step Functions, Amazon SQS, and Amazon EventBridge. Learn how to build scalable, fault-tolerant, and event-driven solutions that can adapt to changing business requirements.
sessions.abstract_cn: 事件驱动架构（EDA）使组织能够构建高度灵活和弹性的系统，客户正在利用无服务器容器来运行EDA工作负载，因为它易于使用、可扩展性强，并与AWS无服务器服务深度集成。本会议探讨在Amazon ECS与AWS Fargate上实施EDA的实际方面，重点关注使用AWS Step Functions、Amazon SQS和Amazon EventBridge在容器化环境中消费事件的模式。学习如何构建可扩展、容错和事件驱动的解决方案，以适应不断变化的业务需求。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Zero Trust for Agentic Systems: Managing Non-Human Identities at Scale (SEC211)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 代理系统的零信任：大规模管理非人类身份 (SEC211)
