sessions.abstract: Agentic systems—AI-driven applications that autonomously act across services—are transforming enterprise workflows, but they also create a surge in non-human identities (NHIs) and secrets that expand the attack surface. In this session, we’ll explore a vulnerable agentic application scenario to illustrate the risks of static credentials, permissive access, and leaked secrets. We’ll then demonstrate how HashiCorp Vault and HCP Vault Radar enable a zero-trust architecture that mitigates these threats while preserving developer agility. Attendees will leave with practical strategies to secure agentic systems from development to production on AWS. This presentation is brought to you by HashiCorp, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 代理系统——跨服务自主运行的AI驱动应用程序——正在改变企业工作流程，但它们也会导致非人类身份(NHI)和密钥激增，从而扩大攻击面。在本次会议中，我们将探讨一个易受攻击的代理应用程序场景，以说明静态凭证、宽松访问权限和泄露密钥的风险。然后我们将演示HashiCorp Vault和HCP Vault Radar如何实现零信任架构，在保持开发者敏捷性的同时缓解这些威胁。与会者将获得在AWS上从开发到生产环境保护代理系统的实用策略。本演示由AWS合作伙伴HashiCorp提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Support: New Tiers Making Customer Operations Effortless (SPS325)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Support：让客户运营变得轻松的新层级 (SPS325)
sessions.abstract: Discover how AWS is revolutionizing customer support with newly announced support tiers designed to make operations seamless and effortless. Learn how these enhanced tiers provide tailored guidance, proactive monitoring, and faster resolution times that align with your business needs. Whether you're a startup scaling rapidly or an enterprise managing complex workloads, explore how the new support structure delivers the right level of expertise at the right time. Join us to understand the benefits of each tier, migration paths, and real-world examples of customers who've transformed their operations through strategic support engagement. Walk away with actionable insights to optimize your AWS support experience.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 AWS 如何通过新推出的支持层级彻底改变客户支持，这些层级旨在使运营无缝且轻松。了解这些增强的层级如何提供量身定制的指导、主动监控以及符合您业务需求的更快解决时间。无论您是快速扩展的初创公司还是管理复杂工作负载的企业，探索新的支持结构如何在正确的时间提供正确级别的专业知识。加入我们，了解每个层级的优势、迁移路径以及通过战略支持参与转变其运营的客户真实案例。带走可操作的见解，以优化您的 AWS 支持体验。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Basketball's AI Revolution: How AWS and the NBA Are Changing the Game (SPF102)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 篮球的AI革命：AWS和NBA如何改变比赛 (SPF102)
sessions.abstract:
The NBA is undergoing a digital revolution powered by AWS. This session explores how cloud computing, AI, and advanced analytics are transforming basketball—from fan engagement and personalized content to immersive viewing experiences and sophisticated game analytics.

Discover how Prime Video and the NBA harness AWS to deliver cutting-edge game analysis and revolutionary viewing options. Learn how cloud infrastructure enables real-time insights, predictive modeling, and AI-driven experiences that reshape how teams strategize, players develop, and millions of fans engage globally.

This isn't just basketball—it's operating advanced analytics and ML at global scale. The technical lessons apply across industries, from real-time platforms to personalized content delivery and production AI.
sessions.abstract_cn:
NBA正在经历由AWS驱动的数字化革命。本次会议探讨云计算、人工智能和高级分析如何改变篮球运动——从球迷参与和个性化内容到沉浸式观看体验和复杂的比赛分析。

了解Prime Video和NBA如何利用AWS提供前沿的比赛分析和革命性的观看选项。学习云基础设施如何实现实时洞察、预测建模和AI驱动的体验，重塑团队制定策略、球员发展以及全球数百万球迷参与的方式。

这不仅仅是篮球——这是在全球规模上运营高级分析和机器学习。这些技术经验适用于各个行业，从实时平台到个性化内容交付和生产AI。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS European Sovereign Cloud: From concept to reality (SEC201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS欧洲主权云：从概念到现实 (SEC201)
sessions.abstract: Join AWS experts Colm and Addy for an in-depth look at the AWS European Sovereign Cloud. Explore this new, independent infrastructure's dedicated architecture, EU-based operations, operational controls coupled with governance and legal framework that powers this cloud. Learn how this cloud solution is built, operated, and secured entirely within Europe.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入AWS专家Colm和Addy，深入了解AWS欧洲主权云。探索这一全新的独立基础设施的专用架构、基于欧盟的运营、运营控制以及支撑该云的治理和法律框架。了解这一云解决方案如何完全在欧洲境内构建、运营和保护。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build a well-architected foundation for scaling generative AI and agentic apps
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为扩展生成式AI和智能体应用构建架构完善的基础
sessions.abstract:
You've seen the potential of agentic AI through proof-of-concepts, and you're ready to build a foundation that can support all AI applications across your organization. Enter the complexities: model access and management, tool discovery, memory and state handling, observability, plus deployment and operations at scale!
In this session we'll demonstrate how to build a well-architected foundation that seamlessly integrates model access, orchestration workflows, agents, tools and domain-specific data pipelines while maintaining enterprise-grade observability and governance controls. We'll examine components of a production-ready generative AI and agentic system and dive deep into the architectural patterns that separates successful deployments from failed experiments.
sessions.abstract_cn:
您已经通过概念验证看到了智能体AI的潜力，现在准备构建一个能够支持组织内所有AI应用的基础架构。但随之而来的是各种复杂性：模型访问和管理、工具发现、内存和状态处理、可观测性，以及大规模部署和运维！

在本次会议中，我们将演示如何构建一个架构良好的基础架构，它能够无缝集成模型访问、编排工作流、智能体、工具和特定领域的数据管道，同时保持企业级的可观测性和治理控制。我们将研究生产就绪的生成式AI和智能体系统的各个组件，并深入探讨将成功部署与失败实验区分开来的架构模式。

presenter.name: Aamna Najmi
presenter.title: Senior Specialist Solutions Architect Generative AI

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transform digital experience: Accelerate AWS Partner & customer success(PEX208)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 转型数字体验：加速AWS合作伙伴和客户成功(PEX208)
sessions.abstract: Revolutionize your partner business with AWS Partner Central. Learn how successful partners reduce complexity, automate processes, and scale efficiently. Discover practical approaches to streamline customer onboarding, enhance security controls, and deliver exceptional value. Leave with actionable strategies to transform operations and strengthen customer relationships with AWS. Ideal for AWS Solution Providers and Distributors focused on accelerating growth and maximizing success.
sessions.abstract_cn: 通过AWS合作伙伴中心革新您的合作伙伴业务。了解成功的合作伙伴如何降低复杂性、自动化流程并高效扩展。探索简化客户入门、增强安全控制和提供卓越价值的实用方法。带走可行的策略来转变运营并通过AWS加强客户关系。适合专注于加速增长和最大化成功的AWS解决方案提供商和分销商。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unlocking business value by integrating SAP and non-SAP data sources (MAM213)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过集成SAP和非SAP数据源释放业务价值 (MAM213)
sessions.abstract: Leading enterprises are gaining competitive advantage by seamlessly integrating their SAP and non-SAP data assets to drive actionable insights. This expert panel explores how industry leaders created an innovation platform to maximize the value of their enterprise data. They will share their experiences, best practices, and practical approaches for building a cohesive data strategy that transforms enterprise data into strategic business value.
sessions.abstract_cn: 领先企业通过无缝整合其SAP和非SAP数据资产来驱动可操作的洞察，从而获得竞争优势。本专家小组探讨行业领导者如何创建创新平台以最大化其企业数据的价值。他们将分享其经验、最佳实践以及构建统一数据战略的实用方法，将企业数据转化为战略业务价值。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Resilience of AWS Cloud: Design patterns for availability (ARC310)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 云的弹性：可用性设计模式 (ARC310)
sessions.abstract: Explore how AWS Regions are designed and operated to achieve resilience beyond traditional data centers. Learn key architectural patterns that AWS services use to maintain operations through disruptions. Discover how service teams ensure continuous availability through sophisticated design principles and operational practices. Gain insights into the foundational patterns that enable mission-critical workloads to maintain availability at scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索 AWS 区域如何设计和运营以实现超越传统数据中心的弹性。了解 AWS 服务用于在中断期间维持运营的关键架构模式。发现服务团队如何通过复杂的设计原则和运营实践确保持续可用性。深入了解使关键任务工作负载能够大规模维持可用性的基础模式。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - What's new with AWS Lambda (CNS376)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Lambda 新功能 (CNS376)
sessions.abstract: Discover the latest innovations in AWS Lambda that go beyond traditional event-driven applications. In this lightning talk, we'll showcase the game-changing capabilities that we just launched at re:Invent. Learn how these features can accelerate your development process and scale your applications effortlessly. Whether you're building proof-of-concept or production-ready solutions, see how Lambda's simplicity and power can help you deliver faster results for web applications, AI solutions, and event processing workloads.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索 AWS Lambda 超越传统事件驱动应用的最新创新。在这个闪电演讲中，我们将展示刚刚在 re:Invent 上发布的颠覆性功能。了解这些特性如何加速您的开发流程并轻松扩展您的应用程序。无论您是构建概念验证还是生产就绪的解决方案，都可以看到 Lambda 的简洁性和强大功能如何帮助您更快地交付 Web 应用程序、AI 解决方案和事件处理工作负载的成果。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Multicloud security best practices (HMC318)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 多云安全最佳实践 (HMC318)
sessions.abstract: Organizations operating in multicloud environments face challenges with distributed data security, identity management, and continuous monitoring. In this session, we will explore approaches to address multicloud security, aligned with NIST Cybersecurity Framework (CSF), an industry standard, focused on protect, detect, and respond functions. We will dive deep into security visibility via centralized logging, encryption and privacy enforcement, and centralized federation. You will learn specific architectural patterns that will help address multicloud security and identity challenges.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在多云环境中运营的组织面临分布式数据安全、身份管理和持续监控的挑战。在本次会议中，我们将探讨解决多云安全的方法，这些方法与行业标准 NIST 网络安全框架 (CSF) 保持一致，重点关注保护、检测和响应功能。我们将深入探讨通过集中式日志记录实现安全可见性、加密和隐私执行以及集中式联合身份验证。您将学习有助于解决多云安全和身份挑战的特定架构模式。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scaling Multi-Tenant SaaS Delivery with Amazon CloudFront (NET316)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon CloudFront 扩展多租户 SaaS 交付 (NET316)
sessions.abstract: Managing thousands of SaaS customer domains doesn’t have to be complex. In this session, discover how Amazon CloudFront SaaS Manager lets you deliver multi-tenant applications with speed, security - reducing operational overhead. See how to enforce security policies across every tenant, automate SSL/TLS provisioning with AWS Certificate Manager, and deliver branded, low-latency experiences worldwide. Hear from Netlify on how they deliver secure, low-latency content globally, all managed through a single unified interface serving massive SaaS customer bases with speed, reliability, and efficiency.
sessions.abstract_cn: 管理数千个 SaaS 客户域名不必复杂。在本次会议中，了解 Amazon CloudFront SaaS Manager 如何让您快速、安全地交付多租户应用程序，同时降低运营开销。了解如何在每个租户中强制执行安全策略，使用 AWS Certificate Manager 自动配置 SSL/TLS，以及在全球范围内提供品牌化的低延迟体验。听取 Netlify 分享他们如何在全球范围内交付安全、低延迟的内容，所有这些都通过单一统一界面进行管理，以速度、可靠性和效率为大规模 SaaS 客户群提供服务。

presenter.name: Sagar Desarda
presenter.title: Head of TAM & BD - Data,Analytics, GenAI ISVs

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Mary Technology is building the legal Fact Layer for agentic AI on AWS
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Mary Technology 如何在 AWS 上为智能体 AI 构建法律事实层
sessions.abstract: Discover how Mary Technology is transforming dispute resolution by cutting through the “fact chaos” buried in emails, PDFs and chats. This lightning talk shows how agentic AI manufactures verified, source-linked facts and persists them as a reusable Fact Layer - the next gap to unlock legal AI at scale - so teams move from confusion to clear, defensible outcomes faster, with transparency and trust.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Mary Technology 如何通过突破埋藏在电子邮件、PDF 和聊天记录中的"事实混乱"来变革争议解决。这个闪电演讲展示了代理 AI 如何制造经过验证的、源链接的事实，并将其持久化为可重用的事实层——这是大规模解锁法律 AI 的下一个缺口——让团队更快地从混乱转向清晰、可辩护的结果，同时保持透明度和信任。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How AI is rewriting the contact center play book (COP207)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI如何重写联络中心操作手册 (COP207)
sessions.abstract: Contact centers are at the front line of customer experience but too often, they’re weighed down by complexity, siloed tools, and reactive service models. In this lightning talk, we’ll show how Zendesk, running on AWS, is helping enterprises reimagine the contact center as an intelligent, proactive engine for customer loyalty. You’ll learn how AI and automation can deflect up to 60% of inquiries, empower agents with real-time insights, and scale seamlessly for unpredictable spikes in demand. Discover what’s possible when CX meets cloud scale where faster resolutions, happier customers, and stronger loyalty aren’t just goals, but everyday outcomes. This presentation is brought to you by Zendesk, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 联络中心处于客户体验的最前线，但往往被复杂性、孤立的工具和被动的服务模式所拖累。在这次闪电演讲中，我们将展示运行在AWS上的Zendesk如何帮助企业将联络中心重新构想为智能、主动的客户忠诚度引擎。您将了解AI和自动化如何转移多达60%的咨询，为座席提供实时洞察，并为不可预测的需求激增进行无缝扩展。探索当客户体验遇上云规模时的可能性，更快的解决方案、更满意的客户和更强的忠诚度不仅仅是目标，而是日常成果。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Zendesk为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build Enterprise AI Apps Faster: Amazon Bedrock's Multimodal Solutions -AIM3341
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 更快构建企业级AI应用：Amazon Bedrock的多模态解决方案 -AIM3341
sessions.abstract: Enterprise developers face challenges processing diverse unstructured content across multiple formats, often requiring complex integration of various AI services. Learn how Amazon Bedrock Data Automation simplifies AI application development by unifying workflows for documents, audio, images, and video into a single service. Through Air's success story discover how Bedrock Data Automation helps streamline content processing, optimizes price-performance, and enables customized insights generation. See how teams can accelerate their journey from experimentation to production while maintaining flexibility to use existing AI services where needed.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业开发人员在处理多种格式的各类非结构化内容时面临挑战，通常需要复杂地集成各种AI服务。了解Amazon Bedrock Data Automation如何通过将文档、音频、图像和视频的工作流程统一到单一服务中，简化AI应用程序开发。通过Air的成功案例，探索Bedrock Data Automation如何帮助简化内容处理、优化性价比，并实现定制化洞察生成。了解团队如何在保持灵活性以便在需要时使用现有AI服务的同时，加速从实验到生产的旅程。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Enhance Contact Center AI With Salesforce and AWS (DAT207)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Salesforce 和 AWS 增强联络中心 AI (DAT207)
sessions.abstract: Empower your service reps with a unified, AI-powered workspace and seamless voice and digital interactions with Salesforce Contact Center and Amazon Connect. This presentation is brought to you by Salesforce, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 通过Salesforce联络中心和Amazon Connect，为您的服务代表提供统一的AI驱动工作空间以及无缝的语音和数字交互体验。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Salesforce为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scaling Observability for the AI Era: From GPUs to LLMs (AIM121)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为AI时代扩展可观测性：从GPU到LLM (AIM121)
sessions.abstract: AI workloads generate unbounded telemetry – spiky inference, massive GPU fleets, and complex orchestration pipelines. Observability strategies that worked for cloud-native applications often collapse under this scale, forcing teams into costly trade-offs between fidelity, performance, and spend. In this session, we’ll explore how observability needs evolve across the AI ecosystem – from GPU providers to LLM builders, AI-native platforms, and feature adopters. Attendees will learn practical strategies for ensuring reliability, controlling costs, and maintaining visibility across diverse AI infrastructures. This presentation is brought to you by Chronosphere, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI工作负载产生无限制的遥测数据——峰值推理、大规模GPU集群和复杂的编排管道。适用于云原生应用程序的可观测性策略在这种规模下往往会崩溃，迫使团队在保真度、性能和支出之间做出昂贵的权衡。在本次会议中，我们将探讨可观测性需求如何在AI生态系统中演进——从GPU提供商到LLM构建者、AI原生平台和功能采用者。与会者将学习确保可靠性、控制成本和在多样化AI基础设施中保持可见性的实用策略。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Chronosphere为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Breaking 25 years of tech debt using AWS Transform for .NET (MAM410)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Transform for .NET 解决 25 年技术债务 (MAM410)
sessions.abstract: Discover how organizations are accelerating modernization of their legacy .NET Framework applications by up to 4x using AWS Transform. This session explores how Idemia, a leading identity solutions provider in the US, addressed 25 years of technical debt by using AWS Transform for modernizing their legacy .NET Framework applications to cross-platform .NET. We'll showcase AWS Transform's latest .NET features and share practical insights on maintaining business continuity during modernization of mission-critical applications.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解组织如何使用AWS Transform将其传统.NET Framework应用程序的现代化速度提升多达4倍。本次会议探讨了美国领先的身份解决方案提供商Idemia如何使用AWS Transform将其传统.NET Framework应用程序现代化为跨平台.NET，从而解决了25年的技术债务。我们将展示AWS Transform的最新.NET功能，并分享在关键业务应用程序现代化过程中保持业务连续性的实用见解。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Introducing Amazon S3 Access Points for FSx for NetApp ONTAP (STG217)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 介绍适用于 FSx for NetApp ONTAP 的 Amazon S3 访问点 (STG217)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Amazon S3 Access Points simplifies managing access with your Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP file data. Understand the benefits of using S3 Access Points which include access to services that work with S3 using FSx for ONTAP data, all without application changes or moving data out of file storage. Learn how to scale access for large, shared datasets, restrict access to VPC and specific account IDs, and use FSx for ONTAP file data with applications and services that work with S3.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Amazon S3 Access Points 如何简化对 Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP 文件数据的访问管理。了解使用 S3 Access Points 的优势，包括使用 FSx for ONTAP 数据访问与 S3 配合使用的服务，无需更改应用程序或将数据移出文件存储。了解如何为大型共享数据集扩展访问权限、将访问限制到 VPC 和特定账户 ID，以及将 FSx for ONTAP 文件数据与支持 S3 的应用程序和服务配合使用。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Ticketmaster: Enhancing live event experiences for fans with AWS (SPF206)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Ticketmaster：利用AWS提升粉丝现场活动体验 (SPF206)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Ticketmaster, the world's largest ticket marketplace, delivers superior live event experiences by bringing its online ticket sales and distribution platform closer to fans with AWS Local Zones. Learn how Ticketmaster overcame technical challenges by reducing latency while using AWS native compute, storage, and other services. We'll examine the architectural evolution, critical decisions, and the transformative impact of onboarding latency-sensitive applications to Local Zones. This session provides insights into how Ticketmaster's implementation sets new standards for distributed cloud, balancing innovation and improving end-user experience.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解全球最大的票务市场Ticketmaster如何通过AWS Local Zones将其在线票务销售和分发平台更贴近粉丝，从而提供卓越的现场活动体验。了解Ticketmaster如何通过降低延迟同时使用AWS原生计算、存储和其他服务来克服技术挑战。我们将探讨架构演进、关键决策以及将延迟敏感型应用程序部署到Local Zones所带来的变革性影响。本次会议将深入介绍Ticketmaster的实施如何为分布式云树立新标准，在创新与改善最终用户体验之间取得平衡。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Enabling government to streamline & ensure healthcare coverage with data-WPS208
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过数据帮助政府简化并确保医疗保险覆盖-WPS208
sessions.abstract: Covered California serves nearly 14 million residents, where success depends on data — verified, analyzed, and activated at scale. In this session, learn how Covered California uses AWS to power identity verification with AI/ML, automate call center operations with agentic technologies, and build data pipelines that pinpoint citizens and residents most at risk of losing healthcare coverage. Attendees will walk away with a blueprint for using Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL, Databricks on AWS, Amazon Connect, and AI/ML services to turn complex, regulated datasets into actionable insights. The session highlights architectures, automation approaches, and lessons learned to help government leaders unlock data as the enabler of secure, citizen-focused innovation.
sessions.abstract_cn: Covered California为近1400万居民提供服务，其成功依赖于大规模验证、分析和激活的数据。在本次会议中，了解Covered California如何使用AWS通过AI/ML支持身份验证，利用代理技术自动化呼叫中心运营，并构建数据管道来精准识别面临失去医疗保险风险的公民和居民。与会者将获得使用Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL、AWS上的Databricks、Amazon Connect和AI/ML服务将复杂的合规数据集转化为可操作洞察的蓝图。本次会议重点介绍架构、自动化方法和经验教训，帮助政府领导者将数据作为安全、以公民为中心创新的推动力。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate .NET application modernization with generative AI (DVT211)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用生成式 AI 加速 .NET 应用程序现代化 (DVT211)
sessions.abstract: Dreading the complexity and costs of migrating legacy .NET applications? Learn how you can automate and offload tedious manual tasks and port .NET Framework applications to cross-platform .NET using generative AI. Break free of the security issues, rising license costs, and challenges with scaling -- all while freeing your teams to focus on high-impact features that deliver business value.
sessions.abstract_cn: 担心迁移旧版 .NET 应用程序的复杂性和成本？了解如何使用生成式 AI 自动化和卸载繁琐的手动任务，并将 .NET Framework 应用程序移植到跨平台 .NET。摆脱安全问题、不断上涨的许可成本和扩展挑战——同时让您的团队专注于提供业务价值的高影响力功能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Code completion to agents: The evolution of development (DVT405)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从代码补全到智能体：开发的演进 (DVT405)
sessions.abstract: AI-powered coding agents are one of the most promising applications of generative AI. In this talk we will start from their humble beginnings as inline code completion tools and explain their evolution into sophisticated autonomous coding agents. Throughout the talk, we will ground our discussion in empirical evidence, presenting evaluations from public benchmarks that demonstrate the progressive improvements in each evolutionary stage. By walking through concrete examples and real-world applications, attendees will gain a comprehensive understanding of the current state of AI-powered development tools and insights into future directions in this rapidly advancing field.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI驱动的编码代理是生成式AI最具前景的应用之一。在本次演讲中，我们将从其作为内联代码补全工具的起步阶段开始，解释其演变为复杂自主编码代理的过程。在整个演讲中，我们将以实证证据为基础，展示来自公共基准测试的评估结果，这些结果展示了每个演进阶段的逐步改进。通过具体示例和实际应用案例，与会者将全面了解AI驱动开发工具的当前状态，并洞察这一快速发展领域的未来方向。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - New York Times: Best practices for migration to Amazon FSx for ONTAP (STG212)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 纽约时报：迁移到 Amazon FSx for ONTAP 的最佳实践 (STG212)
sessions.abstract: Learn and benefit from the New York Times successful FSx for ONTAP migration while understanding how to optimize the cost and performance of FSx for ONTAP for your workload. A New York Times storage architect will discuss best practices and field proven techniques for migrating your data to Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP. Discover time saving tips on how to increase scale, performance, and resilience by migrating to Amazon FSx for ONTAP. You’ll learn how to configure and optimize your FSx for NetApp deployment with high availability, ransomware protection, snapshots, auto-tiering and more.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解纽约时报成功迁移至 FSx for ONTAP 的经验，并学习如何针对您的工作负载优化 FSx for ONTAP 的成本和性能。纽约时报的存储架构师将讨论将数据迁移到 Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP 的最佳实践和经过现场验证的技术。了解通过迁移到 Amazon FSx for ONTAP 来提高规模、性能和弹性的省时技巧。您将学习如何配置和优化 FSx for NetApp 部署，包括高可用性、勒索软件防护、快照、自动分层等功能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond Reactive Scaling: Optimizing Amazon EKS Cost and Performance (COP369)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越响应式扩展：优化 Amazon EKS 成本和性能 (COP369)
sessions.abstract: Traditional Kubernetes scaling on Amazon EKS often leads to a tradeoff between performance and cost. Reactive autoscaling based on utilization metrics can’t keep pace with dynamic workloads, resulting in wasted resources or degraded performance. This session introduces a proactive approach to resource management using workload-aware policies that distinguish between critical services and batch workloads. Attendees will learn how to apply demand forecasting to anticipate traffic patterns, implement pod-level Spot management to reduce EC2 spend by up to 70%, and design an automated control system that keeps EKS environments efficient, reliable, and production-ready at scale. This presentation is brought to you by ScaleOps, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 传统的Amazon EKS上的Kubernetes扩展往往导致性能和成本之间的权衡。基于利用率指标的响应式自动扩展无法跟上动态工作负载的步伐，导致资源浪费或性能下降。本次会议介绍了一种主动的资源管理方法，使用工作负载感知策略来区分关键服务和批处理工作负载。与会者将学习如何应用需求预测来预测流量模式，实施Pod级别的Spot管理以将EC2支出减少高达70%，并设计一个自动化控制系统，使EKS环境在大规模下保持高效、可靠和生产就绪。本演示由AWS合作伙伴ScaleOps为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - See The Future of Cloud Defense: Agentic Cloud Security (AIM288)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 见证云防御的未来：智能体云安全 (AIM288)
sessions.abstract: With too much data, too little context, and not enough time, cloud security leaders and practitioners struggle to identify and resolve real business risk. Agentic AI is changing the game. Intelligent agents that think, reason, and act on your behalf take on the complexity so you can focus on what really matters. In this talk, see how Sysdig Sage™ helps secure your AWS cloud like an AI-powered teammate that reasons about business context to drive better outcomes. You'll get a firsthand look at how Sysdig accelerates risk identification and remediation, with a live demo of agentic cloud security in action. This presentation is brought to you by Sysdig, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在数据过多、上下文不足、时间紧迫的情况下，云安全领导者和从业者很难识别和解决真正的业务风险。智能体AI正在改变游戏规则。能够代表您思考、推理和行动的智能代理承担了复杂性，让您可以专注于真正重要的事情。在本次演讲中，了解Sysdig Sage™如何像一个AI驱动的队友一样帮助保护您的AWS云，通过推理业务上下文来实现更好的结果。您将亲眼看到Sysdig如何加速风险识别和修复，并观看智能体云安全的现场演示。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Sysdig为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Driving modernization using Mphasis’ Agentic AI framework (MAM219)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用Mphasis代理AI框架推动现代化 (MAM219)
sessions.abstract: Mphasis’ Agentic AI framework is redefining enterprise modernization by orchestrating intelligent agents across the software lifecycle. Built on AWS and powered by NeoZeta™, NeoCrux™, and NeoSaba™, Mphasis is revolutionizing enterprise modernization. NeoZeta™ accelerates legacy transformation through AI-driven code analysis and knowledge graph generation. NeoCrux™ enhances developer productivity with forward engineering, CI/CD integration, and GenAI-assisted coding. NeoSaba™ empowers product owners with agile artifact generation and compliance automation. Built on AWS and integrated with Bedrock and LLM Ops, this framework ensures scalable, secure, and responsible AI adoption. Join us to explore how Mphasis and AWS are shaping the future. This presentation is brought to you by Mphasis, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: Mphasis的代理AI框架通过在软件生命周期中编排智能代理，正在重新定义企业现代化。该框架基于AWS构建，由NeoZeta™、NeoCrux™和NeoSaba™驱动，Mphasis正在革命性地改变企业现代化。NeoZeta™通过AI驱动的代码分析和知识图谱生成加速遗留系统转型。NeoCrux™通过前向工程、CI/CD集成和GenAI辅助编码提升开发者生产力。NeoSaba™通过敏捷工件生成和合规自动化为产品负责人赋能。该框架基于AWS构建并与Bedrock和LLM Ops集成，确保可扩展、安全和负责任的AI采用。加入我们，探索Mphasis和AWS如何塑造未来。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Mphasis为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - HSBC & AWS: Transforming Operational Intelligence (SPS329)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 汇丰银行与AWS：运营智能转型 (SPS329)
sessions.abstract: Join HSBC and AWS to explore how organizations can use operational data and Large Language Models to boost release velocity and reduce operational burden during an incident. Discover how HSBC is transforming Change Management with Amazon Bedrock, analyzing historical trends to predict and prevent implementation failures. Learn how to extend this approach into a continuous improvement framework that turns operational data from a passive record into an active tool for risk reduction and service excellence.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入汇丰银行和AWS，探索组织如何利用运营数据和大型语言模型来提升发布速度并减少事故期间的运营负担。了解汇丰银行如何通过Amazon Bedrock转变变更管理，分析历史趋势以预测和防止实施失败。学习如何将这种方法扩展到持续改进框架中，将运营数据从被动记录转变为降低风险和提升服务卓越性的主动工具。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-Detection Engineering at Scale: Building High-Fidelity Security Operations-SEC327
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-大规模检测工程：构建高保真安全运营-SEC327
sessions.abstract: Security teams face an exponential growth in telemetry data across AWS services, third-party tools, and hybrid infrastructure. The challenge isn't just detecting threats—it's finding the real incidents among millions of daily events without overwhelming your SOC team. Join Riot games and Datadog subject matter experts as we explore battle-tested principles for building effective detection systems at scale. Drawing from real-world implementations at enterprises like Riot Games, we'll demonstrate how to leverage AWS native services alongside Datadog's security platform to create high-fidelity detection rules that actually work. This presentation is brought to you by Datadog, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 安全团队面临着AWS服务、第三方工具和混合基础设施中遥测数据的指数级增长。挑战不仅仅是检测威胁——而是在数百万日常事件中找到真正的安全事件，同时不让SOC团队不堪重负。加入Riot Games和Datadog主题专家，我们将探索在大规模环境下构建有效检测系统的实战原则。基于Riot Games等企业的真实实施经验，我们将演示如何利用AWS原生服务与Datadog安全平台相结合，创建真正有效的高保真检测规则。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Datadog为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Security Hub: Unifying & simplifying security operations at scale (SEC228)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Security Hub：大规模统一和简化安全运营 (SEC228)
sessions.abstract: AWS Security Hub is your unified security solution that helps prioritize and respond to critical security risks at scale. We'll explore how Security Hub correlates security signals across multiple sources and demonstrates enhanced visibility around these signals. Discover our new capabilities that simplify operations, and see how leading organizations like Awesome (SmugMug and Flickr) are using automated correlation, prioritization, and response to streamline their security operations. This session will showcase practical strategies for maximizing Security Hub's capabilities at scale
sessions.abstract_cn: AWS Security Hub 是您的统一安全解决方案，可帮助您大规模地确定关键安全风险的优先级并做出响应。我们将探讨 Security Hub 如何关联多个来源的安全信号，并展示围绕这些信号的增强可见性。了解我们简化操作的新功能，并了解 Awesome（SmugMug 和 Flickr）等领先组织如何使用自动化关联、优先级排序和响应来简化其安全运营。本次会议将展示大规模最大化 Security Hub 功能的实用策略

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - PhysicsX: Scaling Physics AI for Automotive Aerodynamics (STP109)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - PhysicsX：为汽车空气动力学扩展物理AI (STP109)
sessions.abstract: Physics AI models for automotive aerodynamics traditionally struggle with real-world applications due to limited training data diversity. PhysicsX addresses this challenge with their new Large Physics Model (LPM), powered by AWS's GPU-accelerated CFD simulations and active learning to generate diverse automotive geometry training data. Learn about how this foundation model significantly reduced fine-tuning requirements and has already been successfully deployed at major automotive manufacturers demonstrating how data diversity and scalable computing can drive practical engineering solutions.
sessions.abstract_cn: 汽车空气动力学物理AI模型传统上由于训练数据多样性有限而难以应用于实际场景。PhysicsX通过其新型大型物理模型(LPM)解决了这一挑战,该模型由AWS的GPU加速CFD模拟和主动学习提供支持,以生成多样化的汽车几何训练数据。了解这一基础模型如何显著减少微调需求,并已成功部署于主要汽车制造商,展示了数据多样性和可扩展计算如何推动实用工程解决方案。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Fast Track to Growth: Leveraging Partner Programs & AWS Marketplace for success
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 快速增长之路：利用合作伙伴计划和AWS Marketplace实现成功
sessions.abstract: Join AWS leaders Julia Chen, VP, Partner Core, and Matt Yanchyshyn, VP, AWS Marketplace & Partner Services, to explore how AWS is transforming partner success through profitable programs and product innovation from AWS Marketplace and Partner Services. Learn how AWS can fast-track your business growth through enhanced incentives, AI-driven automation, and global reach. Explore new features enabling faster time-to-value, including automated specialization validation, simplified contract management, and enhanced AWS Marketplace capabilities. Whether you're focused on migration acceleration, generative AI adoption, or expanding globally, you'll walk away with a plan to scale efficiently while increasing profitability. This session is intended for AWS Partners.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入AWS领导者Julia Chen（合作伙伴核心副总裁）和Matt Yanchyshyn（AWS Marketplace与合作伙伴服务副总裁），探索AWS如何通过AWS Marketplace和合作伙伴服务的盈利项目和产品创新来转变合作伙伴成功。了解AWS如何通过增强激励、AI驱动的自动化和全球覆盖来快速推进您的业务增长。探索实现更快价值实现的新功能，包括自动化专业化验证、简化合同管理和增强的AWS Marketplace功能。无论您专注于迁移加速、生成式AI采用还是全球扩张，您都将带着高效扩展同时提高盈利能力的计划离开。本会议面向AWS合作伙伴。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Introducing Nitro Isolation Engine: Transparency through Mathematics (CMP359)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 介绍 Nitro 隔离引擎：通过数学实现透明性 (CMP359)
sessions.abstract: The AWS Nitro System revolutionized cloud computing by providing always-on confidential computing, ensuring AWS has zero operator access to customer data. While AWS offers various ways to assure this protection, today we are introducing Nitro Isolation Engine as an enhancement to the Nitro System. Nitro Isolation Engine harnesses formal verification to provide mathematical certainty that customer workloads are isolated from each other and AWS operators, pioneering a new standard for  mathematically proven cloud security. Join this session to learn from our engineers how the Nitro Isolation Engine was designed and implemented for formal verification to enhance customer trust in the security of the Nitro System.
sessions.abstract_cn: AWS Nitro System通过提供始终在线的机密计算，确保AWS对客户数据零操作员访问权限，从而彻底改变了云计算。虽然AWS提供了多种方式来保证这种保护，但今天我们推出Nitro Isolation Engine作为Nitro System的增强功能。Nitro Isolation Engine利用形式化验证提供数学确定性，证明客户工作负载彼此隔离且与AWS操作员隔离，开创了数学证明云安全的新标准。加入本次会议，了解我们的工程师如何设计和实现Nitro Isolation Engine的形式化验证，以增强客户对Nitro System安全性的信任。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unleashing Generative AI for Amazon Ads at Scale (AMZ303)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模释放亚马逊广告生成式AI的潜力 (AMZ303)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Amazon Ads harnesses the power of large language models (LLMs) to enhance shopper discovery and drive better outcomes for advertisers. This session explores the AWS-based machine learning infrastructure that fuels these innovations, including fine-tuning, model serving, and real-time inference at scale. Learn how we optimized cost, latency, and reliability to deliver LLM-powered solutions across the Amazon Ads ecosystem while maintaining the high performance our customers expect.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Amazon Ads 如何利用大语言模型 (LLM) 的强大功能来增强购物者发现体验并为广告主带来更好的成果。本次会议探讨了支持这些创新的基于 AWS 的机器学习基础设施，包括微调、模型服务和大规模实时推理。了解我们如何优化成本、延迟和可靠性，以在整个 Amazon Ads 生态系统中提供由 LLM 驱动的解决方案，同时保持客户期望的高性能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Intelligent security: Protection at scale from development to production-INV214
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 智能安全：从开发到生产的大规模保护-INV214
sessions.abstract: How should your security practice adjust to handle the increasing volume of solutions your builders are creating with the help of AI? What should you do as threat actors leverage the very same tooling to reduce the cost of their attacks? Join AWS VP & CISO, Amy Herzog as she explores the answer to these questions. You’ll learn about the architectural choices and technical tradeoffs you will face as you adapt how you approach security in your business. Using real-world examples, Amy will share the strategies you need to implement AI-powered, automated protections at scale in your environment.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着构建者在AI帮助下创建的解决方案数量不断增加，您的安全实践应该如何调整？当威胁行为者利用相同的工具来降低攻击成本时，您应该怎么办？加入AWS副总裁兼首席信息安全官Amy Herzog，探索这些问题的答案。您将了解在调整业务安全方法时面临的架构选择和技术权衡。Amy将通过真实案例分享您需要在环境中大规模实施AI驱动的自动化保护所需的策略。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [NEW LAUNCH] What’s new with Amazon CloudWatch (COP363)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [新发布] Amazon CloudWatch 新功能 (COP363)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Amazon CloudWatch helps you go from data to decisions faster, simpler and more autonomously — from streamlined data ingestion and analytics workflows to new AIOps capabilities. We’ll showcase the latest innovations across CloudWatch that make ingesting and analyzing data easier at any scale. We’ll show how you can use agentic observability systems that make your operations faster and smarter. Whether you’re a builder, SRE, or product owner, discover how AWS observability is redefining how you collect, understand, and act on your telemetry.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Amazon CloudWatch 如何帮助您更快速、更简单、更自主地从数据转向决策——从简化的数据摄取和分析工作流程到全新的 AIOps 功能。我们将展示 CloudWatch 的最新创新，这些创新使任何规模的数据摄取和分析变得更加容易。我们将展示如何使用代理式可观测性系统，让您的运营更快速、更智能。无论您是构建者、SRE 还是产品负责人，都可以了解 AWS 可观测性如何重新定义您收集、理解遥测数据并采取行动的方式。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Legacy to Lakehouse: Proven Best Practices for Data Warehouse Migration
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从传统到湖仓：数据仓库迁移的成熟最佳实践
sessions.abstract: Legacy data warehouses often slow innovation with outdated code, silos, and costly migrations. In this session, we’ll share proven best practices to modernize with confidence. Learn how to profile and assess source systems, convert legacy SQL at scale with automation, and validate data integrity to avoid surprises. We’ll cover an end-to-end process—from discovery through reconciliation—that reduces risk, improves predictability, and accelerates migration timelines by up to 50%. Whether you’re moving one system or many, you’ll leave with practical tactics to streamline your journey to a modern lakehouse. This presentation is brought to you by Databricks, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 传统数据仓库往往因过时的代码、数据孤岛和昂贵的迁移成本而阻碍创新。在本次会议中，我们将分享经过验证的最佳实践，帮助您自信地进行现代化改造。了解如何分析和评估源系统，通过自动化大规模转换传统SQL，以及验证数据完整性以避免意外情况。我们将涵盖端到端流程——从发现到对账——降低风险，提高可预测性，并将迁移时间线加速多达50%。无论您是迁移一个系统还是多个系统，您都将获得实用的策略来简化向现代湖仓架构的迁移之旅。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Databricks为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Autodesk Assistant: Building an Agentic Platform on Bedrock (ISV322)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Autodesk Assistant：在 Bedrock 上构建智能体平台 (ISV322)
sessions.abstract: Autodesk tackled fragmented workflows and inconsistent experiences across its product portfolio by building the Autodesk Assistant Platform— a next-generation, agentic AI partner that unifies capabilities, anticipates needs, and performs complex tasks in collaboration with its human counterpart. Powered by Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and Strands, the platform seamlessly bridges cloud and desktop environments while coordinating domain-specific agents and MCP servers to deliver contextual insights and automate complex workflows. This session explores Autodesk's architecture, implementation approach, and key lessons learned in designing and scaling an agentic platform that breaks down product silos at enterprise scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: Autodesk通过构建Autodesk Assistant Platform——一个下一代代理式AI合作伙伴，解决了其产品组合中碎片化的工作流程和不一致的体验问题。该平台统一了各项能力，能够预测需求，并与人类协作执行复杂任务。该平台由Amazon Bedrock AgentCore和Strands提供支持，无缝连接云端和桌面环境，同时协调特定领域的代理和MCP服务器，以提供上下文洞察并自动化复杂工作流程。本次会议探讨了Autodesk的架构、实施方法，以及在企业规模下设计和扩展代理式平台以打破产品孤岛方面的关键经验教训。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Automated cloud security remediation with agentic workflows (SEC217)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用代理工作流的自动化云安全修复 (SEC217)
sessions.abstract: Today’s platform teams and SREs need to shift from a reactive operations approach to autonomous, agent-based cloud ops. In this session, you’ll learn how to build an automated, agent-driven remediation workflow by combining AWS Security Hub findings with Dynatrace Davis® AI and the MCP server. We’ll walk through a step-by-step pipeline, from detection to automated fix, where automation handles the heavy lifting and only minor steps require human interaction. Additionally, discover how AI-generated remediation assets, context-aware ticketing, and post-fix validation come together to significantly reduce MTTR and streamline DevSecOps. This presentation is brought to you by Dynatrace, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 当今的平台团队和SRE需要从被动运维方式转向自主的、基于代理的云运维。在本次会议中，您将学习如何通过结合AWS Security Hub发现、Dynatrace Davis® AI和MCP服务器来构建自动化的、代理驱动的修复工作流。我们将逐步介绍从检测到自动修复的管道，其中自动化处理繁重的工作，只有少数步骤需要人工干预。此外，了解AI生成的修复资产、上下文感知的工单系统和修复后验证如何协同工作，显著减少MTTR并简化DevSecOps。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Dynatrace为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Boomi Agentstudio- Govern Your AI Agents with Agent Control Tower (AIM103)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Boomi Agentstudio- 使用代理控制塔管理您的AI代理 (AIM103)
sessions.abstract: Elevate your enterprise AI strategy. In this session, we'll dive into the Boomi Agentstudio, integrated with Amazon Bedrock and Q Business Index, for building, orchestrating, and governing AI agents. We'll show you how to leverage Bedrock services with Boomi to create AI agents that have the business context and multi-system access they need to deliver ROI throughout your business, while ensuring you have complete control via Boomi Agent Control Tower. Discover how to unlock hyperproductivity with Boomi and AWS—accelerating business processes with AI agents that drive action and measurable value. This presentation is brought to you by Boomi, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 提升您的企业AI战略。在本次会议中，我们将深入探讨Boomi Agentstudio，它与Amazon Bedrock和Q Business Index集成，用于构建、编排和治理AI代理。我们将向您展示如何利用Bedrock服务与Boomi创建具有业务上下文和多系统访问能力的AI代理，在整个业务中实现投资回报率，同时通过Boomi Agent Control Tower确保您拥有完全控制权。了解如何通过Boomi和AWS释放超生产力——利用能够驱动行动并产生可衡量价值的AI代理加速业务流程。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Boomi为您呈现。

presenter.name: Thomas Benjamin
presenter.title: SVP of Product Development and AI Engineering

presenter.name: Christopher Hallenbeck
presenter.title: Senior Vice President & General Manager, AI & Platform

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Innovation in Identity Security: how we protect the cloud & help you do it too
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 身份安全创新：我们如何保护云并帮助您也做到这一点
sessions.abstract: Learn how AWS approaches identity as the foundation of cloud security, both for protecting AWS and enabling customer security. This session explores how AWS strengthens identity across the stack through secure-by-default design, core security mechanisms, API testing and formal verification. You'll discover innovations in access management and identity security that help organizations operate securely at scale. Capital One will present on how they have implemented AWS identity services and data perimeter controls. Walk away with practical identity security approaches for your organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解AWS如何将身份作为云安全的基础，既保护AWS自身，也为客户安全提供支持。本次会议探讨AWS如何通过默认安全设计、核心安全机制、API测试和形式化验证在整个技术栈中强化身份安全。您将了解访问管理和身份安全方面的创新，帮助组织大规模安全运营。Capital One将介绍他们如何实施AWS身份服务和数据边界控制。您将获得适用于您组织的实用身份安全方法。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Video sampling & search using ElastiCache & multimodal embeddings (DAT433)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 ElastiCache 和多模态嵌入进行视频采样和搜索 (DAT433)
sessions.abstract: Multimodal embeddings enable a wide range of video analysis capabilities, from content understanding and summarization to classification and recommendations. In this code talk, learn how to use smart sampling and video search, generating multimodal embeddings in Amazon Bedrock and using vector search powered by Amazon ElastiCache. See live coding examples to discover how to build delightful video experiences for your customers.
sessions.abstract_cn: 多模态嵌入支持广泛的视频分析功能，从内容理解和摘要到分类和推荐。在本次代码演讲中，学习如何使用智能采样和视频搜索，在Amazon Bedrock中生成多模态嵌入，并使用由Amazon ElastiCache提供支持的向量搜索。通过实时编码示例，了解如何为客户构建令人愉悦的视频体验。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scaling open source observability stack feat. Warner Bros Discovery (COP333)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 扩展开源可观测性堆栈，华纳兄弟探索频道案例分享 (COP333)
sessions.abstract: Organizations using open source observability software often face challenges in managing complex underlying infrastructure. In this session, discover how to leverage AWS managed open-source services including Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus, Amazon OpenSearch Service, Amazon Managed Grafana, and OpenTelemetry to solve these obstacles effectively. You will learn how Warner Bros. Discovery implemented open source observability using modern architectural patterns for ingesting and processing telemetry data at scale, while maintaining security, and cost efficiency to accelerate incident response.
sessions.abstract_cn: 使用开源可观测性软件的组织经常面临管理复杂底层基础设施的挑战。在本次会议中，了解如何利用AWS托管开源服务，包括Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus、Amazon OpenSearch Service、Amazon Managed Grafana和OpenTelemetry来有效解决这些障碍。您将学习Warner Bros. Discovery如何使用现代架构模式实施开源可观测性，以大规模摄取和处理遥测数据，同时保持安全性和成本效益，从而加速事件响应。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernizing Mercedes-Benz’s Global Ordering System with Gen AI (IND218)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用生成式AI现代化奔驰全球订购系统 (IND218)
sessions.abstract: Join Mercedes-Benz to learn about how they are transforming their global vehicle ordering system by migrating mainframe-based infrastructure to AWS and accelerating modernization with Generative AI. Their approach blends replatforming with AWS GenAI-driven code transformation, enabling AI agents to streamline architecture, development, and testing. This modernization secures business continuity, strengthens security, and boosts agility, resulting in a scalable, future-ready IT landscape. Supported by a robust cloud ecosystem focused on security and developer enablement, Mercedes-Benz’s journey offers valuable insights and best practices for successful application modernization and risk reduction. This presentation is brought to you by Capgemini, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入梅赛德斯-奔驰，了解他们如何通过将基于大型机的基础设施迁移到AWS并利用生成式AI加速现代化来转型其全球车辆订购系统。他们的方法将重新平台化与AWS GenAI驱动的代码转换相结合，使AI代理能够简化架构、开发和测试。这种现代化确保了业务连续性，加强了安全性，并提升了敏捷性，从而形成了可扩展的、面向未来的IT环境。在专注于安全和开发者赋能的强大云生态系统支持下，梅赛德斯-奔驰的转型之旅为成功的应用现代化和风险降低提供了宝贵的见解和最佳实践。本演示由AWS合作伙伴凯捷提供。

presenter.name: Christian Klemme
presenter.title: Senior Manager Global Key Sales Processes

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - High-performance storage for AI/ML, analytics, and HPC workloads (STG336)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 面向AI/ML、分析和HPC工作负载的高性能存储 (STG336)
sessions.abstract: AWS storage services can act as a powerful, cost-effective foundation for the most demanding high-performance workload, from genomics analysis to media rendering and real-time analytics. In this session, explore storage options that are suitable for numerous architectures, data types, and organizational requirements and that can accelerate your most performance-critical applications to speed up time to insights and time to market. From data ingestion to processing and storage, learn advanced techniques and best practices for achieving peak performance at scale for your most demanding workloads.
sessions.abstract_cn: AWS存储服务可以作为强大且经济高效的基础，支持最苛刻的高性能工作负载，从基因组学分析到媒体渲染和实时分析。在本次会议中，探索适用于众多架构、数据类型和组织需求的存储选项，这些选项可以加速您最关键的性能应用程序，缩短洞察时间和上市时间。从数据摄取到处理和存储，学习先进技术和最佳实践，为您最苛刻的工作负载实现大规模的峰值性能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Revealing the northern lights: Amazon Aurora security deep dive (DAT456)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 揭秘北极光：Amazon Aurora 安全深度剖析 (DAT456)
sessions.abstract: Researchers at the DEF CON 33 security conference shared that Amazon RDS successfully defended against their novel attack, despite the underlying open source database engine not releasing patches at the time. This is the result of years of consistent investment in security and isolation, enabling customers to focus on their applications instead of managing databases. We dive deep into the engineering and layered security architecture for Amazon Aurora, examining how multiple complementary layers including encryption, network controls, granular permissions, AWS IAM, active defense, and Amazon GuardDuty work together to protect customers' data from the infrastructure through the application interface.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在 DEF CON 33 安全会议上，研究人员分享了 Amazon RDS 成功防御了他们的新型攻击，尽管底层开源数据库引擎当时尚未发布补丁。这是多年来持续投资于安全性和隔离性的结果，使客户能够专注于应用程序而非管理数据库。我们深入探讨了 Amazon Aurora 的工程和分层安全架构，研究了包括加密、网络控制、细粒度权限、AWS IAM、主动防御和 Amazon GuardDuty 在内的多个互补层如何协同工作，从基础设施到应用程序接口全方位保护客户数据。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Navigating the future: Solutions architecture in the age of AI (ARC203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 导航未来：AI时代的解决方案架构 (ARC203)
sessions.abstract: AI is dramatically accelerating technological evolution, with new architectural primitives emerging monthly. This unprecedented pace transforms the Solutions Architect (SA) role from system designer to change navigator. Learn how SAs deliver value by enabling and de-risking rapid transformation while maintaining architectural stability. Discover strategies for developing new capabilities while preserving foundational expertise. This session explores how to guide organizations through an accelerating technology landscape where managing change has become the primary architectural challenge.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI正在显著加速技术演进，每月都有新的架构原语出现。这种前所未有的速度将解决方案架构师（SA）的角色从系统设计师转变为变革导航者。了解SA如何通过启用和降低快速转型风险来交付价值，同时保持架构稳定性。探索在保持基础专业知识的同时开发新能力的策略。本次会议探讨如何引导组织穿越加速的技术环境，在这种环境中，管理变革已成为主要的架构挑战。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Shell's HPC Evolution: Accelerating Seismic Processing with AWS GPU Innovation
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Shell的HPC演进：利用AWS GPU创新加速地震数据处理
sessions.abstract: Explore Shell's transformative journey in hybrid HPC computing, combining on-premises systems with AWS GPU capabilities for seismic processing and AI applications. The evolution from CPU-based processing to advanced GPU implementations represents a critical advancement in energy sector computing. Learn how this hybrid approach achieved 3-5x project acceleration while maintaining cost efficiency, including migration of Shell's processing code to AWS, implementation of GPU-based Full-Waveform Inversion workflows, and significant cost reductions in non-EC2 services. Gain insights into the latest developments in capacity block services, transitions to H200 GPUs, and the future of energy sector HPC through Amazon Parallel Computing Service and Energy HPC Orchestrator platforms.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索壳牌在混合高性能计算领域的转型之旅，将本地系统与AWS GPU能力相结合，用于地震处理和人工智能应用。从基于CPU的处理演进到先进的GPU实现，代表了能源行业计算的关键性进步。了解这种混合方法如何在保持成本效益的同时实现3-5倍的项目加速，包括将壳牌的处理代码迁移到AWS、实施基于GPU的全波形反演工作流程，以及在非EC2服务方面实现显著的成本降低。深入了解容量块服务的最新发展、向H200 GPU的过渡，以及通过Amazon Parallel Computing Service和Energy HPC Orchestrator平台实现能源行业高性能计算的未来。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Operating Apache Kafka and Apache Flink at scale (ANT307)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模运行 Apache Kafka 和 Apache Flink (ANT307)
sessions.abstract: Enterprises use Apache Kafka and Apache Flink for an increasing number of mission-critical use-cases, real-time analytics, application messaging, and machine learning. As this usage grows in size and scale, so does the criticality, scale, and cost of managing the Kafka and Flink clusters. Learn how customers can achieve the same or higher availability and durability of their growing clusters, both at lower unit costs and with operational simplicity with Amazon MSK (Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka), and Amazon MSF (Managed Streaming for Apache Flink).
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业越来越多地将Apache Kafka和Apache Flink用于关键任务用例、实时分析、应用程序消息传递和机器学习。随着使用规模的增长，管理Kafka和Flink集群的关键性、规模和成本也随之增加。了解客户如何通过Amazon MSK（Apache Kafka托管流服务）和Amazon MSF（Apache Flink托管流服务）以更低的单位成本和运营简便性实现不断增长的集群的相同或更高可用性和持久性。

services: Amazon Managed Service for Apache Flink
Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka (Amazon MSK)

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Symbolic AI in the age of LLMs (DAT443)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大语言模型时代的符号人工智能 (DAT443)
sessions.abstract: While generative AI captures headlines, the untapped potential lies in combining it with decades-proven symbolic AI techniques. This session explores how organizations can leverage symbolic AI, such as ontologies and logic-based reasoning to build knowledge graphs and to enhance their AI capabilities. Dive deep into these topics to understand what ontologies look like, where semantics comes from, and what it means to build working knowledge graphs. Learn concrete strategies for defining and adopting ontologies and how to use reasoning for your benefit.
sessions.abstract_cn: 虽然生成式AI占据了新闻头条，但未开发的潜力在于将其与经过数十年验证的符号AI技术相结合。本次会议探讨组织如何利用符号AI，例如本体和基于逻辑的推理来构建知识图谱并增强其AI能力。深入探讨这些主题，以了解本体的外观、语义的来源以及构建可工作的知识图谱的意义。学习定义和采用本体的具体策略，以及如何利用推理为您带来益处。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - What's new with Amazon EBS (STG202)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon EBS 新功能介绍 (STG202)
sessions.abstract: Stay ahead with the cutting-edge capabilities of Amazon's robust block storage solution in Amazon EBS. Join this session for a comprehensive overview of the latest advancements and features in Amazon Elastic Block Store (EBS). Learn about recent performance improvements, cost optimization strategies, new features that enhance data resiliency and storage efficiency, and practical insights for leveraging EBS in modern cloud environments. You will gain a deeper understanding of how to maximize the potential of Amazon EBS for your workloads.
sessions.abstract_cn: 通过 Amazon 强大的块存储解决方案 Amazon EBS 保持领先的尖端能力。参加此会议，全面了解 Amazon Elastic Block Store (EBS) 的最新进展和功能。了解最近的性能改进、成本优化策略、增强数据弹性和存储效率的新功能，以及在现代云环境中利用 EBS 的实用见解。您将更深入地了解如何最大化 Amazon EBS 在您工作负载中的潜力。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI at the speed of news: Bloomberg Media’s vision for the future (IND3331)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 新闻速度的AI：彭博媒体对未来的愿景 (IND3331)
sessions.abstract: Discover Bloomberg’s vision for an AI-driven content pipeline designed to transform natural-language queries and multimodal inputs into video content. This session outlines how Bloomberg aims to unify high-speed discovery and content assembly across audio, video, and text using semantic search patterns, OpenSearch, and Amazon Neptune. Learn how Bloomberg is shaping an approach that balances AI acceleration with human oversight — preserving accuracy and integrity while enabling more dynamic, real-time news experiences. The discussion will explore dynamically weighting data sources, tuning vector types, and using LLM-powered user intent analysis to achieve scalable, precise multimodal retrieval and content recommendations in workflows.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索彭博社对AI驱动内容管道的愿景，该管道旨在将自然语言查询和多模态输入转化为视频内容。本次会议概述了彭博社如何通过语义搜索模式、OpenSearch和Amazon Neptune统一实现跨音频、视频和文本的高速发现和内容组装。了解彭博社如何塑造一种平衡AI加速与人工监督的方法——在保持准确性和完整性的同时，实现更动态、实时的新闻体验。讨论将探讨动态加权数据源、调优向量类型，以及使用LLM驱动的用户意图分析，以在工作流程中实现可扩展、精确的多模态检索和内容推荐。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Advanced AI Security: Architecting Defense-in-Depth for AI Workloads (SEC410)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 高级 AI 安全：为 AI 工作负载构建纵深防御架构 (SEC410)
sessions.abstract: Dive deep into advanced security architectures for AI workloads, exploring how to protect your workload against sophisticated attack vectors. Through technical examples, we'll implement secure architectures for AI workloads, covering identity, fine-grained access policies, and secure foundation model deployment patterns. Learn how to harden generative and agentic AI applications using AWS security capabilities, implementing least-privilege controls, and building secure architectures at scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 深入探讨 AI 工作负载的高级安全架构，了解如何保护您的工作负载免受复杂攻击向量的威胁。通过技术示例，我们将为 AI 工作负载实施安全架构，涵盖身份验证、细粒度访问策略和安全基础模型部署模式。学习如何使用 AWS 安全功能加固生成式和代理 AI 应用程序，实施最小权限控制，并大规模构建安全架构。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Engineering at full throttle: How AWS powers Formula 1® (SPF108)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 全速工程：AWS如何为一级方程式®提供动力 (SPF108)
sessions.abstract: Join F1 Analyst and AWS Motorsports Ambassador Ruth Buscombe as she provides insights into the AWS and F1 partnership, exploring how technology innovations are changing the world of racing and improving the fan experience. Ruth will educate attendees on how AWS powers F1 on and off the track, through F1 Insights, Track Pulse, and more. Stay after the session for a replay of the recent Formula 1 Las Vegas Grand Prix™.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入F1分析师和AWS赛车运动大使Ruth Buscombe，她将深入解析AWS与F1的合作伙伴关系，探索技术创新如何改变赛车世界并提升车迷体验。Ruth将向与会者介绍AWS如何通过F1 Insights、Track Pulse等技术在赛道内外为F1提供支持。会议结束后，请留下观看最近举行的F1拉斯维加斯大奖赛™的重播。

presenter.name: Ruth Buscombe
presenter.title: F1 TV Broadcaster, Race Strategist and AWS Motorsport Ambassador and Technical Advisor

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Let's maximize your learnings at re:Invent! (GBL102)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 让我们在 re:Invent 上最大化您的学习收获！(GBL102)
sessions.abstract: [This session is conducted in Japanese] AWS re:Invent is our biggest, boldest, most comprehensive AWS event of the year, where the global cloud community unites to build the future. Building your optimized schedule that fits your learning needs is important to maximize your experiences at re:Invent. In this session, you can get new insights from 2 guest speakers who have much experience to re:Invent both of Technology focused and Business focused. You can get a chance to rebuild your plans to the event in consideration of experienced attendees plans through this session. Let's learn everything from up-coming re:Invent!
sessions.abstract_cn: [本次会议以日语进行] AWS re:Invent 是我们一年中规模最大、最具创新性、最全面的 AWS 活动，全球云社区在此聚集共同构建未来。制定符合您学习需求的优化日程安排对于最大化您在 re:Invent 的体验非常重要。在本次会议中，您可以从两位在 re:Invent 方面拥有丰富经验的嘉宾演讲者那里获得新的见解，他们分别专注于技术和业务领域。通过本次会议，您有机会参考经验丰富的参会者的计划来重新制定您的活动安排。让我们一起学习即将到来的 re:Invent 的一切！

presenter.name: Kempei Igarashi
presenter.title: Sr. SA Manager, Retail & CPG, AWS Japan

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Powering Prime Video's NASCAR Coverage: ML Fuel Analytics in Action (SPF303)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为 Prime Video 的 NASCAR 赛事报道提供支持：机器学习燃油分析的实际应用 (SPF303)
sessions.abstract: Explore the innovative NASCAR fuel estimation technology developed by AWS PACE Prototyping Team for Prime Video's race broadcasts. This initiative aimed to bring broadcast innovation through our new fuel tool to the inaugural race series on Prime Video. We'll demonstrate how the solution processes streaming telemetry data from the cars (which contains no direct fuel information) and applies both mathematical and machine learning models to 3-second intervals of the data to estimate fuel levels. Discover how real-time fuel metrics are visualized, enabling broadcasters to deliver strategic race insights. Before the series launch on Prime Video, the race fuel prediction system was extensively tested during several live races as no ground truth data was available. It achieved remarkable results with accuracy and latency, utilizing fuel consumption rate machine learning model.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索AWS PACE原型团队为Prime Video赛车直播开发的创新NASCAR燃油估算技术。该项目旨在通过我们的新燃油工具为Prime Video首届赛事系列带来直播创新。我们将展示该解决方案如何处理来自赛车的流式遥测数据（其中不包含直接的燃油信息），并对3秒间隔的数据应用数学和机器学习模型来估算燃油水平。了解实时燃油指标如何可视化，使广播公司能够提供战略性的比赛洞察。在Prime Video系列赛事启动之前，由于没有真实数据可用，赛车燃油预测系统在多场现场比赛中进行了广泛测试。该系统利用燃油消耗率机器学习模型，在准确性和延迟方面取得了显著成果。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS for VMware migrations: Successes, roadmaps, & strategies (MAM203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS VMware迁移：成功案例、路线图和策略 (MAM203)
sessions.abstract: Are you looking to migrate your VMware on-premises environment to AWS and seeking how other IT leaders completed their migration? This session brings together migration trailblazers who’ve been there. Hear firsthand how different global organizations accelerated their cloud journeys, from planning to execution. Speakers share the trusted tools, strategies, and lessons that streamlined their transitions, helping you get insights to guide your own migration. Plus, get a glimpse into their modernization roadmaps and innovation strategies. Whether you’re just starting or overcoming hurdles, you’ll gain actionable insights to drive your own cloud transformation.
sessions.abstract_cn: 您是否希望将本地VMware环境迁移到AWS，并寻求了解其他IT领导者如何完成迁移？本次会议汇聚了经验丰富的迁移先驱者。直接聆听不同全球组织如何加速其云之旅，从规划到执行的全过程。演讲者分享可信赖的工具、策略和经验教训，这些都简化了他们的转型过程，帮助您获得指导自己迁移的洞察。此外，还可以了解他们的现代化路线图和创新策略。无论您是刚刚起步还是正在克服障碍，您都将获得推动自己云转型的可行洞察。

presenter.name: Boatner Blankenstein
presenter.title: Sr. Worldwide Go-To-Market Specialist, AWS for VMware

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building enterprise-grade Agentic AI factory (PEX302)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建企业级代理式AI工厂 (PEX302)
sessions.abstract: Learn to build enterprise-scale AI systems using the new Agentic AI Factory framework, a comprehensive toolkit with pre-built agent blueprints and proven integration patterns. This deep-dive session demonstrates how to orchestrate multiple AI agents with AWS Strands Agents and Amazon Bedrock, implement secure communications via A2A and MCP protocols, and leverage the framework's knowledge management systems. Through practical demonstrations and architectural discussions, you will gain actionable insights to rapidly develop and deploy production-ready agentic AI solutions, transforming ideas into enterprise-grade systems using our proven framework and toolkit.
sessions.abstract_cn: 学习使用全新的 Agentic AI Factory 框架构建企业级 AI 系统，这是一个综合工具包，包含预构建的代理蓝图和经过验证的集成模式。本深度会议演示如何使用 AWS Strands Agents 和 Amazon Bedrock 编排多个 AI 代理，通过 A2A 和 MCP 协议实现安全通信，并利用框架的知识管理系统。通过实际演示和架构讨论，您将获得可操作的见解，以快速开发和部署生产就绪的代理式 AI 解决方案，使用我们经过验证的框架和工具包将想法转化为企业级系统。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build serverless chatbots using Amazon ElastiCache & Aurora PostgreSQL (DAT314)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon ElastiCache 和 Aurora PostgreSQL 构建无服务器聊天机器人 (DAT314)
sessions.abstract: In this session, learn how to build a serverless-first chatbot application by leveraging Amazon Aurora with pgvector as a vector store and Amazon ElastiCache Serverless for Valkey to manage chat history, semantic caching, and agent memory. Discover how to harness these services to create contextually aware, scalable chatbots with agentic capabilities that retain conversational memory across interactions. Explore architectural patterns, implementation strategies, and real-world use cases. Gain insights into optimizing query latency, performance, and cost-effectiveness. Whether you’re a developer, architect, or decision-maker, this session equips you with practical knowledge to build modern, serverless-powered chatbot applications using generative AI.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，学习如何通过利用带有pgvector的Amazon Aurora作为向量存储和Amazon ElastiCache Serverless for Valkey来管理聊天历史、语义缓存和代理内存，构建无服务器优先的聊天机器人应用程序。了解如何利用这些服务创建具有上下文感知能力的可扩展聊天机器人，具备代理功能，能够在交互过程中保持对话记忆。探索架构模式、实施策略和实际用例。深入了解如何优化查询延迟、性能和成本效益。无论您是开发人员、架构师还是决策者，本次会议都将为您提供使用生成式AI构建现代无服务器驱动聊天机器人应用程序的实用知识。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The next frontier: Building the agentic future of Financial Services (INV209)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 下一个前沿：构建金融服务的智能体未来 (INV209)
sessions.abstract: AI agents have made financial institutions more productive, efficient, and secure. But a more autonomous financial system—defined by innovations like inter-agent payments, real-time underwriting, hyper-personalized customer service, and customized lending offers—represents the industry’s next frontier. This session explores how we will get there...and beyond. After outlining a vision for the agentic future of Financial Services, we’ll hear from two customers who will share how they are building the infrastructure for AI systems that independently execute complex financial operations. We’ll learn how they are architecting these systems for compliance and scalability and what it takes to run autonomous agents in production.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI代理已使金融机构变得更高效、更有生产力且更安全。但更自主的金融系统——以代理间支付、实时承保、超个性化客户服务和定制化贷款方案等创新为特征——代表着该行业的下一个前沿领域。本次会议将探讨我们如何到达那里……以及更远的未来。在概述金融服务代理化未来的愿景后,我们将听取两位客户的分享,了解他们如何构建能够独立执行复杂金融操作的AI系统基础设施。我们将了解他们如何为合规性和可扩展性设计这些系统架构,以及在生产环境中运行自主代理所需的条件。

presenter.name: Erik Reppel
presenter.title: Head of Engineering, Coinbase Developer Platform

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Develop AI Agents faster with Amazon SageMaker Studio & Bedrock AgentCore-AIM388
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon SageMaker Studio 和 Bedrock AgentCore 更快速开发 AI 智能体 - AIM388
sessions.abstract: Perfect for both newcomers and experienced practitioners looking to accelerate their AI agent development journey, this sessions will teach you to build and deploy AI agents using Amazon SageMaker Studio and Amazon Bedrock AgentCore. In this breakout session, you'll learn how to integrate enterprise data, train custom models, and deploy production-ready agents. We'll demonstrate how to streamline the entire machine learning lifecycle, from data preparation to deployment.
sessions.abstract_cn: 无论是新手还是希望加速AI代理开发之旅的经验丰富的从业者，本次会议都将教您使用Amazon SageMaker Studio和Amazon Bedrock AgentCore构建和部署AI代理。在这个分组会议中，您将学习如何集成企业数据、训练自定义模型并部署生产就绪的代理。我们将演示如何简化整个机器学习生命周期，从数据准备到部署。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Reactive to Proactive: Infrastructure governance by design (COP352)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从被动到主动：基础设施治理的设计理念 (COP352)
sessions.abstract: Many organizations struggle to maintain consistent security controls across their cloud infrastructure as they scale, often discovering compliance violations only after resources are deployed. This reactive approach leads to security gaps, compliance issues, and costly remediation efforts. This code talk will discuss security best practices using AWS CloudFormation Hooks and AWS CloudFormation Guard, demonstrating how to prevent non-compliant infrastructure deployments before they occur. You will learn how to write CloudFormation Guard domain-specific language (DSL) rules for static template validation and integrate them with CloudFormation Hooks, including managed hooks, to enforce security standards proactively across your organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 许多组织在扩展云基础设施时难以维持一致的安全控制，往往只有在资源部署后才发现合规违规问题。这种被动方式导致安全漏洞、合规问题和昂贵的修复工作。本代码讲座将讨论使用AWS CloudFormation Hooks和AWS CloudFormation Guard的安全最佳实践，演示如何在不合规的基础设施部署发生之前进行预防。您将学习如何编写CloudFormation Guard领域特定语言(DSL)规则进行静态模板验证，并将其与CloudFormation Hooks（包括托管钩子）集成，在整个组织中主动执行安全标准。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Customize AI models & accelerate time to production with Amazon SageMaker AI
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon SageMaker AI 定制 AI 模型并加速生产部署
sessions.abstract: Southwest Airlines® operates one of the world’s most awarded airlines, offering one-of-a-kind value and hospitality at 117 airports in 11 countries, with up to 4,000+ flights daily. This massive operation is powered by technology, from selling tickets to aircraft maintenance to paying employees. What if Southwest’s 2,000+ developers could spend more time on innovative problem-solving? Join Grant Morris, Managing Director, Technology at Southwest Airlines, alongside leaders from GitLab and AWS, to discover the power of GitLab Duo and Amazon Q Developer. Hear how Southwest is enhancing developer productivity through AI-powered DevSecOps and pioneering the next frontier of agentic AI automation. This presentation is brought to you by GitLab, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 西南航空公司®运营着世界上最受赞誉的航空公司之一，在11个国家的117个机场提供独一无二的价值和服务，每日航班多达4,000多架次。这一庞大的运营由技术驱动，从售票到飞机维护再到员工薪酬支付。如果西南航空的2,000多名开发人员能够将更多时间投入到创新问题解决上会怎样？与西南航空技术总监Grant Morris以及来自GitLab和AWS的领导者一起，探索GitLab Duo和Amazon Q Developer的强大功能。了解西南航空如何通过AI驱动的DevSecOps提升开发人员生产力，并开拓智能AI自动化的下一个前沿。本演示由AWS合作伙伴GitLab为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Scalable, Self-Orchestrating AI Workflows with A2A and MCP (DEV415)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 A2A 和 MCP 构建可扩展的自编排 AI 工作流 (DEV415)
sessions.abstract: Learn how to build scalable, autonomous AI workflows using the Agent-to-Agent (A2A) protocol and Model Context Protocol (MCP). This session demonstrates how to design specialized agents that dynamically discover each other's capabilities and collaborate on complex tasks across platforms and implementations. Using MCP for standardized context integration, you'll build horizontally scalable, serverless agents with AWS Lambda, Amazon Bedrock, and Momento Cache. You'll also learn how A2A enables secure agent collaboration with built-in observability. Through real-world examples and best practices, you'll leave equipped to design, deploy, and scale interoperable AI systems in production.
sessions.abstract_cn: 学习如何使用代理到代理（A2A）协议和模型上下文协议（MCP）构建可扩展的自主AI工作流。本课程演示如何设计专门的代理，使其能够动态发现彼此的能力并在跨平台和实现中协作完成复杂任务。使用MCP进行标准化上下文集成，您将使用AWS Lambda、Amazon Bedrock和Momento Cache构建水平可扩展的无服务器代理。您还将学习A2A如何通过内置可观测性实现安全的代理协作。通过实际示例和最佳实践，您将具备在生产环境中设计、部署和扩展可互操作AI系统的能力。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Best practices to simplify resilience at scale for Gen AI data & apps (STG317)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模简化生成式AI数据和应用程序弹性的最佳实践 (STG317)
sessions.abstract: Learn how modern data protection platforms like Clumio provide automated safeguards for cloud-native applications and data lakes, helping to enable business continuity and the rapid recovery capabilities essential for AI. This presentation is brought to you by Commvault, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解像Clumio这样的现代数据保护平台如何为云原生应用程序和数据湖提供自动化保护措施，帮助实现业务连续性和AI所必需的快速恢复能力。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Commvault为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Automotive Supply Chain Optimization using AI (PEX305)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用人工智能优化汽车供应链 (PEX305)
sessions.abstract: Discover how cutting-edge AI technology is advancing supply chain management in 2025. This lecture style session demonstrates how AI-powered analytics can decode complex patterns in backlog fluctuations, dwell times, and transit metrics across your supply chain network in near real-time. Partners will learn how to leverage these advanced capabilities to deliver unprecedented visibility and predictability to their customers' supply chain operations. By implementing these solutions, you can help your customers achieve significant improvements in operational efficiency, reduce costs, and maintain a competitive edge in today's dynamic marketplace.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索尖端AI技术如何在2025年推进供应链管理。本讲座式会议演示AI驱动的分析如何近乎实时地解码供应链网络中积压波动、停留时间和运输指标的复杂模式。合作伙伴将学习如何利用这些先进功能为客户的供应链运营提供前所未有的可见性和可预测性。通过实施这些解决方案，您可以帮助客户在运营效率方面实现显著改进，降低成本，并在当今动态市场中保持竞争优势。

services: Amazon Q in AWS Supply Chain

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - PostgreSQL performance: Real-world workload tuning (DAT410)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - PostgreSQL 性能：真实工作负载调优 (DAT410)
sessions.abstract: PostgreSQL performance isn’t magic—it’s engineering. In this code talk, we dive deep into practical tuning techniques to avoid common pitfalls that silently degrade performance by improving an underperforming PostgreSQL database workload. Learn how excessive indexes hurt write throughput, why HOT updates fail, and how vacuum behavior can stall your system. We’ll demonstrate how to use Query Plan Management (QPM) and pg_hint_plan for plan stability and decode wait events to uncover hidden bottlenecks. With real SQL examples and system insights, this session equips you to tune PostgreSQL for predictable, high-performance workloads.
sessions.abstract_cn: PostgreSQL 性能不是魔法——而是工程技术。在这个代码讲座中，我们深入探讨实用的调优技术，通过改进性能不佳的 PostgreSQL 数据库工作负载来避免悄无声息地降低性能的常见陷阱。了解过多索引如何损害写入吞吐量，为什么 HOT 更新会失败，以及 vacuum 行为如何使系统停滞。我们将演示如何使用查询计划管理 (QPM) 和 pg_hint_plan 来实现计划稳定性，并解码等待事件以发现隐藏的瓶颈。通过真实的 SQL 示例和系统洞察，本次会议将帮助您调优 PostgreSQL 以实现可预测的高性能工作负载。

presenter.name: Vlad Vlasceanu
presenter.title: Sr. Principal SA, Database Tech Leader

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cyber resilience on AWS, designing security and recovery strategies (GBL204)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS上的网络韧性：设计安全和恢复策略 (GBL204)
sessions.abstract:
Cyber resilience is the ability of an organization to continuously deliver the intended outcome despite adverse cyber events. It has an overlap with disaster recovery where both cyber resilience and disaster recovery involve plans and actions to restore normal operations after an incident. Cyber resilience includes disaster recovery as part of its broader strategy.
There are multiple key themes when it comes to designing for cyber resilience:
- Protect: Proactive measures taken to safeguard systems, networks, and data.
- Prepare: Activities to ensure an organization can effectively respond to and recover from a cyber incident.
- Recover: Actions taken to restore systems, networks, and data to their normal state after a cyber incident.
sessions.abstract_cn:
网络韧性是组织在遭遇不利网络事件时持续交付预期成果的能力。它与灾难恢复有重叠之处，两者都涉及在事件发生后恢复正常运营的计划和行动。网络韧性将灾难恢复作为其更广泛战略的一部分。

在设计网络韧性时有多个关键主题：
- 保护：采取主动措施来保护系统、网络和数据。
- 准备：确保组织能够有效响应网络事件并从中恢复的活动。
- 恢复：在网络事件发生后将系统、网络和数据恢复到正常状态所采取的行动。

presenter.name: Cristian Critelli
presenter.title: EMEA Networking & Resilience Lead Specialist Partner Solution Architect

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - BYOK: The Key to Meeting Enterprise SaaS Security Demands (ISV405)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - BYOK：满足企业SaaS安全需求的关键 (ISV405)
sessions.abstract: Software providers face increasing pressure from enterprise customers demanding greater control over their data protection and sovereignty. This session demonstrates how ISVs can leverage AWS KMS and client-side encryption to implement robust customer-managed key capabilities. We'll explore architectural patterns, implementation challenges, and best practices that help software providers meet enterprise security requirements while maintaining operational efficiency. Cloud architects and security professionals at software providers (ISVs) will learn how to enhance their platform's security posture and create a competitive advantage in the enterprise market.
sessions.abstract_cn: 软件提供商面临来自企业客户日益增长的压力，这些客户要求对其数据保护和主权拥有更大的控制权。本次会议演示了独立软件供应商（ISV）如何利用 AWS KMS 和客户端加密来实现强大的客户管理密钥功能。我们将探讨架构模式、实施挑战和最佳实践，帮助软件提供商满足企业安全要求，同时保持运营效率。软件提供商（ISV）的云架构师和安全专业人员将学习如何增强其平台的安全态势，并在企业市场中创造竞争优势。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - SageMaker HyperPod: Checkpointless & elastic training for AI models (AIM3338)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - SageMaker HyperPod：AI模型的无检查点弹性训练 (AIM3338)
sessions.abstract: Transform your generative AI model development with checkpointless and elastic training on Amazon SageMaker HyperPod. Learn how checkpointless training eliminates costly downtime by automatically recovering from infrastructure faults in minutes instead of hours, using peer-to-peer state transfer without relying on restarting from checkpoints. Discover how elastic training can dynamically expand to claim idle accelerators or gracefully contract when higher-priority tasks need capacity, all without manual intervention. See how these innovations help you maintain forward training momentum despite infrastructure faults or fluctuations in resource availability, helping you scale and accelerate generative AI model development across hundreds to thousands of AI accelerators.
sessions.abstract_cn: 使用Amazon SageMaker HyperPod上的无检查点和弹性训练来变革您的生成式AI模型开发。了解无检查点训练如何通过使用点对点状态传输自动从基础设施故障中恢复，在几分钟而非几小时内消除昂贵的停机时间，而无需依赖从检查点重启。探索弹性训练如何动态扩展以占用空闲加速器，或在高优先级任务需要容量时优雅收缩，所有这些都无需人工干预。了解这些创新如何帮助您在基础设施故障或资源可用性波动的情况下保持前向训练动力，帮助您在数百到数千个AI加速器上扩展和加速生成式AI模型开发。

presenter.name: Anirudh Viswanathan
presenter.title: Senior Technical Product Manager, Amazon Web Services

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - What's new in Amazon Redshift and Amazon Athena (ANT206)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Redshift 和 Amazon Athena 新功能 (ANT206)
sessions.abstract: Learn how AWS is enhancing its SQL analytics offerings with new capabilities in Amazon Redshift and Amazon Athena. Discover how Redshift's AI-powered data warehousing capabilities are enabling customers to modernize their analytics workloads with enhanced performance and cost optimization. Explore Athena's latest features for interactively querying data directly in their Amazon S3 data lakes. This session showcases new features and real-world examples of how organizations are using these services to accelerate business insights while optimizing costs.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解AWS如何通过Amazon Redshift和Amazon Athena的新功能增强其SQL分析产品。探索Redshift的AI驱动数据仓库功能如何帮助客户通过增强的性能和成本优化来现代化其分析工作负载。了解Athena在Amazon S3数据湖中直接交互式查询数据的最新功能。本会议展示了新功能和组织如何使用这些服务在优化成本的同时加速业务洞察的实际案例。

presenter.name: Imran Moin
presenter.title: Senior Manager, Product Management, Amazon Redshift

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating sustainability compliance with AI-powered document review (AIM237)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用AI驱动的文档审查加速可持续性合规 (AIM237)
sessions.abstract: Sustainability regulations require extensive documentation reviews, creating bottlenecks in compliance workflows. RAPID (Review & Assessment Powered by Intelligent Documentation) transforms this process using AI with a human-in-the-loop approach. This solution dramatically accelerates certification and regulatory compliance document reviews - processes traditionally requiring significant expert review hours. RAPID structures complex regulatory checklists, applies AI to identify compliance issues, and maintains human oversight for critical decisions. The solution's serverless architecture enables organizations to start small and scale efficiently, reducing review time while improving assessment quality. Learn how RAPID helps organizations overcome administrative barriers and focus resources on implementing sustainable practices rather than paperwork.
sessions.abstract_cn: 可持续发展法规要求进行大量的文档审查，在合规工作流程中造成瓶颈。RAPID（由智能文档驱动的审查与评估）通过人机协作的AI方法改变了这一流程。该解决方案显著加速了认证和监管合规文档审查——这些流程传统上需要大量专家审查时间。RAPID构建复杂的监管检查清单，应用AI识别合规问题，并对关键决策保持人工监督。该解决方案的无服务器架构使组织能够从小规模开始并高效扩展，在缩短审查时间的同时提高评估质量。了解RAPID如何帮助组织克服行政障碍，将资源集中在实施可持续实践而非文书工作上。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Warner Music Group: Apache Iceberg on AWS & Snowflake (ANT205)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 华纳音乐集团：AWS 和 Snowflake 上的 Apache Iceberg (ANT205)
sessions.abstract: In the fast-paced world of music and entertainment, data is a critical asset. This session explores how Warner Music Group is using an open-source data format to drive innovation. Join Michael Jones, Director of Software Engineering at Warner Music Group, to learn how Apache Iceberg tables enable an interoperable data ecosystem that unifies first- and third-party sources. By pairing Iceberg with Snowflake’s innovations, Warner Music is unlocking deeper analytics today while also setting the stage for advanced machine learning and AI initiatives on AWS. This presentation is brought to you by Snowflake, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在快节奏的音乐和娱乐世界中，数据是关键资产。本次会议探讨华纳音乐集团如何使用开源数据格式推动创新。加入华纳音乐集团软件工程总监Michael Jones，了解Apache Iceberg表如何实现可互操作的数据生态系统，统一第一方和第三方数据源。通过将Iceberg与Snowflake的创新相结合，华纳音乐正在释放更深层次的分析能力，同时为在AWS上的高级机器学习和AI计划奠定基础。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Snowflake提供支持。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Advanced RAG Architectures: From Basic Retrieval to Agentic RAG  (NTA403)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 高级RAG架构：从基础检索到智能体RAG (NTA403)
sessions.abstract: Join us for this hands-on Code Talk where we'll dive deep into building advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) architectures that effectively handle large-scale documents. Through live coding demonstrations, we'll explore techniques to enhance retrieval accuracy and context preservation when dealing with complex documents. Watch and code along as we implement multi-step RAG, recursive retrieval, and agent-driven approaches that intelligently chunk and process large texts, decompose queries, evaluate responses, and orchestrate complex tasks. You'll see real AWS customer code examples and learn practical strategies for building more accurate, scalable Generative AI applications. Bring your laptop and questions for this interactive session with AWS experts.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们这个实践性代码讲座，深入构建能够有效处理大规模文档的高级检索增强生成（RAG）架构。通过现场编码演示，我们将探索提高检索准确性和上下文保持的技术，特别是在处理复杂文档时。观看并跟随我们实现多步骤RAG、递归检索和智能代理驱动方法，这些方法能够智能地分块和处理大型文本、分解查询、评估响应并编排复杂任务。您将看到真实的AWS客户代码示例，学习构建更准确、可扩展的生成式AI应用程序的实用策略。请携带您的笔记本电脑和问题，参与这个与AWS专家的互动会议。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Grounding GenAI on Enterprise Data with AWS AgentCore + Coveo (MAM221)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS AgentCore + Coveo 在企业数据上构建生成式AI基础 (MAM221)
sessions.abstract: Building chatbots and GenAI experiences for regulated industries like healthcare and financial services requires more than a prompt and an LLM. It demands an architecture that enforces data access control, auditability, and precision—at scale. In this technical session, we’ll walk through how large corporations design and deploy secure, high-performing agentic chat experiences using AWS AgentCore and Coveo’s Retrieval APIs. We’ll also cover lessons learned from real-world deployments—including how teams across healthcare organizations and global banks are using this architecture to support high-confidence GenAI workflows for patients, advisors, and support agents. This presentation is brought to you by Coveo, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 为受监管行业（如医疗保健和金融服务）构建聊天机器人和生成式AI体验不仅仅需要提示词和大语言模型。它需要一个能够强制执行数据访问控制、可审计性和精确性的架构——并且能够大规模运行。在这个技术会议中，我们将演示大型企业如何使用AWS AgentCore和Coveo的检索API来设计和部署安全、高性能的智能体聊天体验。我们还将分享从实际部署中获得的经验教训——包括医疗保健组织和全球银行的团队如何使用这种架构来为患者、顾问和支持代理提供高可信度的生成式AI工作流程。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Coveo提供。
